34.transliteration: bְּnֵ֣y yַaֲkֹ֗b bָּ֚avּ aַl־hַ֣chֲlָlִ֔yם vַyָּbֹ֖zּvּ hָaִ֑yr aֲshֶׁ֥r tִmְּa֖vּ aֲchvֹtָֽם׃

34.hebrewText: אֶת־צֹאנָ֥ם וְאֶת־בְּקָרָ֖ם וְאֶת־חֲמֹרֵיהֶ֑ם וְאֵ֧ת אֲשֶׁר־בָּעִ֛יר וְאֶת־אֲשֶׁ֥ר בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה לָקָֽחוּ׃
34.englishText: They seized their flocks and herds and asses, all that was inside the town and outside;
34.transliteration: aֶt־tsֹanָ֥ם vְaֶt־bְּkָrָ֖ם vְaֶt־chֲmֹrֵyhֶ֑ם vְaֵ֧t aֲshֶׁr־bָּaִ֛yr vְaֶt־aֲshֶׁ֥r bַּshָּׂdֶ֖h lָkָֽchvּ׃

34.hebrewText: וְאֶת־כׇּל־חֵילָ֤ם וְאֶת־כׇּל־טַפָּם֙ וְאֶת־נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם שָׁב֖וּ וַיָּבֹ֑זּוּ וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֥ר בַּבָּֽיִת׃
34.englishText: all their wealth, all their children, and their wives, all that was in the houses, they took as captives and booty.
34.transliteration: vְaֶt־kׇּl־chֵylָ֤ם vְaֶt־kׇּl־tַpָּם֙ vְaֶt־nְshֵׁyhֶ֔ם shָׁb֖vּ vַyָּbֹ֑zּvּ vְaֵ֖t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֥r bַּbָּֽyִt׃

34.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יַעֲקֹ֜ב אֶל־שִׁמְע֣וֹן וְאֶל־לֵוִי֮ עֲכַרְתֶּ֣ם אֹתִי֒ לְהַבְאִישֵׁ֙נִי֙ בְּיֹשֵׁ֣ב הָאָ֔רֶץ בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י וּבַפְּרִזִּ֑י וַאֲנִי֙ מְתֵ֣י מִסְפָּ֔ר וְנֶאֶסְפ֤וּ עָלַי֙ וְהִכּ֔וּנִי וְנִשְׁמַדְתִּ֖י אֲנִ֥י וּבֵיתִֽי׃
34.englishText: Jacob said to Simeon and Levi, “You have brought trouble on me, making me odious among the inhabitants of the land, the Canaanites and the Perizzites; my fighters*fighters Heb. metim (in construct form); cf. Deut. 2.34; 3.6; Isa. 3.25. NJPS “men.” are few in number, so that if they unite against me and attack me, I and my house will be destroyed.”
34.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yַaֲkֹ֜b aֶl־shִׁmְa֣vֹן vְaֶl־lֵvִy֮ aֲkַrְtֶּ֣ם aֹtִy֒ lְhַbְaִyshֵׁ֙nִy֙ bְּyֹshֵׁ֣b hָaָ֔rֶץ bַּֽkְּnַaֲnִ֖y vּbַpְּrִzִּ֑y vַaֲnִy֙ mְtֵ֣y mִsְpָּ֔r vְnֶaֶsְp֤vּ aָlַy֙ vְhִkּ֔vּnִy vְnִshְׁmַdְtִּ֖y aֲnִ֥y vּbֵytִֽy׃

34.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֑וּ הַכְזוֹנָ֕ה יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה אֶת־אֲחוֹתֵֽנוּ׃ {פ}
34.englishText: But they answered, “Should our sister be treated like a whore?”
34.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֑vּ hַkְzvֹnָ֕h yַaֲshֶׂ֖h aֶt־aֲchvֹtֵֽnvּ׃ {p}

35.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר אֱלֹהִים֙ אֶֽל־יַעֲקֹ֔ב ק֛וּם עֲלֵ֥ה בֵֽית־אֵ֖ל וְשֶׁב־שָׁ֑ם וַעֲשֵׂה־שָׁ֣ם מִזְבֵּ֔חַ לָאֵל֙ הַנִּרְאֶ֣ה אֵלֶ֔יךָ בְּבׇ֨רְחֲךָ֔ מִפְּנֵ֖י עֵשָׂ֥ו אָחִֽיךָ׃
35.englishText: God said to Jacob, “Arise, go up to Bethel and remain there; and build an altar there to the God who appeared to you when you were fleeing from your brother Esau.”
35.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr aֱlֹhִyם֙ aֶֽl־yַaֲkֹ֔b k֛vּם aֲlֵ֥h bֵֽyt־aֵ֖l vְshֶׁb־shָׁ֑ם vַaֲshֵׂh־shָׁ֣ם mִzְbֵּ֔chַ lָaֵl֙ hַnִּrְaֶ֣h aֵlֶ֔yךָ bְּbׇ֨rְchֲךָ֔ mִpְּnֵ֖y aֵshָׂ֥v aָchִֽyךָ׃

35.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יַעֲקֹב֙ אֶל־בֵּית֔וֹ וְאֶ֖ל כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר עִמּ֑וֹ הָסִ֜רוּ אֶת־אֱלֹהֵ֤י הַנֵּכָר֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר בְּתֹכְכֶ֔ם וְהִֽטַּהֲר֔וּ וְהַחֲלִ֖יפוּ שִׂמְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃
35.englishText: So Jacob said to his household and to all who were with him, “Rid yourselves of the alien gods in your midst, purify yourselves, and change your clothes.
35.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yַaֲkֹb֙ aֶl־bֵּyt֔vֹ vְaֶ֖l kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֣r aִmּ֑vֹ hָsִ֜rvּ aֶt־aֱlֹhֵ֤y hַnֵּkָr֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r bְּtֹkְkֶ֔ם vְhִֽtַּhֲr֔vּ vְhַchֲlִ֖ypvּ shִׂmְlֹtֵykֶֽם׃

35.hebrewText: וְנָק֥וּמָה וְנַעֲלֶ֖ה בֵּֽית־אֵ֑ל וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־שָּׁ֣ם מִזְבֵּ֗חַ לָאֵ֞ל הָעֹנֶ֤ה אֹתִי֙ בְּי֣וֹם צָֽרָתִ֔י וַֽיְהִי֙ עִמָּדִ֔י בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ אֲשֶׁ֥ר הָלָֽכְתִּי׃
35.englishText: Come, let us go up to Bethel, and I will build an altar there to the God who answered me when I was in distress and who has been with me wherever I have gone.”
35.transliteration: vְnָk֥vּmָh vְnַaֲlֶ֖h bֵּֽyt־aֵ֑l vְaֶֽaֱshֶׂh־shָּׁ֣ם mִzְbֵּ֗chַ lָaֵ֞l hָaֹnֶ֤h aֹtִy֙ bְּy֣vֹם tsָֽrָtִ֔y vַֽyְhִy֙ aִmָּdִ֔y bַּdֶּ֖rֶךְ aֲshֶׁ֥r hָlָֽkְtִּy׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ אֶֽל־יַעֲקֹ֗ב אֵ֣ת כׇּל־אֱלֹהֵ֤י הַנֵּכָר֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר בְּיָדָ֔ם וְאֶת־הַנְּזָמִ֖ים אֲשֶׁ֣ר בְּאׇזְנֵיהֶ֑ם וַיִּטְמֹ֤ן אֹתָם֙ יַעֲקֹ֔ב תַּ֥חַת הָאֵלָ֖ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר עִם־שְׁכֶֽם׃
35.englishText: They gave to Jacob all the alien gods that they had, and the rings that were in their ears, and Jacob buried them under the terebinth that was near Shechem.
35.transliteration: vַyִּtְּn֣vּ aֶֽl־yַaֲkֹ֗b aֵ֣t kׇּl־aֱlֹhֵ֤y hַnֵּkָr֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r bְּyָdָ֔ם vְaֶt־hַnְּzָmִ֖yם aֲshֶׁ֣r bְּaׇzְnֵyhֶ֑ם vַyִּtְmֹ֤ן aֹtָם֙ yַaֲkֹ֔b tַּ֥chַt hָaֵlָ֖h aֲshֶׁ֥r aִם־shְׁkֶֽם׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּסָּ֑עוּ וַיְהִ֣י ׀ חִתַּ֣ת אֱלֹהִ֗ים עַל־הֶֽעָרִים֙ אֲשֶׁר֙ סְבִיב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם וְלֹ֣א רָֽדְפ֔וּ אַחֲרֵ֖י בְּנֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃
35.englishText: As they set out, a terror from God fell on the cities round about, so that they did not pursue the sons of Jacob.
35.transliteration: vַyִּsָּ֑avּ vַyְhִ֣y ׀ chִtַּ֣t aֱlֹhִ֗yם aַl־hֶֽaָrִyם֙ aֲshֶׁr֙ sְbִyb֣vֹtֵyhֶ֔ם vְlֹ֣a rָֽdְp֔vּ aַchֲrֵ֖y bְּnֵ֥y yַaֲkֹֽb׃

35.hebrewText: וַיָּבֹ֨א יַעֲקֹ֜ב ל֗וּזָה אֲשֶׁר֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן הִ֖וא בֵּֽית־אֵ֑ל ה֖וּא וְכׇל־הָעָ֥ם אֲשֶׁר־עִמּֽוֹ׃
35.englishText: Thus Jacob came to Luz—that is, Bethel—in the land of Canaan, he and all the people who were with him.
35.transliteration: vַyָּbֹ֨a yַaֲkֹ֜b l֗vּzָh aֲshֶׁr֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן hִ֖va bֵּֽyt־aֵ֑l h֖vּa vְkׇl־hָaָ֥ם aֲshֶׁr־aִmּֽvֹ׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּ֤בֶן שָׁם֙ מִזְבֵּ֔חַ וַיִּקְרָא֙ לַמָּק֔וֹם אֵ֖ל בֵּֽית־אֵ֑ל כִּ֣י שָׁ֗ם נִגְל֤וּ אֵלָיו֙ הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים בְּבׇרְח֖וֹ מִפְּנֵ֥י אָחִֽיו׃
35.englishText: There he built an altar and named the site El-bethel,*El-bethel “The God of Bethel.” for it was there that God had been revealed to him when he was fleeing from his brother.
35.transliteration: vַyִּ֤bֶן shָׁם֙ mִzְbֵּ֔chַ vַyִּkְrָa֙ lַmָּk֔vֹם aֵ֖l bֵּֽyt־aֵ֑l kִּ֣y shָׁ֗ם nִgְl֤vּ aֵlָyv֙ hָֽaֱlֹhִ֔yם bְּbׇrְch֖vֹ mִpְּnֵ֥y aָchִֽyv׃

35.hebrewText: וַתָּ֤מׇת דְּבֹרָה֙ מֵינֶ֣קֶת רִבְקָ֔ה וַתִּקָּבֵ֛ר מִתַּ֥חַת לְבֵֽית־אֵ֖ל תַּ֣חַת הָֽאַלּ֑וֹן וַיִּקְרָ֥א שְׁמ֖וֹ אַלּ֥וֹן בָּכֽוּת׃ {פ}
35.englishText: Deborah, Rebekah’s nurse, died, and was buried under the oak below Bethel; so it was named Allon-bacuth.*Allon-bacuth Understood as “the oak of the weeping.”
35.transliteration: vַtָּ֤mׇt dְּbֹrָh֙ mֵynֶ֣kֶt rִbְkָ֔h vַtִּkָּbֵ֛r mִtַּ֥chַt lְbֵֽyt־aֵ֖l tַּ֣chַt hָֽaַlּ֑vֹן vַyִּkְrָ֥a shְׁm֖vֹ aַlּ֥vֹן bָּkֽvּt׃ {p}

35.hebrewText: וַיֵּרָ֨א אֱלֹהִ֤ים אֶֽל־יַעֲקֹב֙ ע֔וֹד בְּבֹא֖וֹ מִפַּדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ אֹתֽוֹ׃
35.englishText: God appeared again to Jacob on his arrival from Paddan-aram. God blessed him,
35.transliteration: vַyֵּrָ֨a aֱlֹhִ֤yם aֶֽl־yַaֲkֹb֙ a֔vֹd bְּbֹa֖vֹ mִpַּdַּ֣ן aֲrָ֑ם vַyְbָ֖rֶךְ aֹtֽvֹ׃

35.hebrewText: וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ל֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים שִׁמְךָ֣ יַעֲקֹ֑ב לֹֽא־יִקָּרֵא֩ שִׁמְךָ֨ ע֜וֹד יַעֲקֹ֗ב כִּ֤י אִם־יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ יִהְיֶ֣ה שְׁמֶ֔ךָ וַיִּקְרָ֥א אֶת־שְׁמ֖וֹ יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃
35.englishText:
saying to him,
“You whose name is Jacob,
You shall be called Jacob no more,
But Israel shall be your name.” Thus he was named Israel.
35.transliteration: vַyֹּֽamֶr־l֥vֹ aֱlֹhִ֖yם shִׁmְךָ֣ yַaֲkֹ֑b lֹֽa־yִkָּrֵa֩ shִׁmְךָ֨ a֜vֹd yַaֲkֹ֗b kִּ֤y aִם־yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ yִhְyֶ֣h shְׁmֶ֔ךָ vַyִּkְrָ֥a aֶt־shְׁm֖vֹ yִshְׂrָaֵֽl׃

35.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֩אמֶר֩ ל֨וֹ אֱלֹהִ֜ים אֲנִ֨י אֵ֤ל שַׁדַּי֙ פְּרֵ֣ה וּרְבֵ֔ה גּ֛וֹי וּקְהַ֥ל גּוֹיִ֖ם יִהְיֶ֣ה מִמֶּ֑ךָּ וּמְלָכִ֖ים מֵחֲלָצֶ֥יךָ יֵצֵֽאוּ׃
35.englishText:
And God said to him,
“I am El Shaddai.*El Shaddai Cf. 17.1.
Be fertile and increase;
A nation, yea an assembly of nations,
Shall descend from you.
Kings shall issue from your loins.
35.transliteration: vַyֹּ֩amֶr֩ l֨vֹ aֱlֹhִ֜yם aֲnִ֨y aֵ֤l shַׁdַּy֙ pְּrֵ֣h vּrְbֵ֔h gּ֛vֹy vּkְhַ֥l gּvֹyִ֖ם yִhְyֶ֣h mִmֶּ֑ךָּ vּmְlָkִ֖yם mֵchֲlָtsֶ֥yךָ yֵtsֵֽavּ׃

35.hebrewText: וְאֶת־הָאָ֗רֶץ אֲשֶׁ֥ר נָתַ֛תִּי לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם וּלְיִצְחָ֖ק לְךָ֣ אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֥ אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ אֶתֵּ֥ן אֶת־הָאָֽרֶץ׃
35.englishText:
The land that I assigned to Abraham and Isaac
I assign to you;
And to your offspring to come
Will I assign the land.”
35.transliteration: vְaֶt־hָaָ֗rֶץ aֲshֶׁ֥r nָtַ֛tִּy lְaַbְrָhָ֥ם vּlְyִtsְchָ֖k lְךָ֣ aֶtְּnֶ֑nָּh vּֽlְzַrְaֲךָ֥ aַchֲrֶ֖yךָ aֶtֵּ֥ן aֶt־hָaָֽrֶץ׃

35.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַל מֵעָלָ֖יו אֱלֹהִ֑ים בַּמָּק֖וֹם אֲשֶׁר־דִּבֶּ֥ר אִתּֽוֹ׃
35.englishText: God parted from him at the spot where [God] had spoken to him;
35.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַl mֵaָlָ֖yv aֱlֹhִ֑yם bַּmָּk֖vֹם aֲshֶׁr־dִּbֶּ֥r aִtּֽvֹ׃

35.hebrewText: וַיַּצֵּ֨ב יַעֲקֹ֜ב מַצֵּבָ֗ה בַּמָּק֛וֹם אֲשֶׁר־דִּבֶּ֥ר אִתּ֖וֹ מַצֶּ֣בֶת אָ֑בֶן וַיַּסֵּ֤ךְ עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ נֶ֔סֶךְ וַיִּצֹ֥ק עָלֶ֖יהָ שָֽׁמֶן׃
35.englishText: and Jacob set up a pillar at the site where [God] had spoken to him, a pillar of stone, and he offered a libation on it and poured oil upon it.
35.transliteration: vַyַּtsֵּ֨b yַaֲkֹ֜b mַtsֵּbָ֗h bַּmָּk֛vֹם aֲshֶׁr־dִּbֶּ֥r aִtּ֖vֹ mַtsֶּ֣bֶt aָ֑bֶן vַyַּsֵּ֤ךְ aָlֶ֙yhָ֙ nֶ֔sֶךְ vַyִּtsֹ֥k aָlֶ֖yhָ shָֽׁmֶן׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרָ֨א יַעֲקֹ֜ב אֶת־שֵׁ֣ם הַמָּק֗וֹם אֲשֶׁר֩ דִּבֶּ֨ר אִתּ֥וֹ שָׁ֛ם אֱלֹהִ֖ים בֵּֽית־אֵֽל׃
35.englishText: Jacob gave the site, where God had spoken to him, the name of Bethel.
35.transliteration: vַyִּkְrָ֨a yַaֲkֹ֜b aֶt־shֵׁ֣ם hַmָּk֗vֹם aֲshֶׁr֩ dִּbֶּ֨r aִtּ֥vֹ shָׁ֛ם aֱlֹhִ֖yם bֵּֽyt־aֵֽl׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּסְעוּ֙ מִבֵּ֣ית אֵ֔ל וַֽיְהִי־ע֥וֹד כִּבְרַת־הָאָ֖רֶץ לָב֣וֹא אֶפְרָ֑תָה וַתֵּ֥לֶד רָחֵ֖ל וַתְּקַ֥שׁ בְּלִדְתָּֽהּ׃
35.englishText: They set out from Bethel; but when they were still some distance short of Ephrath, Rachel was in childbirth, and she had hard labor.
35.transliteration: vַyִּsְavּ֙ mִbֵּ֣yt aֵ֔l vַֽyְhִy־a֥vֹd kִּbְrַt־hָaָ֖rֶץ lָb֣vֹa aֶpְrָ֑tָh vַtֵּ֥lֶd rָchֵ֖l vַtְּkַ֥shׁ bְּlִdְtָּֽhּ׃

35.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֥י בְהַקְשֹׁתָ֖הּ בְּלִדְתָּ֑הּ וַתֹּ֨אמֶר לָ֤הּ הַמְיַלֶּ֙דֶת֙ אַל־תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י כִּֽי־גַם־זֶ֥ה לָ֖ךְ בֵּֽן׃
35.englishText: When her labor was at its hardest, the midwife said to her, “Have no fear, for it is another boy for you.”
35.transliteration: vַyְhִ֥y bְhַkְshֹׁtָ֖hּ bְּlִdְtָּ֑hּ vַtֹּ֨amֶr lָ֤hּ hַmְyַlֶּ֙dֶt֙ aַl־tִּ֣yrְaִ֔y kִּֽy־gַם־zֶ֥h lָ֖ךְ bֵּֽן׃

35.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֞י בְּצֵ֤את נַפְשָׁהּ֙ כִּ֣י מֵ֔תָה וַתִּקְרָ֥א שְׁמ֖וֹ בֶּן־אוֹנִ֑י וְאָבִ֖יו קָֽרָא־ל֥וֹ בִנְיָמִֽין׃
35.englishText: But as she breathed her last—for she was dying—she named him Ben-oni;*Ben-oni Understood as “son of my suffering (or, strength).” but his father called him Benjamin.*Benjamin I.e., “son of the right hand,” or “son of the south.”
35.transliteration: vַyְhִ֞y bְּtsֵ֤at nַpְshָׁhּ֙ kִּ֣y mֵ֔tָh vַtִּkְrָ֥a shְׁm֖vֹ bֶּן־avֹnִ֑y vְaָbִ֖yv kָֽrָa־l֥vֹ bִnְyָmִֽyן׃

35.hebrewText: וַתָּ֖מׇת רָחֵ֑ל וַתִּקָּבֵר֙ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ אֶפְרָ֔תָה הִ֖וא בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃
35.englishText: Thus Rachel died. She was buried on the road to Ephrath—now Bethlehem.
35.transliteration: vַtָּ֖mׇt rָchֵ֑l vַtִּkָּbֵr֙ bְּdֶ֣rֶךְ aֶpְrָ֔tָh hִ֖va bֵּ֥yt lָֽchֶם׃

35.hebrewText: וַיַּצֵּ֧ב יַעֲקֹ֛ב מַצֵּבָ֖ה עַל־קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ הִ֛וא מַצֶּ֥בֶת קְבֻֽרַת־רָחֵ֖ל עַד־הַיּֽוֹם׃
35.englishText: Over her grave Jacob set up a pillar; it is the pillar at Rachel’s grave to this day.
35.transliteration: vַyַּtsֵּ֧b yַaֲkֹ֛b mַtsֵּbָ֖h aַl־kְbֻrָtָ֑hּ hִ֛va mַtsֶּ֥bֶt kְbֻֽrַt־rָchֵ֖l aַd־hַyּֽvֹם׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּסַּ֖ע יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל וַיֵּ֣ט אׇֽהֳלֹ֔ה מֵהָ֖לְאָה לְמִגְדַּל־עֵֽדֶר׃
35.englishText: Israel journeyed on, and pitched his tent beyond Migdal-eder.
35.transliteration: vַyִּsַּ֖a yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l vַyֵּ֣t aׇֽhֳlֹ֔h mֵhָ֖lְaָh lְmִgְdַּl־aֵֽdֶr׃

35.hebrewText:
וַיְהִ֗י בִּשְׁכֹּ֤ן יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ בָּאָ֣רֶץ הַהִ֔וא וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ רְאוּבֵ֗֔ן וַיִּשְׁכַּ֕ב֙ אֶת־בִּלְהָ֖ה֙ פִּילֶ֣גֶשׁ אָבִ֑֔יו וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע יִשְׂרָאֵ֑͏ֽל׃ {פ}
וַיִּֽהְי֥וּ בְנֵֽי־יַעֲקֹ֖ב שְׁנֵ֥ים עָשָֽׂר׃
35.englishText: While Israel stayed in that land, Reuben went and lay with Bilhah, his father’s concubine; and Israel found out. Now the sons of Jacob were twelve in number.
35.transliteration:
vַyְhִ֗y bִּshְׁkֹּ֤ן yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ bָּaָ֣rֶץ hַhִ֔va vַyֵּ֣lֶךְ rְavּbֵ֗֔ן vַyִּshְׁkַּ֕b֙ aֶt־bִּlְhָ֖h֙ pִּylֶ֣gֶshׁ aָbִ֑֔yv vַyִּshְׁmַ֖a yִshְׂrָaֵ֑͏ֽl׃ {p}
vַyִּֽhְy֥vּ bְnֵֽy־yַaֲkֹ֖b shְׁnֵ֥yם aָshָֽׂr׃

35.hebrewText: בְּנֵ֣י לֵאָ֔ה בְּכ֥וֹר יַעֲקֹ֖ב רְאוּבֵ֑ן וְשִׁמְעוֹן֙ וְלֵוִ֣י וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר וּזְבֻלֽוּן׃
35.englishText: The sons of Leah: Reuben—Jacob’s first-born—Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun.
35.transliteration: bְּnֵ֣y lֵaָ֔h bְּk֥vֹr yַaֲkֹ֖b rְavּbֵ֑ן vְshִׁmְavֹן֙ vְlֵvִ֣y vִֽyhvּdָ֔h vְyִshָּׂshkָ֖r vּzְbֻlֽvּן׃

35.hebrewText: בְּנֵ֣י רָחֵ֔ל יוֹסֵ֖ף וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃
35.englishText: The sons of Rachel: Joseph and Benjamin.
35.transliteration: bְּnֵ֣y rָchֵ֔l yvֹsֵ֖ף vּbִnְyָmִֽן׃

35.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֤י בִלְהָה֙ שִׁפְחַ֣ת רָחֵ֔ל דָּ֖ן וְנַפְתָּלִֽי׃
35.englishText: The sons of Bilhah, Rachel’s maid: Dan and Naphtali.
35.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֤y bִlְhָh֙ shִׁpְchַ֣t rָchֵ֔l dָּ֖ן vְnַpְtָּlִֽy׃

35.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֥י זִלְפָּ֛ה שִׁפְחַ֥ת לֵאָ֖ה גָּ֣ד וְאָשֵׁ֑ר אֵ֚לֶּה בְּנֵ֣י יַעֲקֹ֔ב אֲשֶׁ֥ר יֻלַּד־ל֖וֹ בְּפַדַּ֥ן אֲרָֽם׃
35.englishText: And the sons of Zilpah, Leah’s maid: Gad and Asher. These are the sons of Jacob who were born to him in Paddan-aram.
35.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֥y zִlְpָּ֛h shִׁpְchַ֥t lֵaָ֖h gָּ֣d vְaָshֵׁ֑r aֵ֚lֶּh bְּnֵ֣y yַaֲkֹ֔b aֲshֶׁ֥r yֻlַּd־l֖vֹ bְּpַdַּ֥ן aֲrָֽם׃

35.hebrewText: וַיָּבֹ֤א יַעֲקֹב֙ אֶל־יִצְחָ֣ק אָבִ֔יו מַמְרֵ֖א קִרְיַ֣ת הָֽאַרְבַּ֑ע הִ֣וא חֶבְר֔וֹן אֲשֶׁר־גָּֽר־שָׁ֥ם אַבְרָהָ֖ם וְיִצְחָֽק׃
35.englishText: And Jacob came to his father Isaac at Mamre, at Kiriath-arba—now Hebron—where Abraham and Isaac had sojourned.
35.transliteration: vַyָּbֹ֤a yַaֲkֹb֙ aֶl־yִtsְchָ֣k aָbִ֔yv mַmְrֵ֖a kִrְyַ֣t hָֽaַrְbַּ֑a hִ֣va chֶbְr֔vֹן aֲshֶׁr־gָּֽr־shָׁ֥ם aַbְrָhָ֖ם vְyִtsְchָֽk׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּֽהְי֖וּ יְמֵ֣י יִצְחָ֑ק מְאַ֥ת שָׁנָ֖ה וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים שָׁנָֽה׃
35.englishText: Isaac was a hundred and eighty years old
35.transliteration: vַyִּֽhְy֖vּ yְmֵ֣y yִtsְchָ֑k mְaַ֥t shָׁnָ֖h vּshְׁmֹnִ֥yם shָׁnָֽh׃

35.hebrewText: וַיִּגְוַ֨ע יִצְחָ֤ק וַיָּ֙מׇת֙ וַיֵּאָ֣סֶף אֶל־עַמָּ֔יו זָקֵ֖ן וּשְׂבַ֣ע יָמִ֑ים וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ אֹת֔וֹ עֵשָׂ֥ו וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב בָּנָֽיו׃ {פ}
35.englishText: when he breathed his last and died. He*He Lit. “Isaac.” was gathered to his kin*kin (So NJPS.) See the Dictionary under “predecessors.” in ripe old age; and he was buried by his sons Esau and Jacob.
35.transliteration: vַyִּgְvַ֨a yִtsְchָ֤k vַyָּ֙mׇt֙ vַyֵּaָ֣sֶף aֶl־aַmָּ֔yv zָkֵ֖ן vּshְׂbַ֣a yָmִ֑yם vַyִּkְbְּr֣vּ aֹt֔vֹ aֵshָׂ֥v vְyַaֲkֹ֖b bָּnָֽyv׃ {p}

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֛לֶּה תֹּלְד֥וֹת עֵשָׂ֖ו ה֥וּא אֱדֽוֹם׃
36.englishText: This is the line of Esau—that is, Edom.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֛lֶּh tֹּlְd֥vֹt aֵshָׂ֖v h֥vּa aֱdֽvֹם׃

36.hebrewText: עֵשָׂ֛ו לָקַ֥ח אֶת־נָשָׁ֖יו מִבְּנ֣וֹת כְּנָ֑עַן אֶת־עָדָ֗ה בַּת־אֵילוֹן֙ הַֽחִתִּ֔י וְאֶת־אׇהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ בַּת־עֲנָ֔ה בַּת־צִבְע֖וֹן הַֽחִוִּֽי׃
36.englishText: Esau took his wives from among the Canaanite women—Adah daughter of Elon the Hittite, and Oholibamah daughter of Anah daughter of Zibeon the Hivite*Hivite Cf. v. 20, “Horite.” —
36.transliteration: aֵshָׂ֛v lָkַ֥ch aֶt־nָshָׁ֖yv mִbְּn֣vֹt kְּnָ֑aַן aֶt־aָdָ֗h bַּt־aֵylvֹן֙ hַֽchִtִּ֔y vְaֶt־aׇhֳlִֽybָmָh֙ bַּt־aֲnָ֔h bַּt־tsִbְa֖vֹן hַֽchִvִּֽy׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֶת־בָּשְׂמַ֥ת בַּת־יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל אֲח֥וֹת נְבָיֽוֹת׃
36.englishText: and also Basemath daughter of Ishmael and sister of Nebaioth.
36.transliteration: vְaֶt־bָּshְׂmַ֥t bַּt־yִshְׁmָaֵ֖al aֲch֥vֹt nְbָyֽvֹt׃

36.hebrewText: וַתֵּ֧לֶד עָדָ֛ה לְעֵשָׂ֖ו אֶת־אֱלִיפָ֑ז וּבָ֣שְׂמַ֔ת יָלְדָ֖ה אֶת־רְעוּאֵֽל׃
36.englishText: Adah bore to Esau Eliphaz; Basemath bore Reuel;
36.transliteration: vַtֵּ֧lֶd aָdָ֛h lְaֵshָׂ֖v aֶt־aֱlִypָ֑z vּbָ֣shְׂmַ֔t yָlְdָ֖h aֶt־rְavּaֵֽl׃

36.hebrewText: וְאׇהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ יָֽלְדָ֔ה אֶת־[יְע֥וּשׁ] (יעיש) וְאֶת־יַעְלָ֖ם וְאֶת־קֹ֑רַח אֵ֚לֶּה בְּנֵ֣י עֵשָׂ֔ו אֲשֶׁ֥ר יֻלְּדוּ־ל֖וֹ בְּאֶ֥רֶץ כְּנָֽעַן׃
36.englishText: and Oholibamah bore Jeush, Jalam, and Korah. Those were the sons of Esau, who were born to him in the land of Canaan.
36.transliteration: vְaׇhֳlִֽybָmָh֙ yָֽlְdָ֔h aֶt־[yְa֥vּshׁ] (yaysh) vְaֶt־yַaְlָ֖ם vְaֶt־kֹ֑rַch aֵ֚lֶּh bְּnֵ֣y aֵshָׂ֔v aֲshֶׁ֥r yֻlְּdvּ־l֖vֹ bְּaֶ֥rֶץ kְּnָֽaַן׃

36.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֣ח עֵשָׂ֡ו אֶת־נָ֠שָׁ֠יו וְאֶת־בָּנָ֣יו וְאֶת־בְּנֹתָיו֮ וְאֶת־כׇּל־נַפְשׁ֣וֹת בֵּיתוֹ֒ וְאֶת־מִקְנֵ֣הוּ וְאֶת־כׇּל־בְּהֶמְתּ֗וֹ וְאֵת֙ כׇּל־קִנְיָנ֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֥ר רָכַ֖שׁ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ אֶל־אֶ֔רֶץ מִפְּנֵ֖י יַעֲקֹ֥ב אָחִֽיו׃
36.englishText: Esau took his wives, his sons and daughters, and all the members of his household, his cattle and all his livestock, and all the property that he had acquired in the land of Canaan, and went to another land because of his brother Jacob.
36.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֣ch aֵshָׂ֡v aֶt־nָ֠shָׁ֠yv vְaֶt־bָּnָ֣yv vְaֶt־bְּnֹtָyv֮ vְaֶt־kׇּl־nַpְshׁ֣vֹt bֵּytvֹ֒ vְaֶt־mִkְnֵ֣hvּ vְaֶt־kׇּl־bְּhֶmְtּ֗vֹ vְaֵt֙ kׇּl־kִnְyָn֔vֹ aֲshֶׁ֥r rָkַ֖shׁ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן vַyֵּ֣lֶךְ aֶl־aֶ֔rֶץ mִpְּnֵ֖y yַaֲkֹ֥b aָchִֽyv׃

36.hebrewText: כִּֽי־הָיָ֧ה רְכוּשָׁ֛ם רָ֖ב מִשֶּׁ֣בֶת יַחְדָּ֑ו וְלֹ֨א יָֽכְלָ֜ה אֶ֤רֶץ מְגֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ לָשֵׂ֣את אֹתָ֔ם מִפְּנֵ֖י מִקְנֵיהֶֽם׃
36.englishText: For their possessions were too many for them to dwell together, and the land where they sojourned could not support them because of their livestock.
36.transliteration: kִּֽy־hָyָ֧h rְkvּshָׁ֛ם rָ֖b mִshֶּׁ֣bֶt yַchְdָּ֑v vְlֹ֨a yָֽkְlָ֜h aֶ֤rֶץ mְgֽvּrֵyhֶם֙ lָshֵׂ֣at aֹtָ֔ם mִpְּnֵ֖y mִkְnֵyhֶֽם׃

36.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב עֵשָׂו֙ בְּהַ֣ר שֵׂעִ֔יר עֵשָׂ֖ו ה֥וּא אֱדֽוֹם׃
36.englishText: So Esau settled in the hill country of Seir—Esau being Edom.
36.transliteration: vַyֵּ֤shֶׁb aֵshָׂv֙ bְּhַ֣r shֵׂaִ֔yr aֵshָׂ֖v h֥vּa aֱdֽvֹם׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֛לֶּה תֹּלְד֥וֹת עֵשָׂ֖ו אֲבִ֣י אֱד֑וֹם בְּהַ֖ר שֵׂעִֽיר׃
36.englishText: This, then, is the line of Esau, the ancestor of the Edomites, in the hill country of Seir.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֛lֶּh tֹּlְd֥vֹt aֵshָׂ֖v aֲbִ֣y aֱd֑vֹם bְּhַ֖r shֵׂaִֽyr׃

36.hebrewText: אֵ֖לֶּה שְׁמ֣וֹת בְּנֵֽי־עֵשָׂ֑ו אֱלִיפַ֗ז בֶּן־עָדָה֙ אֵ֣שֶׁת עֵשָׂ֔ו רְעוּאֵ֕ל בֶּן־בָּשְׂמַ֖ת אֵ֥שֶׁת עֵשָֽׂו׃
36.englishText: These are the names of Esau’s sons: Eliphaz, the son of Esau’s wife Adah; Reuel, the son of Esau’s wife Basemath.
36.transliteration: aֵ֖lֶּh shְׁm֣vֹt bְּnֵֽy־aֵshָׂ֑v aֱlִypַ֗z bֶּן־aָdָh֙ aֵ֣shֶׁt aֵshָׂ֔v rְavּaֵ֕l bֶּן־bָּshְׂmַ֖t aֵ֥shֶׁt aֵshָֽׂv׃

36.hebrewText: וַיִּהְי֖וּ בְּנֵ֣י אֱלִיפָ֑ז תֵּימָ֣ן אוֹמָ֔ר צְפ֥וֹ וְגַעְתָּ֖ם וּקְנַֽז׃
36.englishText: The sons of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam, and Kenaz.
36.transliteration: vַyִּhְy֖vּ bְּnֵ֣y aֱlִypָ֑z tֵּymָ֣ן avֹmָ֔r tsְp֥vֹ vְgַaְtָּ֖ם vּkְnַֽz׃

36.hebrewText: וְתִמְנַ֣ע ׀ הָיְתָ֣ה פִילֶ֗גֶשׁ לֶֽאֱלִיפַז֙ בֶּן־עֵשָׂ֔ו וַתֵּ֥לֶד לֶאֱלִיפַ֖ז אֶת־עֲמָלֵ֑ק אֵ֕לֶּה בְּנֵ֥י עָדָ֖ה אֵ֥שֶׁת עֵשָֽׂו׃
36.englishText: Timna was a concubine of Esau’s son Eliphaz; she bore Amalek to Eliphaz. Those were the descendants of Esau’s wife Adah.
36.transliteration: vְtִmְnַ֣a ׀ hָyְtָ֣h pִylֶ֗gֶshׁ lֶֽaֱlִypַz֙ bֶּן־aֵshָׂ֔v vַtֵּ֥lֶd lֶaֱlִypַ֖z aֶt־aֲmָlֵ֑k aֵ֕lֶּh bְּnֵ֥y aָdָ֖h aֵ֥shֶׁt aֵshָֽׂv׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ בְּנֵ֣י רְעוּאֵ֔ל נַ֥חַת וָזֶ֖רַח שַׁמָּ֣ה וּמִזָּ֑ה אֵ֣לֶּה הָי֔וּ בְּנֵ֥י בָשְׂמַ֖ת אֵ֥שֶׁת עֵשָֽׂו׃
36.englishText: And these were the sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah. Those were the descendants of Esau’s wife Basemath.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֙lֶּh֙ bְּnֵ֣y rְavּaֵ֔l nַ֥chַt vָzֶ֖rַch shַׁmָּ֣h vּmִzָּ֑h aֵ֣lֶּh hָy֔vּ bְּnֵ֥y bָshְׂmַ֖t aֵ֥shֶׁt aֵshָֽׂv׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֣לֶּה הָי֗וּ בְּנֵ֨י אׇהֳלִיבָמָ֧ה בַת־עֲנָ֛ה בַּת־צִבְע֖וֹן אֵ֣שֶׁת עֵשָׂ֑ו וַתֵּ֣לֶד לְעֵשָׂ֔ו אֶת־[יְע֥וּשׁ] (יעיש) וְאֶת־יַעְלָ֖ם וְאֶת־קֹֽרַח׃
36.englishText: And these were the sons of Esau’s wife Oholibamah, daughter of Anah daughter of Zibeon: she bore to Esau Jeush, Jalam, and Korah.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֣lֶּh hָy֗vּ bְּnֵ֨y aׇhֳlִybָmָ֧h bַt־aֲnָ֛h bַּt־tsִbְa֖vֹן aֵ֣shֶׁt aֵshָׂ֑v vַtֵּ֣lֶd lְaֵshָׂ֔v aֶt־[yְa֥vּshׁ] (yaysh) vְaֶt־yַaְlָ֖ם vְaֶt־kֹֽrַch׃

36.hebrewText: אֵ֖לֶּה אַלּוּפֵ֣י בְנֵֽי־עֵשָׂ֑ו בְּנֵ֤י אֱלִיפַז֙ בְּכ֣וֹר עֵשָׂ֔ו אַלּ֤וּף תֵּימָן֙ אַלּ֣וּף אוֹמָ֔ר אַלּ֥וּף צְפ֖וֹ אַלּ֥וּף קְנַֽז׃
36.englishText: These are the clans of the sons of Esau. The descendants of Esau’s first-born Eliphaz: the clans Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kenaz,
36.transliteration: aֵ֖lֶּh aַlּvּpֵ֣y bְnֵֽy־aֵshָׂ֑v bְּnֵ֤y aֱlִypַz֙ bְּk֣vֹr aֵshָׂ֔v aַlּ֤vּף tֵּymָן֙ aַlּ֣vּף avֹmָ֔r aַlּ֥vּף tsְp֖vֹ aַlּ֥vּף kְnַֽz׃

36.hebrewText: אַלּֽוּף־קֹ֛רַח אַלּ֥וּף גַּעְתָּ֖ם אַלּ֣וּף עֲמָלֵ֑ק אֵ֣לֶּה אַלּוּפֵ֤י אֱלִיפַז֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ אֱד֔וֹם אֵ֖לֶּה בְּנֵ֥י עָדָֽה׃
36.englishText: Korah, Gatam, and Amalek; these are the clans of Eliphaz in the land of Edom. Those are the descendants of Adah.
36.transliteration: aַlּֽvּף־kֹ֛rַch aַlּ֥vּף gַּaְtָּ֖ם aַlּ֣vּף aֲmָlֵ֑k aֵ֣lֶּh aַlּvּpֵ֤y aֱlִypַz֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ aֱd֔vֹם aֵ֖lֶּh bְּnֵ֥y aָdָֽh׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֗לֶּה בְּנֵ֤י רְעוּאֵל֙ בֶּן־עֵשָׂ֔ו אַלּ֥וּף נַ֙חַת֙ אַלּ֣וּף זֶ֔רַח אַלּ֥וּף שַׁמָּ֖ה אַלּ֣וּף מִזָּ֑ה אֵ֣לֶּה אַלּוּפֵ֤י רְעוּאֵל֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ אֱד֔וֹם אֵ֕לֶּה בְּנֵ֥י בָשְׂמַ֖ת אֵ֥שֶׁת עֵשָֽׂו׃
36.englishText: And these are the descendants of Esau’s son Reuel: the clans Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah; these are the clans of Reuel in the land of Edom. Those are the descendants of Esau’s wife Basemath.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֗lֶּh bְּnֵ֤y rְavּaֵl֙ bֶּן־aֵshָׂ֔v aַlּ֥vּף nַ֙chַt֙ aַlּ֣vּף zֶ֔rַch aַlּ֥vּף shַׁmָּ֖h aַlּ֣vּף mִzָּ֑h aֵ֣lֶּh aַlּvּpֵ֤y rְavּaֵl֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ aֱd֔vֹם aֵ֕lֶּh bְּnֵ֥y bָshְׂmַ֖t aֵ֥shֶׁt aֵshָֽׂv׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֗לֶּה בְּנֵ֤י אׇהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ אֵ֣שֶׁת עֵשָׂ֔ו אַלּ֥וּף יְע֛וּשׁ אַלּ֥וּף יַעְלָ֖ם אַלּ֣וּף קֹ֑רַח אֵ֣לֶּה אַלּוּפֵ֞י אׇהֳלִֽיבָמָ֛ה בַּת־עֲנָ֖ה אֵ֥שֶׁת עֵשָֽׂו׃
36.englishText: And these are the descendants of Esau’s wife Oholibamah: the clans Jeush, Jalam, and Korah; these are the clans of Esau’s wife Oholibamah, the daughter of Anah.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֗lֶּh bְּnֵ֤y aׇhֳlִֽybָmָh֙ aֵ֣shֶׁt aֵshָׂ֔v aַlּ֥vּף yְa֛vּshׁ aַlּ֥vּף yַaְlָ֖ם aַlּ֣vּף kֹ֑rַch aֵ֣lֶּh aַlּvּpֵ֞y aׇhֳlִֽybָmָ֛h bַּt־aֲnָ֖h aֵ֥shֶׁt aֵshָֽׂv׃

36.hebrewText: אֵ֧לֶּה בְנֵי־עֵשָׂ֛ו וְאֵ֥לֶּה אַלּוּפֵיהֶ֖ם ה֥וּא אֱדֽוֹם׃ {ס}
36.englishText: Those were the sons of Esau—that is, Edom—and those are their clans.
36.transliteration: aֵ֧lֶּh bְnֵy־aֵshָׂ֛v vְaֵ֥lֶּh aַlּvּpֵyhֶ֖ם h֥vּa aֱdֽvֹם׃ {s}

36.hebrewText: אֵ֤לֶּה בְנֵֽי־שֵׂעִיר֙ הַחֹרִ֔י יֹשְׁבֵ֖י הָאָ֑רֶץ לוֹטָ֥ן וְשׁוֹבָ֖ל וְצִבְע֥וֹן וַעֲנָֽה׃
36.englishText: These were the sons of Seir the Horite, who were settled in the land: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
36.transliteration: aֵ֤lֶּh bְnֵֽy־shֵׂaִyr֙ hַchֹrִ֔y yֹshְׁbֵ֖y hָaָ֑rֶץ lvֹtָ֥ן vְshׁvֹbָ֖l vְtsִbְa֥vֹן vַaֲnָֽh׃

36.hebrewText: וְדִשׁ֥וֹן וְאֵ֖צֶר וְדִישָׁ֑ן אֵ֣לֶּה אַלּוּפֵ֧י הַחֹרִ֛י בְּנֵ֥י שֵׂעִ֖יר בְּאֶ֥רֶץ אֱדֽוֹם׃
36.englishText: Dishon, Ezer, and Dishan. Those are the clans of the Horites, the descendants of Seir, in the land of Edom.
36.transliteration: vְdִshׁ֥vֹן vְaֵ֖tsֶr vְdִyshָׁ֑ן aֵ֣lֶּh aַlּvּpֵ֧y hַchֹrִ֛y bְּnֵ֥y shֵׂaִ֖yr bְּaֶ֥rֶץ aֱdֽvֹם׃

36.hebrewText: וַיִּהְי֥וּ בְנֵי־לוֹטָ֖ן חֹרִ֣י וְהֵימָ֑ם וַאֲח֥וֹת לוֹטָ֖ן תִּמְנָֽע׃
36.englishText: The sons of Lotan were Hori and Hemam; and Lotan’s sister was Timna.
36.transliteration: vַyִּhְy֥vּ bְnֵy־lvֹtָ֖ן chֹrִ֣y vְhֵymָ֑ם vַaֲch֥vֹt lvֹtָ֖ן tִּmְnָֽa׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ בְּנֵ֣י שׁוֹבָ֔ל עַלְוָ֥ן וּמָנַ֖חַת וְעֵיבָ֑ל שְׁפ֖וֹ וְאוֹנָֽם׃
36.englishText: The sons of Shobal were these: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shepho, and Onam.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֙lֶּh֙ bְּnֵ֣y shׁvֹbָ֔l aַlְvָ֥ן vּmָnַ֖chַt vְaֵybָ֑l shְׁp֖vֹ vְavֹnָֽם׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֥לֶּה בְנֵֽי־צִבְע֖וֹן וְאַיָּ֣ה וַעֲנָ֑ה ה֣וּא עֲנָ֗ה אֲשֶׁ֨ר מָצָ֤א אֶת־הַיֵּמִם֙ בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר בִּרְעֹת֥וֹ אֶת־הַחֲמֹרִ֖ים לְצִבְע֥וֹן אָבִֽיו׃
36.englishText: The sons of Zibeon were these: Aiah*Aiah Heb. “and Aiah.” and Anah—that was the Anah who discovered the hot springs*hot springs Meaning of Heb. yemim uncertain. in the wilderness while pasturing the asses of his father Zibeon.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֥lֶּh bְnֵֽy־tsִbְa֖vֹן vְaַyָּ֣h vַaֲnָ֑h h֣vּa aֲnָ֗h aֲshֶׁ֨r mָtsָ֤a aֶt־hַyֵּmִם֙ bַּmִּdְbָּ֔r bִּrְaֹt֥vֹ aֶt־hַchֲmֹrִ֖yם lְtsִbְa֥vֹן aָbִֽyv׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֥לֶּה בְנֵֽי־עֲנָ֖ה דִּשֹׁ֑ן וְאׇהֳלִיבָמָ֖ה בַּת־עֲנָֽה׃
36.englishText: The children of Anah were these: Dishon and Anah’s daughter Oholibamah.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֥lֶּh bְnֵֽy־aֲnָ֖h dִּshֹׁ֑ן vְaׇhֳlִybָmָ֖h bַּt־aֲnָֽh׃

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֖לֶּה בְּנֵ֣י דִישָׁ֑ן חֶמְדָּ֥ן וְאֶשְׁבָּ֖ן וְיִתְרָ֥ן וּכְרָֽן׃
36.englishText: The sons of Dishon*Dishon Heb. Dishan; but cf. vv. 21, 25, 28, and 30, and 1 Chron. 1.41. were these: Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran, and Cheran.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֖lֶּh bְּnֵ֣y dִyshָׁ֑ן chֶmְdָּ֥ן vְaֶshְׁbָּ֖ן vְyִtְrָ֥ן vּkְrָֽן׃

36.hebrewText: אֵ֖לֶּה בְּנֵי־אֵ֑צֶר בִּלְהָ֥ן וְזַעֲוָ֖ן וַעֲקָֽן׃
36.englishText: The sons of Ezer were these: Bilhan, Zaavan, and Akan.
36.transliteration: aֵ֖lֶּh bְּnֵy־aֵ֑tsֶr bִּlְhָ֥ן vְzַaֲvָ֖ן vַaֲkָֽן׃

36.hebrewText: אֵ֥לֶּה בְנֵֽי־דִישָׁ֖ן ע֥וּץ וַאֲרָֽן׃
36.englishText: And the sons of Dishan were these: Uz and Aran.
36.transliteration: aֵ֥lֶּh bְnֵֽy־dִyshָׁ֖ן a֥vּץ vַaֲrָֽן׃

36.hebrewText: אֵ֖לֶּה אַלּוּפֵ֣י הַחֹרִ֑י אַלּ֤וּף לוֹטָן֙ אַלּ֣וּף שׁוֹבָ֔ל אַלּ֥וּף צִבְע֖וֹן אַלּ֥וּף עֲנָֽה׃
36.englishText: These are the clans of the Horites: the clans Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
36.transliteration: aֵ֖lֶּh aַlּvּpֵ֣y hַchֹrִ֑y aַlּ֤vּף lvֹtָן֙ aַlּ֣vּף shׁvֹbָ֔l aַlּ֥vּף tsִbְa֖vֹן aַlּ֥vּף aֲnָֽh׃

36.hebrewText: אַלּ֥וּף דִּשֹׁ֛ן אַלּ֥וּף אֵ֖צֶר אַלּ֣וּף דִּישָׁ֑ן אֵ֣לֶּה אַלּוּפֵ֧י הַחֹרִ֛י לְאַלֻּפֵיהֶ֖ם בְּאֶ֥רֶץ שֵׂעִֽיר׃ {פ}
36.englishText: Dishon, Ezer, and Dishan. Those are the clans of the Horites, clan by clan, in the land of Seir.
36.transliteration: aַlּ֥vּף dִּshֹׁ֛ן aַlּ֥vּף aֵ֖tsֶr aַlּ֣vּף dִּyshָׁ֑ן aֵ֣lֶּh aַlּvּpֵ֧y hַchֹrִ֛y lְaַlֻּpֵyhֶ֖ם bְּaֶ֥rֶץ shֵׂaִֽyr׃ {p}

36.hebrewText: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ הַמְּלָכִ֔ים אֲשֶׁ֥ר מָלְכ֖וּ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ אֱד֑וֹם לִפְנֵ֥י מְלׇךְ־מֶ֖לֶךְ לִבְנֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃
36.englishText: These are the kings who reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the Israelites.
36.transliteration: vְaֵ֙lֶּh֙ hַmְּlָkִ֔yם aֲshֶׁ֥r mָlְk֖vּ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ aֱd֑vֹם lִpְnֵ֥y mְlׇךְ־mֶ֖lֶךְ lִbְnֵ֥y yִshְׂrָaֵֽl׃

36.hebrewText: וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ בֶּאֱד֔וֹם בֶּ֖לַע בֶּן־בְּע֑וֹר וְשֵׁ֥ם עִיר֖וֹ דִּנְהָֽבָה׃
36.englishText: Bela son of Beor reigned in Edom, and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
36.transliteration: vַyִּmְlֹ֣ךְ bֶּaֱd֔vֹם bֶּ֖lַa bֶּן־bְּa֑vֹr vְshֵׁ֥ם aִyr֖vֹ dִּnְhָֽbָh׃

36.hebrewText: וַיָּ֖מׇת בָּ֑לַע וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ תַּחְתָּ֔יו יוֹבָ֥ב בֶּן־זֶ֖רַח מִבׇּצְרָֽה׃
36.englishText: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah, from Bozrah, succeeded him as king.
36.transliteration: vַyָּ֖mׇt bָּ֑lַa vַyִּmְlֹ֣ךְ tַּchְtָּ֔yv yvֹbָ֥b bֶּן־zֶ֖rַch mִbׇּtsְrָֽh׃

36.hebrewText: וַיָּ֖מׇת יוֹבָ֑ב וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ תַּחְתָּ֔יו חֻשָׁ֖ם מֵאֶ֥רֶץ הַתֵּימָנִֽי׃
36.englishText: When Jobab died, Husham of the land of the Temanites succeeded him as king.
36.transliteration: vַyָּ֖mׇt yvֹbָ֑b vַyִּmְlֹ֣ךְ tַּchְtָּ֔yv chֻshָׁ֖ם mֵaֶ֥rֶץ hַtֵּymָnִֽy׃

36.hebrewText: וַיָּ֖מׇת חֻשָׁ֑ם וַיִּמְלֹ֨ךְ תַּחְתָּ֜יו הֲדַ֣ד בֶּן־בְּדַ֗ד הַמַּכֶּ֤ה אֶת־מִדְיָן֙ בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה מוֹאָ֔ב וְשֵׁ֥ם עִיר֖וֹ עֲוִֽית׃
36.englishText: When Husham died, Hadad son of Bedad, who defeated the Midianites in the country of Moab, succeeded him as king; the name of his city was Avith.
36.transliteration: vַyָּ֖mׇt chֻshָׁ֑ם vַyִּmְlֹ֨ךְ tַּchְtָּ֜yv hֲdַ֣d bֶּן־bְּdַ֗d hַmַּkֶּ֤h aֶt־mִdְyָן֙ bִּshְׂdֵ֣h mvֹaָ֔b vְshֵׁ֥ם aִyr֖vֹ aֲvִֽyt׃

36.hebrewText: וַיָּ֖מׇת הֲדָ֑ד וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ תַּחְתָּ֔יו שַׂמְלָ֖ה מִמַּשְׂרֵקָֽה׃
36.englishText: When Hadad died, Samlah of Masrekah succeeded him as king.
36.transliteration: vַyָּ֖mׇt hֲdָ֑d vַyִּmְlֹ֣ךְ tַּchְtָּ֔yv shַׂmְlָ֖h mִmַּshְׂrֵkָֽh׃

36.hebrewText: וַיָּ֖מׇת שַׂמְלָ֑ה וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ תַּחְתָּ֔יו שָׁא֖וּל מֵרְחֹב֥וֹת הַנָּהָֽר׃
36.englishText: When Samlah died, Saul*Saul Or “Shaul.” of Rehoboth-on-the-river succeeded him as king.
36.transliteration: vַyָּ֖mׇt shַׂmְlָ֑h vַyִּmְlֹ֣ךְ tַּchְtָּ֔yv shָׁa֖vּl mֵrְchֹb֥vֹt hַnָּhָֽr׃

36.hebrewText: וַיָּ֖מׇת שָׁא֑וּל וַיִּמְלֹ֣ךְ תַּחְתָּ֔יו בַּ֥עַל חָנָ֖ן בֶּן־עַכְבּֽוֹר׃
36.englishText: When Saul died, Baal-hanan son of Achbor succeeded him as king.
36.transliteration: vַyָּ֖mׇt shָׁa֑vּl vַyִּmְlֹ֣ךְ tַּchְtָּ֔yv bַּ֥aַl chָnָ֖ן bֶּן־aַkְbּֽvֹr׃

36.hebrewText: וַיָּ֘מׇת֮ בַּ֣עַל חָנָ֣ן בֶּן־עַכְבּוֹר֒ וַיִּמְלֹ֤ךְ תַּחְתָּיו֙ הֲדַ֔ר וְשֵׁ֥ם עִיר֖וֹ פָּ֑עוּ וְשֵׁ֨ם אִשְׁתּ֤וֹ מְהֵֽיטַבְאֵל֙ בַּת־מַטְרֵ֔ד בַּ֖ת מֵ֥י זָהָֽב׃
36.englishText: And when Baal-hanan son of Achbor died, Hadar succeeded him as king; the name of his city was Pau, and his wife’s name was Mehetabel daughter of Matred daughter of Me-zahab.
36.transliteration: vַyָּ֘mׇt֮ bַּ֣aַl chָnָ֣ן bֶּן־aַkְbּvֹr֒ vַyִּmְlֹ֤ךְ tַּchְtָּyv֙ hֲdַ֔r vְshֵׁ֥ם aִyr֖vֹ pָּ֑avּ vְshֵׁ֨ם aִshְׁtּ֤vֹ mְhֵֽytַbְaֵl֙ bַּt־mַtְrֵ֔d bַּ֖t mֵ֥y zָhָֽb׃

36.hebrewText: וְ֠אֵ֠לֶּה שְׁמ֞וֹת אַלּוּפֵ֤י עֵשָׂו֙ לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔ם לִמְקֹמֹתָ֖ם בִּשְׁמֹתָ֑ם אַלּ֥וּף תִּמְנָ֛ע אַלּ֥וּף עַֽלְוָ֖ה אַלּ֥וּף יְתֵֽת׃
36.englishText: These are the names of the clans of Esau, each with its families and locality, name by name: the clans Timna, Alvah, Jetheth,
36.transliteration: vְ֠aֵ֠lֶּh shְׁm֞vֹt aַlּvּpֵ֤y aֵshָׂv֙ lְmִshְׁpְּchֹtָ֔ם lִmְkֹmֹtָ֖ם bִּshְׁmֹtָ֑ם aַlּ֥vּף tִּmְnָ֛a aַlּ֥vּף aַֽlְvָ֖h aַlּ֥vּף yְtֵֽt׃

36.hebrewText: אַלּ֧וּף אׇהֳלִיבָמָ֛ה אַלּ֥וּף אֵלָ֖ה אַלּ֥וּף פִּינֹֽן׃
36.englishText: Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
36.transliteration: aַlּ֧vּף aׇhֳlִybָmָ֛h aַlּ֥vּף aֵlָ֖h aַlּ֥vּף pִּynֹֽן׃

36.hebrewText: אַלּ֥וּף קְנַ֛ז אַלּ֥וּף תֵּימָ֖ן אַלּ֥וּף מִבְצָֽר׃
36.englishText: Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
36.transliteration: aַlּ֥vּף kְnַ֛z aַlּ֥vּף tֵּymָ֖ן aַlּ֥vּף mִbְtsָֽr׃

36.hebrewText: אַלּ֥וּף מַגְדִּיאֵ֖ל אַלּ֣וּף עִירָ֑ם אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ אַלּוּפֵ֣י אֱד֗וֹם לְמֹֽשְׁבֹתָם֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ אֲחֻזָּתָ֔ם ה֥וּא עֵשָׂ֖ו אֲבִ֥י אֱדֽוֹם׃ {פ}
36.englishText: Magdiel, and Iram. Those are the clans of Edom—that is, of Esau, father of the Edomites—by their settlements in the land which they hold.
36.transliteration: aַlּ֥vּף mַgְdִּyaֵ֖l aַlּ֣vּף aִyrָ֑ם aֵ֣lֶּh ׀ aַlּvּpֵ֣y aֱd֗vֹם lְmֹֽshְׁbֹtָם֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ aֲchֻzָּtָ֔ם h֥vּa aֵshָׂ֖v aֲbִ֥y aֱdֽvֹם׃ {p}

vayeshev.name: Vayeshev
vayeshev.summary: Joseph's dreams, Joseph sold into slavery, Judah and Tamar, Joseph in Potiphar's house, Joseph in prison, and the interpretation of dreams.

37.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב יַעֲקֹ֔ב בְּאֶ֖רֶץ מְגוּרֵ֣י אָבִ֑יו בְּאֶ֖רֶץ כְּנָֽעַן׃
37.englishText: Now Jacob was settled in the land where his father had sojourned, the land of Canaan.
37.transliteration: vַyֵּ֣shֶׁb yַaֲkֹ֔b bְּaֶ֖rֶץ mְgvּrֵ֣y aָbִ֑yv bְּaֶ֖rֶץ kְּnָֽaַן׃

37.hebrewText: אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ תֹּלְד֣וֹת יַעֲקֹ֗ב יוֹסֵ֞ף בֶּן־שְׁבַֽע־עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה שָׁנָה֙ הָיָ֨ה רֹעֶ֤ה אֶת־אֶחָיו֙ בַּצֹּ֔אן וְה֣וּא נַ֗עַר אֶת־בְּנֵ֥י בִלְהָ֛ה וְאֶת־בְּנֵ֥י זִלְפָּ֖ה נְשֵׁ֣י אָבִ֑יו וַיָּבֵ֥א יוֹסֵ֛ף אֶת־דִּבָּתָ֥ם רָעָ֖ה אֶל־אֲבִיהֶֽם׃
37.englishText: This, then, is the line of Jacob: At seventeen years of age, Joseph tended the flocks with his brothers, as a helper to the sons of his father’s wives Bilhah and Zilpah. And Joseph brought bad reports of them to their father.
37.transliteration: aֵ֣lֶּh ׀ tֹּlְd֣vֹt yַaֲkֹ֗b yvֹsֵ֞ף bֶּן־shְׁbַֽa־aֶshְׂrֵ֤h shָׁnָh֙ hָyָ֨h rֹaֶ֤h aֶt־aֶchָyv֙ bַּtsֹּ֔aן vְh֣vּa nַ֗aַr aֶt־bְּnֵ֥y bִlְhָ֛h vְaֶt־bְּnֵ֥y zִlְpָּ֖h nְshֵׁ֣y aָbִ֑yv vַyָּbֵ֥a yvֹsֵ֛ף aֶt־dִּbָּtָ֥ם rָaָ֖h aֶl־aֲbִyhֶֽם׃

37.hebrewText: וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל אָהַ֤ב אֶת־יוֹסֵף֙ מִכׇּל־בָּנָ֔יו כִּֽי־בֶן־זְקֻנִ֥ים ה֖וּא ל֑וֹ וְעָ֥שָׂה ל֖וֹ כְּתֹ֥נֶת פַּסִּֽים׃
37.englishText: Now Israel loved Joseph best of all his sons—he was his “child of old age”;*he was his “child of old age” NJPS “he was the child of his old age.” The expression ben zequnim is used here as a category label; it seems to denote a special, favored status. Cf. 44.20. and he had made him an ornamented tunic.*ornamented tunic Or “a coat of many colors”; meaning of Heb. uncertain.
37.transliteration: vְyִshְׂrָaֵ֗l aָhַ֤b aֶt־yvֹsֵף֙ mִkׇּl־bָּnָ֔yv kִּֽy־bֶן־zְkֻnִ֥yם h֖vּa l֑vֹ vְaָ֥shָׂh l֖vֹ kְּtֹ֥nֶt pַּsִּֽyם׃

37.hebrewText: וַיִּרְא֣וּ אֶחָ֗יו כִּֽי־אֹת֞וֹ אָהַ֤ב אֲבִיהֶם֙ מִכׇּל־אֶחָ֔יו וַֽיִּשְׂנְא֖וּ אֹת֑וֹ וְלֹ֥א יָכְל֖וּ דַּבְּר֥וֹ לְשָׁלֹֽם׃
37.englishText: And when his brothers saw that their father loved him more than any of his brothers, they hated him so that they could not speak a friendly word to him.
37.transliteration: vַyִּrְa֣vּ aֶchָ֗yv kִּֽy־aֹt֞vֹ aָhַ֤b aֲbִyhֶם֙ mִkׇּl־aֶchָ֔yv vַֽyִּshְׂnְa֖vּ aֹt֑vֹ vְlֹ֥a yָkְl֖vּ dַּbְּr֥vֹ lְshָׁlֹֽם׃

37.hebrewText: וַיַּחֲלֹ֤ם יוֹסֵף֙ חֲל֔וֹם וַיַּגֵּ֖ד לְאֶחָ֑יו וַיּוֹסִ֥פוּ ע֖וֹד שְׂנֹ֥א אֹתֽוֹ׃
37.englishText: Once Joseph had a dream which he told to his brothers; and they hated him even more.
37.transliteration: vַyַּchֲlֹ֤ם yvֹsֵף֙ chֲl֔vֹם vַyַּgֵּ֖d lְaֶchָ֑yv vַyּvֹsִ֥pvּ a֖vֹd shְׂnֹ֥a aֹtֽvֹ׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם שִׁמְעוּ־נָ֕א הַחֲל֥וֹם הַזֶּ֖ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר חָלָֽמְתִּי׃
37.englishText: He said to them, “Hear this dream which I have dreamed:
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֖amֶr aֲlֵyhֶ֑ם shִׁmְavּ־nָ֕a hַchֲl֥vֹם hַzֶּ֖h aֲshֶׁ֥r chָlָֽmְtִּy׃

37.hebrewText: וְ֠הִנֵּ֠ה אֲנַ֜חְנוּ מְאַלְּמִ֤ים אֲלֻמִּים֙ בְּת֣וֹךְ הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה וְהִנֵּ֛ה קָ֥מָה אֲלֻמָּתִ֖י וְגַם־נִצָּ֑בָה וְהִנֵּ֤ה תְסֻבֶּ֙ינָה֙ אֲלֻמֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖יןָ לַאֲלֻמָּתִֽי׃
37.englishText: There we were binding sheaves in the field, when suddenly my sheaf stood up and remained upright; then your sheaves gathered around and bowed low to my sheaf.”
37.transliteration: vְ֠hִnֵּ֠h aֲnַ֜chְnvּ mְaַlְּmִ֤yם aֲlֻmִּyם֙ bְּt֣vֹךְ hַshָּׂdֶ֔h vְhִnֵּ֛h kָ֥mָh aֲlֻmָּtִ֖y vְgַם־nִtsָּ֑bָh vְhִnֵּ֤h tְsֻbֶּ֙ynָh֙ aֲlֻmֹּ֣tֵykֶ֔ם vַtִּֽshְׁtַּchֲvֶ֖yןָ lַaֲlֻmָּtִֽy׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ לוֹ֙ אֶחָ֔יו הֲמָלֹ֤ךְ תִּמְלֹךְ֙ עָלֵ֔ינוּ אִם־מָשׁ֥וֹל תִּמְשֹׁ֖ל בָּ֑נוּ וַיּוֹסִ֤פוּ עוֹד֙ שְׂנֹ֣א אֹת֔וֹ עַל־חֲלֹמֹתָ֖יו וְעַל־דְּבָרָֽיו׃
37.englishText: His brothers answered, “Do you mean to reign over us? Do you mean to rule over us?” And they hated him even more for his talk about his dreams.
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amְrvּ lvֹ֙ aֶchָ֔yv hֲmָlֹ֤ךְ tִּmְlֹךְ֙ aָlֵ֔ynvּ aִם־mָshׁ֥vֹl tִּmְshֹׁ֖l bָּ֑nvּ vַyּvֹsִ֤pvּ avֹd֙ shְׂnֹ֣a aֹt֔vֹ aַl־chֲlֹmֹtָ֖yv vְaַl־dְּbָrָֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וַיַּחֲלֹ֥ם עוֹד֙ חֲל֣וֹם אַחֵ֔ר וַיְסַפֵּ֥ר אֹת֖וֹ לְאֶחָ֑יו וַיֹּ֗אמֶר הִנֵּ֨ה חָלַ֤מְתִּֽי חֲלוֹם֙ ע֔וֹד וְהִנֵּ֧ה הַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ וְהַיָּרֵ֗חַ וְאַחַ֤ד עָשָׂר֙ כּֽוֹכָבִ֔ים מִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֖ים לִֽי׃
37.englishText: He dreamed another dream and told it to his brothers, saying, “Look, I have had another dream: And this time, the sun, the moon, and eleven stars were bowing down to me.”
37.transliteration: vַyַּchֲlֹ֥ם avֹd֙ chֲl֣vֹם aַchֵ֔r vַyְsַpֵּ֥r aֹt֖vֹ lְaֶchָ֑yv vַyֹּ֗amֶr hִnֵּ֨h chָlַ֤mְtִּֽy chֲlvֹם֙ a֔vֹd vְhִnֵּ֧h hַshֶּׁ֣mֶshׁ vְhַyָּrֵ֗chַ vְaַchַ֤d aָshָׂr֙ kּֽvֹkָbִ֔yם mִֽshְׁtַּchֲvִ֖yם lִֽy׃

37.hebrewText: וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר אֶל־אָבִיו֮ וְאֶל־אֶחָיו֒ וַיִּגְעַר־בּ֣וֹ אָבִ֔יו וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ל֔וֹ מָ֛ה הַחֲל֥וֹם הַזֶּ֖ה אֲשֶׁ֣ר חָלָ֑מְתָּ הֲב֣וֹא נָב֗וֹא אֲנִי֙ וְאִמְּךָ֣ וְאַחֶ֔יךָ לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֺ֥ת לְךָ֖ אָֽרְצָה׃
37.englishText: And when he told it to his father and brothers, his father berated him. “What,” he said to him, “is this dream you have dreamed? Are we to come, I and your mother and your brothers, and bow low to you to the ground?”
37.transliteration: vַyְsַpֵּ֣r aֶl־aָbִyv֮ vְaֶl־aֶchָyv֒ vַyִּgְaַr־bּ֣vֹ aָbִ֔yv vַyֹּ֣amֶr l֔vֹ mָ֛h hַchֲl֥vֹם hַzֶּ֖h aֲshֶׁ֣r chָlָ֑mְtָּ hֲb֣vֹa nָb֗vֹa aֲnִy֙ vְaִmְּךָ֣ vְaַchֶ֔yךָ lְhִshְׁtַּchֲvֺ֥t lְךָ֖ aָֽrְtsָh׃

37.hebrewText: וַיְקַנְאוּ־ב֖וֹ אֶחָ֑יו וְאָבִ֖יו שָׁמַ֥ר אֶת־הַדָּבָֽר׃
37.englishText: So his brothers were wrought up at him, and his father kept the matter in mind.
37.transliteration: vַyְkַnְavּ־b֖vֹ aֶchָ֑yv vְaָbִ֖yv shָׁmַ֥r aֶt־hַdָּbָֽr׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ אֶחָ֑יו לִרְע֛וֹת אֶׄתׄ־צֹ֥אן אֲבִיהֶ֖ם בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃
37.englishText: One time, when his brothers had gone to pasture their father’s flock at Shechem,
37.transliteration: vַyֵּlְk֖vּ aֶchָ֑yv lִrְa֛vֹt aֶׄtׄ־tsֹ֥aן aֲbִyhֶ֖ם bִּshְׁkֶֽם׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל אֶל־יוֹסֵ֗ף הֲל֤וֹא אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ רֹעִ֣ים בִּשְׁכֶ֔ם לְכָ֖ה וְאֶשְׁלָחֲךָ֣ אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם וַיֹּ֥אמֶר ל֖וֹ הִנֵּֽנִי׃
37.englishText: Israel said to Joseph, “Your brothers are pasturing at Shechem. Come, I will send you to them.” He answered, “I am ready.”
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yִshְׂrָaֵ֜l aֶl־yvֹsֵ֗ף hֲl֤vֹa aַchֶ֙yךָ֙ rֹaִ֣yם bִּshְׁkֶ֔ם lְkָ֖h vְaֶshְׁlָchֲךָ֣ aֲlֵyhֶ֑ם vַyֹּ֥amֶr l֖vֹ hִnֵּֽnִy׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ל֗וֹ לֶךְ־נָ֨א רְאֵ֜ה אֶת־שְׁל֤וֹם אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ וְאֶת־שְׁל֣וֹם הַצֹּ֔אן וַהֲשִׁבֵ֖נִי דָּבָ֑ר וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֙הוּ֙ מֵעֵ֣מֶק חֶבְר֔וֹן וַיָּבֹ֖א שְׁכֶֽמָה׃
37.englishText: And he said to him, “Go and see how your brothers are and how the flocks are faring, and bring me back word.” So he sent him from the valley of Hebron. When he reached Shechem,
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr l֗vֹ lֶךְ־nָ֨a rְaֵ֜h aֶt־shְׁl֤vֹם aַchֶ֙yךָ֙ vְaֶt־shְׁl֣vֹם hַtsֹּ֔aן vַhֲshִׁbֵ֖nִy dָּbָ֑r vַyִּshְׁlָchֵ֙hvּ֙ mֵaֵ֣mֶk chֶbְr֔vֹן vַyָּbֹ֖a shְׁkֶֽmָh׃

37.hebrewText: וַיִּמְצָאֵ֣הוּ אִ֔ישׁ וְהִנֵּ֥ה תֹעֶ֖ה בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֧הוּ הָאִ֛ישׁ לֵאמֹ֖ר מַה־תְּבַקֵּֽשׁ׃
37.englishText: a man came upon him*a man came upon him Or “an agent located him,” i.e., this figure could be construed as acting in God’s behalf. For this verb’s use to describe a mission, see 16.7; 37.17; 38.22. On “man” and “agent,” see notes at 18.2, 24.21, and the Dictionary under ’ish; Agent. wandering in the fields. The man asked him, “What are you looking for?”
37.transliteration: vַyִּmְtsָaֵ֣hvּ aִ֔yshׁ vְhִnֵּ֥h tֹaֶ֖h bַּshָּׂdֶ֑h vַyִּshְׁaָlֵ֧hvּ hָaִ֛yshׁ lֵamֹ֖r mַh־tְּbַkֵּֽshׁ׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֕אמֶר אֶת־אַחַ֖י אָנֹכִ֣י מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ הַגִּֽידָה־נָּ֣א לִ֔י אֵיפֹ֖ה הֵ֥ם רֹעִֽים׃
37.englishText: He answered, “I am looking for my brothers. Could you tell me where they are pasturing?”
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֕amֶr aֶt־aַchַ֖y aָnֹkִ֣y mְbַkֵּ֑shׁ hַgִּֽydָh־nָּ֣a lִ֔y aֵypֹ֖h hֵ֥ם rֹaִֽyם׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר הָאִישׁ֙ נָסְע֣וּ מִזֶּ֔ה כִּ֤י שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ אֹֽמְרִ֔ים נֵלְכָ֖ה דֹּתָ֑יְנָה וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ יוֹסֵף֙ אַחַ֣ר אֶחָ֔יו וַיִּמְצָאֵ֖ם בְּדֹתָֽן׃
37.englishText: The man said, “They have gone from here, for I heard them say: Let us go to Dothan.” So Joseph followed his brothers and found them at Dothan.
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr hָaִyshׁ֙ nָsְa֣vּ mִzֶּ֔h kִּ֤y shָׁmַ֙aְtִּy֙ aֹֽmְrִ֔yם nֵlְkָ֖h dֹּtָ֑yְnָh vַyֵּ֤lֶךְ yvֹsֵף֙ aַchַ֣r aֶchָ֔yv vַyִּmְtsָaֵ֖ם bְּdֹtָֽן׃

37.hebrewText: וַיִּרְא֥וּ אֹת֖וֹ מֵרָחֹ֑ק וּבְטֶ֙רֶם֙ יִקְרַ֣ב אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם וַיִּֽתְנַכְּל֥וּ אֹת֖וֹ לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃
37.englishText: They saw him from afar, and before he came close to them they conspired to kill him.
37.transliteration: vַyִּrְa֥vּ aֹt֖vֹ mֵrָchֹ֑k vּbְtֶ֙rֶם֙ yִkְrַ֣b aֲlֵyhֶ֔ם vַyִּֽtְnַkְּl֥vּ aֹt֖vֹ lַhֲmִytֽvֹ׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ אִ֣ישׁ אֶל־אָחִ֑יו הִנֵּ֗ה בַּ֛עַל הַחֲלֹמ֥וֹת הַלָּזֶ֖ה בָּֽא׃
37.englishText: They said to one another, “Here comes that dreamer!
37.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֖vּ aִ֣yshׁ aֶl־aָchִ֑yv hִnֵּ֗h bַּ֛aַl hַchֲlֹm֥vֹt hַlָּzֶ֖h bָּֽa׃

37.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ לְכ֣וּ וְנַֽהַרְגֵ֗הוּ וְנַשְׁלִכֵ֙הוּ֙ בְּאַחַ֣ד הַבֹּר֔וֹת וְאָמַ֕רְנוּ חַיָּ֥ה רָעָ֖ה אֲכָלָ֑תְהוּ וְנִרְאֶ֕ה מַה־יִּהְי֖וּ חֲלֹמֹתָֽיו׃
37.englishText: Come now, let us kill him and throw him into one of the pits; and we can say, ‘A savage beast devoured him.’ We shall see what comes of his dreams!”
37.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֣h ׀ lְk֣vּ vְnַֽhַrְgֵ֗hvּ vְnַshְׁlִkֵ֙hvּ֙ bְּaַchַ֣d hַbֹּr֔vֹt vְaָmַ֕rְnvּ chַyָּ֥h rָaָ֖h aֲkָlָ֑tְhvּ vְnִrְaֶ֕h mַh־yִּhְy֖vּ chֲlֹmֹtָֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע רְאוּבֵ֔ן וַיַּצִּלֵ֖הוּ מִיָּדָ֑ם וַיֹּ֕אמֶר לֹ֥א נַכֶּ֖נּוּ נָֽפֶשׁ׃
37.englishText: But when Reuben heard it, he tried to save him from them. He said, “Let us not take his life.”
37.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁmַ֣a rְavּbֵ֔ן vַyַּtsִּlֵ֖hvּ mִyָּdָ֑ם vַyֹּ֕amֶr lֹ֥a nַkֶּ֖nּvּ nָֽpֶshׁ׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר אֲלֵהֶ֣ם <small>׀</small> רְאוּבֵן֮ אַל־תִּשְׁפְּכוּ־דָם֒ הַשְׁלִ֣יכוּ אֹת֗וֹ אֶל־הַבּ֤וֹר הַזֶּה֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר וְיָ֖ד אַל־תִּשְׁלְחוּ־ב֑וֹ לְמַ֗עַן הַצִּ֤יל אֹתוֹ֙ מִיָּדָ֔ם לַהֲשִׁיב֖וֹ אֶל־אָבִֽיו׃
37.englishText: And Reuben went on, “Shed no blood! Cast him into that pit out in the wilderness, but do not touch him yourselves”—intending to save him from them and restore him to his father.
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr aֲlֵhֶ֣ם <small>׀</small> rְavּbֵן֮ aַl־tִּshְׁpְּkvּ־dָם֒ hַshְׁlִ֣ykvּ aֹt֗vֹ aֶl־hַbּ֤vֹr hַzֶּh֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r bַּmִּdְbָּ֔r vְyָ֖d aַl־tִּshְׁlְchvּ־b֑vֹ lְmַ֗aַן hַtsִּ֤yl aֹtvֹ֙ mִyָּdָ֔ם lַhֲshִׁyb֖vֹ aֶl־aָbִֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֕י כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־בָּ֥א יוֹסֵ֖ף אֶל־אֶחָ֑יו וַיַּפְשִׁ֤יטוּ אֶת־יוֹסֵף֙ אֶת־כֻּתׇּנְתּ֔וֹ אֶת־כְּתֹ֥נֶת הַפַּסִּ֖ים אֲשֶׁ֥ר עָלָֽיו׃
37.englishText: When Joseph came up to his brothers, they stripped Joseph of his tunic, the ornamented tunic that he was wearing,
37.transliteration: vַyְhִ֕y kַּֽaֲshֶׁr־bָּ֥a yvֹsֵ֖ף aֶl־aֶchָ֑yv vַyַּpְshִׁ֤ytvּ aֶt־yvֹsֵף֙ aֶt־kֻּtׇּnְtּ֔vֹ aֶt־kְּtֹ֥nֶt hַpַּsִּ֖yם aֲshֶׁ֥r aָlָֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וַיִּ֨קָּחֻ֔הוּ וַיַּשְׁלִ֥כוּ אֹת֖וֹ הַבֹּ֑רָה וְהַבּ֣וֹר רֵ֔ק אֵ֥ין בּ֖וֹ מָֽיִם׃
37.englishText: and took him and cast him into the pit. The pit was empty; there was no water in it.
37.transliteration: vַyִּ֨kָּchֻ֔hvּ vַyַּshְׁlִ֥kvּ aֹt֖vֹ hַbֹּ֑rָh vְhַbּ֣vֹr rֵ֔k aֵ֥yן bּ֖vֹ mָֽyִם׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֵּשְׁבוּ֮ לֶֽאֱכׇל־לֶ֒חֶם֒ וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ וַיִּרְא֔וּ וְהִנֵּה֙ אֹרְחַ֣ת יִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים בָּאָ֖ה מִגִּלְעָ֑ד וּגְמַלֵּיהֶ֣ם נֹֽשְׂאִ֗ים נְכֹאת֙ וּצְרִ֣י וָלֹ֔ט הוֹלְכִ֖ים לְהוֹרִ֥יד מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃
37.englishText: Then they sat down to a meal. Looking up, they saw a caravan of Ishmaelites coming from Gilead, their camels bearing gum, balm, and ladanum to be taken to Egypt.
37.transliteration: vַyֵּshְׁbvּ֮ lֶֽaֱkׇl־lֶ֒chֶם֒ vַyִּshְׂa֤vּ aֵֽynֵyhֶם֙ vַyִּrְa֔vּ vְhִnֵּh֙ aֹrְchַ֣t yִshְׁmְaֵalִ֔yם bָּaָ֖h mִgִּlְaָ֑d vּgְmַlֵּyhֶ֣ם nֹֽshְׂaִ֗yם nְkֹat֙ vּtsְrִ֣y vָlֹ֔t hvֹlְkִ֖yם lְhvֹrִ֥yd mִtsְrָֽyְmָh׃

37.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר יְהוּדָ֖ה אֶל־אֶחָ֑יו מַה־בֶּ֗צַע כִּ֤י נַהֲרֹג֙ אֶת־אָחִ֔ינוּ וְכִסִּ֖ינוּ אֶת־דָּמֽוֹ׃
37.englishText: Then Judah said to his brothers, “What do we gain by killing our brother and covering up his blood?
37.transliteration: vַyֹּ֥amֶr yְhvּdָ֖h aֶl־aֶchָ֑yv mַh־bֶּ֗tsַa kִּ֤y nַhֲrֹg֙ aֶt־aָchִ֔ynvּ vְkִsִּ֖ynvּ aֶt־dָּmֽvֹ׃

37.hebrewText: לְכ֞וּ וְנִמְכְּרֶ֣נּוּ לַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים וְיָדֵ֙נוּ֙ אַל־תְּהִי־ב֔וֹ כִּֽי־אָחִ֥ינוּ בְשָׂרֵ֖נוּ ה֑וּא וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ אֶחָֽיו׃
37.englishText: Come, let us sell him to the Ishmaelites, but let us not do away with him ourselves. After all, he is our brother, our own flesh.” His brothers agreed.
37.transliteration: lְk֞vּ vְnִmְkְּrֶ֣nּvּ lַyִּshְׁmְaֵalִ֗yם vְyָdֵ֙nvּ֙ aַl־tְּhִy־b֔vֹ kִּֽy־aָchִ֥ynvּ bְshָׂrֵ֖nvּ h֑vּa vַֽyִּshְׁmְa֖vּ aֶchָֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וַיַּֽעַבְרוּ֩ אֲנָשִׁ֨ים מִדְיָנִ֜ים סֹֽחֲרִ֗ים וַֽיִּמְשְׁכוּ֙ וַיַּֽעֲל֤וּ אֶת־יוֹסֵף֙ מִן־הַבּ֔וֹר וַיִּמְכְּר֧וּ אֶת־יוֹסֵ֛ף לַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֖ים בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים כָּ֑סֶף וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ אֶת־יוֹסֵ֖ף מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃
37.englishText: When Midianite traders passed by, they pulled Joseph up out of the pit. They sold Joseph for twenty pieces of silver to the Ishmaelites, who brought Joseph to Egypt.
37.transliteration: vַyַּֽaַbְrvּ֩ aֲnָshִׁ֨yם mִdְyָnִ֜yם sֹֽchֲrִ֗yם vַֽyִּmְshְׁkvּ֙ vַyַּֽaֲl֤vּ aֶt־yvֹsֵף֙ mִן־hַbּ֔vֹr vַyִּmְkְּr֧vּ aֶt־yvֹsֵ֛ף lַyִּshְׁmְaֵalִ֖yם bְּaֶshְׂrִ֣yם kָּ֑sֶף vַyָּbִ֥yavּ aֶt־yvֹsֵ֖ף mִtsְrָֽyְmָh׃

37.hebrewText: וַיָּ֤שׇׁב רְאוּבֵן֙ אֶל־הַבּ֔וֹר וְהִנֵּ֥ה אֵין־יוֹסֵ֖ף בַּבּ֑וֹר וַיִּקְרַ֖ע אֶת־בְּגָדָֽיו׃
37.englishText: When Reuben returned to the pit and saw that Joseph was not in the pit, he rent his clothes.
37.transliteration: vַyָּ֤shׇׁb rְavּbֵן֙ aֶl־hַbּ֔vֹr vְhִnֵּ֥h aֵyן־yvֹsֵ֖ף bַּbּ֑vֹr vַyִּkְrַ֖a aֶt־bְּgָdָֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וַיָּ֥שׇׁב אֶל־אֶחָ֖יו וַיֹּאמַ֑ר הַיֶּ֣לֶד אֵינֶ֔נּוּ וַאֲנִ֖י אָ֥נָה אֲנִי־בָֽא׃
37.englishText: Returning to his brothers, he said, “The boy is gone! Now, what am I to do?”
37.transliteration: vַyָּ֥shׇׁb aֶl־aֶchָ֖yv vַyֹּamַ֑r hַyֶּ֣lֶd aֵynֶ֔nּvּ vַaֲnִ֖y aָ֥nָh aֲnִy־bָֽa׃

37.hebrewText: וַיִּקְח֖וּ אֶת־כְּתֹ֣נֶת יוֹסֵ֑ף וַֽיִּשְׁחֲטוּ֙ שְׂעִ֣יר עִזִּ֔ים וַיִּטְבְּל֥וּ אֶת־הַכֻּתֹּ֖נֶת בַּדָּֽם׃
37.englishText: Then they took Joseph’s tunic, slaughtered a kid, and dipped the tunic in the blood.
37.transliteration: vַyִּkְch֖vּ aֶt־kְּtֹ֣nֶt yvֹsֵ֑ף vַֽyִּshְׁchֲtvּ֙ shְׂaִ֣yr aִzִּ֔yם vַyִּtְbְּl֥vּ aֶt־hַkֻּtֹּ֖nֶt bַּdָּֽם׃

37.hebrewText: וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֞וּ אֶת־כְּתֹ֣נֶת הַפַּסִּ֗ים וַיָּבִ֙יאוּ֙ אֶל־אֲבִיהֶ֔ם וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ זֹ֣את מָצָ֑אנוּ הַכֶּר־נָ֗א הַכְּתֹ֧נֶת בִּנְךָ֛ הִ֖וא אִם־לֹֽא׃
37.englishText: They had the ornamented tunic taken to their father, and they said, “We found this. Please examine it; is it your son’s tunic or not?”
37.transliteration: vַֽyְshַׁlְּch֞vּ aֶt־kְּtֹ֣nֶt hַpַּsִּ֗yם vַyָּbִ֙yavּ֙ aֶl־aֲbִyhֶ֔ם vַyֹּamְr֖vּ zֹ֣at mָtsָ֑anvּ hַkֶּr־nָ֗a hַkְּtֹ֧nֶt bִּnְךָ֛ hִ֖va aִם־lֹֽa׃

37.hebrewText: וַיַּכִּירָ֤הּ וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ כְּתֹ֣נֶת בְּנִ֔י חַיָּ֥ה רָעָ֖ה אֲכָלָ֑תְהוּ טָרֹ֥ף טֹרַ֖ף יוֹסֵֽף׃
37.englishText: He recognized it, and said, “My son’s tunic! A savage beast devoured him! Joseph was torn by a beast!”
37.transliteration: vַyַּkִּyrָ֤hּ vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ kְּtֹ֣nֶt bְּnִ֔y chַyָּ֥h rָaָ֖h aֲkָlָ֑tְhvּ tָrֹ֥ף tֹrַ֖ף yvֹsֵֽף׃

37.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרַ֤ע יַעֲקֹב֙ שִׂמְלֹתָ֔יו וַיָּ֥שֶׂם שַׂ֖ק בְּמׇתְנָ֑יו וַיִּתְאַבֵּ֥ל עַל־בְּנ֖וֹ יָמִ֥ים רַבִּֽים׃
37.englishText: Jacob rent his clothes, put sackcloth on his loins, and observed mourning for his son many days.
37.transliteration: vַyִּkְrַ֤a yַaֲkֹb֙ shִׂmְlֹtָ֔yv vַyָּ֥shֶׂם shַׂ֖k bְּmׇtְnָ֑yv vַyִּtְaַbֵּ֥l aַl־bְּn֖vֹ yָmִ֥yם rַbִּֽyם׃

37.hebrewText: וַיָּקֻ֩מוּ֩ כׇל־בָּנָ֨יו וְכׇל־בְּנֹתָ֜יו לְנַחֲמ֗וֹ וַיְמָאֵן֙ לְהִתְנַחֵ֔ם וַיֹּ֕אמֶר כִּֽי־אֵרֵ֧ד אֶל־בְּנִ֛י אָבֵ֖ל שְׁאֹ֑לָה וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ אֹת֖וֹ אָבִֽיו׃
37.englishText: All his sons and daughters sought to comfort him; but he refused to be comforted, saying, “No, I will go down mourning to my son in Sheol.” Thus his father bewailed him.
37.transliteration: vַyָּkֻ֩mvּ֩ kׇl־bָּnָ֨yv vְkׇl־bְּnֹtָ֜yv lְnַchֲm֗vֹ vַyְmָaֵן֙ lְhִtְnַchֵ֔ם vַyֹּ֕amֶr kִּֽy־aֵrֵ֧d aֶl־bְּnִ֛y aָbֵ֖l shְׁaֹ֑lָh vַyֵּ֥bְךְּ aֹt֖vֹ aָbִֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וְהַ֨מְּדָנִ֔ים מָכְר֥וּ אֹת֖וֹ אֶל־מִצְרָ֑יִם לְפֽוֹטִיפַר֙ סְרִ֣יס פַּרְעֹ֔ה שַׂ֖ר הַטַּבָּחִֽים׃ {פ}
37.englishText: The Midianites,*Midianites Heb. “Medanites.” meanwhile, sold him in Egypt to Potiphar, a courtier of Pharaoh and his prefect.*prefect Precise force of Heb. sar haṭṭabaḥim uncertain; cf. Jer. 52.12; 2 Kings 25.8ff. and Jer. 39–40; Gen. 39.20; 40.3. Apparently the office was obscure even to the text’s original audience (cf. 39.1). NJPS “chief steward,” trad. “captain of the guard.”
37.transliteration: vְhַ֨mְּdָnִ֔yם mָkְr֥vּ aֹt֖vֹ aֶl־mִtsְrָ֑yִם lְpֽvֹtִypַr֙ sְrִ֣ys pַּrְaֹ֔h shַׂ֖r hַtַּbָּchִֽyם׃ {p}

38.hebrewText: וַֽיְהִי֙ בָּעֵ֣ת הַהִ֔וא וַיֵּ֥רֶד יְהוּדָ֖ה מֵאֵ֣ת אֶחָ֑יו וַיֵּ֛ט עַד־אִ֥ישׁ עֲדֻלָּמִ֖י וּשְׁמ֥וֹ חִירָֽה׃
38.englishText: About that time Judah left his brothers and camped near a certain Adullamite whose name was Hirah.
38.transliteration: vַֽyְhִy֙ bָּaֵ֣t hַhִ֔va vַyֵּ֥rֶd yְhvּdָ֖h mֵaֵ֣t aֶchָ֑yv vַyֵּ֛t aַd־aִ֥yshׁ aֲdֻlָּmִ֖y vּshְׁm֥vֹ chִyrָֽh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּרְא־שָׁ֧ם יְהוּדָ֛ה בַּת־אִ֥ישׁ כְּנַעֲנִ֖י וּשְׁמ֣וֹ שׁ֑וּעַ וַיִּקָּחֶ֖הָ וַיָּבֹ֥א אֵלֶֽיהָ׃
38.englishText: There Judah saw the daughter of a certain Canaanite whose name was Shua, and he took her [into his household as wife] and cohabited with her.
38.transliteration: vַyַּrְa־shָׁ֧ם yְhvּdָ֛h bַּt־aִ֥yshׁ kְּnַaֲnִ֖y vּshְׁm֣vֹ shׁ֑vּaַ vַyִּkָּchֶ֖hָ vַyָּbֹ֥a aֵlֶֽyhָ׃

38.hebrewText: וַתַּ֖הַר וַתֵּ֣לֶד בֵּ֑ן וַיִּקְרָ֥א אֶת־שְׁמ֖וֹ עֵֽר׃
38.englishText: She conceived and bore a son, and he named him Er.
38.transliteration: vַtַּ֖hַr vַtֵּ֣lֶd bֵּ֑ן vַyִּkְrָ֥a aֶt־shְׁm֖vֹ aֵֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וַתַּ֥הַר ע֖וֹד וַתֵּ֣לֶד בֵּ֑ן וַתִּקְרָ֥א אֶת־שְׁמ֖וֹ אוֹנָֽן׃
38.englishText: She conceived again and bore a son, and named him Onan.
38.transliteration: vַtַּ֥hַr a֖vֹd vַtֵּ֣lֶd bֵּ֑ן vַtִּkְrָ֥a aֶt־shְׁm֖vֹ avֹnָֽן׃

38.hebrewText: וַתֹּ֤סֶף עוֹד֙ וַתֵּ֣לֶד בֵּ֔ן וַתִּקְרָ֥א אֶת־שְׁמ֖וֹ שֵׁלָ֑ה וְהָיָ֥ה בִכְזִ֖יב בְּלִדְתָּ֥הּ אֹתֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: Once again she bore a son, and named him Shelah; he was at Chezib when she bore him.
38.transliteration: vַtֹּ֤sֶף avֹd֙ vַtֵּ֣lֶd bֵּ֔ן vַtִּkְrָ֥a aֶt־shְׁm֖vֹ shֵׁlָ֑h vְhָyָ֥h bִkְzִ֖yb bְּlִdְtָּ֥hּ aֹtֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֧ח יְהוּדָ֛ה אִשָּׁ֖ה לְעֵ֣ר בְּכוֹר֑וֹ וּשְׁמָ֖הּ תָּמָֽר׃
38.englishText: Judah got a wife for Er his first-born; her name was Tamar.
38.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֧ch yְhvּdָ֛h aִshָּׁ֖h lְaֵ֣r bְּkvֹr֑vֹ vּshְׁmָ֖hּ tָּmָֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י עֵ֚ר בְּכ֣וֹר יְהוּדָ֔ה רַ֖ע בְּעֵינֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה וַיְמִתֵ֖הוּ יְהֹוָֽה׃
38.englishText: But Er, Judah’s first-born, was displeasing to יהוה, and יהוה took his life.
38.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y aֵ֚r bְּk֣vֹr yְhvּdָ֔h rַ֖a bְּaֵynֵ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h vַyְmִtֵ֖hvּ yְhֹvָֽh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהוּדָה֙ לְאוֹנָ֔ן בֹּ֛א אֶל־אֵ֥שֶׁת אָחִ֖יךָ וְיַבֵּ֣ם אֹתָ֑הּ וְהָקֵ֥ם זֶ֖רַע לְאָחִֽיךָ׃
38.englishText: Then Judah said to Onan, “Join with your brother’s wife and do your duty*duty Cf. Deut. 25.5. by her as a brother-in-law, and provide offspring for your brother.”
38.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhvּdָh֙ lְavֹnָ֔ן bֹּ֛a aֶl־aֵ֥shֶׁt aָchִ֖yךָ vְyַbֵּ֣ם aֹtָ֑hּ vְhָkֵ֥ם zֶ֖rַa lְaָchִֽyךָ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֣דַע אוֹנָ֔ן כִּ֛י לֹּ֥א ל֖וֹ יִהְיֶ֣ה הַזָּ֑רַע וְהָיָ֞ה אִם־בָּ֨א אֶל־אֵ֤שֶׁת אָחִיו֙ וְשִׁחֵ֣ת אַ֔רְצָה לְבִלְתִּ֥י נְתׇן־זֶ֖רַע לְאָחִֽיו׃
38.englishText: But Onan, knowing that the offspring would not count as his, let [the semen] go to waste*let [the semen] go to waste Heb. shiḥet arṣah; lit. “spoil [it] groundward.” NJPS “let it go to waste,” with “offspring” as the implausible co-referent of “it.” See the Dictionary under “seed.” whenever he joined with his brother’s wife, so as not to provide offspring for his brother.
38.transliteration: vַyֵּ֣dַa avֹnָ֔ן kִּ֛y lֹּ֥a l֖vֹ yִhְyֶ֣h hַzָּ֑rַa vְhָyָ֞h aִם־bָּ֨a aֶl־aֵ֤shֶׁt aָchִyv֙ vְshִׁchֵ֣t aַ֔rְtsָh lְbִlְtִּ֥y nְtׇן־zֶ֖rַa lְaָchִֽyv׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֛רַע בְּעֵינֵ֥י יְהֹוָ֖ה אֲשֶׁ֣ר עָשָׂ֑ה וַיָּ֖מֶת גַּם־אֹתֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: What he did was displeasing to יהוה, who took his life also.
38.transliteration: vַyֵּ֛rַa bְּaֵynֵ֥y yְhֹvָ֖h aֲshֶׁ֣r aָshָׂ֑h vַyָּ֖mֶt gַּם־aֹtֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר יְהוּדָה֩ לְתָמָ֨ר כַּלָּת֜וֹ שְׁבִ֧י אַלְמָנָ֣ה בֵית־אָבִ֗יךְ עַד־יִגְדַּל֙ שֵׁלָ֣ה בְנִ֔י כִּ֣י אָמַ֔ר פֶּן־יָמ֥וּת גַּם־ה֖וּא כְּאֶחָ֑יו וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ תָּמָ֔ר וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב בֵּ֥ית אָבִֽיהָ׃
38.englishText: Then Judah said to his daughter-in-law Tamar, “Stay as a widow in your father’s house until my son Shelah grows up”—for he thought, “He too might die like his brothers.” So Tamar went to live in her father’s house.
38.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr yְhvּdָh֩ lְtָmָ֨r kַּlָּt֜vֹ shְׁbִ֧y aַlְmָnָ֣h bֵyt־aָbִ֗yךְ aַd־yִgְdַּl֙ shֵׁlָ֣h bְnִ֔y kִּ֣y aָmַ֔r pֶּן־yָm֥vּt gַּם־h֖vּa kְּaֶchָ֑yv vַtֵּ֣lֶךְ tָּmָ֔r vַtֵּ֖shֶׁb bֵּ֥yt aָbִֽyhָ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיִּרְבּוּ֙ הַיָּמִ֔ים וַתָּ֖מׇת בַּת־שׁ֣וּעַ אֵֽשֶׁת־יְהוּדָ֑ה וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם יְהוּדָ֗ה וַיַּ֜עַל עַל־גֹּֽזְזֵ֤י צֹאנוֹ֙ ה֗וּא וְחִירָ֛ה רֵעֵ֥הוּ הָעֲדֻלָּמִ֖י תִּמְנָֽתָה׃
38.englishText: A long time afterward, Shua’s daughter, the wife of Judah, died. When his period of mourning was over,*his period of mourning was over Lit. “he was comforted.” Judah went up to Timnah to his sheepshearers, together with his friend Hirah the Adullamite.
38.transliteration: vַyִּrְbּvּ֙ hַyָּmִ֔yם vַtָּ֖mׇt bַּt־shׁ֣vּaַ aֵֽshֶׁt־yְhvּdָ֑h vַyִּnָּ֣chֶם yְhvּdָ֗h vַyַּ֜aַl aַl־gֹּֽzְzֵ֤y tsֹanvֹ֙ h֗vּa vְchִyrָ֛h rֵaֵ֥hvּ hָaֲdֻlָּmִ֖y tִּmְnָֽtָh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֻּגַּ֥ד לְתָמָ֖ר לֵאמֹ֑ר הִנֵּ֥ה חָמִ֛יךְ עֹלֶ֥ה תִמְנָ֖תָה לָגֹ֥ז צֹאנֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: And Tamar was told, “Your father-in-law is coming up to Timnah for the sheepshearing.”
38.transliteration: vַyֻּgַּ֥d lְtָmָ֖r lֵamֹ֑r hִnֵּ֥h chָmִ֛yךְ aֹlֶ֥h tִmְnָ֖tָh lָgֹ֥z tsֹanֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַתָּ֩סַר֩ בִּגְדֵ֨י אַלְמְנוּתָ֜הּ מֵֽעָלֶ֗יהָ וַתְּכַ֤ס בַּצָּעִיף֙ וַתִּתְעַלָּ֔ף וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ בְּפֶ֣תַח עֵינַ֔יִם אֲשֶׁ֖ר עַל־דֶּ֣רֶךְ תִּמְנָ֑תָה כִּ֤י רָאֲתָה֙ כִּֽי־גָדַ֣ל שֵׁלָ֔ה וְהִ֕וא לֹֽא־נִתְּנָ֥ה ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃
38.englishText: So she took off her widow’s garb, covered her face with a veil, and, wrapping herself up, sat down at the entrance to Enaim,*Enaim Cf. Enam, Josh. 15.34. Others “in an open place” or “at the crossroad.” which is on the road to Timnah; for she saw that Shelah was grown up, yet she had not been given to him as wife.
38.transliteration: vַtָּ֩sַr֩ bִּgְdֵ֨y aַlְmְnvּtָ֜hּ mֵֽaָlֶ֗yhָ vַtְּkַ֤s bַּtsָּaִyף֙ vַtִּtְaַlָּ֔ף vַtֵּ֙shֶׁb֙ bְּpֶ֣tַch aֵynַ֔yִם aֲshֶׁ֖r aַl־dֶּ֣rֶךְ tִּmְnָ֑tָh kִּ֤y rָaֲtָh֙ kִּֽy־gָdַ֣l shֵׁlָ֔h vְhִ֕va lֹֽa־nִtְּnָ֥h l֖vֹ lְaִshָּֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיִּרְאֶ֣הָ יְהוּדָ֔ה וַֽיַּחְשְׁבֶ֖הָ לְזוֹנָ֑ה כִּ֥י כִסְּתָ֖ה פָּנֶֽיהָ׃
38.englishText: When Judah saw her, he took her for a harlot; for she had covered her face.
38.transliteration: vַyִּrְaֶ֣hָ yְhvּdָ֔h vַֽyַּchְshְׁbֶ֖hָ lְzvֹnָ֑h kִּ֥y kִsְּtָ֖h pָּnֶֽyhָ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֨ט אֵלֶ֜יהָ אֶל־הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ הָֽבָה־נָּא֙ אָב֣וֹא אֵלַ֔יִךְ כִּ֚י לֹ֣א יָדַ֔ע כִּ֥י כַלָּת֖וֹ הִ֑וא וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ מַה־תִּתֶּן־לִ֔י כִּ֥י תָב֖וֹא אֵלָֽי׃
38.englishText: So he turned aside to her by the road and said, “Here, let me sleep with you”—for he did not know that she was his daughter-in-law. “What,” she asked, “will you pay for sleeping with me?”
38.transliteration: vַyֵּ֨t aֵlֶ֜yhָ aֶl־hַdֶּ֗rֶךְ vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ hָֽbָh־nָּa֙ aָb֣vֹa aֵlַ֔yִךְ kִּ֚y lֹ֣a yָdַ֔a kִּ֥y kַlָּt֖vֹ hִ֑va vַtֹּ֙amֶr֙ mַh־tִּtֶּן־lִ֔y kִּ֥y tָb֖vֹa aֵlָֽy׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֕אמֶר אָנֹכִ֛י אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח גְּדִֽי־עִזִּ֖ים מִן־הַצֹּ֑אן וַתֹּ֕אמֶר אִם־תִּתֵּ֥ן עֵרָב֖וֹן עַ֥ד שׇׁלְחֶֽךָ׃
38.englishText: He replied, “I will send a kid from my flock.” But she said, “You must leave a pledge until you have sent it.”
38.transliteration: vַyֹּ֕amֶr aָnֹkִ֛y aֲshַׁlַּ֥ch gְּdִֽy־aִzִּ֖yם mִן־hַtsֹּ֑aן vַtֹּ֕amֶr aִם־tִּtֵּ֥ן aֵrָb֖vֹן aַ֥d shׇׁlְchֶֽךָ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר מָ֣ה הָעֵֽרָבוֹן֮ אֲשֶׁ֣ר אֶתֶּן־לָךְ֒ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר חֹתָֽמְךָ֙ וּפְתִילֶ֔ךָ וּמַטְּךָ֖ אֲשֶׁ֣ר בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ וַיִּתֶּן־לָ֛הּ וַיָּבֹ֥א אֵלֶ֖יהָ וַתַּ֥הַר לֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: And he said, “What pledge shall I give you?” She replied, “Your seal and cord, and the staff which you carry.” So he gave them to her and slept with her, and she conceived by him.
38.transliteration: vַyֹּ֗amֶr mָ֣h hָaֵֽrָbvֹן֮ aֲshֶׁ֣r aֶtֶּן־lָךְ֒ vַtֹּ֗amֶr chֹtָֽmְךָ֙ vּpְtִylֶ֔ךָ vּmַtְּךָ֖ aֲshֶׁ֣r bְּyָdֶ֑ךָ vַyִּtֶּן־lָ֛hּ vַyָּbֹ֥a aֵlֶ֖yhָ vַtַּ֥hַr lֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַתָּ֣קׇם וַתֵּ֔לֶךְ וַתָּ֥סַר צְעִיפָ֖הּ מֵעָלֶ֑יהָ וַתִּלְבַּ֖שׁ בִּגְדֵ֥י אַלְמְנוּתָֽהּ׃
38.englishText: Then she went on her way. She took off her veil and again put on her widow’s garb.
38.transliteration: vַtָּ֣kׇם vַtֵּ֔lֶךְ vַtָּ֥sַr tsְaִypָ֖hּ mֵaָlֶ֑yhָ vַtִּlְbַּ֖shׁ bִּgְdֵ֥y aַlְmְnvּtָֽhּ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח יְהוּדָ֜ה אֶת־גְּדִ֣י הָֽעִזִּ֗ים בְּיַד֙ רֵעֵ֣הוּ הָֽעֲדֻלָּמִ֔י לָקַ֥חַת הָעֵרָב֖וֹן מִיַּ֣ד הָאִשָּׁ֑ה וְלֹ֖א מְצָאָֽהּ׃
38.englishText: Judah sent the kid by his friend the Adullamite, to redeem the pledge from the woman; but he could not find her.
38.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁlַ֨ch yְhvּdָ֜h aֶt־gְּdִ֣y hָֽaִzִּ֗yם bְּyַd֙ rֵaֵ֣hvּ hָֽaֲdֻlָּmִ֔y lָkַ֥chַt hָaֵrָb֖vֹן mִyַּ֣d hָaִshָּׁ֑h vְlֹ֖a mְtsָaָֽhּ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁאַ֞ל אֶת־אַנְשֵׁ֤י מְקֹמָהּ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר אַיֵּ֧ה הַקְּדֵשָׁ֛ה הִ֥וא בָעֵינַ֖יִם עַל־הַדָּ֑רֶךְ וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ לֹא־הָיְתָ֥ה בָזֶ֖ה קְדֵשָֽׁה׃
38.englishText: He inquired of the council of that locale,*council of that locale Or “locals.” Heb. ’anshe meqomah; cf. 26.7; 29.22; 34.20. NJPS “people of that town,” trad. “men of….” See further the Dictionary under ’ish. “Where is the prostitute,*prostitute Meaning of Heb. qedeshah uncertain. Perhaps a type of female functionary at a religious site. Trad. “harlot.” NJPS “cult prostitute,” but the notion that ancient Near Eastern religions included prostitution as a religious act has since been discredited. the one at Enaim, by the road?” But they said, “There has been no prostitute here.”
38.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁaַ֞l aֶt־aַnְshֵׁ֤y mְkֹmָhּ֙ lֵamֹ֔r aַyֵּ֧h hַkְּdֵshָׁ֛h hִ֥va bָaֵynַ֖yִם aַl־hַdָּ֑rֶךְ vַyֹּ֣amְr֔vּ lֹa־hָyְtָ֥h bָzֶ֖h kְdֵshָֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיָּ֙שׇׁב֙ אֶל־יְהוּדָ֔ה וַיֹּ֖אמֶר לֹ֣א מְצָאתִ֑יהָ וְגַ֨ם אַנְשֵׁ֤י הַמָּקוֹם֙ אָֽמְר֔וּ לֹא־הָיְתָ֥ה בָזֶ֖ה קְדֵשָֽׁה׃
38.englishText: So he returned to Judah and said, “I could not find her; moreover, the local council*local council Heb. ’anshe ha-maqom; NJPS “the townspeople.” See the first note at v. 21. said: There has been no prostitute here.”
38.transliteration: vַyָּ֙shׇׁb֙ aֶl־yְhvּdָ֔h vַyֹּ֖amֶr lֹ֣a mְtsָatִ֑yhָ vְgַ֨ם aַnְshֵׁ֤y hַmָּkvֹם֙ aָֽmְr֔vּ lֹa־hָyְtָ֥h bָzֶ֖h kְdֵshָֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהוּדָה֙ תִּֽקַּֽח־לָ֔הּ פֶּ֖ן נִהְיֶ֣ה לָב֑וּז הִנֵּ֤ה שָׁלַ֙חְתִּי֙ הַגְּדִ֣י הַזֶּ֔ה וְאַתָּ֖ה לֹ֥א מְצָאתָֽהּ׃
38.englishText: Judah said, “Let her keep them, lest we become a laughingstock. I did send her this kid, but you did not find her.”
38.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhvּdָh֙ tִּֽkַּֽch־lָ֔hּ pֶּ֖ן nִhְyֶ֣h lָb֑vּz hִnֵּ֤h shָׁlַ֙chְtִּy֙ hַgְּdִ֣y hַzֶּ֔h vְaַtָּ֖h lֹ֥a mְtsָatָֽhּ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ כְּמִשְׁלֹ֣שׁ חֳדָשִׁ֗ים וַיֻּגַּ֨ד לִֽיהוּדָ֤ה לֵאמֹר֙ זָֽנְתָה֙ תָּמָ֣ר כַּלָּתֶ֔ךָ וְגַ֛ם הִנֵּ֥ה הָרָ֖ה לִזְנוּנִ֑ים וַיֹּ֣אמֶר יְהוּדָ֔ה הוֹצִיא֖וּהָ וְתִשָּׂרֵֽף׃
38.englishText: About three months later, Judah was told, “Your daughter-in-law Tamar has played the harlot; in fact, she is pregnant from harlotry.” “Bring her out,”*out I.e., for a hearing in the local court of law. (Judah had no jurisdiction over someone living in another household, but he could sue as an aggrieved party.) said Judah. “She should be burned!”
38.transliteration: vַyְhִ֣y ׀ kְּmִshְׁlֹ֣shׁ chֳdָshִׁ֗yם vַyֻּgַּ֨d lִֽyhvּdָ֤h lֵamֹr֙ zָֽnְtָh֙ tָּmָ֣r kַּlָּtֶ֔ךָ vְgַ֛ם hִnֵּ֥h hָrָ֖h lִzְnvּnִ֑yם vַyֹּ֣amֶr yְhvּdָ֔h hvֹtsִya֖vּhָ vְtִshָּׂrֵֽף׃

38.hebrewText: הִ֣וא מוּצֵ֗את וְהִ֨יא שָׁלְחָ֤ה אֶל־חָמִ֙יהָ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר לְאִישׁ֙ אֲשֶׁר־אֵ֣לֶּה לּ֔וֹ אָנֹכִ֖י הָרָ֑ה וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ הַכֶּר־נָ֔א לְמִ֞י הַחֹתֶ֧מֶת וְהַפְּתִילִ֛ים וְהַמַּטֶּ֖ה הָאֵֽלֶּה׃
38.englishText: As she was being brought out, she sent this message to her father-in-law, “It’s by the man*man Or “party.” Lit. “[salient] participant.” See further the Dictionary under ’ish. to whom these belong that I’m pregnant.” And she added, “Examine these: whose seal and cord and staff are these?”
38.transliteration: hִ֣va mvּtsֵ֗at vְhִ֨ya shָׁlְchָ֤h aֶl־chָmִ֙yhָ֙ lֵamֹ֔r lְaִyshׁ֙ aֲshֶׁr־aֵ֣lֶּh lּ֔vֹ aָnֹkִ֖y hָrָ֑h vַtֹּ֙amֶr֙ hַkֶּr־nָ֔a lְmִ֞y hַchֹtֶ֧mֶt vְhַpְּtִylִ֛yם vְhַmַּtֶּ֖h hָaֵֽlֶּh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּכֵּ֣ר יְהוּדָ֗ה וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ צָֽדְקָ֣ה מִמֶּ֔נִּי כִּֽי־עַל־כֵּ֥ן לֹא־נְתַתִּ֖יהָ לְשֵׁלָ֣ה בְנִ֑י וְלֹֽא־יָסַ֥ף ע֖וֹד לְדַעְתָּֽהּ׃
38.englishText: Judah recognized them, and said, “She is more in the right than I, inasmuch as I did not give her to my son Shelah.” And he was not intimate with her again.
38.transliteration: vַyַּkֵּ֣r yְhvּdָ֗h vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ tsָֽdְkָ֣h mִmֶּ֔nִּy kִּֽy־aַl־kֵּ֥ן lֹa־nְtַtִּ֖yhָ lְshֵׁlָ֣h bְnִ֑y vְlֹֽa־yָsַ֥ף a֖vֹd lְdַaְtָּֽhּ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֖י בְּעֵ֣ת לִדְתָּ֑הּ וְהִנֵּ֥ה תְאוֹמִ֖ים בְּבִטְנָֽהּ׃
38.englishText: When the time came for her to give birth, there were twins in her womb!
38.transliteration: vַyְhִ֖y bְּaֵ֣t lִdְtָּ֑hּ vְhִnֵּ֥h tְavֹmִ֖yם bְּbִtְnָֽhּ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֥י בְלִדְתָּ֖הּ וַיִּתֶּן־יָ֑ד וַתִּקַּ֣ח הַמְיַלֶּ֗דֶת וַתִּקְשֹׁ֨ר עַל־יָד֤וֹ שָׁנִי֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר זֶ֖ה יָצָ֥א רִאשֹׁנָֽה׃
38.englishText: While she was in labor, one of them put out a hand, and the midwife tied a crimson thread on that hand, to signify: This one came out first.
38.transliteration: vַyְhִ֥y bְlִdְtָּ֖hּ vַyִּtֶּן־yָ֑d vַtִּkַּ֣ch hַmְyַlֶּ֗dֶt vַtִּkְshֹׁ֨r aַl־yָd֤vֹ shָׁnִy֙ lֵamֹ֔r zֶ֖h yָtsָ֥a rִashֹׁnָֽh׃

38.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ כְּמֵשִׁ֣יב יָד֗וֹ וְהִנֵּה֙ יָצָ֣א אָחִ֔יו וַתֹּ֕אמֶר מַה־פָּרַ֖צְתָּ עָלֶ֣יךָ פָּ֑רֶץ וַיִּקְרָ֥א שְׁמ֖וֹ פָּֽרֶץ׃
38.englishText: But just then it drew back its hand, and out came its brother; and she said, “What a breach*breach Heb. pereṣ, connected with “Perez.” you have made for yourself!” So he was named Perez.
38.transliteration: vַyְhִ֣y ׀ kְּmֵshִׁ֣yb yָd֗vֹ vְhִnֵּh֙ yָtsָ֣a aָchִ֔yv vַtֹּ֕amֶr mַh־pָּrַ֖tsְtָּ aָlֶ֣yךָ pָּ֑rֶץ vַyִּkְrָ֥a shְׁm֖vֹ pָּֽrֶץ׃

38.hebrewText: וְאַחַר֙ יָצָ֣א אָחִ֔יו אֲשֶׁ֥ר עַל־יָד֖וֹ הַשָּׁנִ֑י וַיִּקְרָ֥א שְׁמ֖וֹ זָֽרַח׃ {ס}
38.englishText: Afterward his brother came out, on whose hand was the crimson thread; he was named Zerah.*Zerah I.e., “brightness,” perhaps alluding to the crimson thread.
38.transliteration: vְaַchַr֙ yָtsָ֣a aָchִ֔yv aֲshֶׁ֥r aַl־yָd֖vֹ hַshָּׁnִ֑y vַyִּkְrָ֥a shְׁm֖vֹ zָֽrַch׃ {s}

39.hebrewText: וְיוֹסֵ֖ף הוּרַ֣ד מִצְרָ֑יְמָה וַיִּקְנֵ֡הוּ פּוֹטִיפַר֩ סְרִ֨יס פַּרְעֹ֜ה שַׂ֤ר הַטַּבָּחִים֙ אִ֣ישׁ מִצְרִ֔י מִיַּד֙ הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים אֲשֶׁ֥ר הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ שָֽׁמָּה׃
39.englishText: When Joseph was taken down to Egypt, Potiphar, a courtier of Pharaoh and his prefect*prefect See the second note at 37.36. —a [type of] Egyptian official*official Cf. 2 Sam. 23.21; 1 Chron. 11.23. NJPS (rendering idiomatically via an adjective) “certain.” Traditionally taken as a generic noun of class, but see the Dictionary under ’ish. —bought him from the Ishmaelites who had brought him there.
39.transliteration: vְyvֹsֵ֖ף hvּrַ֣d mִtsְrָ֑yְmָh vַyִּkְnֵ֡hvּ pּvֹtִypַr֩ sְrִ֨ys pַּrְaֹ֜h shַׂ֤r hַtַּbָּchִyם֙ aִ֣yshׁ mִtsְrִ֔y mִyַּd֙ hַyִּshְׁmְaֵalִ֔yם aֲshֶׁ֥r hvֹrִdֻ֖hvּ shָֽׁmָּh׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֤י יְהֹוָה֙ אֶת־יוֹסֵ֔ף וַיְהִ֖י אִ֣ישׁ מַצְלִ֑יחַ וַיְהִ֕י בְּבֵ֖ית אֲדֹנָ֥יו הַמִּצְרִֽי׃
39.englishText: יהוה was with Joseph, and he was a successful man; and he stayed in the house of his Egyptian master.
39.transliteration: vַyְhִ֤y yְhֹvָh֙ aֶt־yvֹsֵ֔ף vַyְhִ֖y aִ֣yshׁ mַtsְlִ֑ychַ vַyְhִ֕y bְּbֵ֖yt aֲdֹnָ֥yv hַmִּtsְrִֽy׃

39.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣רְא אֲדֹנָ֔יו כִּ֥י יְהֹוָ֖ה אִתּ֑וֹ וְכֹל֙ אֲשֶׁר־ה֣וּא עֹשֶׂ֔ה יְהֹוָ֖ה מַצְלִ֥יחַ בְּיָדֽוֹ׃
39.englishText: And when his master saw that יהוה was with him and that יהוה lent success to everything he undertook,
39.transliteration: vַyַּ֣rְa aֲdֹnָ֔yv kִּ֥y yְhֹvָ֖h aִtּ֑vֹ vְkֹl֙ aֲshֶׁr־h֣vּa aֹshֶׂ֔h yְhֹvָ֖h mַtsְlִ֥ychַ bְּyָdֽvֹ׃

39.hebrewText: וַיִּמְצָ֨א יוֹסֵ֥ף חֵ֛ן בְּעֵינָ֖יו וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת אֹת֑וֹ וַיַּפְקִדֵ֙הוּ֙ עַל־בֵּית֔וֹ וְכׇל־יֶשׁ־ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן בְּיָדֽוֹ׃
39.englishText: he took a liking to Joseph. He made him his personal attendant and put him in charge of his household, placing in his hands all that he owned.
39.transliteration: vַyִּmְtsָ֨a yvֹsֵ֥ף chֵ֛ן bְּaֵynָ֖yv vַyְshָׁ֣rֶt aֹt֑vֹ vַyַּpְkִdֵ֙hvּ֙ aַl־bֵּyt֔vֹ vְkׇl־yֶshׁ־l֖vֹ nָtַ֥ן bְּyָdֽvֹ׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֡י מֵאָז֩ הִפְקִ֨יד אֹת֜וֹ בְּבֵית֗וֹ וְעַל֙ כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר יֶשׁ־ל֔וֹ וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ יְהֹוָ֛ה אֶת־בֵּ֥ית הַמִּצְרִ֖י בִּגְלַ֣ל יוֹסֵ֑ף וַיְהִ֞י בִּרְכַּ֤ת יְהֹוָה֙ בְּכׇל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר יֶשׁ־ל֔וֹ בַּבַּ֖יִת וּבַשָּׂדֶֽה׃
39.englishText: And from the time that the Egyptian put him in charge of his household and of all that he owned, יהוה blessed his house for Joseph’s sake, so that the blessing of יהוה was upon everything that he owned, in the house and outside.
39.transliteration: vַyְhִ֡y mֵaָz֩ hִpְkִ֨yd aֹt֜vֹ bְּbֵyt֗vֹ vְaַl֙ kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֣r yֶshׁ־l֔vֹ vַyְbָ֧rֶךְ yְhֹvָ֛h aֶt־bֵּ֥yt hַmִּtsְrִ֖y bִּgְlַ֣l yvֹsֵ֑ף vַyְhִ֞y bִּrְkַּ֤t yְhֹvָh֙ bְּkׇl־aֲshֶׁ֣r yֶshׁ־l֔vֹ bַּbַּ֖yִt vּbַshָּׂdֶֽh׃

39.hebrewText: וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב כׇּל־אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ֮ בְּיַד־יוֹסֵף֒ וְלֹא־יָדַ֤ע אִתּוֹ֙ מְא֔וּמָה כִּ֥י אִם־הַלֶּ֖חֶם אֲשֶׁר־ה֣וּא אוֹכֵ֑ל וַיְהִ֣י יוֹסֵ֔ף יְפֵה־תֹ֖אַר וִיפֵ֥ה מַרְאֶֽה׃
39.englishText: He left all that he had in Joseph’s hands and, with him there, he paid attention to nothing save the food that he ate. Now Joseph was well built and handsome.
39.transliteration: vַyַּaֲzֹ֣b kׇּl־aֲshֶׁr־lvֹ֮ bְּyַd־yvֹsֵף֒ vְlֹa־yָdַ֤a aִtּvֹ֙ mְa֔vּmָh kִּ֥y aִם־hַlֶּ֖chֶם aֲshֶׁr־h֣vּa avֹkֵ֑l vַyְhִ֣y yvֹsֵ֔ף yְpֵh־tֹ֖aַr vִypֵ֥h mַrְaֶֽh׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י אַחַר֙ הַדְּבָרִ֣ים הָאֵ֔לֶּה וַתִּשָּׂ֧א אֵֽשֶׁת־אֲדֹנָ֛יו אֶת־עֵינֶ֖יהָ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֑ף וַתֹּ֖אמֶר שִׁכְבָ֥ה עִמִּֽי׃
39.englishText: After a time, his master’s wife cast her eyes upon Joseph and said, “Lie with me.”
39.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y aַchַr֙ hַdְּbָrִ֣yם hָaֵ֔lֶּh vַtִּshָּׂ֧a aֵֽshֶׁt־aֲdֹnָ֛yv aֶt־aֵynֶ֖yhָ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֑ף vַtֹּ֖amֶr shִׁkְbָ֥h aִmִּֽy׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְמָאֵ֓ן ׀ וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ אֶל־אֵ֣שֶׁת אֲדֹנָ֔יו הֵ֣ן אֲדֹנִ֔י לֹא־יָדַ֥ע אִתִּ֖י מַה־בַּבָּ֑יִת וְכֹ֥ל אֲשֶׁר־יֶשׁ־ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן בְּיָדִֽי׃
39.englishText: But he refused. He said to his master’s wife, “Look, with me here, my master gives no thought to anything in this house, and all that he owns he has placed in my hands.
39.transliteration: vַyְmָaֵ֓ן ׀ vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ aֶl־aֵ֣shֶׁt aֲdֹnָ֔yv hֵ֣ן aֲdֹnִ֔y lֹa־yָdַ֥a aִtִּ֖y mַh־bַּbָּ֑yִt vְkֹ֥l aֲshֶׁr־yֶshׁ־l֖vֹ nָtַ֥ן bְּyָdִֽy׃

39.hebrewText: אֵינֶ֨נּוּ גָד֜וֹל בַּבַּ֣יִת הַזֶּה֮ מִמֶּ֒נִּי֒ וְלֹֽא־חָשַׂ֤ךְ מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ מְא֔וּמָה כִּ֥י אִם־אוֹתָ֖ךְ בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר אַתְּ־אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ וְאֵ֨יךְ אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֜ה הָרָעָ֤ה הַגְּדֹלָה֙ הַזֹּ֔את וְחָטָ֖אתִי לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃
39.englishText: He wields no more authority in this house than I, and he has withheld nothing from me except yourself, since you are his wife. How then could I do this most wicked thing, and sin before God?”
39.transliteration: aֵynֶ֨nּvּ gָd֜vֹl bַּbַּ֣yִt hַzֶּh֮ mִmֶּ֒nִּy֒ vְlֹֽa־chָshַׂ֤ךְ mִmֶּ֙nִּy֙ mְa֔vּmָh kִּ֥y aִם־avֹtָ֖ךְ bַּaֲshֶׁ֣r aַtְּ־aִshְׁtּ֑vֹ vְaֵ֨yךְ aֶֽaֱshֶׂ֜h hָrָaָ֤h hַgְּdֹlָh֙ hַzֹּ֔at vְchָtָ֖atִy lֵֽalֹhִֽyם׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֕י כְּדַבְּרָ֥הּ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֖ף י֣וֹם <small>׀</small> י֑וֹם וְלֹא־שָׁמַ֥ע אֵלֶ֛יהָ לִשְׁכַּ֥ב אֶצְלָ֖הּ לִהְי֥וֹת עִמָּֽהּ׃
39.englishText: And much as she coaxed Joseph day after day, he did not yield to her request to lie beside her, to be with her.
39.transliteration: vַyְhִ֕y kְּdַbְּrָ֥hּ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֖ף y֣vֹם <small>׀</small> y֑vֹם vְlֹa־shָׁmַ֥a aֵlֶ֛yhָ lִshְׁkַּ֥b aֶtsְlָ֖hּ lִhְy֥vֹt aִmָּֽhּ׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיְהִי֙ כְּהַיּ֣וֹם הַזֶּ֔ה וַיָּבֹ֥א הַבַּ֖יְתָה לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת מְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ וְאֵ֨ין אִ֜ישׁ מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י הַבַּ֛יִת שָׁ֖ם בַּבָּֽיִת׃
39.englishText: One such day, he came into the house to do his work. None of the household being there inside,
39.transliteration: vַֽyְhִy֙ kְּhַyּ֣vֹם hַzֶּ֔h vַyָּbֹ֥a hַbַּ֖yְtָh lַaֲshׂ֣vֹt mְlַakְtּ֑vֹ vְaֵ֨yן aִ֜yshׁ mֵaַnְshֵׁ֥y hַbַּ֛yִt shָׁ֖ם bַּbָּֽyִt׃

39.hebrewText: וַתִּתְפְּשֵׂ֧הוּ בְּבִגְד֛וֹ לֵאמֹ֖ר שִׁכְבָ֣ה עִמִּ֑י וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב בִּגְדוֹ֙ בְּיָדָ֔הּ וַיָּ֖נׇס וַיֵּצֵ֥א הַחֽוּצָה׃
39.englishText: she caught hold of him by his garment and said, “Lie with me!” But he left his garment in her hand and got away and fled outside.
39.transliteration: vַtִּtְpְּshֵׂ֧hvּ bְּbִgְd֛vֹ lֵamֹ֖r shִׁkְbָ֣h aִmִּ֑y vַyַּaֲzֹ֤b bִּgְdvֹ֙ bְּyָdָ֔hּ vַyָּ֖nׇs vַyֵּtsֵ֥a hַchֽvּtsָh׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיְהִי֙ כִּרְאוֹתָ֔הּ כִּֽי־עָזַ֥ב בִּגְד֖וֹ בְּיָדָ֑הּ וַיָּ֖נׇס הַחֽוּצָה׃
39.englishText: When she saw that he had left it in her hand and had fled outside,
39.transliteration: vַֽyְhִy֙ kִּrְavֹtָ֔hּ kִּֽy־aָzַ֥b bִּgְd֖vֹ bְּyָdָ֑hּ vַyָּ֖nׇs hַchֽvּtsָh׃

39.hebrewText: וַתִּקְרָ֞א לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י בֵיתָ֗הּ וַתֹּ֤אמֶר לָהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר רְא֗וּ הֵ֥בִיא לָ֛נוּ אִ֥ישׁ עִבְרִ֖י לְצַ֣חֶק בָּ֑נוּ בָּ֤א אֵלַי֙ לִשְׁכַּ֣ב עִמִּ֔י וָאֶקְרָ֖א בְּק֥וֹל גָּדֽוֹל׃
39.englishText: she called out to her servants and said to them, “Look, he had to bring us a Hebrew to dally with us! This one came to lie with me; but I screamed loud.
39.transliteration: vַtִּkְrָ֞a lְaַnְshֵׁ֣y bֵytָ֗hּ vַtֹּ֤amֶr lָhֶם֙ lֵamֹ֔r rְa֗vּ hֵ֥bִya lָ֛nvּ aִ֥yshׁ aִbְrִ֖y lְtsַ֣chֶk bָּ֑nvּ bָּ֤a aֵlַy֙ lִshְׁkַּ֣b aִmִּ֔y vָaֶkְrָ֖a bְּk֥vֹl gָּdֽvֹl׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֣י כְשׇׁמְע֔וֹ כִּֽי־הֲרִימֹ֥תִי קוֹלִ֖י וָאֶקְרָ֑א וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב בִּגְדוֹ֙ אֶצְלִ֔י וַיָּ֖נׇס וַיֵּצֵ֥א הַחֽוּצָה׃
39.englishText: And when he heard me screaming at the top of my voice, he left his garment with me and got away and fled outside.”
39.transliteration: vַyְhִ֣y kְshׇׁmְa֔vֹ kִּֽy־hֲrִymֹ֥tִy kvֹlִ֖y vָaֶkְrָ֑a vַyַּaֲzֹ֤b bִּgְdvֹ֙ aֶtsְlִ֔y vַyָּ֖nׇs vַyֵּtsֵ֥a hַchֽvּtsָh׃

39.hebrewText: וַתַּנַּ֥ח בִּגְד֖וֹ אֶצְלָ֑הּ עַד־בּ֥וֹא אֲדֹנָ֖יו אֶל־בֵּיתֽוֹ׃
39.englishText: She kept his garment beside her, until his master came home.
39.transliteration: vַtַּnַּ֥ch bִּgְd֖vֹ aֶtsְlָ֑hּ aַd־bּ֥vֹa aֲdֹnָ֖yv aֶl־bֵּytֽvֹ׃

39.hebrewText: וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר אֵלָ֔יו כַּדְּבָרִ֥ים הָאֵ֖לֶּה לֵאמֹ֑ר בָּֽא־אֵלַ֞י הָעֶ֧בֶד הָֽעִבְרִ֛י אֲשֶׁר־הֵבֵ֥אתָ לָּ֖נוּ לְצַ֥חֶק בִּֽי׃
39.englishText: Then she told him the same story, saying, “The Hebrew slave whom you brought into our house came to me to dally with me;
39.transliteration: vַtְּdַbֵּ֣r aֵlָ֔yv kַּdְּbָrִ֥yם hָaֵ֖lֶּh lֵamֹ֑r bָּֽa־aֵlַ֞y hָaֶ֧bֶd hָֽaִbְrִ֛y aֲshֶׁr־hֵbֵ֥atָ lָּ֖nvּ lְtsַ֥chֶk bִּֽy׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֕י כַּהֲרִימִ֥י קוֹלִ֖י וָאֶקְרָ֑א וַיַּעֲזֹ֥ב בִּגְד֛וֹ אֶצְלִ֖י וַיָּ֥נׇס הַחֽוּצָה׃
39.englishText: but when I screamed at the top of my voice, he left his garment with me and fled outside.”
39.transliteration: vַyְhִ֕y kַּhֲrִymִ֥y kvֹlִ֖y vָaֶkְrָ֑a vַyַּaֲzֹ֥b bִּgְd֛vֹ aֶtsְlִ֖y vַyָּ֥nׇs hַchֽvּtsָh׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִי֩ כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ אֲדֹנָ֜יו אֶת־דִּבְרֵ֣י אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ אֲשֶׁ֨ר דִּבְּרָ֤ה אֵלָיו֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים הָאֵ֔לֶּה עָ֥שָׂה לִ֖י עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ וַיִּ֖חַר אַפּֽוֹ׃
39.englishText: When his master heard the story that his wife told him, namely, “Thus and so your slave did to me,” he was furious.
39.transliteration: vַyְhִy֩ kִshְׁmֹ֨aַ aֲdֹnָ֜yv aֶt־dִּbְrֵ֣y aִshְׁtּ֗vֹ aֲshֶׁ֨r dִּbְּrָ֤h aֵlָyv֙ lֵamֹ֔r kַּdְּbָrִ֣yם hָaֵ֔lֶּh aָ֥shָׂh lִ֖y aַbְdֶּ֑ךָ vַyִּ֖chַr aַpּֽvֹ׃

39.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּח֩ אֲדֹנֵ֨י יוֹסֵ֜ף אֹת֗וֹ וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֙הוּ֙ אֶל־בֵּ֣ית הַסֹּ֔הַר מְק֕וֹם אֲשֶׁר־[אֲסִירֵ֥י] (אסורי) הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ אֲסוּרִ֑ים וַֽיְהִי־שָׁ֖ם בְּבֵ֥ית הַסֹּֽהַר׃
39.englishText: So Joseph’s master had him put in prison, where the king’s prisoners were confined. But even while he was there in prison,
39.transliteration: vַyִּkַּch֩ aֲdֹnֵ֨y yvֹsֵ֜ף aֹt֗vֹ vַֽyִּtְּnֵ֙hvּ֙ aֶl־bֵּ֣yt hַsֹּ֔hַr mְk֕vֹם aֲshֶׁr־[aֲsִyrֵ֥y] (asvry) hַmֶּ֖lֶךְ aֲsvּrִ֑yם vַֽyְhִy־shָׁ֖ם bְּbֵ֥yt hַsֹּֽhַr׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֤י יְהֹוָה֙ אֶת־יוֹסֵ֔ף וַיֵּ֥ט אֵלָ֖יו חָ֑סֶד וַיִּתֵּ֣ן חִנּ֔וֹ בְּעֵינֵ֖י שַׂ֥ר בֵּית־הַסֹּֽהַר׃
39.englishText: יהוה was with Joseph—extending kindness to him and disposing the chief jailer favorably toward him.
39.transliteration: vַyְhִ֤y yְhֹvָh֙ aֶt־yvֹsֵ֔ף vַyֵּ֥t aֵlָ֖yv chָ֑sֶd vַyִּtֵּ֣ן chִnּ֔vֹ bְּaֵynֵ֖y shַׂ֥r bֵּyt־hַsֹּֽhַr׃

39.hebrewText: וַיִּתֵּ֞ן שַׂ֤ר בֵּית־הַסֹּ֙הַר֙ בְּיַד־יוֹסֵ֔ף אֵ֚ת כׇּל־הָ֣אֲסִירִ֔ם אֲשֶׁ֖ר בְּבֵ֣ית הַסֹּ֑הַר וְאֵ֨ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֤ר עֹשִׂים֙ שָׁ֔ם ה֖וּא הָיָ֥ה עֹשֶֽׂה׃
39.englishText: The chief jailer put in Joseph’s charge all the prisoners who were in that prison, and he was the one to carry out everything that was done there.
39.transliteration: vַyִּtֵּ֞ן shַׂ֤r bֵּyt־hַsֹּ֙hַr֙ bְּyַd־yvֹsֵ֔ף aֵ֚t kׇּl־hָ֣aֲsִyrִ֔ם aֲshֶׁ֖r bְּbֵ֣yt hַsֹּ֑hַr vְaֵ֨t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֤r aֹshִׂyם֙ shָׁ֔ם h֖vּa hָyָ֥h aֹshֶֽׂh׃

39.hebrewText: אֵ֣ין ׀ שַׂ֣ר בֵּית־הַסֹּ֗הַר רֹאֶ֤ה אֶֽת־כׇּל־מְא֙וּמָה֙ בְּיָד֔וֹ בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר יְהֹוָ֖ה אִתּ֑וֹ וַֽאֲשֶׁר־ה֥וּא עֹשֶׂ֖ה יְהֹוָ֥ה מַצְלִֽיחַ׃ {פ}
39.englishText: The chief jailer did not supervise anything that was in Joseph’s*Joseph’s Lit. “his.” charge, because יהוה was with him, and whatever he did יהוה made successful.
39.transliteration: aֵ֣yן ׀ shַׂ֣r bֵּyt־hַsֹּ֗hַr rֹaֶ֤h aֶֽt־kׇּl־mְa֙vּmָh֙ bְּyָd֔vֹ bַּaֲshֶׁ֥r yְhֹvָ֖h aִtּ֑vֹ vַֽaֲshֶׁr־h֥vּa aֹshֶׂ֖h yְhֹvָ֥h mַtsְlִֽychַ׃ {p}

40.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י אַחַר֙ הַדְּבָרִ֣ים הָאֵ֔לֶּה חָ֥טְא֛וּ מַשְׁקֵ֥ה מֶֽלֶךְ־מִצְרַ֖יִם וְהָאֹפֶ֑ה לַאֲדֹנֵיהֶ֖ם לְמֶ֥לֶךְ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
40.englishText: Some time later, the cupbearer and the baker of the king of Egypt gave offense to their lord the king of Egypt.
40.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y aַchַr֙ hַdְּbָrִ֣yם hָaֵ֔lֶּh chָ֥tְa֛vּ mַshְׁkֵ֥h mֶֽlֶךְ־mִtsְrַ֖yִם vְhָaֹpֶ֑h lַaֲdֹnֵyhֶ֖ם lְmֶ֥lֶךְ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

40.hebrewText: וַיִּקְצֹ֣ף פַּרְעֹ֔ה עַ֖ל שְׁנֵ֣י סָרִיסָ֑יו עַ֚ל שַׂ֣ר הַמַּשְׁקִ֔ים וְעַ֖ל שַׂ֥ר הָאוֹפִֽים׃
40.englishText: Pharaoh was angry with his two courtiers, the chief cupbearer and the chief baker,
40.transliteration: vַyִּkְtsֹ֣ף pַּrְaֹ֔h aַ֖l shְׁnֵ֣y sָrִysָ֑yv aַ֚l shַׂ֣r hַmַּshְׁkִ֔yם vְaַ֖l shַׂ֥r hָavֹpִֽyם׃

40.hebrewText: וַיִּתֵּ֨ן אֹתָ֜ם בְּמִשְׁמַ֗ר בֵּ֛ית שַׂ֥ר הַטַּבָּחִ֖ים אֶל־בֵּ֣ית הַסֹּ֑הַר מְק֕וֹם אֲשֶׁ֥ר יוֹסֵ֖ף אָס֥וּר שָֽׁם׃
40.englishText: and put them in custody, in the house of the prefect,*prefect See note at 37.36. in the same prison house where Joseph was confined.
40.transliteration: vַyִּtֵּ֨ן aֹtָ֜ם bְּmִshְׁmַ֗r bֵּ֛yt shַׂ֥r hַtַּbָּchִ֖yם aֶl־bֵּ֣yt hַsֹּ֑hַr mְk֕vֹם aֲshֶׁ֥r yvֹsֵ֖ף aָs֥vּr shָֽׁם׃

40.hebrewText: וַ֠יִּפְקֹ֠ד שַׂ֣ר הַטַּבָּחִ֧ים אֶת־יוֹסֵ֛ף אִתָּ֖ם וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת אֹתָ֑ם וַיִּהְי֥וּ יָמִ֖ים בְּמִשְׁמָֽר׃
40.englishText: The prefect assigned Joseph to them, and he attended them. When they had been in custody for some time,
40.transliteration: vַ֠yִּpְkֹ֠d shַׂ֣r hַtַּbָּchִ֧yם aֶt־yvֹsֵ֛ף aִtָּ֖ם vַyְshָׁ֣rֶt aֹtָ֑ם vַyִּhְy֥vּ yָmִ֖yם bְּmִshְׁmָֽr׃

40.hebrewText: וַיַּֽחַלְמוּ֩ חֲל֨וֹם שְׁנֵיהֶ֜ם אִ֤ישׁ חֲלֹמוֹ֙ בְּלַ֣יְלָה אֶחָ֔ד אִ֖ישׁ כְּפִתְר֣וֹן חֲלֹמ֑וֹ הַמַּשְׁקֶ֣ה וְהָאֹפֶ֗ה אֲשֶׁר֙ לְמֶ֣לֶךְ מִצְרַ֔יִם אֲשֶׁ֥ר אֲסוּרִ֖ים בְּבֵ֥ית הַסֹּֽהַר׃
40.englishText: both of them—the cupbearer and the baker of the king of Egypt, who were confined in the prison—dreamed in the same night, each his own dream and each dream with its own meaning.
40.transliteration: vַyַּֽchַlְmvּ֩ chֲl֨vֹם shְׁnֵyhֶ֜ם aִ֤yshׁ chֲlֹmvֹ֙ bְּlַ֣yְlָh aֶchָ֔d aִ֖yshׁ kְּpִtְr֣vֹן chֲlֹm֑vֹ hַmַּshְׁkֶ֣h vְhָaֹpֶ֗h aֲshֶׁr֙ lְmֶ֣lֶךְ mִtsְrַ֔yִם aֲshֶׁ֥r aֲsvּrִ֖yם bְּbֵ֥yt hַsֹּֽhַr׃

40.hebrewText: וַיָּבֹ֧א אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם יוֹסֵ֖ף בַּבֹּ֑קֶר וַיַּ֣רְא אֹתָ֔ם וְהִנָּ֖ם זֹעֲפִֽים׃
40.englishText: When Joseph came to them in the morning, he saw that they were distraught.
40.transliteration: vַyָּbֹ֧a aֲlֵyhֶ֛ם yvֹsֵ֖ף bַּbֹּ֑kֶr vַyַּ֣rְa aֹtָ֔ם vְhִnָּ֖ם zֹaֲpִֽyם׃

40.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁאַ֞ל אֶת־סְרִיסֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֗ה אֲשֶׁ֨ר אִתּ֧וֹ בְמִשְׁמַ֛ר בֵּ֥ית אֲדֹנָ֖יו לֵאמֹ֑ר מַדּ֛וּעַ פְּנֵיכֶ֥ם רָעִ֖ים הַיּֽוֹם׃
40.englishText: He asked Pharaoh’s courtiers, who were with him in custody in his master’s house, saying, “Why do you appear downcast today?”
40.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁaַ֞l aֶt־sְrִysֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֗h aֲshֶׁ֨r aִtּ֧vֹ bְmִshְׁmַ֛r bֵּ֥yt aֲdֹnָ֖yv lֵamֹ֑r mַdּ֛vּaַ pְּnֵykֶ֥ם rָaִ֖yם hַyּֽvֹם׃

40.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ אֵלָ֔יו חֲל֣וֹם חָלַ֔מְנוּ וּפֹתֵ֖ר אֵ֣ין אֹת֑וֹ וַיֹּ֨אמֶר אֲלֵהֶ֜ם יוֹסֵ֗ף הֲל֤וֹא לֵֽאלֹהִים֙ פִּתְרֹנִ֔ים סַפְּרוּ־נָ֖א לִֽי׃
40.englishText: And they said to him, “We had dreams, and there is no one to interpret them.” So Joseph said to them, “Surely God can interpret! Tell me [your dreams].”
40.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֣vּ aֵlָ֔yv chֲl֣vֹם chָlַ֔mְnvּ vּpֹtֵ֖r aֵ֣yן aֹt֑vֹ vַyֹּ֨amֶr aֲlֵhֶ֜ם yvֹsֵ֗ף hֲl֤vֹa lֵֽalֹhִyם֙ pִּtְrֹnִ֔yם sַpְּrvּ־nָ֖a lִֽy׃

40.hebrewText: וַיְסַפֵּ֧ר שַֽׂר־הַמַּשְׁקִ֛ים אֶת־חֲלֹמ֖וֹ לְיוֹסֵ֑ף וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ל֔וֹ בַּחֲלוֹמִ֕י וְהִנֵּה־גֶ֖פֶן לְפָנָֽי׃
40.englishText: Then the chief cupbearer told his dream to Joseph. He said to him, “In my dream, there was a vine in front of me.
40.transliteration: vַyְsַpֵּ֧r shַֽׂr־hַmַּshְׁkִ֛yם aֶt־chֲlֹm֖vֹ lְyvֹsֵ֑ף vַyֹּ֣amֶr l֔vֹ bַּchֲlvֹmִ֕y vְhִnֵּh־gֶ֖pֶן lְpָnָֽy׃

40.hebrewText: וּבַגֶּ֖פֶן שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה שָׂרִיגִ֑ם וְהִ֤וא כְפֹרַ֙חַת֙ עָלְתָ֣ה נִצָּ֔הּ הִבְשִׁ֥ילוּ אַשְׁכְּלֹתֶ֖יהָ עֲנָבִֽים׃
40.englishText: On the vine were three branches. It had barely budded, when out came its blossoms and its clusters ripened into grapes.
40.transliteration: vּbַgֶּ֖pֶן shְׁlֹshָׁ֣h shָׂrִygִ֑ם vְhִ֤va kְpֹrַ֙chַt֙ aָlְtָ֣h nִtsָּ֔hּ hִbְshִׁ֥ylvּ aַshְׁkְּlֹtֶ֖yhָ aֲnָbִֽyם׃

40.hebrewText: וְכ֥וֹס פַּרְעֹ֖ה בְּיָדִ֑י וָאֶקַּ֣ח אֶת־הָֽעֲנָבִ֗ים וָֽאֶשְׂחַ֤ט אֹתָם֙ אֶל־כּ֣וֹס פַּרְעֹ֔ה וָאֶתֵּ֥ן אֶת־הַכּ֖וֹס עַל־כַּ֥ף פַּרְעֹֽה׃
40.englishText: Pharaoh’s cup was in my hand, and I took the grapes, pressed them into Pharaoh’s cup, and placed the cup in Pharaoh’s hand.”
40.transliteration: vְk֥vֹs pַּrְaֹ֖h bְּyָdִ֑y vָaֶkַּ֣ch aֶt־hָֽaֲnָbִ֗yם vָֽaֶshְׂchַ֤t aֹtָם֙ aֶl־kּ֣vֹs pַּrְaֹ֔h vָaֶtֵּ֥ן aֶt־hַkּ֖vֹs aַl־kַּ֥ף pַּrְaֹֽh׃

40.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר לוֹ֙ יוֹסֵ֔ף זֶ֖ה פִּתְרֹנ֑וֹ שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ הַשָּׂ֣רִגִ֔ים שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת יָמִ֖ים הֵֽם׃
40.englishText: Joseph said to him, “This is its interpretation: The three branches are three days.
40.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr lvֹ֙ yvֹsֵ֔ף zֶ֖h pִּtְrֹn֑vֹ shְׁlֹ֙shֶׁt֙ hַshָּׂ֣rִgִ֔yם shְׁlֹ֥shֶׁt yָmִ֖yם hֵֽם׃

40.hebrewText: בְּע֣וֹד ׀ שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת יָמִ֗ים יִשָּׂ֤א פַרְעֹה֙ אֶת־רֹאשֶׁ֔ךָ וַהֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֖ עַל־כַּנֶּ֑ךָ וְנָתַתָּ֤ כוֹס־פַּרְעֹה֙ בְּיָד֔וֹ כַּמִּשְׁפָּט֙ הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן אֲשֶׁ֥ר הָיִ֖יתָ מַשְׁקֵֽהוּ׃
40.englishText: In three days Pharaoh will pardon you*pardon you Lit. “lift up your head.” Cf. below at vv. 19, 20. and restore you to your post; you will place Pharaoh’s cup in his hand, as was your custom formerly when you were his cupbearer.
40.transliteration: bְּa֣vֹd ׀ shְׁlֹ֣shֶׁt yָmִ֗yם yִshָּׂ֤a pַrְaֹh֙ aֶt־rֹashֶׁ֔ךָ vַhֲshִֽׁybְךָ֖ aַl־kַּnֶּ֑ךָ vְnָtַtָּ֤ kvֹs־pַּrְaֹh֙ bְּyָd֔vֹ kַּmִּshְׁpָּt֙ hָֽrִashׁ֔vֹן aֲshֶׁ֥r hָyִ֖ytָ mַshְׁkֵֽhvּ׃

40.hebrewText: כִּ֧י אִם־זְכַרְתַּ֣נִי אִתְּךָ֗ כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ יִ֣יטַב לָ֔ךְ וְעָשִֽׂיתָ־נָּ֥א עִמָּדִ֖י חָ֑סֶד וְהִזְכַּרְתַּ֙נִי֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְהוֹצֵאתַ֖נִי מִן־הַבַּ֥יִת הַזֶּֽה׃
40.englishText: But think of me when all is well with you again, and do me the kindness of mentioning me to Pharaoh, so as to free me from this place.
40.transliteration: kִּ֧y aִם־zְkַrְtַּ֣nִy aִtְּךָ֗ kַּaֲshֶׁr֙ yִ֣ytַb lָ֔ךְ vְaָshִֽׂytָ־nָּ֥a aִmָּdִ֖y chָ֑sֶd vְhִzְkַּrְtַּ֙nִy֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֔h vְhvֹtsֵatַ֖nִy mִן־hַbַּ֥yִt hַzֶּֽh׃

40.hebrewText: כִּֽי־גֻנֹּ֣ב גֻּנַּ֔בְתִּי מֵאֶ֖רֶץ הָעִבְרִ֑ים וְגַם־פֹּה֙ לֹא־עָשִׂ֣יתִֽי מְא֔וּמָה כִּֽי־שָׂמ֥וּ אֹתִ֖י בַּבּֽוֹר׃
40.englishText: For in truth, I was kidnapped from the land of the Hebrews; nor have I done anything here that they should have put me in the dungeon.”
40.transliteration: kִּֽy־gֻnֹּ֣b gֻּnַּ֔bְtִּy mֵaֶ֖rֶץ hָaִbְrִ֑yם vְgַם־pֹּh֙ lֹa־aָshִׂ֣ytִֽy mְa֔vּmָh kִּֽy־shָׂm֥vּ aֹtִ֖y bַּbּֽvֹr׃

40.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥רְא שַׂר־הָאֹפִ֖ים כִּ֣י ט֣וֹב פָּתָ֑ר וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֔ף אַף־אֲנִי֙ בַּחֲלוֹמִ֔י וְהִנֵּ֗ה שְׁלֹשָׁ֛ה סַלֵּ֥י חֹרִ֖י עַל־רֹאשִֽׁי׃
40.englishText: When the chief baker saw how favorably he had interpreted, he said to Joseph, “In my dream, similarly, there were three openwork baskets*openwork baskets Others “baskets with white bread” or “white baskets”; meaning of Heb. ḥori uncertain. on my head.
40.transliteration: vַyַּ֥rְa shַׂr־hָaֹpִ֖yם kִּ֣y t֣vֹb pָּtָ֑r vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֔ף aַף־aֲnִy֙ bַּchֲlvֹmִ֔y vְhִnֵּ֗h shְׁlֹshָׁ֛h sַlֵּ֥y chֹrִ֖y aַl־rֹashִֽׁy׃

40.hebrewText: וּבַסַּ֣ל הָֽעֶלְי֗וֹן מִכֹּ֛ל מַאֲכַ֥ל פַּרְעֹ֖ה מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה אֹפֶ֑ה וְהָע֗וֹף אֹכֵ֥ל אֹתָ֛ם מִן־הַסַּ֖ל מֵעַ֥ל רֹאשִֽׁי׃
40.englishText: In the uppermost basket were all kinds of food for Pharaoh that a baker prepares; and the birds were eating it out of the basket above my head.”
40.transliteration: vּbַsַּ֣l hָֽaֶlְy֗vֹן mִkֹּ֛l mַaֲkַ֥l pַּrְaֹ֖h mַaֲshֵׂ֣h aֹpֶ֑h vְhָa֗vֹף aֹkֵ֥l aֹtָ֛ם mִן־hַsַּ֖l mֵaַ֥l rֹashִֽׁy׃

40.hebrewText: וַיַּ֤עַן יוֹסֵף֙ וַיֹּ֔אמֶר זֶ֖ה פִּתְרֹנ֑וֹ שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ הַסַּלִּ֔ים שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת יָמִ֖ים הֵֽם׃
40.englishText: Joseph answered, “This is its interpretation: The three baskets are three days.
40.transliteration: vַyַּ֤aַן yvֹsֵף֙ vַyֹּ֔amֶr zֶ֖h pִּtְrֹn֑vֹ shְׁlֹ֙shֶׁt֙ hַsַּlִּ֔yם shְׁlֹ֥shֶׁt yָmִ֖yם hֵֽם׃

40.hebrewText: בְּע֣וֹד ׀ שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת יָמִ֗ים יִשָּׂ֨א פַרְעֹ֤ה אֶת־רֹֽאשְׁךָ֙ מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ וְתָלָ֥ה אוֹתְךָ֖ עַל־עֵ֑ץ וְאָכַ֥ל הָע֛וֹף אֶת־בְּשָׂרְךָ֖ מֵעָלֶֽיךָ׃
40.englishText: In three days Pharaoh will lift off your head*lift off your head Lit. “lift up your head.” Cf. at vv. 13, 20. and impale you upon a pole; and the birds will pick off your flesh.”
40.transliteration: bְּa֣vֹd ׀ shְׁlֹ֣shֶׁt yָmִ֗yם yִshָּׂ֨a pַrְaֹ֤h aֶt־rֹֽashְׁךָ֙ mֵֽaָlֶ֔yךָ vְtָlָ֥h avֹtְךָ֖ aַl־aֵ֑ץ vְaָkַ֥l hָa֛vֹף aֶt־bְּshָׂrְךָ֖ mֵaָlֶֽyךָ׃

40.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ בַּיּ֣וֹם הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י י֚וֹם הֻלֶּ֣דֶת אֶת־פַּרְעֹ֔ה וַיַּ֥עַשׂ מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה לְכׇל־עֲבָדָ֑יו וַיִּשָּׂ֞א אֶת־רֹ֣אשׁ ׀ שַׂ֣ר הַמַּשְׁקִ֗ים וְאֶת־רֹ֛אשׁ שַׂ֥ר הָאֹפִ֖ים בְּת֥וֹךְ עֲבָדָֽיו׃
40.englishText: On the third day—his birthday—Pharaoh made a banquet for all his officials, and he singled out*singled out Lit. “lifted the head of.” Cf. at vv. 13, 19. his chief cupbearer and his chief baker from among his officials.
40.transliteration: vַyְhִ֣y ׀ bַּyּ֣vֹם hַshְּׁlִyshִׁ֗y y֚vֹם hֻlֶּ֣dֶt aֶt־pַּrְaֹ֔h vַyַּ֥aַshׂ mִshְׁtֶּ֖h lְkׇl־aֲbָdָ֑yv vַyִּshָּׂ֞a aֶt־rֹ֣ashׁ ׀ shַׂ֣r hַmַּshְׁkִ֗yם vְaֶt־rֹ֛ashׁ shַׂ֥r hָaֹpִ֖yם bְּt֥vֹךְ aֲbָdָֽyv׃
