44.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr lָhֶם֙ yvֹsֵ֔ף mָֽh־hַmַּaֲshֶׂ֥h hַzֶּ֖h aֲshֶׁ֣r aֲshִׂytֶ֑ם hֲl֣vֹa yְdַaְtֶּ֔ם kִּֽy־nַchֵ֧shׁ yְnַchֵ֛shׁ aִ֖yshׁ aֲshֶׁ֥r kָּmֹֽnִy׃

44.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר יְהוּדָ֗ה מַה־נֹּאמַר֙ לַֽאדֹנִ֔י מַה־נְּדַבֵּ֖ר וּמַה־נִּצְטַדָּ֑ק הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים מָצָא֙ אֶת־עֲוֺ֣ן עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ הִנֶּ֤נּוּ עֲבָדִים֙ לַֽאדֹנִ֔י גַּם־אֲנַ֕חְנוּ גַּ֛ם אֲשֶׁר־נִמְצָ֥א הַגָּבִ֖יעַ בְּיָדֽוֹ׃
44.englishText: Judah replied, “What can we say to my lord? How can we plead, how can we prove our innocence? God has uncovered the crime of your servants. Here we are, then, slaves of my lord, the rest of us as much as he in whose possession the goblet was found.”
44.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr yְhvּdָ֗h mַh־nֹּamַr֙ lַֽadֹnִ֔y mַh־nְּdַbֵּ֖r vּmַh־nִּtsְtַdָּ֑k hָaֱlֹhִ֗yם mָtsָa֙ aֶt־aֲvֺ֣ן aֲbָdֶ֔yךָ hִnֶּ֤nּvּ aֲbָdִyם֙ lַֽadֹnִ֔y gַּם־aֲnַ֕chְnvּ gַּ֛ם aֲshֶׁr־nִmְtsָ֥a hַgָּbִ֖yaַ bְּyָdֽvֹ׃

44.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֕אמֶר חָלִ֣ילָה לִּ֔י מֵעֲשׂ֖וֹת זֹ֑את הָאִ֡ישׁ אֲשֶׁר֩ נִמְצָ֨א הַגָּבִ֜יעַ בְּיָד֗וֹ ה֚וּא יִהְיֶה־לִּ֣י עָ֔בֶד וְאַתֶּ֕ם עֲל֥וּ לְשָׁל֖וֹם אֶל־אֲבִיכֶֽם׃ {ס}
44.englishText: But he replied, “Far be it from me to act thus! Only the one in whose possession the goblet was found shall be my slave; the rest of you go back in peace to your father.”
44.transliteration: vַyֹּ֕amֶr chָlִ֣ylָh lִּ֔y mֵaֲshׂ֖vֹt zֹ֑at hָaִ֡yshׁ aֲshֶׁr֩ nִmְtsָ֨a hַgָּbִ֜yaַ bְּyָd֗vֹ h֚vּa yִhְyֶh־lִּ֣y aָ֔bֶd vְaַtֶּ֕ם aֲl֥vּ lְshָׁl֖vֹם aֶl־aֲbִykֶֽם׃ {s}

44.hebrewText: וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ אֵלָ֜יו יְהוּדָ֗ה וַיֹּ֘אמֶר֮ בִּ֣י אֲדֹנִי֒ יְדַבֶּר־נָ֨א עַבְדְּךָ֤ דָבָר֙ בְּאׇזְנֵ֣י אֲדֹנִ֔י וְאַל־יִ֥חַר אַפְּךָ֖ בְּעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י כָמ֖וֹךָ כְּפַרְעֹֽה׃
44.englishText: Then Judah went up to him and said, “Please, my lord, let your servant appeal to my lord, and do not be impatient with your servant, you who are the equal of Pharaoh.
44.transliteration: vַyִּgַּ֨shׁ aֵlָ֜yv yְhvּdָ֗h vַyֹּ֘amֶr֮ bִּ֣y aֲdֹnִy֒ yְdַbֶּr־nָ֨a aַbְdְּךָ֤ dָbָr֙ bְּaׇzְnֵ֣y aֲdֹnִ֔y vְaַl־yִ֥chַr aַpְּךָ֖ bְּaַbְdֶּ֑ךָ kִּ֥y kָm֖vֹךָ kְּpַrְaֹֽh׃

44.hebrewText: אֲדֹנִ֣י שָׁאַ֔ל אֶת־עֲבָדָ֖יו לֵאמֹ֑ר הֲיֵשׁ־לָכֶ֥ם אָ֖ב אוֹ־אָֽח׃
44.englishText: My lord asked his servants, ‘Have you a father or another brother?’
44.transliteration: aֲdֹnִ֣y shָׁaַ֔l aֶt־aֲbָdָ֖yv lֵamֹ֑r hֲyֵshׁ־lָkֶ֥ם aָ֖b avֹ־aָֽch׃

44.hebrewText: וַנֹּ֙אמֶר֙ אֶל־אֲדֹנִ֔י יֶשׁ־לָ֙נוּ֙ אָ֣ב זָקֵ֔ן וְיֶ֥לֶד זְקֻנִ֖ים קָטָ֑ן וְאָחִ֣יו מֵ֔ת וַיִּוָּתֵ֨ר ה֧וּא לְבַדּ֛וֹ לְאִמּ֖וֹ וְאָבִ֥יו אֲהֵבֽוֹ׃
44.englishText: We told my lord, ‘We have an old father, and there is a child of his old age, the youngest; his full brother is dead, so that he alone is left of his mother, and his father dotes on him.’
44.transliteration: vַnֹּ֙amֶr֙ aֶl־aֲdֹnִ֔y yֶshׁ־lָ֙nvּ֙ aָ֣b zָkֵ֔ן vְyֶ֥lֶd zְkֻnִ֖yם kָtָ֑ן vְaָchִ֣yv mֵ֔t vַyִּvָּtֵ֨r h֧vּa lְbַdּ֛vֹ lְaִmּ֖vֹ vְaָbִ֥yv aֲhֵbֽvֹ׃

44.hebrewText: וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ אֶל־עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ אֵלָ֑י וְאָשִׂ֥ימָה עֵינִ֖י עָלָֽיו׃
44.englishText: Then you said to your servants, ‘Bring him down to me, that I may set eyes on him.’
44.transliteration: vַtֹּ֙amֶr֙ aֶl־aֲbָdֶ֔yךָ hvֹrִdֻ֖hvּ aֵlָ֑y vְaָshִׂ֥ymָh aֵynִ֖y aָlָֽyv׃

44.hebrewText: וַנֹּ֙אמֶר֙ אֶל־אֲדֹנִ֔י לֹא־יוּכַ֥ל הַנַּ֖עַר לַעֲזֹ֣ב אֶת־אָבִ֑יו וְעָזַ֥ב אֶת־אָבִ֖יו וָמֵֽת׃
44.englishText: We said to my lord, ‘The boy cannot leave his father; if he were to leave him, his father would die.’
44.transliteration: vַnֹּ֙amֶr֙ aֶl־aֲdֹnִ֔y lֹa־yvּkַ֥l hַnַּ֖aַr lַaֲzֹ֣b aֶt־aָbִ֑yv vְaָzַ֥b aֶt־aָbִ֖yv vָmֵֽt׃

44.hebrewText: וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ אֶל־עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ אִם־לֹ֥א יֵרֵ֛ד אֲחִיכֶ֥ם הַקָּטֹ֖ן אִתְּכֶ֑ם לֹ֥א תֹסִפ֖וּן לִרְא֥וֹת פָּנָֽי׃
44.englishText: But you said to your servants, ‘Unless your youngest brother comes down with you, do not let me see your faces.’
44.transliteration: vַtֹּ֙amֶr֙ aֶl־aֲbָdֶ֔yךָ aִם־lֹ֥a yֵrֵ֛d aֲchִykֶ֥ם hַkָּtֹ֖ן aִtְּkֶ֑ם lֹ֥a tֹsִp֖vּן lִrְa֥vֹt pָּnָֽy׃

44.hebrewText: וַֽיְהִי֙ כִּ֣י עָלִ֔ינוּ אֶֽל־עַבְדְּךָ֖ אָבִ֑י וַנַּ֨גֶּד־ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ת דִּבְרֵ֥י אֲדֹנִֽי׃
44.englishText: When we came back to your servant my father, we reported my lord’s words to him.
44.transliteration: vַֽyְhִy֙ kִּ֣y aָlִ֔ynvּ aֶֽl־aַbְdְּךָ֖ aָbִ֑y vַnַּ֨gֶּd־l֔vֹ aֵ֖t dִּbְrֵ֥y aֲdֹnִֽy׃

44.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר אָבִ֑ינוּ שֻׁ֖בוּ שִׁבְרוּ־לָ֥נוּ מְעַט־אֹֽכֶל׃
44.englishText: “Later our father said, ‘Go back and procure some food for us.’
44.transliteration: vַyֹּ֖amֶr aָbִ֑ynvּ shֻׁ֖bvּ shִׁbְrvּ־lָ֥nvּ mְaַt־aֹֽkֶl׃

44.hebrewText: וַנֹּ֕אמֶר לֹ֥א נוּכַ֖ל לָרֶ֑דֶת אִם־יֵשׁ֩ אָחִ֨ינוּ הַקָּטֹ֤ן אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ וְיָרַ֔דְנוּ כִּי־לֹ֣א נוּכַ֗ל לִרְאוֹת֙ פְּנֵ֣י הָאִ֔ישׁ וְאָחִ֥ינוּ הַקָּטֹ֖ן אֵינֶ֥נּוּ אִתָּֽנוּ׃
44.englishText: We answered, ‘We cannot go down; only if our youngest brother is with us can we go down, for we may not show our faces to the man*show our faces to the man Lit. “see the [salient] participant’s face.” unless our youngest brother is with us.’
44.transliteration: vַnֹּ֕amֶr lֹ֥a nvּkַ֖l lָrֶ֑dֶt aִם־yֵshׁ֩ aָchִ֨ynvּ hַkָּtֹ֤ן aִtָּ֙nvּ֙ vְyָrַ֔dְnvּ kִּy־lֹ֣a nvּkַ֗l lִrְavֹt֙ pְּnֵ֣y hָaִ֔yshׁ vְaָchִ֥ynvּ hַkָּtֹ֖ן aֵynֶ֥nּvּ aִtָּֽnvּ׃

44.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֛אמֶר עַבְדְּךָ֥ אָבִ֖י אֵלֵ֑ינוּ אַתֶּ֣ם יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם כִּ֥י שְׁנַ֖יִם יָֽלְדָה־לִּ֥י אִשְׁתִּֽי׃
44.englishText: Your servant my father said to us, ‘As you know, my wife bore me two sons.
44.transliteration: vַyֹּ֛amֶr aַbְdְּךָ֥ aָbִ֖y aֵlֵ֑ynvּ aַtֶּ֣ם yְdַaְtֶּ֔ם kִּ֥y shְׁnַ֖yִם yָֽlְdָh־lִּ֥y aִshְׁtִּֽy׃

44.hebrewText: וַיֵּצֵ֤א הָֽאֶחָד֙ מֵֽאִתִּ֔י וָאֹמַ֕ר אַ֖ךְ טָרֹ֣ף טֹרָ֑ף וְלֹ֥א רְאִיתִ֖יו עַד־הֵֽנָּה׃
44.englishText: But one is gone from me, and I said: Alas, he was torn by a beast! And I have not seen him since.
44.transliteration: vַyֵּtsֵ֤a hָֽaֶchָd֙ mֵֽaִtִּ֔y vָaֹmַ֕r aַ֖ךְ tָrֹ֣ף tֹrָ֑ף vְlֹ֥a rְaִytִ֖yv aַd־hֵֽnָּh׃

44.hebrewText: וּלְקַחְתֶּ֧ם גַּם־אֶת־זֶ֛ה מֵעִ֥ם פָּנַ֖י וְקָרָ֣הוּ אָס֑וֹן וְהֽוֹרַדְתֶּ֧ם אֶת־שֵׂיבָתִ֛י בְּרָעָ֖ה שְׁאֹֽלָה׃
44.englishText: If you take this one from me, too, and he meets with disaster, you will send my white head down to Sheol in sorrow.’
44.transliteration: vּlְkַchְtֶּ֧ם gַּם־aֶt־zֶ֛h mֵaִ֥ם pָּnַ֖y vְkָrָ֣hvּ aָs֑vֹן vְhֽvֹrַdְtֶּ֧ם aֶt־shֵׂybָtִ֛y bְּrָaָ֖h shְׁaֹֽlָh׃

44.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֗ה כְּבֹאִי֙ אֶל־עַבְדְּךָ֣ אָבִ֔י וְהַנַּ֖עַר אֵינֶ֣נּוּ אִתָּ֑נוּ וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ קְשׁוּרָ֥ה בְנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃
44.englishText: “Now, if I come to your servant my father and the boy is not with us—since his own life is so bound up with his—
44.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֗h kְּbֹaִy֙ aֶl־aַbְdְּךָ֣ aָbִ֔y vְhַnַּ֖aַr aֵynֶ֣nּvּ aִtָּ֑nvּ vְnַpְshׁ֖vֹ kְshׁvּrָ֥h bְnַpְshֽׁvֹ׃

44.hebrewText: וְהָיָ֗ה כִּרְאוֹת֛וֹ כִּי־אֵ֥ין הַנַּ֖עַר וָמֵ֑ת וְהוֹרִ֨ידוּ עֲבָדֶ֜יךָ אֶת־שֵׂיבַ֨ת עַבְדְּךָ֥ אָבִ֛ינוּ בְּיָג֖וֹן שְׁאֹֽלָה׃
44.englishText: when he sees that the boy is not with us, he will die, and your servants will send the white head of your servant our father down to Sheol in grief.
44.transliteration: vְhָyָ֗h kִּrְavֹt֛vֹ kִּy־aֵ֥yן hַnַּ֖aַr vָmֵ֑t vְhvֹrִ֨ydvּ aֲbָdֶ֜yךָ aֶt־shֵׂybַ֨t aַbְdְּךָ֥ aָbִ֛ynvּ bְּyָg֖vֹן shְׁaֹֽlָh׃

44.hebrewText: כִּ֤י עַבְדְּךָ֙ עָרַ֣ב אֶת־הַנַּ֔עַר מֵעִ֥ם אָבִ֖י לֵאמֹ֑ר אִם־לֹ֤א אֲבִיאֶ֙נּוּ֙ אֵלֶ֔יךָ וְחָטָ֥אתִי לְאָבִ֖י כׇּל־הַיָּמִֽים׃
44.englishText: Now your servant has pledged himself for the boy to my father, saying, ‘If I do not bring him back to you, I shall stand guilty before my father forever.’
44.transliteration: kִּ֤y aַbְdְּךָ֙ aָrַ֣b aֶt־hַnַּ֔aַr mֵaִ֥ם aָbִ֖y lֵamֹ֑r aִם־lֹ֤a aֲbִyaֶ֙nּvּ֙ aֵlֶ֔yךָ vְchָtָ֥atִy lְaָbִ֖y kׇּl־hַyָּmִֽyם׃

44.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֗ה יֵֽשֶׁב־נָ֤א עַבְדְּךָ֙ תַּ֣חַת הַנַּ֔עַר עֶ֖בֶד לַֽאדֹנִ֑י וְהַנַּ֖עַר יַ֥עַל עִם־אֶחָֽיו׃
44.englishText: Therefore, please let your servant remain as a slave to my lord instead of the boy, and let the boy go back with his brothers.
44.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֗h yֵֽshֶׁb־nָ֤a aַbְdְּךָ֙ tַּ֣chַt hַnַּ֔aַr aֶ֖bֶd lַֽadֹnִ֑y vְhַnַּ֖aַr yַ֥aַl aִם־aֶchָֽyv׃

44.hebrewText: כִּי־אֵיךְ֙ אֶֽעֱלֶ֣ה אֶל־אָבִ֔י וְהַנַּ֖עַר אֵינֶ֣נּוּ אִתִּ֑י פֶּ֚ן אֶרְאֶ֣ה בָרָ֔ע אֲשֶׁ֥ר יִמְצָ֖א אֶת־אָבִֽי׃
44.englishText: For how can I go back to my father unless the boy is with me? Let me not be witness to the woe that would overtake my father!”
44.transliteration: kִּy־aֵyךְ֙ aֶֽaֱlֶ֣h aֶl־aָbִ֔y vְhַnַּ֖aַr aֵynֶ֣nּvּ aִtִּ֑y pֶּ֚ן aֶrְaֶ֣h bָrָ֔a aֲshֶׁ֥r yִmְtsָ֖a aֶt־aָbִֽy׃

45.hebrewText: וְלֹֽא־יָכֹ֨ל יוֹסֵ֜ף לְהִתְאַפֵּ֗ק לְכֹ֤ל הַנִּצָּבִים֙ עָלָ֔יו וַיִּקְרָ֕א הוֹצִ֥יאוּ כׇל־אִ֖ישׁ מֵעָלָ֑י וְלֹא־עָ֤מַד אִישׁ֙ אִתּ֔וֹ בְּהִתְוַדַּ֥ע יוֹסֵ֖ף אֶל־אֶחָֽיו׃
45.englishText: Joseph could no longer control himself before all his attendants, and he cried out, “Have everyone withdraw from me!” So there was no one else about when Joseph made himself known to his brothers.
45.transliteration: vְlֹֽa־yָkֹ֨l yvֹsֵ֜ף lְhִtְaַpֵּ֗k lְkֹ֤l hַnִּtsָּbִyם֙ aָlָ֔yv vַyִּkְrָ֕a hvֹtsִ֥yavּ kׇl־aִ֖yshׁ mֵaָlָ֑y vְlֹa־aָ֤mַd aִyshׁ֙ aִtּ֔vֹ bְּhִtְvַdַּ֥a yvֹsֵ֖ף aֶl־aֶchָֽyv׃

45.hebrewText: וַיִּתֵּ֥ן אֶת־קֹל֖וֹ בִּבְכִ֑י וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ מִצְרַ֔יִם וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע בֵּ֥ית פַּרְעֹֽה׃
45.englishText: His sobs were so loud that the Egyptians could hear, and so the news reached Pharaoh’s palace.
45.transliteration: vַyִּtֵּ֥ן aֶt־kֹl֖vֹ bִּbְkִ֑y vַyִּshְׁmְa֣vּ mִtsְrַ֔yִם vַyִּshְׁmַ֖a bֵּ֥yt pַּrְaֹֽh׃

45.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יוֹסֵ֤ף אֶל־אֶחָיו֙ אֲנִ֣י יוֹסֵ֔ף הַע֥וֹד אָבִ֖י חָ֑י וְלֹֽא־יָכְל֤וּ אֶחָיו֙ לַעֲנ֣וֹת אֹת֔וֹ כִּ֥י נִבְהֲל֖וּ מִפָּנָֽיו׃
45.englishText: Joseph said to his brothers, “I am Joseph. Is my father still well?” But his brothers could not answer him, so dumbfounded were they on account of him.
45.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yvֹsֵ֤ף aֶl־aֶchָyv֙ aֲnִ֣y yvֹsֵ֔ף hַa֥vֹd aָbִ֖y chָ֑y vְlֹֽa־yָkְl֤vּ aֶchָyv֙ lַaֲn֣vֹt aֹt֔vֹ kִּ֥y nִbְhֲl֖vּ mִpָּnָֽyv׃

45.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יוֹסֵ֧ף אֶל־אֶחָ֛יו גְּשׁוּ־נָ֥א אֵלַ֖י וַיִּגָּ֑שׁוּ וַיֹּ֗אמֶר אֲנִי֙ יוֹסֵ֣ף אֲחִיכֶ֔ם אֲשֶׁר־מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם אֹתִ֖י מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃
45.englishText: Then Joseph said to his brothers, “Come forward to me.” And when they came forward, he said, “I am your brother Joseph, he whom you sold into Egypt.
45.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yvֹsֵ֧ף aֶl־aֶchָ֛yv gְּshׁvּ־nָ֥a aֵlַ֖y vַyִּgָּ֑shׁvּ vַyֹּ֗amֶr aֲnִy֙ yvֹsֵ֣ף aֲchִykֶ֔ם aֲshֶׁr־mְkַrְtֶּ֥ם aֹtִ֖y mִtsְrָֽyְmָh׃

45.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ אַל־תֵּעָ֣צְב֗וּ וְאַל־יִ֙חַר֙ בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם כִּֽי־מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם אֹתִ֖י הֵ֑נָּה כִּ֣י לְמִֽחְיָ֔ה שְׁלָחַ֥נִי אֱלֹהִ֖ים לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃
45.englishText: Now, do not be distressed or reproach yourselves because you sold me hither; it was to save life that God sent me ahead of you.
45.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֣h ׀ aַl־tֵּaָ֣tsְb֗vּ vְaַl־yִ֙chַr֙ bְּaֵ֣ynֵykֶ֔ם kִּֽy־mְkַrְtֶּ֥ם aֹtִ֖y hֵ֑nָּh kִּ֣y lְmִֽchְyָ֔h shְׁlָchַ֥nִy aֱlֹhִ֖yם lִpְnֵykֶֽם׃

45.hebrewText: כִּי־זֶ֛ה שְׁנָתַ֥יִם הָרָעָ֖ב בְּקֶ֣רֶב הָאָ֑רֶץ וְעוֹד֙ חָמֵ֣שׁ שָׁנִ֔ים אֲשֶׁ֥ר אֵין־חָרִ֖ישׁ וְקָצִֽיר׃
45.englishText: It is now two years that there has been famine in the land, and there are still five years to come in which there shall be no yield from tilling.
45.transliteration: kִּy־zֶ֛h shְׁnָtַ֥yִם hָrָaָ֖b bְּkֶ֣rֶb hָaָ֑rֶץ vְavֹd֙ chָmֵ֣shׁ shָׁnִ֔yם aֲshֶׁ֥r aֵyן־chָrִ֖yshׁ vְkָtsִֽyr׃

45.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֤נִי אֱלֹהִים֙ לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם לָשׂ֥וּם לָכֶ֛ם שְׁאֵרִ֖ית בָּאָ֑רֶץ וּלְהַחֲי֣וֹת לָכֶ֔ם לִפְלֵיטָ֖ה גְּדֹלָֽה׃
45.englishText: God has sent me ahead of you to ensure your survival on earth, and to save your lives in an extraordinary deliverance.
45.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁlָchֵ֤nִy aֱlֹhִyם֙ lִpְnֵykֶ֔ם lָshׂ֥vּם lָkֶ֛ם shְׁaֵrִ֖yt bָּaָ֑rֶץ vּlְhַchֲy֣vֹt lָkֶ֔ם lִpְlֵytָ֖h gְּdֹlָֽh׃

45.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֗ה לֹֽא־אַתֶּ֞ם שְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם אֹתִי֙ הֵ֔נָּה כִּ֖י הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים וַיְשִׂימֵ֨נִֽי לְאָ֜ב לְפַרְעֹ֗ה וּלְאָדוֹן֙ לְכׇל־בֵּית֔וֹ וּמֹשֵׁ֖ל בְּכׇל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
45.englishText: So, it was not you who sent me here, but God—who has made me a father to Pharaoh,*father to Pharaoh (So trad.) Or “Pharaoh’s chancellor,” cf. Isa. 22.15, 20–21. Heb. ’av le-phar‘oh. lord of all his household, and ruler over the whole land of Egypt.
45.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֗h lֹֽa־aַtֶּ֞ם shְׁlַchְtֶּ֤ם aֹtִy֙ hֵ֔nָּh kִּ֖y hָaֱlֹhִ֑yם vַyְshִׂymֵ֨nִֽy lְaָ֜b lְpַrְaֹ֗h vּlְaָdvֹן֙ lְkׇl־bֵּyt֔vֹ vּmֹshֵׁ֖l bְּkׇl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

45.hebrewText: מַהֲרוּ֮ וַעֲל֣וּ אֶל־אָבִי֒ וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֣ם אֵלָ֗יו כֹּ֤ה אָמַר֙ בִּנְךָ֣ יוֹסֵ֔ף שָׂמַ֧נִי אֱלֹהִ֛ים לְאָד֖וֹן לְכׇל־מִצְרָ֑יִם רְדָ֥ה אֵלַ֖י אַֽל־תַּעֲמֹֽד׃
45.englishText: “Now, hurry back to my father and say to him: Thus says your son Joseph, ‘God has made me lord of all Egypt; come down to me without delay.
45.transliteration: mַhֲrvּ֮ vַaֲl֣vּ aֶl־aָbִy֒ vַaֲmַrְtֶּ֣ם aֵlָ֗yv kֹּ֤h aָmַr֙ bִּnְךָ֣ yvֹsֵ֔ף shָׂmַ֧nִy aֱlֹhִ֛yם lְaָd֖vֹן lְkׇl־mִtsְrָ֑yִם rְdָ֥h aֵlַ֖y aַֽl־tַּaֲmֹֽd׃

45.hebrewText: וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֣ בְאֶֽרֶץ־גֹּ֗שֶׁן וְהָיִ֤יתָ קָרוֹב֙ אֵלַ֔י אַתָּ֕ה וּבָנֶ֖יךָ וּבְנֵ֣י בָנֶ֑יךָ וְצֹאנְךָ֥ וּבְקָרְךָ֖ וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־לָֽךְ׃
45.englishText: You will dwell in the region of Goshen, where you will be near me—you and your children and your grandchildren, your flocks and herds, and all that is yours.
45.transliteration: vְyָshַׁbְtָּ֣ bְaֶֽrֶץ־gֹּ֗shֶׁן vְhָyִ֤ytָ kָrvֹb֙ aֵlַ֔y aַtָּ֕h vּbָnֶ֖yךָ vּbְnֵ֣y bָnֶ֑yךָ vְtsֹanְךָ֥ vּbְkָrְךָ֖ vְkׇl־aֲshֶׁr־lָֽךְ׃

45.hebrewText: וְכִלְכַּלְתִּ֤י אֹֽתְךָ֙ שָׁ֔ם כִּי־ע֛וֹד חָמֵ֥שׁ שָׁנִ֖ים רָעָ֑ב פֶּן־תִּוָּרֵ֛שׁ אַתָּ֥ה וּבֵֽיתְךָ֖ וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־לָֽךְ׃
45.englishText: There I will provide for you—for there are yet five years of famine to come—that you and your household and all that is yours may not suffer want.’
45.transliteration: vְkִlְkַּlְtִּ֤y aֹֽtְךָ֙ shָׁ֔ם kִּy־a֛vֹd chָmֵ֥shׁ shָׁnִ֖yם rָaָ֑b pֶּן־tִּvָּrֵ֛shׁ aַtָּ֥h vּbֵֽytְךָ֖ vְkׇl־aֲshֶׁr־lָֽךְ׃

45.hebrewText: וְהִנֵּ֤ה עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ רֹא֔וֹת וְעֵינֵ֖י אָחִ֣י בִנְיָמִ֑ין כִּי־פִ֖י הַֽמְדַבֵּ֥ר אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃
45.englishText: You can see for yourselves, and my brother Benjamin for himself, that it is indeed I who am speaking to you.
45.transliteration: vְhִnֵּ֤h aֵֽynֵykֶם֙ rֹa֔vֹt vְaֵynֵ֖y aָchִ֣y bִnְyָmִ֑yן kִּy־pִ֖y hַֽmְdַbֵּ֥r aֲlֵykֶֽם׃

45.hebrewText: וְהִגַּדְתֶּ֣ם לְאָבִ֗י אֶת־כׇּל־כְּבוֹדִי֙ בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר רְאִיתֶ֑ם וּמִֽהַרְתֶּ֛ם וְהוֹרַדְתֶּ֥ם אֶת־אָבִ֖י הֵֽנָּה׃
45.englishText: And you must tell my father everything about my high station in Egypt and all that you have seen; and bring my father here with all speed.”
45.transliteration: vְhִgַּdְtֶּ֣ם lְaָbִ֗y aֶt־kׇּl־kְּbvֹdִy֙ bְּmִtsְrַ֔yִם vְaֵ֖t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֣r rְaִytֶ֑ם vּmִֽhַrְtֶּ֛ם vְhvֹrַdְtֶּ֥ם aֶt־aָbִ֖y hֵֽnָּh׃

45.hebrewText: וַיִּפֹּ֛ל עַל־צַוְּארֵ֥י בִנְיָֽמִן־אָחִ֖יו וַיֵּ֑בְךְּ וּבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן בָּכָ֖ה עַל־צַוָּארָֽיו׃
45.englishText: With that he embraced*embraced Lit. “fell on.” his brother Benjamin around the neck and wept, and Benjamin wept on his neck.
45.transliteration: vַyִּpֹּ֛l aַl־tsַvְּarֵ֥y bִnְyָֽmִן־aָchִ֖yv vַyֵּ֑bְךְּ vּbִ֨nְyָmִ֔ן bָּkָ֖h aַl־tsַvָּarָֽyv׃

45.hebrewText: וַיְנַשֵּׁ֥ק לְכׇל־אֶחָ֖יו וַיֵּ֣בְךְּ עֲלֵהֶ֑ם וְאַ֣חֲרֵי כֵ֔ן דִּבְּר֥וּ אֶחָ֖יו אִתּֽוֹ׃
45.englishText: He kissed all his brothers and wept upon them; only then were his brothers able to talk to him.
45.transliteration: vַyְnַshֵּׁ֥k lְkׇl־aֶchָ֖yv vַyֵּ֣bְךְּ aֲlֵhֶ֑ם vְaַ֣chֲrֵy kֵ֔ן dִּbְּr֥vּ aֶchָ֖yv aִtּֽvֹ׃

45.hebrewText: וְהַקֹּ֣ל נִשְׁמַ֗ע בֵּ֤ית פַּרְעֹה֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר בָּ֖אוּ אֲחֵ֣י יוֹסֵ֑ף וַיִּיטַב֙ בְּעֵינֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֔ה וּבְעֵינֵ֖י עֲבָדָֽיו׃
45.englishText: The news reached Pharaoh’s palace: “Joseph’s brothers have come.” Pharaoh and his courtiers were pleased.
45.transliteration: vְhַkֹּ֣l nִshְׁmַ֗a bֵּ֤yt pַּrְaֹh֙ lֵamֹ֔r bָּ֖avּ aֲchֵ֣y yvֹsֵ֑ף vַyִּytַb֙ bְּaֵynֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֔h vּbְaֵynֵ֖y aֲbָdָֽyv׃

45.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר פַּרְעֹה֙ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֔ף אֱמֹ֥ר אֶל־אַחֶ֖יךָ זֹ֣את עֲשׂ֑וּ טַֽעֲנוּ֙ אֶת־בְּעִ֣ירְכֶ֔ם וּלְכוּ־בֹ֖אוּ אַ֥רְצָה כְּנָֽעַן׃
45.englishText: And Pharaoh said to Joseph, “Say to your brothers, ‘Do as follows: load up your beasts and go at once to the land of Canaan.
45.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr pַּrְaֹh֙ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֔ף aֱmֹ֥r aֶl־aַchֶ֖yךָ zֹ֣at aֲshׂ֑vּ tַֽaֲnvּ֙ aֶt־bְּaִ֣yrְkֶ֔ם vּlְkvּ־bֹ֖avּ aַ֥rְtsָh kְּnָֽaַן׃

45.hebrewText: וּקְח֧וּ אֶת־אֲבִיכֶ֛ם וְאֶת־בָּתֵּיכֶ֖ם וּבֹ֣אוּ אֵלָ֑י וְאֶתְּנָ֣ה לָכֶ֗ם אֶת־טוּב֙ אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם וְאִכְל֖וּ אֶת־חֵ֥לֶב הָאָֽרֶץ׃
45.englishText: Take your father and your households and come to me; I will give you the best of the land of Egypt and you shall live off the fat of the land.’
45.transliteration: vּkְch֧vּ aֶt־aֲbִykֶ֛ם vְaֶt־bָּtֵּykֶ֖ם vּbֹ֣avּ aֵlָ֑y vְaֶtְּnָ֣h lָkֶ֗ם aֶt־tvּb֙ aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם vְaִkְl֖vּ aֶt־chֵ֥lֶb hָaָֽrֶץ׃

45.hebrewText: וְאַתָּ֥ה צֻוֵּ֖יתָה זֹ֣את עֲשׂ֑וּ קְחוּ־לָכֶם֩ מֵאֶ֨רֶץ מִצְרַ֜יִם עֲגָל֗וֹת לְטַפְּכֶם֙ וְלִנְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם וּנְשָׂאתֶ֥ם אֶת־אֲבִיכֶ֖ם וּבָאתֶֽם׃
45.englishText: And you are bidden [to add], ‘Do as follows: take from the land of Egypt wagons for your children and your wives, and bring your father here.
45.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֥h tsֻvֵּ֖ytָh zֹ֣at aֲshׂ֑vּ kְchvּ־lָkֶם֩ mֵaֶ֨rֶץ mִtsְrַ֜yִם aֲgָl֗vֹt lְtַpְּkֶם֙ vְlִnְshֵׁykֶ֔ם vּnְshָׂatֶ֥ם aֶt־aֲbִykֶ֖ם vּbָatֶֽם׃

45.hebrewText: וְעֵ֣ינְכֶ֔ם אַל־תָּחֹ֖ס עַל־כְּלֵיכֶ֑ם כִּי־ט֛וּב כׇּל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם לָכֶ֥ם הֽוּא׃
45.englishText: And never mind your belongings, for the best of all the land of Egypt shall be yours.’”
45.transliteration: vְaֵ֣ynְkֶ֔ם aַl־tָּchֹ֖s aַl־kְּlֵykֶ֑ם kִּy־t֛vּb kׇּl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrַ֖yִם lָkֶ֥ם hֽvּa׃

45.hebrewText: וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־כֵן֙ בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל וַיִּתֵּ֨ן לָהֶ֥ם יוֹסֵ֛ף עֲגָל֖וֹת עַל־פִּ֣י פַרְעֹ֑ה וַיִּתֵּ֥ן לָהֶ֛ם צֵדָ֖ה לַדָּֽרֶךְ׃
45.englishText: The sons of Israel did so; Joseph gave them wagons as Pharaoh had commanded, and he supplied them with provisions for the journey.
45.transliteration: vַyַּֽaֲshׂvּ־kֵן֙ bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l vַyִּtֵּ֨ן lָhֶ֥ם yvֹsֵ֛ף aֲgָl֖vֹt aַl־pִּ֣y pַrְaֹ֑h vַyִּtֵּ֥ן lָhֶ֛ם tsֵdָ֖h lַdָּֽrֶךְ׃

45.hebrewText: לְכֻלָּ֥ם נָתַ֛ן לָאִ֖ישׁ חֲלִפ֣וֹת שְׂמָלֹ֑ת וּלְבִנְיָמִ֤ן נָתַן֙ שְׁלֹ֣שׁ מֵא֣וֹת כֶּ֔סֶף וְחָמֵ֖שׁ חֲלִפֹ֥ת שְׂמָלֹֽת׃
45.englishText: To each of them, moreover, he gave a change of clothing; but to Benjamin he gave three hundred pieces of silver and several*several Lit. “five”; cf. 43.34. changes of clothing.
45.transliteration: lְkֻlָּ֥ם nָtַ֛ן lָaִ֖yshׁ chֲlִp֣vֹt shְׂmָlֹ֑t vּlְbִnְyָmִ֤ן nָtַן֙ shְׁlֹ֣shׁ mֵa֣vֹt kֶּ֔sֶף vְchָmֵ֖shׁ chֲlִpֹ֥t shְׂmָlֹֽt׃

45.hebrewText: וּלְאָבִ֞יו שָׁלַ֤ח כְּזֹאת֙ עֲשָׂרָ֣ה חֲמֹרִ֔ים נֹשְׂאִ֖ים מִטּ֣וּב מִצְרָ֑יִם וְעֶ֣שֶׂר אֲתֹנֹ֡ת נֹֽ֠שְׂאֹ֠ת בָּ֣ר וָלֶ֧חֶם וּמָז֛וֹן לְאָבִ֖יו לַדָּֽרֶךְ׃
45.englishText: And to his father he sent the following: ten he-asses laden with the best things of Egypt, and ten she-asses laden with grain, bread, and provisions for his father on the journey.
45.transliteration: vּlְaָbִ֞yv shָׁlַ֤ch kְּzֹat֙ aֲshָׂrָ֣h chֲmֹrִ֔yם nֹshְׂaִ֖yם mִtּ֣vּb mִtsְrָ֑yִם vְaֶ֣shֶׂr aֲtֹnֹ֡t nֹֽ֠shְׂaֹ֠t bָּ֣r vָlֶ֧chֶם vּmָz֛vֹן lְaָbִ֖yv lַdָּֽrֶךְ׃

45.hebrewText: וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח אֶת־אֶחָ֖יו וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר אֲלֵהֶ֔ם אַֽל־תִּרְגְּז֖וּ בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃
45.englishText: As he sent his brothers off on their way, he told them, “Do not be quarrelsome on the way.”
45.transliteration: vַyְshַׁlַּ֥ch aֶt־aֶchָ֖yv vַyֵּlֵ֑kvּ vַyֹּ֣amֶr aֲlֵhֶ֔ם aַֽl־tִּrְgְּz֖vּ bַּdָּֽrֶךְ׃

45.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ אֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן אֶֽל־יַעֲקֹ֖ב אֲבִיהֶֽם׃
45.englishText: They went up from Egypt and came to their father Jacob in the land of Canaan.
45.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲl֖vּ mִmִּtsְrָ֑yִם vַyָּbֹ֙avּ֙ aֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן aֶֽl־yַaֲkֹ֖b aֲbִyhֶֽם׃

45.hebrewText: וַיַּגִּ֨דוּ ל֜וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר ע֚וֹד יוֹסֵ֣ף חַ֔י וְכִֽי־ה֥וּא מֹשֵׁ֖ל בְּכׇל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם וַיָּ֣פׇג לִבּ֔וֹ כִּ֥י לֹא־הֶאֱמִ֖ין לָהֶֽם׃
45.englishText: And they told him, “Joseph is still alive; yes, he is ruler over the whole land of Egypt.” His heart went numb, for he did not believe them.
45.transliteration: vַyַּgִּ֨dvּ l֜vֹ lֵamֹ֗r a֚vֹd yvֹsֵ֣ף chַ֔y vְkִֽy־h֥vּa mֹshֵׁ֖l bְּkׇl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrָ֑yִם vַyָּ֣pׇg lִbּ֔vֹ kִּ֥y lֹa־hֶaֱmִ֖yן lָhֶֽם׃

45.hebrewText: וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ אֵלָ֗יו אֵ֣ת כׇּל־דִּבְרֵ֤י יוֹסֵף֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר דִּבֶּ֣ר אֲלֵהֶ֔ם וַיַּרְא֙ אֶת־הָ֣עֲגָל֔וֹת אֲשֶׁר־שָׁלַ֥ח יוֹסֵ֖ף לָשֵׂ֣את אֹת֑וֹ וַתְּחִ֕י ר֖וּחַ יַעֲקֹ֥ב אֲבִיהֶֽם׃
45.englishText: But when they recounted all that Joseph had said to them, and when he saw the wagons that Joseph had sent to transport him, the spirit of their father Jacob revived.
45.transliteration: vַyְdַbְּr֣vּ aֵlָ֗yv aֵ֣t kׇּl־dִּbְrֵ֤y yvֹsֵף֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r dִּbֶּ֣r aֲlֵhֶ֔ם vַyַּrְa֙ aֶt־hָ֣aֲgָl֔vֹt aֲshֶׁr־shָׁlַ֥ch yvֹsֵ֖ף lָshֵׂ֣at aֹt֑vֹ vַtְּchִ֕y r֖vּchַ yַaֲkֹ֥b aֲbִyhֶֽם׃

45.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל רַ֛ב עוֹד־יוֹסֵ֥ף בְּנִ֖י חָ֑י אֵֽלְכָ֥ה וְאֶרְאֶ֖נּוּ בְּטֶ֥רֶם אָמֽוּת׃
45.englishText: “Enough!” said Israel. “My son Joseph is still alive! I must go and see him before I die.”
45.transliteration: vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l rַ֛b avֹd־yvֹsֵ֥ף bְּnִ֖y chָ֑y aֵֽlְkָ֥h vְaֶrְaֶ֖nּvּ bְּtֶ֥rֶם aָmֽvּt׃

46.hebrewText: וַיִּסַּ֤ע יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־ל֔וֹ וַיָּבֹ֖א בְּאֵ֣רָה שָּׁ֑בַע וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח זְבָחִ֔ים לֵאלֹהֵ֖י אָבִ֥יו יִצְחָֽק׃
46.englishText: So Israel set out with all that was his, and he came to Beer-sheba, where he offered sacrifices to the God of his father Isaac’s [house].
46.transliteration: vַyִּsַּ֤a yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ vְkׇl־aֲshֶׁr־l֔vֹ vַyָּbֹ֖a bְּaֵ֣rָh shָּׁ֑bַa vַyִּzְbַּ֣ch zְbָchִ֔yם lֵalֹhֵ֖y aָbִ֥yv yִtsְchָֽk׃

46.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר אֱלֹהִ֤ים <small>׀</small> לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ בְּמַרְאֹ֣ת הַלַּ֔יְלָה וַיֹּ֖אמֶר יַעֲקֹ֣ב <small>׀</small> יַעֲקֹ֑ב וַיֹּ֖אמֶר הִנֵּֽנִי׃
46.englishText: God called to Israel in a vision by night: “Jacob! Jacob!” He answered, “Here.”
46.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr aֱlֹhִ֤yם <small>׀</small> lְyִshְׂrָaֵl֙ bְּmַrְaֹ֣t hַlַּ֔yְlָh vַyֹּ֖amֶr yַaֲkֹ֣b <small>׀</small> yַaֲkֹ֑b vַyֹּ֖amֶr hִnֵּֽnִy׃

46.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֕אמֶר אָנֹכִ֥י הָאֵ֖ל אֱלֹהֵ֣י אָבִ֑יךָ אַל־תִּירָא֙ מֵרְדָ֣ה מִצְרַ֔יְמָה כִּֽי־לְג֥וֹי גָּד֖וֹל אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֥ שָֽׁם׃
46.englishText: “I am God, the God of your father’s [house]. Fear not to go down to Egypt, for I will make you there into a great nation.
46.transliteration: vַyֹּ֕amֶr aָnֹkִ֥y hָaֵ֖l aֱlֹhֵ֣y aָbִ֑yךָ aַl־tִּyrָa֙ mֵrְdָ֣h mִtsְrַ֔yְmָh kִּֽy־lְg֥vֹy gָּd֖vֹl aֲshִֽׂymְךָ֥ shָֽׁם׃

46.hebrewText: אָנֹכִ֗י אֵרֵ֤ד עִמְּךָ֙ מִצְרַ֔יְמָה וְאָנֹכִ֖י אַֽעַלְךָ֣ גַם־עָלֹ֑ה וְיוֹסֵ֕ף יָשִׁ֥ית יָד֖וֹ עַל־עֵינֶֽיךָ׃
46.englishText: I Myself will go down with you to Egypt, and I Myself will also bring you back; and Joseph’s hand shall close your eyes.”
46.transliteration: aָnֹkִ֗y aֵrֵ֤d aִmְּךָ֙ mִtsְrַ֔yְmָh vְaָnֹkִ֖y aַֽaַlְךָ֣ gַם־aָlֹ֑h vְyvֹsֵ֕ף yָshִׁ֥yt yָd֖vֹ aַl־aֵynֶֽyךָ׃

46.hebrewText: וַיָּ֥קׇם יַעֲקֹ֖ב מִבְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ בְנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל אֶת־יַעֲקֹ֣ב אֲבִיהֶ֗ם וְאֶת־טַפָּם֙ ��ְאֶת־נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם בָּעֲגָל֕וֹת אֲשֶׁר־שָׁלַ֥ח פַּרְעֹ֖ה לָשֵׂ֥את אֹתֽוֹ׃
46.englishText: So Jacob set out from Beer-sheba. The sons of Israel put their father Jacob and their children and their wives in the wagons that Pharaoh had sent to transport him;
46.transliteration: vַyָּ֥kׇם yַaֲkֹ֖b mִbְּaֵ֣r shָׁ֑bַa vַyִּshְׂa֨vּ bְnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֜l aֶt־yַaֲkֹ֣b aֲbִyhֶ֗ם vְaֶt־tַpָּם֙ ��ְaֶt־nְshֵׁyhֶ֔ם bָּaֲgָl֕vֹt aֲshֶׁr־shָׁlַ֥ch pַּrְaֹ֖h lָshֵׂ֥at aֹtֽvֹ׃

46.hebrewText: וַיִּקְח֣וּ אֶת־מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם וְאֶת־רְכוּשָׁם֙ אֲשֶׁ֤ר רָֽכְשׁוּ֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ מִצְרָ֑יְמָה יַעֲקֹ֖ב וְכׇל־זַרְע֥וֹ אִתּֽוֹ׃
46.englishText: and they took along their livestock and the wealth that they had amassed in the land of Canaan. Thus Jacob and all his offspring with him came to Egypt:
46.transliteration: vַyִּkְch֣vּ aֶt־mִkְnֵyhֶ֗ם vְaֶt־rְkvּshָׁם֙ aֲshֶׁ֤r rָֽkְshׁvּ֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן vַyָּbֹ֖avּ mִtsְrָ֑yְmָh yַaֲkֹ֖b vְkׇl־zַrְa֥vֹ aִtּֽvֹ׃

46.hebrewText: בָּנָ֞יו וּבְנֵ֤י בָנָיו֙ אִתּ֔וֹ בְּנֹתָ֛יו וּבְנ֥וֹת בָּנָ֖יו וְכׇל־זַרְע֑וֹ הֵבִ֥יא אִתּ֖וֹ מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ {ס}
46.englishText: he brought with him to Egypt his sons and grandsons, his daughters*daughters (So trad.) The plural is part of a standard formula; cf. vv. 15, 23; Num. 26.8; 1 Chron. 2.8. and granddaughters—all his offspring.
46.transliteration: bָּnָ֞yv vּbְnֵ֤y bָnָyv֙ aִtּ֔vֹ bְּnֹtָ֛yv vּbְn֥vֹt bָּnָ֖yv vְkׇl־zַrְa֑vֹ hֵbִ֥ya aִtּ֖vֹ mִtsְrָֽyְmָh׃ {s}

46.hebrewText: וְאֵ֨לֶּה שְׁמ֧וֹת בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל הַבָּאִ֥ים מִצְרַ֖יְמָה יַעֲקֹ֣ב וּבָנָ֑יו בְּכֹ֥ר יַעֲקֹ֖ב רְאוּבֵֽן׃
46.englishText: These are the names of the Israelites, Jacob and his descendants, who came to Egypt. Jacob’s first-born Reuben;
46.transliteration: vְaֵ֨lֶּh shְׁm֧vֹt bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֛l hַbָּaִ֥yם mִtsְrַ֖yְmָh yַaֲkֹ֣b vּbָnָ֑yv bְּkֹ֥r yַaֲkֹ֖b rְavּbֵֽן׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י רְאוּבֵ֑ן חֲנ֥וֹךְ וּפַלּ֖וּא וְחֶצְרֹ֥ן וְכַרְמִֽי׃
46.englishText: Reuben’s sons: Enoch,*Enoch Or “Hanoch.” Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y rְavּbֵ֑ן chֲn֥vֹךְ vּpַlּ֖vּa vְchֶtsְrֹ֥ן vְkַrְmִֽy׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י שִׁמְע֗וֹן יְמוּאֵ֧ל וְיָמִ֛ין וְאֹ֖הַד וְיָכִ֣ין וְצֹ֑חַר וְשָׁא֖וּל בֶּן־הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽית׃
46.englishText: Simeon’s sons: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar, and Saul*Saul Or “Shaul.” the son of a Canaanite woman.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y shִׁmְa֗vֹן yְmvּaֵ֧l vְyָmִ֛yן vְaֹ֖hַd vְyָkִ֣yן vְtsֹ֑chַr vְshָׁa֖vּl bֶּן־hַֽkְּnַaֲnִֽyt׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י לֵוִ֑י גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן קְהָ֖ת וּמְרָרִֽי׃
46.englishText: Levi’s sons: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y lֵvִ֑y gֵּrְshׁ֕vֹן kְhָ֖t vּmְrָrִֽy׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י יְהוּדָ֗ה עֵ֧ר וְאוֹנָ֛ן וְשֵׁלָ֖ה וָפֶ֣רֶץ וָזָ֑רַח וַיָּ֨מׇת עֵ֤ר וְאוֹנָן֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן וַיִּהְי֥וּ בְנֵי־פֶ֖רֶץ חֶצְרֹ֥ן וְחָמֽוּל׃
46.englishText: Judah’s sons: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez, and Zerah—but Er and Onan had died in the land of Canaan; and Perez’s sons were Hezron and Hamul.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y yְhvּdָ֗h aֵ֧r vְavֹnָ֛ן vְshֵׁlָ֖h vָpֶ֣rֶץ vָzָ֑rַch vַyָּ֨mׇt aֵ֤r vְavֹnָן֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן vַyִּhְy֥vּ bְnֵy־pֶ֖rֶץ chֶtsְrֹ֥ן vְchָmֽvּl׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר תּוֹלָ֥ע וּפֻוָ֖ה וְי֥וֹב וְשִׁמְרֹֽן׃
46.englishText: Issachar’s sons: Tola, Puvah, Iob, and Shimron.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y yִshָּׂshkָ֑r tּvֹlָ֥a vּpֻvָ֖h vְy֥vֹb vְshִׁmְrֹֽן׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י זְבֻל֑וּן סֶ֥רֶד וְאֵל֖וֹן וְיַחְלְאֵֽל׃
46.englishText: Zebulun’s sons: Sered, Elon, and Jahleel.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y zְbֻl֑vּן sֶ֥rֶd vְaֵl֖vֹן vְyַchְlְaֵֽl׃

46.hebrewText: אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ בְּנֵ֣י לֵאָ֗ה אֲשֶׁ֨ר יָֽלְדָ֤ה לְיַעֲקֹב֙ בְּפַדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֔ם וְאֵ֖ת דִּינָ֣ה בִתּ֑וֹ כׇּל־נֶ֧פֶשׁ בָּנָ֛יו וּבְנוֹתָ֖יו שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים וְשָׁלֹֽשׁ׃
46.englishText: Those were the sons whom Leah bore to Jacob in Paddan-aram, in addition to his daughter Dinah. Persons in all, male and female: 33.*33 Including Jacob.
46.transliteration: aֵ֣lֶּh ׀ bְּnֵ֣y lֵaָ֗h aֲshֶׁ֨r yָֽlְdָ֤h lְyַaֲkֹb֙ bְּpַdַּ֣ן aֲrָ֔ם vְaֵ֖t dִּynָ֣h bִtּ֑vֹ kׇּl־nֶ֧pֶshׁ bָּnָ֛yv vּbְnvֹtָ֖yv shְׁlֹshִׁ֥yם vְshָׁlֹֽshׁ׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י גָ֔ד צִפְי֥וֹן וְחַגִּ֖י שׁוּנִ֣י וְאֶצְבֹּ֑ן עֵרִ֥י וַֽאֲרוֹדִ֖י וְאַרְאֵלִֽי׃
46.englishText: Gad’s sons: Ziphion, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi, and Areli.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y gָ֔d tsִpְy֥vֹן vְchַgִּ֖y shׁvּnִ֣y vְaֶtsְbֹּ֑ן aֵrִ֥y vַֽaֲrvֹdִ֖y vְaַrְaֵlִֽy׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י אָשֵׁ֗ר יִמְנָ֧ה וְיִשְׁוָ֛ה וְיִשְׁוִ֥י וּבְרִיעָ֖ה וְשֶׂ֣רַח אֲחֹתָ֑ם וּבְנֵ֣י בְרִיעָ֔ה חֶ֖בֶר וּמַלְכִּיאֵֽל׃
46.englishText: Asher’s sons: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, and Beriah, and their sister Serah. Beriah’s sons: Heber and Malchiel.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y aָshֵׁ֗r yִmְnָ֧h vְyִshְׁvָ֛h vְyִshְׁvִ֥y vּbְrִyaָ֖h vְshֶׂ֣rַch aֲchֹtָ֑ם vּbְnֵ֣y bְrִyaָ֔h chֶ֖bֶr vּmַlְkִּyaֵֽl׃

46.hebrewText: אֵ֚לֶּה בְּנֵ֣י זִלְפָּ֔ה אֲשֶׁר־נָתַ֥ן לָבָ֖ן לְלֵאָ֣ה בִתּ֑וֹ וַתֵּ֤לֶד אֶת־אֵ֙לֶּה֙ לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב שֵׁ֥שׁ עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה נָֽפֶשׁ׃
46.englishText: These were the descendants of Zilpah, whom Laban had given to his daughter Leah. These she bore to Jacob—16 persons.
46.transliteration: aֵ֚lֶּh bְּnֵ֣y zִlְpָּ֔h aֲshֶׁr־nָtַ֥ן lָbָ֖ן lְlֵaָ֣h bִtּ֑vֹ vַtֵּ֤lֶd aֶt־aֵ֙lֶּh֙ lְyַaֲkֹ֔b shֵׁ֥shׁ aֶshְׂrֵ֖h nָֽpֶshׁ׃

46.hebrewText: בְּנֵ֤י רָחֵל֙ אֵ֣שֶׁת יַעֲקֹ֔ב יוֹסֵ֖ף וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃
46.englishText: The sons of Jacob’s wife Rachel were Joseph and Benjamin.
46.transliteration: bְּnֵ֤y rָchֵl֙ aֵ֣shֶׁt yַaֲkֹ֔b yvֹsֵ֖ף vּbִnְyָmִֽן׃

46.hebrewText: וַיִּוָּלֵ֣ד לְיוֹסֵף֮ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֒יִם֒ אֲשֶׁ֤ר יָֽלְדָה־לּוֹ֙ אָֽסְנַ֔ת בַּת־פּ֥וֹטִי פֶ֖רַע*(בספרי תימן פּֽוֹטִיפֶ֖רַע בתיבה אחת) כֹּהֵ֣ן אֹ֑ן אֶת־מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה וְאֶת־אֶפְרָֽיִם׃
46.englishText: To Joseph were born in the land of Egypt Manasseh and Ephraim, whom Asenath daughter of Poti-phera priest of On bore to him.
46.transliteration: vַyִּvָּlֵ֣d lְyvֹsֵף֮ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֒yִם֒ aֲshֶׁ֤r yָֽlְdָh־lּvֹ֙ aָֽsְnַ֔t bַּt־pּ֥vֹtִy pֶ֖rַa*(bspry tymן pּֽvֹtִypֶ֖rַa btybh acht) kֹּhֵ֣ן aֹ֑ן aֶt־mְnַshֶּׁ֖h vְaֶt־aֶpְrָֽyִם׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י בִנְיָמִ֗ן בֶּ֤לַע וָבֶ֙כֶר֙ וְאַשְׁבֵּ֔ל גֵּרָ֥א וְנַעֲמָ֖ן אֵחִ֣י וָרֹ֑אשׁ מֻפִּ֥ים וְחֻפִּ֖ים וָאָֽרְדְּ׃
46.englishText: Benjamin’s sons: Bela, Becher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim, and Ard.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y bִnְyָmִ֗ן bֶּ֤lַa vָbֶ֙kֶr֙ vְaַshְׁbֵּ֔l gֵּrָ֥a vְnַaֲmָ֖ן aֵchִ֣y vָrֹ֑ashׁ mֻpִּ֥yם vְchֻpִּ֖yם vָaָֽrְdְּ׃

46.hebrewText: אֵ֚לֶּה בְּנֵ֣י רָחֵ֔ל אֲשֶׁ֥ר יֻלַּ֖ד לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב כׇּל־נֶ֖פֶשׁ אַרְבָּעָ֥ה עָשָֽׂר׃
46.englishText: These were the descendants of Rachel who were born to Jacob—14 persons in all.
46.transliteration: aֵ֚lֶּh bְּnֵ֣y rָchֵ֔l aֲshֶׁ֥r yֻlַּ֖d lְyַaֲkֹ֑b kׇּl־nֶ֖pֶshׁ aַrְbָּaָ֥h aָshָֽׂr׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵי־דָ֖ן חֻשִֽׁים׃
46.englishText: Dan’s son:*son Heb. “sons.” Hushim.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵy־dָ֖ן chֻshִֽׁyם׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י נַפְתָּלִ֑י יַחְצְאֵ֥ל וְגוּנִ֖י וְיֵ֥צֶר וְשִׁלֵּֽם׃
46.englishText: Naphtali’s sons: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer, and Shillem.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y nַpְtָּlִ֑y yַchְtsְaֵ֥l vְgvּnִ֖y vְyֵ֥tsֶr vְshִׁlֵּֽם׃

46.hebrewText: אֵ֚לֶּה בְּנֵ֣י בִלְהָ֔ה אֲשֶׁר־נָתַ֥ן לָבָ֖ן לְרָחֵ֣ל בִּתּ֑וֹ וַתֵּ֧לֶד אֶת־אֵ֛לֶּה לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב כׇּל־נֶ֥פֶשׁ שִׁבְעָֽה׃
46.englishText: These were the descendants of Bilhah, whom Laban had given to his daughter Rachel. These she bore to Jacob—7 persons in all.
46.transliteration: aֵ֚lֶּh bְּnֵ֣y bִlְhָ֔h aֲshֶׁr־nָtַ֥ן lָbָ֖ן lְrָchֵ֣l bִּtּ֑vֹ vַtֵּ֧lֶd aֶt־aֵ֛lֶּh lְyַaֲkֹ֖b kׇּl־nֶ֥pֶshׁ shִׁbְaָֽh׃

46.hebrewText: כׇּל־הַ֠נֶּ֠פֶשׁ הַבָּאָ֨ה לְיַעֲקֹ֤ב מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ יֹצְאֵ֣י יְרֵכ֔וֹ מִלְּבַ֖ד נְשֵׁ֣י בְנֵי־יַעֲקֹ֑ב כׇּל־נֶ֖פֶשׁ שִׁשִּׁ֥ים וָשֵֽׁשׁ׃
46.englishText: All the persons belonging to Jacob who came to Egypt*who came to Egypt Not including Joseph and Joseph’s two sons. —his own issue, aside from the wives of Jacob’s sons—all these persons numbered 66.
46.transliteration: kׇּl־hַ֠nֶּ֠pֶshׁ hַbָּaָ֨h lְyַaֲkֹ֤b mִtsְrַ֙yְmָh֙ yֹtsְaֵ֣y yְrֵk֔vֹ mִlְּbַ֖d nְshֵׁ֣y bְnֵy־yַaֲkֹ֑b kׇּl־nֶ֖pֶshׁ shִׁshִּׁ֥yם vָshֵֽׁshׁ׃

46.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֥י יוֹסֵ֛ף אֲשֶׁר־יֻלַּד־ל֥וֹ בְמִצְרַ֖יִם נֶ֣פֶשׁ שְׁנָ֑יִם כׇּל־הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ לְבֵֽית־יַעֲקֹ֛ב הַבָּ֥אָה מִצְרַ֖יְמָה שִׁבְעִֽים׃ {ס}
46.englishText: And Joseph’s sons who were born to him in Egypt were two in number. Thus the total of Jacob’s household who came to Egypt was seventy persons.*seventy persons Including Jacob and Joseph.
46.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֥y yvֹsֵ֛ף aֲshֶׁr־yֻlַּd־l֥vֹ bְmִtsְrַ֖yִם nֶ֣pֶshׁ shְׁnָ֑yִם kׇּl־hַnֶּ֧pֶshׁ lְbֵֽyt־yַaֲkֹ֛b hַbָּ֥aָh mִtsְrַ֖yְmָh shִׁbְaִֽyם׃ {s}

46.hebrewText: וְאֶת־יְהוּדָ֞ה שָׁלַ֤ח לְפָנָיו֙ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֔ף לְהוֹרֹ֥ת לְפָנָ֖יו גֹּ֑שְׁנָה וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ אַ֥רְצָה גֹּֽשֶׁן׃
46.englishText: He had sent Judah ahead of him to Joseph, to point the way before him to Goshen. So when they came to the region of Goshen,
46.transliteration: vְaֶt־yְhvּdָ֞h shָׁlַ֤ch lְpָnָyv֙ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֔ף lְhvֹrֹ֥t lְpָnָ֖yv gֹּ֑shְׁnָh vַyָּbֹ֖avּ aַ֥rְtsָh gֹּֽshֶׁן׃

46.hebrewText: וַיֶּאְסֹ֤ר יוֹסֵף֙ מֶרְכַּבְתּ֔וֹ וַיַּ֛עַל לִקְרַֽאת־יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל אָבִ֖יו גֹּ֑שְׁנָה וַיֵּרָ֣א אֵלָ֗יו וַיִּפֹּל֙ עַל־צַוָּארָ֔יו וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ עַל־צַוָּארָ֖יו עֽוֹד׃
46.englishText: Joseph ordered*ordered Lit. “hitched.” his chariot and went to Goshen to meet his father Israel; he presented himself to him and, embracing him around the neck, he wept on his neck a good while.
46.transliteration: vַyֶּaְsֹ֤r yvֹsֵף֙ mֶrְkַּbְtּ֔vֹ vַyַּ֛aַl lִkְrַֽat־yִshְׂrָaֵ֥l aָbִ֖yv gֹּ֑shְׁnָh vַyֵּrָ֣a aֵlָ֗yv vַyִּpֹּl֙ aַl־tsַvָּarָ֔yv vַyֵּ֥bְךְּ aַl־tsַvָּarָ֖yv aֽvֹd׃

46.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל אֶל־יוֹסֵ֖ף אָמ֣וּתָה הַפָּ֑עַם אַחֲרֵי֙ רְאוֹתִ֣י אֶת־פָּנֶ֔יךָ כִּ֥י עוֹדְךָ֖ חָֽי׃
46.englishText: Then Israel said to Joseph, “Now I can die, having seen for myself that you are still alive.”
46.transliteration: vַyֹּ֧amֶr yִshְׂrָaֵ֛l aֶl־yvֹsֵ֖ף aָm֣vּtָh hַpָּ֑aַם aַchֲrֵy֙ rְavֹtִ֣y aֶt־pָּnֶ֔yךָ kִּ֥y avֹdְךָ֖ chָֽy׃

46.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יוֹסֵ֤ף אֶל־אֶחָיו֙ וְאֶל־בֵּ֣ית אָבִ֔יו אֶעֱלֶ֖ה וְאַגִּ֣ידָה לְפַרְעֹ֑ה וְאֹֽמְרָ֣ה אֵלָ֔יו אַחַ֧י וּבֵית־אָבִ֛י אֲשֶׁ֥ר בְּאֶֽרֶץ־כְּנַ֖עַן בָּ֥אוּ אֵלָֽי׃
46.englishText: Then Joseph said to his brothers and to his father’s household, “I will go up and tell the news to Pharaoh, and say to him, ‘My brothers and my father’s household, who were in the land of Canaan, have come to me.
46.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yvֹsֵ֤ף aֶl־aֶchָyv֙ vְaֶl־bֵּ֣yt aָbִ֔yv aֶaֱlֶ֖h vְaַgִּ֣ydָh lְpַrְaֹ֑h vְaֹֽmְrָ֣h aֵlָ֔yv aַchַ֧y vּbֵyt־aָbִ֛y aֲshֶׁ֥r bְּaֶֽrֶץ־kְּnַ֖aַן bָּ֥avּ aֵlָֽy׃

46.hebrewText: וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֙ רֹ֣עֵי צֹ֔אן כִּֽי־אַנְשֵׁ֥י מִקְנֶ֖ה הָי֑וּ וְצֹאנָ֧ם וּבְקָרָ֛ם וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁ֥ר לָהֶ֖ם הֵבִֽיאוּ׃
46.englishText: They happen to be shepherds; they have always been breeders of livestock, and they have brought with them their flocks and herds and all that is theirs.’
46.transliteration: vְhָaֲnָshִׁyם֙ rֹ֣aֵy tsֹ֔aן kִּֽy־aַnְshֵׁ֥y mִkְnֶ֖h hָy֑vּ vְtsֹanָ֧ם vּbְkָrָ֛ם vְkׇl־aֲshֶׁ֥r lָhֶ֖ם hֵbִֽyavּ׃

46.hebrewText: וְהָיָ֕ה כִּֽי־יִקְרָ֥א לָכֶ֖ם פַּרְעֹ֑ה וְאָמַ֖ר מַה־מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶֽם׃
46.englishText: So when Pharaoh summons you and asks, ‘What is your occupation?’
46.transliteration: vְhָyָ֕h kִּֽy־yִkְrָ֥a lָkֶ֖ם pַּrְaֹ֑h vְaָmַ֖r mַh־mַּaֲshֵׂykֶֽם׃

46.hebrewText: וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֗ם אַנְשֵׁ֨י מִקְנֶ֜ה הָי֤וּ עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ מִנְּעוּרֵ֣ינוּ וְעַד־עַ֔תָּה גַּם־אֲנַ֖חְנוּ גַּם־אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ בַּעֲב֗וּר תֵּשְׁבוּ֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ גֹּ֔שֶׁן כִּֽי־תוֹעֲבַ֥ת מִצְרַ֖יִם כׇּל־רֹ֥עֵה צֹֽאן׃
46.englishText: you shall answer, ‘Your servants have been breeders of livestock from the start until now, both we and our fathers’—so that you may stay in the region of Goshen. For all shepherds are abhorrent to Egyptians.”
46.transliteration: vַaֲmַrְtֶּ֗ם aַnְshֵׁ֨y mִkְnֶ֜h hָy֤vּ aֲbָdֶ֙yךָ֙ mִnְּavּrֵ֣ynvּ vְaַd־aַ֔tָּh gַּם־aֲnַ֖chְnvּ gַּם־aֲbֹtֵ֑ynvּ bַּaֲb֗vּr tֵּshְׁbvּ֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ gֹּ֔shֶׁן kִּֽy־tvֹaֲbַ֥t mִtsְrַ֖yִם kׇּl־rֹ֥aֵh tsֹֽaן׃

47.hebrewText: וַיָּבֹ֣א יוֹסֵף֮ וַיַּגֵּ֣ד לְפַרְעֹה֒ וַיֹּ֗אמֶר אָבִ֨י וְאַחַ֜י וְצֹאנָ֤ם וּבְקָרָם֙ וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר לָהֶ֔ם בָּ֖אוּ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן וְהִנָּ֖ם בְּאֶ֥רֶץ גֹּֽשֶׁן׃
47.englishText: Then Joseph came and reported to Pharaoh, saying, “My father and my brothers, with their flocks and herds and all that is theirs, have come from the land of Canaan and are now in the region of Goshen.”
47.transliteration: vַyָּbֹ֣a yvֹsֵף֮ vַyַּgֵּ֣d lְpַrְaֹh֒ vַyֹּ֗amֶr aָbִ֨y vְaַchַ֜y vְtsֹanָ֤ם vּbְkָrָם֙ vְkׇl־aֲshֶׁ֣r lָhֶ֔ם bָּ֖avּ mֵaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן vְhִnָּ֖ם bְּaֶ֥rֶץ gֹּֽshֶׁן׃

47.hebrewText: וּמִקְצֵ֣ה אֶחָ֔יו לָקַ֖ח חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה אֲנָשִׁ֑ים וַיַּצִּגֵ֖ם לִפְנֵ֥י פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: And carefully selecting a few*a few Lit. “five.” of his brothers, he presented them to Pharaoh.
47.transliteration: vּmִkְtsֵ֣h aֶchָ֔yv lָkַ֖ch chֲmִshָּׁ֣h aֲnָshִׁ֑yם vַyַּtsִּgֵ֖ם lִpְnֵ֥y pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר פַּרְעֹ֛ה אֶל־אֶחָ֖יו מַה־מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶ֑ם וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֗ה רֹעֵ֥ה צֹאן֙ עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ גַּם־אֲנַ֖חְנוּ גַּם־אֲבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃
47.englishText: Pharaoh said to his brothers, “What is your occupation?” They answered Pharaoh, “We your servants are shepherds, as were also our fathers.
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֧amֶr pַּrְaֹ֛h aֶl־aֶchָ֖yv mַh־mַּaֲshֵׂykֶ֑ם vַyֹּamְr֣vּ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֗h rֹaֵ֥h tsֹaן֙ aֲbָdֶ֔yךָ gַּם־aֲnַ֖chְnvּ gַּם־aֲbvֹtֵֽynvּ׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֗ה לָג֣וּר בָּאָ֘רֶץ֮ בָּ֒אנוּ֒ כִּי־אֵ֣ין מִרְעֶ֗ה לַצֹּאן֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ כִּֽי־כָבֵ֥ד הָרָעָ֖ב בְּאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן וְעַתָּ֛ה יֵֽשְׁבוּ־נָ֥א עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ בְּאֶ֥רֶץ גֹּֽשֶׁן׃
47.englishText: We have come,” they told Pharaoh, “to sojourn in this land, for there is no pasture for your servants’ flocks, the famine being severe in the land of Canaan. Pray, then, let your servants stay in the region of Goshen.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֣vּ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֗h lָg֣vּr bָּaָ֘rֶץ֮ bָּ֒anvּ֒ kִּy־aֵ֣yן mִrְaֶ֗h lַtsֹּaן֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r lַaֲbָdֶ֔yךָ kִּֽy־kָbֵ֥d hָrָaָ֖b bְּaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן vְaַtָּ֛h yֵֽshְׁbvּ־nָ֥a aֲbָdֶ֖yךָ bְּaֶ֥rֶץ gֹּֽshֶׁן׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר פַּרְעֹ֔ה אֶל־יוֹסֵ֖ף לֵאמֹ֑ר אָבִ֥יךָ וְאַחֶ֖יךָ בָּ֥אוּ אֵלֶֽיךָ׃
47.englishText: Then Pharaoh said to Joseph, “As regards your father and your brothers who have come to you,
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr pַּrְaֹ֔h aֶl־yvֹsֵ֖ף lֵamֹ֑r aָbִ֥yךָ vְaַchֶ֖yךָ bָּ֥avּ aֵlֶֽyךָ׃

47.hebrewText: אֶ֤רֶץ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ לְפָנֶ֣יךָ הִ֔וא בְּמֵיטַ֣ב הָאָ֔רֶץ הוֹשֵׁ֥ב אֶת־אָבִ֖יךָ וְאֶת־אַחֶ֑יךָ יֵשְׁבוּ֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ גֹּ֔שֶׁן וְאִם־יָדַ֗עְתָּ וְיֶשׁ־בָּם֙ אַנְשֵׁי־חַ֔יִל וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ם שָׂרֵ֥י מִקְנֶ֖ה עַל־אֲשֶׁר־לִֽי׃
47.englishText: the land of Egypt is open before you: settle your father and your brothers in the best part of the land; let them stay in the region of Goshen. And if you know some men of ability*men of ability NJPS “capable men.” See the Dictionary under ’ish. among them, put them in charge of my livestock.”
47.transliteration: aֶ֤rֶץ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ lְpָnֶ֣yךָ hִ֔va bְּmֵytַ֣b hָaָ֔rֶץ hvֹshֵׁ֥b aֶt־aָbִ֖yךָ vְaֶt־aַchֶ֑yךָ yֵshְׁbvּ֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ gֹּ֔shֶׁן vְaִם־yָdַ֗aְtָּ vְyֶshׁ־bָּם֙ aַnְshֵׁy־chַ֔yִl vְshַׂmְtָּ֛ם shָׂrֵ֥y mִkְnֶ֖h aַl־aֲshֶׁr־lִֽy׃

47.hebrewText: וַיָּבֵ֤א יוֹסֵף֙ אֶת־יַֽעֲקֹ֣ב אָבִ֔יו וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֖הוּ לִפְנֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֑ה וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ יַעֲקֹ֖ב אֶת־פַּרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: Joseph then brought his father Jacob and presented him to Pharaoh; and Jacob greeted Pharaoh.
47.transliteration: vַyָּbֵ֤a yvֹsֵף֙ aֶt־yַֽaֲkֹ֣b aָbִ֔yv vַyַּֽaֲmִdֵ֖hvּ lִpְnֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֑h vַyְbָ֥rֶךְ yַaֲkֹ֖b aֶt־pַּrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר פַּרְעֹ֖ה אֶֽל־יַעֲקֹ֑ב כַּמָּ֕ה יְמֵ֖י שְׁנֵ֥י חַיֶּֽיךָ׃
47.englishText: Pharaoh asked Jacob, “How many are the years of your life?”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֥amֶr pַּrְaֹ֖h aֶֽl־yַaֲkֹ֑b kַּmָּ֕h yְmֵ֖y shְׁnֵ֥y chַyֶּֽyךָ׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יַעֲקֹב֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֔ה יְמֵי֙ שְׁנֵ֣י מְגוּרַ֔י שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָ֑ה מְעַ֣ט וְרָעִ֗ים הָיוּ֙ יְמֵי֙ שְׁנֵ֣י חַיַּ֔י וְלֹ֣א הִשִּׂ֗יגוּ אֶת־יְמֵי֙ שְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י אֲבֹתַ֔י בִּימֵ֖י מְגוּרֵיהֶֽם׃
47.englishText: And Jacob answered Pharaoh, “The years of my sojourn [on earth] are one hundred and thirty. Few and hard have been the years of my life, nor do they come up to the life spans of my ancestors*ancestors I.e., predecessors in general. Or, with NJPS, “fathers”—taking the “sojourns” to allude specifically to Terah, Abraham, and Isaac as wandering heads of corporate households. Heb. ’avoth. during their sojourns.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yַaֲkֹb֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֔h yְmֵy֙ shְׁnֵ֣y mְgvּrַ֔y shְׁlֹshִׁ֥yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָ֑h mְaַ֣t vְrָaִ֗yם hָyvּ֙ yְmֵy֙ shְׁnֵ֣y chַyַּ֔y vְlֹ֣a hִshִּׂ֗ygvּ aֶt־yְmֵy֙ shְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y aֲbֹtַ֔y bִּymֵ֖y mְgvּrֵyhֶֽם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ יַעֲקֹ֖ב אֶת־פַּרְעֹ֑ה וַיֵּצֵ֖א מִלִּפְנֵ֥י פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: Then Jacob bade Pharaoh farewell, and left Pharaoh’s presence.
47.transliteration: vַyְbָ֥rֶךְ yַaֲkֹ֖b aֶt־pַּrְaֹ֑h vַyֵּtsֵ֖a mִlִּpְnֵ֥y pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב יוֹסֵף֮ אֶת־אָבִ֣יו וְאֶת־אֶחָיו֒ וַיִּתֵּ֨ן לָהֶ֤ם אֲחֻזָּה֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם בְּמֵיטַ֥ב הָאָ֖רֶץ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ רַעְמְסֵ֑ס כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר צִוָּ֥ה פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: So Joseph settled his father and his brothers, giving them holdings in the choicest part of the land of Egypt, in the region of Rameses, as Pharaoh had commanded.
47.transliteration: vַyּvֹshֵׁ֣b yvֹsֵף֮ aֶt־aָbִ֣yv vְaֶt־aֶchָyv֒ vַyִּtֵּ֨ן lָhֶ֤ם aֲchֻzָּh֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם bְּmֵytַ֥b hָaָ֖rֶץ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ rַaְmְsֵ֑s kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r tsִvָּ֥h pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְכַלְכֵּ֤ל יוֹסֵף֙ אֶת־אָבִ֣יו וְאֶת־אֶחָ֔יו וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־בֵּ֣ית אָבִ֑יו לֶ֖חֶם לְפִ֥י הַטָּֽף׃
47.englishText: Joseph sustained his father, and his brothers, and all his father’s household with bread, down to the little ones.
47.transliteration: vַyְkַlְkֵּ֤l yvֹsֵף֙ aֶt־aָbִ֣yv vְaֶt־aֶchָ֔yv vְaֵ֖t kׇּl־bֵּ֣yt aָbִ֑yv lֶ֖chֶם lְpִ֥y hַtָּֽף׃

47.hebrewText: וְלֶ֤חֶם אֵין֙ בְּכׇל־הָאָ֔רֶץ כִּֽי־כָבֵ֥ד הָרָעָ֖ב מְאֹ֑ד וַתֵּ֜לַהּ אֶ֤רֶץ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ וְאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן מִפְּנֵ֖י הָרָעָֽב׃
47.englishText: Now there was no bread in all the world, for the famine was very severe; both the land of Egypt and the land of Canaan languished because of the famine.
47.transliteration: vְlֶ֤chֶם aֵyן֙ bְּkׇl־hָaָ֔rֶץ kִּֽy־kָbֵ֥d hָrָaָ֖b mְaֹ֑d vַtֵּ֜lַhּ aֶ֤rֶץ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ vְaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן mִpְּnֵ֖y hָrָaָֽb׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְלַקֵּ֣ט יוֹסֵ֗ף אֶת־כׇּל־הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ הַנִּמְצָ֤א בְאֶֽרֶץ־מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ וּבְאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן בַּשֶּׁ֖בֶר אֲשֶׁר־הֵ֣ם שֹׁבְרִ֑ים וַיָּבֵ֥א יוֹסֵ֛ף אֶת־הַכֶּ֖סֶף בֵּ֥יתָה פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: Joseph gathered in all the money that was to be found in the land of Egypt and in the land of Canaan, as payment for the rations that were being procured, and Joseph brought the money into Pharaoh’s palace.
47.transliteration: vַyְlַkֵּ֣t yvֹsֵ֗ף aֶt־kׇּl־hַkֶּ֙sֶף֙ hַnִּmְtsָ֤a bְaֶֽrֶץ־mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ vּbְaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן bַּshֶּׁ֖bֶr aֲshֶׁr־hֵ֣ם shֹׁbְrִ֑yם vַyָּbֵ֥a yvֹsֵ֛ף aֶt־hַkֶּ֖sֶף bֵּ֥ytָh pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיִּתֹּ֣ם הַכֶּ֗סֶף מֵאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֘יִם֮ וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֒עַן֒ וַיָּבֹ֩אוּ֩ כׇל־מִצְרַ֨יִם אֶל־יוֹסֵ֤ף לֵאמֹר֙ הָֽבָה־לָּ֣נוּ לֶ֔חֶם וְלָ֥מָּה נָמ֖וּת נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י אָפֵ֖ס כָּֽסֶף׃
47.englishText: And when the money gave out in the land of Egypt and in the land of Canaan, all the Egyptians came to Joseph and said, “Give us bread, lest we die before your very eyes; for the money is gone!”
47.transliteration: vַyִּtֹּ֣ם hַkֶּ֗sֶף mֵaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֘yִם֮ vּmֵaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֒aַן֒ vַyָּbֹ֩avּ֩ kׇl־mִtsְrַ֨yִם aֶl־yvֹsֵ֤ף lֵamֹr֙ hָֽbָh־lָּ֣nvּ lֶ֔chֶם vְlָ֥mָּh nָm֖vּt nֶgְdֶּ֑ךָ kִּ֥y aָpֵ֖s kָּֽsֶף׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יוֹסֵף֙ הָב֣וּ מִקְנֵיכֶ֔ם וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה לָכֶ֖ם בְּמִקְנֵיכֶ֑ם אִם־אָפֵ֖ס כָּֽסֶף׃
47.englishText: And Joseph said, “Bring your livestock, and I will sell to you against your livestock, if the money is gone.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yvֹsֵף֙ hָb֣vּ mִkְnֵykֶ֔ם vְaֶtְּnָ֥h lָkֶ֖ם bְּmִkְnֵykֶ֑ם aִם־aָpֵ֖s kָּֽsֶף׃

47.hebrewText: וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ אֶת־מִקְנֵיהֶם֮ אֶל־יוֹסֵף֒ וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לָהֶם֩ יוֹסֵ֨ף לֶ֜חֶם בַּסּוּסִ֗ים וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה הַצֹּ֛אן וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה הַבָּקָ֖ר וּבַחֲמֹרִ֑ים וַיְנַהֲלֵ֤ם בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ בְּכׇל־מִקְנֵהֶ֔ם בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה הַהִֽוא׃
47.englishText: So they brought their livestock to Joseph, and Joseph gave them bread in exchange for the horses, for the stocks of sheep and cattle, and the asses; thus he provided them with bread that year in exchange for all their livestock.
47.transliteration: vַyָּbִ֣yavּ aֶt־mִkְnֵyhֶם֮ aֶl־yvֹsֵף֒ vַyִּtֵּ֣ן lָhֶם֩ yvֹsֵ֨ף lֶ֜chֶם bַּsּvּsִ֗yם vּbְmִkְnֵ֥h hַtsֹּ֛aן vּbְmִkְnֵ֥h hַbָּkָ֖r vּbַchֲmֹrִ֑yם vַyְnַhֲlֵ֤ם bַּlֶּ֙chֶם֙ bְּkׇl־mִkְnֵhֶ֔ם bַּshָּׁnָ֖h hַhִֽva׃

47.hebrewText: וַתִּתֹּם֮ הַשָּׁנָ֣ה הַהִוא֒ וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ אֵלָ֜יו בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ לוֹ֙ לֹֽא־נְכַחֵ֣ד מֵֽאֲדֹנִ֔י כִּ֚י אִם־תַּ֣ם הַכֶּ֔סֶף וּמִקְנֵ֥ה הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה אֶל־אֲדֹנִ֑י לֹ֤א נִשְׁאַר֙ לִפְנֵ֣י אֲדֹנִ֔י בִּלְתִּ֥י אִם־גְּוִיָּתֵ֖נוּ וְאַדְמָתֵֽנוּ׃
47.englishText: And when that year was ended, they came to him the next year and said to him, “We cannot hide from my lord that, with all the money and animal stocks consigned to my lord, nothing is left at my lord’s disposal save our persons and our farmland.
47.transliteration: vַtִּtֹּם֮ hַshָּׁnָ֣h hַhִva֒ vַyָּbֹ֨avּ aֵlָ֜yv bַּshָּׁnָ֣h hַshֵּׁnִ֗yt vַyֹּ֤amְrvּ lvֹ֙ lֹֽa־nְkַchֵ֣d mֵֽaֲdֹnִ֔y kִּ֚y aִם־tַּ֣ם hַkֶּ֔sֶף vּmִkְnֵ֥h hַbְּhֵmָ֖h aֶl־aֲdֹnִ֑y lֹ֤a nִshְׁaַr֙ lִpְnֵ֣y aֲdֹnִ֔y bִּlְtִּ֥y aִם־gְּvִyָּtֵ֖nvּ vְaַdְmָtֵֽnvּ׃

47.hebrewText: לָ֧מָּה נָמ֣וּת לְעֵינֶ֗יךָ גַּם־אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ גַּ֣ם אַדְמָתֵ֔נוּ קְנֵֽה־אֹתָ֥נוּ וְאֶת־אַדְמָתֵ֖נוּ בַּלָּ֑חֶם וְנִֽהְיֶ֞ה אֲנַ֤חְנוּ וְאַדְמָתֵ֙נוּ֙ עֲבָדִ֣ים לְפַרְעֹ֔ה וְתֶן־זֶ֗רַע וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ וְלֹ֣א נָמ֔וּת וְהָאֲדָמָ֖ה לֹ֥א תֵשָֽׁם׃
47.englishText: Let us not perish before your eyes, both we and our land. Take us and our land in exchange for bread, and we with our land will be serfs to Pharaoh; provide the seed, that we may live and not die, and that the land may not become a waste.”
47.transliteration: lָ֧mָּh nָm֣vּt lְaֵynֶ֗yךָ gַּם־aֲnַ֙chְnvּ֙ gַּ֣ם aַdְmָtֵ֔nvּ kְnֵֽh־aֹtָ֥nvּ vְaֶt־aַdְmָtֵ֖nvּ bַּlָּ֑chֶם vְnִֽhְyֶ֞h aֲnַ֤chְnvּ vְaַdְmָtֵ֙nvּ֙ aֲbָdִ֣yם lְpַrְaֹ֔h vְtֶן־zֶ֗rַa vְnִֽchְyֶh֙ vְlֹ֣a nָm֔vּt vְhָaֲdָmָ֖h lֹ֥a tֵshָֽׁם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיִּ֨קֶן יוֹסֵ֜ף אֶת־כׇּל־אַדְמַ֤ת מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ לְפַרְעֹ֔ה כִּֽי־מָכְר֤וּ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ אִ֣ישׁ שָׂדֵ֔הוּ כִּֽי־חָזַ֥ק עֲלֵהֶ֖ם הָרָעָ֑ב וַתְּהִ֥י הָאָ֖רֶץ לְפַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: So Joseph gained possession of all the farm land of Egypt for Pharaoh, all the Egyptians having sold their fields because the famine was too much for them; thus the land passed over to Pharaoh.
47.transliteration: vַyִּ֨kֶן yvֹsֵ֜ף aֶt־kׇּl־aַdְmַ֤t mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ lְpַrְaֹ֔h kִּֽy־mָkְr֤vּ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ aִ֣yshׁ shָׂdֵ֔hvּ kִּֽy־chָzַ֥k aֲlֵhֶ֖ם hָrָaָ֑b vַtְּhִ֥y hָaָ֖rֶץ lְpַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וְאֶ֨ת־הָעָ֔ם הֶעֱבִ֥יר אֹת֖וֹ לֶעָרִ֑ים מִקְצֵ֥ה גְבוּל־מִצְרַ֖יִם וְעַד־קָצֵֽהוּ׃
47.englishText: And he removed the population town by town,*town by town Meaning of Heb. ’otho le‘arim uncertain. from one end of Egypt’s border to the other.
47.transliteration: vְaֶ֨t־hָaָ֔ם hֶaֱbִ֥yr aֹt֖vֹ lֶaָrִ֑yם mִkְtsֵ֥h gְbvּl־mִtsְrַ֖yִם vְaַd־kָtsֵֽhvּ׃

47.hebrewText: רַ֛ק אַדְמַ֥ת הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים לֹ֣א קָנָ֑ה כִּי֩ חֹ֨ק לַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים מֵאֵ֣ת פַּרְעֹ֗ה וְאָֽכְל֤וּ אֶת־חֻקָּם֙ אֲשֶׁ֨ר נָתַ֤ן לָהֶם֙ פַּרְעֹ֔ה עַל־כֵּ֕ן לֹ֥א מָכְר֖וּ אֶת־אַדְמָתָֽם׃
47.englishText: Only the land of the priests he did not take over, for the priests had an allotment from Pharaoh, and they lived off the allotment which Pharaoh had made to them; therefore they did not sell their land.
47.transliteration: rַ֛k aַdְmַ֥t hַkֹּhֲnִ֖yם lֹ֣a kָnָ֑h kִּy֩ chֹ֨k lַkֹּhֲnִ֜yם mֵaֵ֣t pַּrְaֹ֗h vְaָֽkְl֤vּ aֶt־chֻkָּם֙ aֲshֶׁ֨r nָtַ֤ן lָhֶם֙ pַּrְaֹ֔h aַl־kֵּ֕ן lֹ֥a mָkְr֖vּ aֶt־aַdְmָtָֽם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יוֹסֵף֙ אֶל־הָעָ֔ם הֵן֩ קָנִ֨יתִי אֶתְכֶ֥ם הַיּ֛וֹם וְאֶת־אַדְמַתְכֶ֖ם לְפַרְעֹ֑ה הֵֽא־לָכֶ֣ם זֶ֔רַע וּזְרַעְתֶּ֖ם אֶת־הָאֲדָמָֽה׃
47.englishText: Then Joseph said to the people, “Whereas I have this day acquired you and your land for Pharaoh, here is seed for you to sow the land.
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yvֹsֵף֙ aֶl־hָaָ֔ם hֵן֩ kָnִ֨ytִy aֶtְkֶ֥ם hַyּ֛vֹם vְaֶt־aַdְmַtְkֶ֖ם lְpַrְaֹ֑h hֵֽa־lָkֶ֣ם zֶ֔rַa vּzְrַaְtֶּ֖ם aֶt־hָaֲdָmָֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וְהָיָה֙ בַּתְּבוּאֹ֔ת וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם חֲמִישִׁ֖ית לְפַרְעֹ֑ה וְאַרְבַּ֣ע הַיָּדֹ֡ת יִהְיֶ֣ה לָכֶם֩ לְזֶ֨רַע הַשָּׂדֶ֧ה וּֽלְאׇכְלְכֶ֛ם וְלַאֲשֶׁ֥ר בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֖ם וְלֶאֱכֹ֥ל לְטַפְּכֶֽם׃
47.englishText: And when harvest comes, you shall give one-fifth to Pharaoh, and four-fifths shall be yours as seed for the fields and as food for you and those in your households, and as nourishment for your children.”
47.transliteration: vְhָyָh֙ bַּtְּbvּaֹ֔t vּnְtַtֶּ֥ם chֲmִyshִׁ֖yt lְpַrְaֹ֑h vְaַrְbַּ֣a hַyָּdֹ֡t yִhְyֶ֣h lָkֶם֩ lְzֶ֨rַa hַshָּׂdֶ֧h vּֽlְaׇkְlְkֶ֛ם vְlַaֲshֶׁ֥r bְּbָtֵּykֶ֖ם vְlֶaֱkֹ֥l lְtַpְּkֶֽם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ הֶחֱיִתָ֑נוּ נִמְצָא־חֵן֙ בְּעֵינֵ֣י אֲדֹנִ֔י וְהָיִ֥ינוּ עֲבָדִ֖ים לְפַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: And they said, “You have saved our lives! We are grateful to my lord, and we shall be serfs to Pharaoh.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֖vּ hֶchֱyִtָ֑nvּ nִmְtsָa־chֵן֙ bְּaֵynֵ֣y aֲdֹnִ֔y vְhָyִ֥ynvּ aֲbָdִ֖yם lְpַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיָּ֣שֶׂם אֹתָ֣הּ יוֹסֵ֡ף לְחֹק֩ עַד־הַיּ֨וֹם הַזֶּ֜ה עַל־אַדְמַ֥ת מִצְרַ֛יִם לְפַרְעֹ֖ה לַחֹ֑מֶשׁ רַ֞ק אַדְמַ֤ת הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ לְבַדָּ֔ם לֹ֥א הָיְתָ֖ה לְפַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: And Joseph made it into a land law in Egypt, which is still valid, that a fifth should be Pharaoh’s; only the land of the priests did not become Pharaoh’s.
47.transliteration: vַyָּ֣shֶׂם aֹtָ֣hּ yvֹsֵ֡ף lְchֹk֩ aַd־hַyּ֨vֹם hַzֶּ֜h aַl־aַdְmַ֥t mִtsְrַ֛yִם lְpַrְaֹ֖h lַchֹ֑mֶshׁ rַ֞k aַdְmַ֤t hַkֹּֽhֲnִyם֙ lְbַdָּ֔ם lֹ֥a hָyְtָ֖h lְpַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל בְּאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם בְּאֶ֣רֶץ גֹּ֑שֶׁן וַיֵּאָחֲז֣וּ בָ֔הּ וַיִּפְר֥וּ וַיִּרְבּ֖וּ מְאֹֽד׃
47.englishText: Thus Israel settled in the country of Egypt, in the region of Goshen; they acquired holdings in it, and were fertile and increased greatly.
47.transliteration: vַyֵּ֧shֶׁb yִshְׂrָaֵ֛l bְּaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrַ֖yִם bְּaֶ֣rֶץ gֹּ֑shֶׁן vַyֵּaָchֲz֣vּ bָ֔hּ vַyִּpְr֥vּ vַyִּrְbּ֖vּ mְaֹֽd׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְחִ֤י יַעֲקֹב֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם שְׁבַ֥ע עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה שָׁנָ֑ה וַיְהִ֤י יְמֵֽי־יַעֲקֹב֙ שְׁנֵ֣י חַיָּ֔יו שֶׁ֣בַע שָׁנִ֔ים וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
47.englishText: Jacob lived seventeen years in the land of Egypt, so that the span of Jacob’s life came to one hundred and forty-seven years.
47.transliteration: vַyְchִ֤y yַaֲkֹb֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם shְׁbַ֥a aֶshְׂrֵ֖h shָׁnָ֑h vַyְhִ֤y yְmֵֽy־yַaֲkֹb֙ shְׁnֵ֣y chַyָּ֔yv shֶׁ֣bַa shָׁnִ֔yם vְaַrְbָּaִ֥yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרְב֣וּ יְמֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ לָמוּת֒ וַיִּקְרָ֣א ׀ לִבְנ֣וֹ לְיוֹסֵ֗ף וַיֹּ֤אמֶר לוֹ֙ אִם־נָ֨א מָצָ֤אתִי חֵן֙ בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ שִֽׂים־נָ֥א יָדְךָ֖ תַּ֣חַת יְרֵכִ֑י וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ עִמָּדִי֙ חֶ֣סֶד וֶאֱמֶ֔ת אַל־נָ֥א תִקְבְּרֵ֖נִי בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃
47.englishText: And when the time approached for Israel to die, he summoned his son Joseph and said to him, “Do me this favor, place your hand under my thigh as a pledge of your steadfast loyalty: please do not bury me in Egypt.
47.transliteration: vַyִּkְrְb֣vּ yְmֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵl֮ lָmvּt֒ vַyִּkְrָ֣a ׀ lִbְn֣vֹ lְyvֹsֵ֗ף vַyֹּ֤amֶr lvֹ֙ aִם־nָ֨a mָtsָ֤atִy chֵן֙ bְּaֵynֶ֔yךָ shִֽׂyם־nָ֥a yָdְךָ֖ tַּ֣chַt yְrֵkִ֑y vְaָshִׂ֤ytָ aִmָּdִy֙ chֶ֣sֶd vֶaֱmֶ֔t aַl־nָ֥a tִkְbְּrֵ֖nִy bְּmִtsְrָֽyִם׃

47.hebrewText: וְשָֽׁכַבְתִּי֙ עִם־אֲבֹתַ֔י וּנְשָׂאתַ֙נִי֙ מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם וּקְבַרְתַּ֖נִי בִּקְבֻרָתָ֑ם וַיֹּאמַ֕ר אָנֹכִ֖י אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה כִדְבָרֶֽךָ׃
47.englishText: When I lie down with my ancestors,*ancestors Heb. ’avoth; trad. “fathers.” See the Dictionary under “predecessors.” take me up from Egypt and bury me in their burial-place.” He replied, “I will do as you have spoken.”
47.transliteration: vְshָֽׁkַbְtִּy֙ aִם־aֲbֹtַ֔y vּnְshָׂatַ֙nִy֙ mִmִּtsְrַ֔yִם vּkְbַrְtַּ֖nִy bִּkְbֻrָtָ֑ם vַyֹּamַ֕r aָnֹkִ֖y aֶֽaֱshֶׂ֥h kִdְbָrֶֽךָ׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר הִשָּֽׁבְעָה֙ לִ֔י וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע ל֑וֹ וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל עַל־רֹ֥אשׁ הַמִּטָּֽה׃ {פ}
47.englishText: And he said, “Swear to me.” And he swore to him. Then Israel bowed at the head of the bed.
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֗amֶr hִshָּֽׁbְaָh֙ lִ֔y vַyִּshָּׁbַ֖a l֑vֹ vַyִּshְׁtַּ֥chvּ yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l aַl־rֹ֥ashׁ hַmִּtָּֽh׃ {p}

vayechi.name: Vayechi
vayechi.summary: Jacob's final years, the blessing of Ephraim and Manasseh, Jacob's blessing of his sons, Jacob's death and burial, and Joseph's death.

47.hebrewText: וַיָּבֹ֣א יוֹסֵף֮ וַיַּגֵּ֣ד לְפַרְעֹה֒ וַיֹּ֗אמֶר אָבִ֨י וְאַחַ֜י וְצֹאנָ֤ם וּבְקָרָם֙ וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר לָהֶ֔ם בָּ֖אוּ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן וְהִנָּ֖ם בְּאֶ֥רֶץ גֹּֽשֶׁן׃
47.englishText: Then Joseph came and reported to Pharaoh, saying, “My father and my brothers, with their flocks and herds and all that is theirs, have come from the land of Canaan and are now in the region of Goshen.”
47.transliteration: vַyָּbֹ֣a yvֹsֵף֮ vַyַּgֵּ֣d lְpַrְaֹh֒ vַyֹּ֗amֶr aָbִ֨y vְaַchַ֜y vְtsֹanָ֤ם vּbְkָrָם֙ vְkׇl־aֲshֶׁ֣r lָhֶ֔ם bָּ֖avּ mֵaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן vְhִnָּ֖ם bְּaֶ֥rֶץ gֹּֽshֶׁן׃

47.hebrewText: וּמִקְצֵ֣ה אֶחָ֔יו לָקַ֖ח חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה אֲנָשִׁ֑ים וַיַּצִּגֵ֖ם לִפְנֵ֥י פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: And carefully selecting a few*a few Lit. “five.” of his brothers, he presented them to Pharaoh.
47.transliteration: vּmִkְtsֵ֣h aֶchָ֔yv lָkַ֖ch chֲmִshָּׁ֣h aֲnָshִׁ֑yם vַyַּtsִּgֵ֖ם lִpְnֵ֥y pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר פַּרְעֹ֛ה אֶל־אֶחָ֖יו מַה־מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶ֑ם וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֗ה רֹעֵ֥ה צֹאן֙ עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ גַּם־אֲנַ֖חְנוּ גַּם־אֲבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃
47.englishText: Pharaoh said to his brothers, “What is your occupation?” They answered Pharaoh, “We your servants are shepherds, as were also our fathers.
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֧amֶr pַּrְaֹ֛h aֶl־aֶchָ֖yv mַh־mַּaֲshֵׂykֶ֑ם vַyֹּamְr֣vּ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֗h rֹaֵ֥h tsֹaן֙ aֲbָdֶ֔yךָ gַּם־aֲnַ֖chְnvּ gַּם־aֲbvֹtֵֽynvּ׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֗ה לָג֣וּר בָּאָ֘רֶץ֮ בָּ֒אנוּ֒ כִּי־אֵ֣ין מִרְעֶ֗ה לַצֹּאן֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ כִּֽי־כָבֵ֥ד הָרָעָ֖ב בְּאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן וְעַתָּ֛ה יֵֽשְׁבוּ־נָ֥א עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ בְּאֶ֥רֶץ גֹּֽשֶׁן׃
47.englishText: We have come,” they told Pharaoh, “to sojourn in this land, for there is no pasture for your servants’ flocks, the famine being severe in the land of Canaan. Pray, then, let your servants stay in the region of Goshen.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֣vּ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֗h lָg֣vּr bָּaָ֘rֶץ֮ bָּ֒anvּ֒ kִּy־aֵ֣yן mִrְaֶ֗h lַtsֹּaן֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r lַaֲbָdֶ֔yךָ kִּֽy־kָbֵ֥d hָrָaָ֖b bְּaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן vְaַtָּ֛h yֵֽshְׁbvּ־nָ֥a aֲbָdֶ֖yךָ bְּaֶ֥rֶץ gֹּֽshֶׁן׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר פַּרְעֹ֔ה אֶל־יוֹסֵ֖ף לֵאמֹ֑ר אָבִ֥יךָ וְאַחֶ֖יךָ בָּ֥אוּ אֵלֶֽיךָ׃
47.englishText: Then Pharaoh said to Joseph, “As regards your father and your brothers who have come to you,
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr pַּrְaֹ֔h aֶl־yvֹsֵ֖ף lֵamֹ֑r aָbִ֥yךָ vְaַchֶ֖yךָ bָּ֥avּ aֵlֶֽyךָ׃

47.hebrewText: אֶ֤רֶץ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ לְפָנֶ֣יךָ הִ֔וא בְּמֵיטַ֣ב הָאָ֔רֶץ הוֹשֵׁ֥ב אֶת־אָבִ֖יךָ וְאֶת־אַחֶ֑יךָ יֵשְׁבוּ֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ גֹּ֔שֶׁן וְאִם־יָדַ֗עְתָּ וְיֶשׁ־בָּם֙ אַנְשֵׁי־חַ֔יִל וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ם שָׂרֵ֥י מִקְנֶ֖ה עַל־אֲשֶׁר־לִֽי׃
47.englishText: the land of Egypt is open before you: settle your father and your brothers in the best part of the land; let them stay in the region of Goshen. And if you know some men of ability*men of ability NJPS “capable men.” See the Dictionary under ’ish. among them, put them in charge of my livestock.”
47.transliteration: aֶ֤rֶץ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ lְpָnֶ֣yךָ hִ֔va bְּmֵytַ֣b hָaָ֔rֶץ hvֹshֵׁ֥b aֶt־aָbִ֖yךָ vְaֶt־aַchֶ֑yךָ yֵshְׁbvּ֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ gֹּ֔shֶׁן vְaִם־yָdַ֗aְtָּ vְyֶshׁ־bָּם֙ aַnְshֵׁy־chַ֔yִl vְshַׂmְtָּ֛ם shָׂrֵ֥y mִkְnֶ֖h aַl־aֲshֶׁr־lִֽy׃

47.hebrewText: וַיָּבֵ֤א יוֹסֵף֙ אֶת־יַֽעֲקֹ֣ב אָבִ֔יו וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֖הוּ לִפְנֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֑ה וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ יַעֲקֹ֖ב אֶת־פַּרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: Joseph then brought his father Jacob and presented him to Pharaoh; and Jacob greeted Pharaoh.
47.transliteration: vַyָּbֵ֤a yvֹsֵף֙ aֶt־yַֽaֲkֹ֣b aָbִ֔yv vַyַּֽaֲmִdֵ֖hvּ lִpְnֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֑h vַyְbָ֥rֶךְ yַaֲkֹ֖b aֶt־pַּrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר פַּרְעֹ֖ה אֶֽל־יַעֲקֹ֑ב כַּמָּ֕ה יְמֵ֖י שְׁנֵ֥י חַיֶּֽיךָ׃
47.englishText: Pharaoh asked Jacob, “How many are the years of your life?”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֥amֶr pַּrְaֹ֖h aֶֽl־yַaֲkֹ֑b kַּmָּ֕h yְmֵ֖y shְׁnֵ֥y chַyֶּֽyךָ׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יַעֲקֹב֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֔ה יְמֵי֙ שְׁנֵ֣י מְגוּרַ֔י שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָ֑ה מְעַ֣ט וְרָעִ֗ים הָיוּ֙ יְמֵי֙ שְׁנֵ֣י חַיַּ֔י וְלֹ֣א הִשִּׂ֗יגוּ אֶת־יְמֵי֙ שְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י אֲבֹתַ֔י בִּימֵ֖י מְגוּרֵיהֶֽם׃
47.englishText: And Jacob answered Pharaoh, “The years of my sojourn [on earth] are one hundred and thirty. Few and hard have been the years of my life, nor do they come up to the life spans of my ancestors*ancestors I.e., predecessors in general. Or, with NJPS, “fathers”—taking the “sojourns” to allude specifically to Terah, Abraham, and Isaac as wandering heads of corporate households. Heb. ’avoth. during their sojourns.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yַaֲkֹb֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֔h yְmֵy֙ shְׁnֵ֣y mְgvּrַ֔y shְׁlֹshִׁ֥yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָ֑h mְaַ֣t vְrָaִ֗yם hָyvּ֙ yְmֵy֙ shְׁnֵ֣y chַyַּ֔y vְlֹ֣a hִshִּׂ֗ygvּ aֶt־yְmֵy֙ shְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y aֲbֹtַ֔y bִּymֵ֖y mְgvּrֵyhֶֽם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ יַעֲקֹ֖ב אֶת־פַּרְעֹ֑ה וַיֵּצֵ֖א מִלִּפְנֵ֥י פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: Then Jacob bade Pharaoh farewell, and left Pharaoh’s presence.
47.transliteration: vַyְbָ֥rֶךְ yַaֲkֹ֖b aֶt־pַּrְaֹ֑h vַyֵּtsֵ֖a mִlִּpְnֵ֥y pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב יוֹסֵף֮ אֶת־אָבִ֣יו וְאֶת־אֶחָיו֒ וַיִּתֵּ֨ן לָהֶ֤ם אֲחֻזָּה֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם בְּמֵיטַ֥ב הָאָ֖רֶץ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ רַעְמְסֵ֑ס כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר צִוָּ֥ה פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: So Joseph settled his father and his brothers, giving them holdings in the choicest part of the land of Egypt, in the region of Rameses, as Pharaoh had commanded.
47.transliteration: vַyּvֹshֵׁ֣b yvֹsֵף֮ aֶt־aָbִ֣yv vְaֶt־aֶchָyv֒ vַyִּtֵּ֨ן lָhֶ֤ם aֲchֻzָּh֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם bְּmֵytַ֥b hָaָ֖rֶץ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ rַaְmְsֵ֑s kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r tsִvָּ֥h pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְכַלְכֵּ֤ל יוֹסֵף֙ אֶת־אָבִ֣יו וְאֶת־אֶחָ֔יו וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־בֵּ֣ית אָבִ֑יו לֶ֖חֶם לְפִ֥י הַטָּֽף׃
47.englishText: Joseph sustained his father, and his brothers, and all his father’s household with bread, down to the little ones.
47.transliteration: vַyְkַlְkֵּ֤l yvֹsֵף֙ aֶt־aָbִ֣yv vְaֶt־aֶchָ֔yv vְaֵ֖t kׇּl־bֵּ֣yt aָbִ֑yv lֶ֖chֶם lְpִ֥y hַtָּֽף׃

47.hebrewText: וְלֶ֤חֶם אֵין֙ בְּכׇל־הָאָ֔רֶץ כִּֽי־כָבֵ֥ד הָרָעָ֖ב מְאֹ֑ד וַתֵּ֜לַהּ אֶ֤רֶץ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ וְאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן מִפְּנֵ֖י הָרָעָֽב׃
47.englishText: Now there was no bread in all the world, for the famine was very severe; both the land of Egypt and the land of Canaan languished because of the famine.
47.transliteration: vְlֶ֤chֶם aֵyן֙ bְּkׇl־hָaָ֔rֶץ kִּֽy־kָbֵ֥d hָrָaָ֖b mְaֹ֑d vַtֵּ֜lַhּ aֶ֤rֶץ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ vְaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן mִpְּnֵ֖y hָrָaָֽb׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְלַקֵּ֣ט יוֹסֵ֗ף אֶת־כׇּל־הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ הַנִּמְצָ֤א בְאֶֽרֶץ־מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ וּבְאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֔עַן בַּשֶּׁ֖בֶר אֲשֶׁר־הֵ֣ם שֹׁבְרִ֑ים וַיָּבֵ֥א יוֹסֵ֛ף אֶת־הַכֶּ֖סֶף בֵּ֥יתָה פַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: Joseph gathered in all the money that was to be found in the land of Egypt and in the land of Canaan, as payment for the rations that were being procured, and Joseph brought the money into Pharaoh’s palace.
47.transliteration: vַyְlַkֵּ֣t yvֹsֵ֗ף aֶt־kׇּl־hַkֶּ֙sֶף֙ hַnִּmְtsָ֤a bְaֶֽrֶץ־mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ vּbְaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֔aַן bַּshֶּׁ֖bֶr aֲshֶׁr־hֵ֣ם shֹׁbְrִ֑yם vַyָּbֵ֥a yvֹsֵ֛ף aֶt־hַkֶּ֖sֶף bֵּ֥ytָh pַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיִּתֹּ֣ם הַכֶּ֗סֶף מֵאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֘יִם֮ וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנַ֒עַן֒ וַיָּבֹ֩אוּ֩ כׇל־מִצְרַ֨יִם אֶל־יוֹסֵ֤ף לֵאמֹר֙ הָֽבָה־לָּ֣נוּ לֶ֔חֶם וְלָ֥מָּה נָמ֖וּת נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י אָפֵ֖ס כָּֽסֶף׃
47.englishText: And when the money gave out in the land of Egypt and in the land of Canaan, all the Egyptians came to Joseph and said, “Give us bread, lest we die before your very eyes; for the money is gone!”
47.transliteration: vַyִּtֹּ֣ם hַkֶּ֗sֶף mֵaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֘yִם֮ vּmֵaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnַ֒aַן֒ vַyָּbֹ֩avּ֩ kׇl־mִtsְrַ֨yִם aֶl־yvֹsֵ֤ף lֵamֹr֙ hָֽbָh־lָּ֣nvּ lֶ֔chֶם vְlָ֥mָּh nָm֖vּt nֶgְdֶּ֑ךָ kִּ֥y aָpֵ֖s kָּֽsֶף׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יוֹסֵף֙ הָב֣וּ מִקְנֵיכֶ֔ם וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה לָכֶ֖ם בְּמִקְנֵיכֶ֑ם אִם־אָפֵ֖ס כָּֽסֶף׃
47.englishText: And Joseph said, “Bring your livestock, and I will sell to you against your livestock, if the money is gone.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yvֹsֵף֙ hָb֣vּ mִkְnֵykֶ֔ם vְaֶtְּnָ֥h lָkֶ֖ם bְּmִkְnֵykֶ֑ם aִם־aָpֵ֖s kָּֽsֶף׃

47.hebrewText: וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ אֶת־מִקְנֵיהֶם֮ אֶל־יוֹסֵף֒ וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לָהֶם֩ יוֹסֵ֨ף לֶ֜חֶם בַּסּוּסִ֗ים וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה הַצֹּ֛אן וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה הַבָּקָ֖ר וּבַחֲמֹרִ֑ים וַיְנַהֲלֵ֤ם בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ בְּכׇל־מִקְנֵהֶ֔ם בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה הַהִֽוא׃
47.englishText: So they brought their livestock to Joseph, and Joseph gave them bread in exchange for the horses, for the stocks of sheep and cattle, and the asses; thus he provided them with bread that year in exchange for all their livestock.
47.transliteration: vַyָּbִ֣yavּ aֶt־mִkְnֵyhֶם֮ aֶl־yvֹsֵף֒ vַyִּtֵּ֣ן lָhֶם֩ yvֹsֵ֨ף lֶ֜chֶם bַּsּvּsִ֗yם vּbְmִkְnֵ֥h hַtsֹּ֛aן vּbְmִkְnֵ֥h hַbָּkָ֖r vּbַchֲmֹrִ֑yם vַyְnַhֲlֵ֤ם bַּlֶּ֙chֶם֙ bְּkׇl־mִkְnֵhֶ֔ם bַּshָּׁnָ֖h hַhִֽva׃

47.hebrewText: וַתִּתֹּם֮ הַשָּׁנָ֣ה הַהִוא֒ וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ אֵלָ֜יו בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ לוֹ֙ לֹֽא־נְכַחֵ֣ד מֵֽאֲדֹנִ֔י כִּ֚י אִם־תַּ֣ם הַכֶּ֔סֶף וּמִקְנֵ֥ה הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה אֶל־אֲדֹנִ֑י לֹ֤א נִשְׁאַר֙ לִפְנֵ֣י אֲדֹנִ֔י בִּלְתִּ֥י אִם־גְּוִיָּתֵ֖נוּ וְאַדְמָתֵֽנוּ׃
47.englishText: And when that year was ended, they came to him the next year and said to him, “We cannot hide from my lord that, with all the money and animal stocks consigned to my lord, nothing is left at my lord’s disposal save our persons and our farmland.
47.transliteration: vַtִּtֹּם֮ hַshָּׁnָ֣h hַhִva֒ vַyָּbֹ֨avּ aֵlָ֜yv bַּshָּׁnָ֣h hַshֵּׁnִ֗yt vַyֹּ֤amְrvּ lvֹ֙ lֹֽa־nְkַchֵ֣d mֵֽaֲdֹnִ֔y kִּ֚y aִם־tַּ֣ם hַkֶּ֔sֶף vּmִkְnֵ֥h hַbְּhֵmָ֖h aֶl־aֲdֹnִ֑y lֹ֤a nִshְׁaַr֙ lִpְnֵ֣y aֲdֹnִ֔y bִּlְtִּ֥y aִם־gְּvִyָּtֵ֖nvּ vְaַdְmָtֵֽnvּ׃

47.hebrewText: לָ֧מָּה נָמ֣וּת לְעֵינֶ֗יךָ גַּם־אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ גַּ֣ם אַדְמָתֵ֔נוּ קְנֵֽה־אֹתָ֥נוּ וְאֶת־אַדְמָתֵ֖נוּ בַּלָּ֑חֶם וְנִֽהְיֶ֞ה אֲנַ֤חְנוּ וְאַדְמָתֵ֙נוּ֙ עֲבָדִ֣ים לְפַרְעֹ֔ה וְתֶן־זֶ֗רַע וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ וְלֹ֣א נָמ֔וּת וְהָאֲדָמָ֖ה לֹ֥א תֵשָֽׁם׃
47.englishText: Let us not perish before your eyes, both we and our land. Take us and our land in exchange for bread, and we with our land will be serfs to Pharaoh; provide the seed, that we may live and not die, and that the land may not become a waste.”
47.transliteration: lָ֧mָּh nָm֣vּt lְaֵynֶ֗yךָ gַּם־aֲnַ֙chְnvּ֙ gַּ֣ם aַdְmָtֵ֔nvּ kְnֵֽh־aֹtָ֥nvּ vְaֶt־aַdְmָtֵ֖nvּ bַּlָּ֑chֶם vְnִֽhְyֶ֞h aֲnַ֤chְnvּ vְaַdְmָtֵ֙nvּ֙ aֲbָdִ֣yם lְpַrְaֹ֔h vְtֶן־zֶ֗rַa vְnִֽchְyֶh֙ vְlֹ֣a nָm֔vּt vְhָaֲdָmָ֖h lֹ֥a tֵshָֽׁם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיִּ֨קֶן יוֹסֵ֜ף אֶת־כׇּל־אַדְמַ֤ת מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ לְפַרְעֹ֔ה כִּֽי־מָכְר֤וּ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ אִ֣ישׁ שָׂדֵ֔הוּ כִּֽי־חָזַ֥ק עֲלֵהֶ֖ם הָרָעָ֑ב וַתְּהִ֥י הָאָ֖רֶץ לְפַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: So Joseph gained possession of all the farm land of Egypt for Pharaoh, all the Egyptians having sold their fields because the famine was too much for them; thus the land passed over to Pharaoh.
47.transliteration: vַyִּ֨kֶן yvֹsֵ֜ף aֶt־kׇּl־aַdְmַ֤t mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ lְpַrְaֹ֔h kִּֽy־mָkְr֤vּ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ aִ֣yshׁ shָׂdֵ֔hvּ kִּֽy־chָzַ֥k aֲlֵhֶ֖ם hָrָaָ֑b vַtְּhִ֥y hָaָ֖rֶץ lְpַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וְאֶ֨ת־הָעָ֔ם הֶעֱבִ֥יר אֹת֖וֹ לֶעָרִ֑ים מִקְצֵ֥ה גְבוּל־מִצְרַ֖יִם וְעַד־קָצֵֽהוּ׃
47.englishText: And he removed the population town by town,*town by town Meaning of Heb. ’otho le‘arim uncertain. from one end of Egypt’s border to the other.
47.transliteration: vְaֶ֨t־hָaָ֔ם hֶaֱbִ֥yr aֹt֖vֹ lֶaָrִ֑yם mִkְtsֵ֥h gְbvּl־mִtsְrַ֖yִם vְaַd־kָtsֵֽhvּ׃

47.hebrewText: רַ֛ק אַדְמַ֥ת הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים לֹ֣א קָנָ֑ה כִּי֩ חֹ֨ק לַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים מֵאֵ֣ת פַּרְעֹ֗ה וְאָֽכְל֤וּ אֶת־חֻקָּם֙ אֲשֶׁ֨ר נָתַ֤ן לָהֶם֙ פַּרְעֹ֔ה עַל־כֵּ֕ן לֹ֥א מָכְר֖וּ אֶת־אַדְמָתָֽם׃
47.englishText: Only the land of the priests he did not take over, for the priests had an allotment from Pharaoh, and they lived off the allotment which Pharaoh had made to them; therefore they did not sell their land.
47.transliteration: rַ֛k aַdְmַ֥t hַkֹּhֲnִ֖yם lֹ֣a kָnָ֑h kִּy֩ chֹ֨k lַkֹּhֲnִ֜yם mֵaֵ֣t pַּrְaֹ֗h vְaָֽkְl֤vּ aֶt־chֻkָּם֙ aֲshֶׁ֨r nָtַ֤ן lָhֶם֙ pַּrְaֹ֔h aַl־kֵּ֕ן lֹ֥a mָkְr֖vּ aֶt־aַdְmָtָֽם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יוֹסֵף֙ אֶל־הָעָ֔ם הֵן֩ קָנִ֨יתִי אֶתְכֶ֥ם הַיּ֛וֹם וְאֶת־אַדְמַתְכֶ֖ם לְפַרְעֹ֑ה הֵֽא־לָכֶ֣ם זֶ֔רַע וּזְרַעְתֶּ֖ם אֶת־הָאֲדָמָֽה׃
47.englishText: Then Joseph said to the people, “Whereas I have this day acquired you and your land for Pharaoh, here is seed for you to sow the land.
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yvֹsֵף֙ aֶl־hָaָ֔ם hֵן֩ kָnִ֨ytִy aֶtְkֶ֥ם hַyּ֛vֹם vְaֶt־aַdְmַtְkֶ֖ם lְpַrְaֹ֑h hֵֽa־lָkֶ֣ם zֶ֔rַa vּzְrַaְtֶּ֖ם aֶt־hָaֲdָmָֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וְהָיָה֙ בַּתְּבוּאֹ֔ת וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם חֲמִישִׁ֖ית לְפַרְעֹ֑ה וְאַרְבַּ֣ע הַיָּדֹ֡ת יִהְיֶ֣ה לָכֶם֩ לְזֶ֨רַע הַשָּׂדֶ֧ה וּֽלְאׇכְלְכֶ֛ם וְלַאֲשֶׁ֥ר בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֖ם וְלֶאֱכֹ֥ל לְטַפְּכֶֽם׃
47.englishText: And when harvest comes, you shall give one-fifth to Pharaoh, and four-fifths shall be yours as seed for the fields and as food for you and those in your households, and as nourishment for your children.”
47.transliteration: vְhָyָh֙ bַּtְּbvּaֹ֔t vּnְtַtֶּ֥ם chֲmִyshִׁ֖yt lְpַrְaֹ֑h vְaַrְbַּ֣a hַyָּdֹ֡t yִhְyֶ֣h lָkֶם֩ lְzֶ֨rַa hַshָּׂdֶ֧h vּֽlְaׇkְlְkֶ֛ם vְlַaֲshֶׁ֥r bְּbָtֵּykֶ֖ם vְlֶaֱkֹ֥l lְtַpְּkֶֽם׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ הֶחֱיִתָ֑נוּ נִמְצָא־חֵן֙ בְּעֵינֵ֣י אֲדֹנִ֔י וְהָיִ֥ינוּ עֲבָדִ֖ים לְפַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: And they said, “You have saved our lives! We are grateful to my lord, and we shall be serfs to Pharaoh.”
47.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֖vּ hֶchֱyִtָ֑nvּ nִmְtsָa־chֵן֙ bְּaֵynֵ֣y aֲdֹnִ֔y vְhָyִ֥ynvּ aֲbָdִ֖yם lְpַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיָּ֣שֶׂם אֹתָ֣הּ יוֹסֵ֡ף לְחֹק֩ עַד־הַיּ֨וֹם הַזֶּ֜ה עַל־אַדְמַ֥ת מִצְרַ֛יִם לְפַרְעֹ֖ה לַחֹ֑מֶשׁ רַ֞ק אַדְמַ֤ת הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ לְבַדָּ֔ם לֹ֥א הָיְתָ֖ה לְפַרְעֹֽה׃
47.englishText: And Joseph made it into a land law in Egypt, which is still valid, that a fifth should be Pharaoh’s; only the land of the priests did not become Pharaoh’s.
47.transliteration: vַyָּ֣shֶׂם aֹtָ֣hּ yvֹsֵ֡ף lְchֹk֩ aַd־hַyּ֨vֹם hַzֶּ֜h aַl־aַdְmַ֥t mִtsְrַ֛yִם lְpַrְaֹ֖h lַchֹ֑mֶshׁ rַ֞k aַdְmַ֤t hַkֹּֽhֲnִyם֙ lְbַdָּ֔ם lֹ֥a hָyְtָ֖h lְpַrְaֹֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל בְּאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם בְּאֶ֣רֶץ גֹּ֑שֶׁן וַיֵּאָחֲז֣וּ בָ֔הּ וַיִּפְר֥וּ וַיִּרְבּ֖וּ מְאֹֽד׃
47.englishText: Thus Israel settled in the country of Egypt, in the region of Goshen; they acquired holdings in it, and were fertile and increased greatly.
47.transliteration: vַyֵּ֧shֶׁb yִshְׂrָaֵ֛l bְּaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrַ֖yִם bְּaֶ֣rֶץ gֹּ֑shֶׁן vַyֵּaָchֲz֣vּ bָ֔hּ vַyִּpְr֥vּ vַyִּrְbּ֖vּ mְaֹֽd׃

47.hebrewText: וַיְחִ֤י יַעֲקֹב֙ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם שְׁבַ֥ע עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה שָׁנָ֑ה וַיְהִ֤י יְמֵֽי־יַעֲקֹב֙ שְׁנֵ֣י חַיָּ֔יו שֶׁ֣בַע שָׁנִ֔ים וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
47.englishText: Jacob lived seventeen years in the land of Egypt, so that the span of Jacob’s life came to one hundred and forty-seven years.
47.transliteration: vַyְchִ֤y yַaֲkֹb֙ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם shְׁbַ֥a aֶshְׂrֵ֖h shָׁnָ֑h vַyְhִ֤y yְmֵֽy־yַaֲkֹb֙ shְׁnֵ֣y chַyָּ֔yv shֶׁ֣bַa shָׁnִ֔yם vְaַrְbָּaִ֥yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

47.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרְב֣וּ יְמֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ לָמוּת֒ וַיִּקְרָ֣א ׀ לִבְנ֣וֹ לְיוֹסֵ֗ף וַיֹּ֤אמֶר לוֹ֙ אִם־נָ֨א מָצָ֤אתִי חֵן֙ בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ שִֽׂים־נָ֥א יָדְךָ֖ תַּ֣חַת יְרֵכִ֑י וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ עִמָּדִי֙ חֶ֣סֶד וֶאֱמֶ֔ת אַל־נָ֥א תִקְבְּרֵ֖נִי בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃
47.englishText: And when the time approached for Israel to die, he summoned his son Joseph and said to him, “Do me this favor, place your hand under my thigh as a pledge of your steadfast loyalty: please do not bury me in Egypt.
47.transliteration: vַyִּkְrְb֣vּ yְmֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵl֮ lָmvּt֒ vַyִּkְrָ֣a ׀ lִbְn֣vֹ lְyvֹsֵ֗ף vַyֹּ֤amֶr lvֹ֙ aִם־nָ֨a mָtsָ֤atִy chֵן֙ bְּaֵynֶ֔yךָ shִֽׂyם־nָ֥a yָdְךָ֖ tַּ֣chַt yְrֵkִ֑y vְaָshִׂ֤ytָ aִmָּdִy֙ chֶ֣sֶd vֶaֱmֶ֔t aַl־nָ֥a tִkְbְּrֵ֖nִy bְּmִtsְrָֽyִם׃

47.hebrewText: וְשָֽׁכַבְתִּי֙ עִם־אֲבֹתַ֔י וּנְשָׂאתַ֙נִי֙ מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם וּקְבַרְתַּ֖נִי בִּקְבֻרָתָ֑ם וַיֹּאמַ֕ר אָנֹכִ֖י אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה כִדְבָרֶֽךָ׃
47.englishText: When I lie down with my ancestors,*ancestors Heb. ’avoth; trad. “fathers.” See the Dictionary under “predecessors.” take me up from Egypt and bury me in their burial-place.” He replied, “I will do as you have spoken.”
47.transliteration: vְshָֽׁkַbְtִּy֙ aִם־aֲbֹtַ֔y vּnְshָׂatַ֙nִy֙ mִmִּtsְrַ֔yִם vּkְbַrְtַּ֖nִy bִּkְbֻrָtָ֑ם vַyֹּamַ֕r aָnֹkִ֖y aֶֽaֱshֶׂ֥h kִdְbָrֶֽךָ׃

47.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר הִשָּֽׁבְעָה֙ לִ֔י וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע ל֑וֹ וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל עַל־רֹ֥אשׁ הַמִּטָּֽה׃ {פ}
47.englishText: And he said, “Swear to me.” And he swore to him. Then Israel bowed at the head of the bed.
47.transliteration: vַyֹּ֗amֶr hִshָּֽׁbְaָh֙ lִ֔y vַyִּshָּׁbַ֖a l֑vֹ vַyִּshְׁtַּ֥chvּ yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l aַl־rֹ֥ashׁ hַmִּtָּֽh׃ {p}

48.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י אַחֲרֵי֙ הַדְּבָרִ֣ים הָאֵ֔לֶּה וַיֹּ֣אמֶר לְיוֹסֵ֔ף הִנֵּ֥ה אָבִ֖יךָ חֹלֶ֑ה וַיִּקַּ֞ח אֶת־שְׁנֵ֤י בָנָיו֙ עִמּ֔וֹ אֶת־מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה וְאֶת־אֶפְרָֽיִם׃
48.englishText: Some time afterward, Joseph was told, “Your father is ill.” So he took with him his two sons, Manasseh and Ephraim.
48.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y aַchֲrֵy֙ hַdְּbָrִ֣yם hָaֵ֔lֶּh vַyֹּ֣amֶr lְyvֹsֵ֔ף hִnֵּ֥h aָbִ֖yךָ chֹlֶ֑h vַyִּkַּ֞ch aֶt־shְׁnֵ֤y bָnָyv֙ aִmּ֔vֹ aֶt־mְnַshֶּׁ֖h vְaֶt־aֶpְrָֽyִם׃

48.hebrewText: וַיַּגֵּ֣ד לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב וַיֹּ֕אמֶר הִנֵּ֛ה בִּנְךָ֥ יוֹסֵ֖ף בָּ֣א אֵלֶ֑יךָ וַיִּתְחַזֵּק֙ יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב עַל־הַמִּטָּֽה׃
48.englishText: When Jacob was told, “Your son Joseph has come to see you,” Israel summoned his strength and sat up in bed.
48.transliteration: vַyַּgֵּ֣d lְyַaֲkֹ֔b vַyֹּ֕amֶr hִnֵּ֛h bִּnְךָ֥ yvֹsֵ֖ף bָּ֣a aֵlֶ֑yךָ vַyִּtְchַzֵּk֙ yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l vַyֵּ֖shֶׁb aַl־hַmִּtָּֽh׃

48.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יַעֲקֹב֙ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֔ף אֵ֥ל שַׁדַּ֛י נִרְאָֽה־אֵלַ֥י בְּל֖וּז בְּאֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ אֹתִֽי׃
48.englishText: And Jacob said to Joseph, “El Shaddai, who appeared to me at Luz in the land of Canaan, blessed me—
48.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yַaֲkֹb֙ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֔ף aֵ֥l shַׁdַּ֛y nִrְaָֽh־aֵlַ֥y bְּl֖vּz bְּaֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן vַyְbָ֖rֶךְ aֹtִֽy׃

48.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר אֵלַ֗י הִנְנִ֤י מַפְרְךָ֙ וְהִרְבִּיתִ֔ךָ וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ לִקְהַ֣ל עַמִּ֑ים וְנָ֨תַתִּ֜י אֶת־הָאָ֧רֶץ הַזֹּ֛את לְזַרְעֲךָ֥ אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ אֲחֻזַּ֥ת עוֹלָֽם׃
48.englishText: and said to me, ‘I will make you fertile and numerous, making of you a community of peoples; and I will assign this land to your offspring to come for an everlasting possession.’
48.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr aֵlַ֗y hִnְnִ֤y mַpְrְךָ֙ vְhִrְbִּytִ֔ךָ vּnְtַtִּ֖yךָ lִkְhַ֣l aַmִּ֑yם vְnָ֨tַtִּ֜y aֶt־hָaָ֧rֶץ hַzֹּ֛at lְzַrְaֲךָ֥ aַchֲrֶ֖yךָ aֲchֻzַּ֥t avֹlָֽם׃

48.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֡ה שְׁנֵֽי־בָנֶ֩יךָ֩ הַנּוֹלָדִ֨ים לְךָ֜ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֗יִם עַד־בֹּאִ֥י אֵלֶ֛יךָ מִצְרַ֖יְמָה לִי־הֵ֑ם אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ וּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה כִּרְאוּבֵ֥ן וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן יִֽהְיוּ־לִֽי׃
48.englishText: Now, your two sons, who were born to you in the land of Egypt before I came to you in Egypt, shall be mine; Ephraim and Manasseh shall be mine no less than Reuben and Simeon.
48.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֡h shְׁnֵֽy־bָnֶ֩yךָ֩ hַnּvֹlָdִ֨yם lְךָ֜ bְּaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֗yִם aַd־bֹּaִ֥y aֵlֶ֛yךָ mִtsְrַ֖yְmָh lִy־hֵ֑ם aֶpְrַ֙yִם֙ vּmְnַshֶּׁ֔h kִּrְavּbֵ֥ן vְshִׁmְa֖vֹן yִֽhְyvּ־lִֽy׃

48.hebrewText: וּמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֛ אֲשֶׁר־הוֹלַ֥דְתָּ אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם לְךָ֣ יִהְי֑וּ עַ֣ל שֵׁ֧ם אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם יִקָּרְא֖וּ בְּנַחֲלָתָֽם׃
48.englishText: But progeny born to you after them shall be yours; they shall be recorded instead*instead Lit. “under the name.” of their brothers in their inheritance.
48.transliteration: vּmvֹlַdְtְּךָ֛ aֲshֶׁr־hvֹlַ֥dְtָּ aַchֲrֵyhֶ֖ם lְךָ֣ yִhְy֑vּ aַ֣l shֵׁ֧ם aֲchֵyhֶ֛ם yִkָּrְa֖vּ bְּnַchֲlָtָֽם׃

48.hebrewText: וַאֲנִ֣י ׀ בְּבֹאִ֣י מִפַּדָּ֗ן מֵ֩תָה֩ עָלַ֨י רָחֵ֜ל בְּאֶ֤רֶץ כְּנַ֙עַן֙ בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ בְּע֥וֹד כִּבְרַת־אֶ֖רֶץ לָבֹ֣א אֶפְרָ֑תָה וָאֶקְבְּרֶ֤הָ שָּׁם֙ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ אֶפְרָ֔ת הִ֖וא בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃
48.englishText: I [do this because], when I was returning from Paddan, Rachel died, to my sorrow, while I was journeying in the land of Canaan, when still some distance short of Ephrath; and I buried her there on the road to Ephrath”—now Bethlehem.
48.transliteration: vַaֲnִ֣y ׀ bְּbֹaִ֣y mִpַּdָּ֗ן mֵ֩tָh֩ aָlַ֨y rָchֵ֜l bְּaֶ֤rֶץ kְּnַ֙aַן֙ bַּdֶּ֔rֶךְ bְּa֥vֹd kִּbְrַt־aֶ֖rֶץ lָbֹ֣a aֶpְrָ֑tָh vָaֶkְbְּrֶ֤hָ shָּׁם֙ bְּdֶ֣rֶךְ aֶpְrָ֔t hִ֖va bֵּ֥yt lָֽchֶם׃

48.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥רְא יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל אֶת־בְּנֵ֣י יוֹסֵ֑ף וַיֹּ֖אמֶר מִי־אֵֽלֶּה׃
48.englishText: Noticing Joseph’s sons, Israel asked, “Who are these?”
48.transliteration: vַyַּ֥rְa yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l aֶt־bְּnֵ֣y yvֹsֵ֑ף vַyֹּ֖amֶr mִy־aֵֽlֶּh׃

48.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יוֹסֵף֙ אֶל־אָבִ֔יו בָּנַ֣י הֵ֔ם אֲשֶׁר־נָֽתַן־לִ֥י אֱלֹהִ֖ים בָּזֶ֑ה וַיֹּאמַ֕ר קָֽחֶם־נָ֥א אֵלַ֖י וַאֲבָרְכֵֽם׃
48.englishText: And Joseph said to his father, “They are my sons, whom God has given me here.” “Bring them up to me,” he said, “that I may bless them.”
48.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yvֹsֵף֙ aֶl־aָbִ֔yv bָּnַ֣y hֵ֔ם aֲshֶׁr־nָֽtַן־lִ֥y aֱlֹhִ֖yם bָּzֶ֑h vַyֹּamַ֕r kָֽchֶם־nָ֥a aֵlַ֖y vַaֲbָrְkֵֽם׃

48.hebrewText: וְעֵינֵ֤י יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ כָּבְד֣וּ מִזֹּ֔קֶן לֹ֥א יוּכַ֖ל לִרְא֑וֹת וַיַּגֵּ֤שׁ אֹתָם֙ אֵלָ֔יו וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק לָהֶ֖ם וַיְחַבֵּ֥ק לָהֶֽם׃
48.englishText: Now Israel’s eyes were dim with age; he could not see. So [Joseph] brought them close to him, and he kissed them and embraced them.
48.transliteration: vְaֵynֵ֤y yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ kָּbְd֣vּ mִzֹּ֔kֶן lֹ֥a yvּkַ֖l lִrְa֑vֹt vַyַּgֵּ֤shׁ aֹtָם֙ aֵlָ֔yv vַyִּshַּׁ֥k lָhֶ֖ם vַyְchַbֵּ֥k lָhֶֽם׃

48.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֔ף רְאֹ֥ה פָנֶ֖יךָ לֹ֣א פִלָּ֑לְתִּי וְהִנֵּ֨ה הֶרְאָ֥ה אֹתִ֛י אֱלֹהִ֖ים גַּ֥ם אֶת־זַרְעֶֽךָ׃
48.englishText: And Israel said to Joseph, “I never expected to see you again, and here God has let me see your children as well.”
48.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֔ף rְaֹ֥h pָnֶ֖yךָ lֹ֣a pִlָּ֑lְtִּy vְhִnֵּ֨h hֶrְaָ֥h aֹtִ֛y aֱlֹhִ֖yם gַּ֥ם aֶt־zַrְaֶֽךָ׃

48.hebrewText: וַיּוֹצֵ֥א יוֹסֵ֛ף אֹתָ֖ם מֵעִ֣ם בִּרְכָּ֑יו וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ לְאַפָּ֖יו אָֽרְצָה׃
48.englishText: Joseph then removed them from his knees, and bowed low with his face to the ground.
48.transliteration: vַyּvֹtsֵ֥a yvֹsֵ֛ף aֹtָ֖ם mֵaִ֣ם bִּrְkָּ֑yv vַyִּshְׁtַּ֥chvּ lְaַpָּ֖yv aָֽrְtsָh׃

48.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֣ח יוֹסֵף֮ אֶת־שְׁנֵיהֶם֒ אֶת־אֶפְרַ֤יִם בִּֽימִינוֹ֙ מִשְּׂמֹ֣אל יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל וְאֶת־מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה בִשְׂמֹאל֖וֹ מִימִ֣ין יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל וַיַּגֵּ֖שׁ אֵלָֽיו׃
48.englishText: Joseph took the two of them, Ephraim with his right hand—to Israel’s left—and Manasseh with his left hand—to Israel’s right—and brought them close to him.
48.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֣ch yvֹsֵף֮ aֶt־shְׁnֵyhֶם֒ aֶt־aֶpְrַ֤yִם bִּֽymִynvֹ֙ mִshְּׂmֹ֣al yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l vְaֶt־mְnַshֶּׁ֥h bִshְׂmֹal֖vֹ mִymִ֣yן yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l vַyַּgֵּ֖shׁ aֵlָֽyv׃

48.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל אֶת־יְמִינ֜וֹ וַיָּ֨שֶׁת עַל־רֹ֤אשׁ אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ וְה֣וּא הַצָּעִ֔יר וְאֶת־שְׂמֹאל֖וֹ עַל־רֹ֣אשׁ מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה שִׂכֵּל֙ אֶת־יָדָ֔יו כִּ֥י מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה הַבְּכֽוֹר׃
48.englishText: But Israel stretched out his right hand and laid it on Ephraim’s head, though he was the younger, and his left hand on Manasseh’s head—thus crossing his hands—although Manasseh was the first-born.
48.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁlַch֩ yִshְׂrָaֵ֨l aֶt־yְmִyn֜vֹ vַyָּ֨shֶׁt aַl־rֹ֤ashׁ aֶpְrַ֙yִם֙ vְh֣vּa hַtsָּaִ֔yr vְaֶt־shְׂmֹal֖vֹ aַl־rֹ֣ashׁ mְnַshֶּׁ֑h shִׂkֵּl֙ aֶt־yָdָ֔yv kִּ֥y mְnַshֶּׁ֖h hַbְּkֽvֹr׃

48.hebrewText: וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ אֶת־יוֹסֵ֖ף וַיֹּאמַ֑ר הָֽאֱלֹהִ֡ים אֲשֶׁר֩ הִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ אֲבֹתַ֤י לְפָנָיו֙ אַבְרָהָ֣ם וְיִצְחָ֔ק הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ הָרֹעֶ֣ה אֹתִ֔י מֵעוֹדִ֖י עַד־הַיּ֥וֹם הַזֶּֽה׃
48.englishText:
And he blessed Joseph, saying,
“The God in whose ways my fathers Abraham and Isaac walked,
The God who has been my shepherd from my birth to this day—
48.transliteration: vַyְbָ֥rֶךְ aֶt־yvֹsֵ֖ף vַyֹּamַ֑r hָֽaֱlֹhִ֡yם aֲshֶׁr֩ hִtְhַlְּk֨vּ aֲbֹtַ֤y lְpָnָyv֙ aַbְrָhָ֣ם vְyִtsְchָ֔k hָֽaֱlֹhִyם֙ hָrֹaֶ֣h aֹtִ֔y mֵavֹdִ֖y aַd־hַyּ֥vֹם hַzֶּֽh׃

48.hebrewText: הַמַּלְאָךְ֩ הַגֹּאֵ֨ל אֹתִ֜י מִכׇּל־רָ֗ע יְבָרֵךְ֮ אֶת־הַנְּעָרִים֒ וְיִקָּרֵ֤א בָהֶם֙ שְׁמִ֔י וְשֵׁ֥ם אֲבֹתַ֖י אַבְרָהָ֣ם וְיִצְחָ֑ק וְיִדְגּ֥וּ לָרֹ֖ב בְּקֶ֥רֶב הָאָֽרֶץ׃
48.englishText:
The Messenger who has redeemed me from all harm—
Bless the lads.
In them may my name be recalled,
And the names of my fathers Abraham and Isaac,
And may they be teeming multitudes upon the earth.”
48.transliteration: hַmַּlְaָךְ֩ hַgֹּaֵ֨l aֹtִ֜y mִkׇּl־rָ֗a yְbָrֵךְ֮ aֶt־hַnְּaָrִyם֒ vְyִkָּrֵ֤a bָhֶם֙ shְׁmִ֔y vְshֵׁ֥ם aֲbֹtַ֖y aַbְrָhָ֣ם vְyִtsְchָ֑k vְyִdְgּ֥vּ lָrֹ֖b bְּkֶ֥rֶb hָaָֽrֶץ׃

48.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣רְא יוֹסֵ֗ף כִּי־יָשִׁ֨ית אָבִ֧יו יַד־יְמִינ֛וֹ עַל־רֹ֥אשׁ אֶפְרַ֖יִם וַיֵּ֣רַע בְּעֵינָ֑יו וַיִּתְמֹ֣ךְ יַד־אָבִ֗יו לְהָסִ֥יר אֹתָ֛הּ מֵעַ֥ל רֹאשׁ־אֶפְרַ֖יִם עַל־רֹ֥אשׁ מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃
48.englishText: When Joseph saw that his father was placing his right hand on Ephraim’s head, he thought it wrong; so he took hold of his father’s hand to move it from Ephraim’s head to Manasseh’s.
48.transliteration: vַyַּ֣rְa yvֹsֵ֗ף kִּy־yָshִׁ֨yt aָbִ֧yv yַd־yְmִyn֛vֹ aַl־rֹ֥ashׁ aֶpְrַ֖yִם vַyֵּ֣rַa bְּaֵynָ֑yv vַyִּtְmֹ֣ךְ yַd־aָbִ֗yv lְhָsִ֥yr aֹtָ֛hּ mֵaַ֥l rֹashׁ־aֶpְrַ֖yִם aַl־rֹ֥ashׁ mְnַshֶּֽׁh׃

48.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר יוֹסֵ֛ף אֶל־אָבִ֖יו לֹא־כֵ֣ן אָבִ֑י כִּי־זֶ֣ה הַבְּכֹ֔ר שִׂ֥ים יְמִינְךָ֖ עַל־רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃
48.englishText: “Not so, Father,” Joseph said to his father, “for the other is the first-born; place your right hand on his head.”
48.transliteration: vַyֹּ֧amֶr yvֹsֵ֛ף aֶl־aָbִ֖yv lֹa־kֵ֣ן aָbִ֑y kִּy־zֶ֣h hַbְּkֹ֔r shִׂ֥yם yְmִynְךָ֖ aַl־rֹashֽׁvֹ׃

48.hebrewText: וַיְמָאֵ֣ן אָבִ֗יו וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ יָדַ֤עְתִּֽי בְנִי֙ יָדַ֔עְתִּי גַּם־ה֥וּא יִֽהְיֶה־לְּעָ֖ם וְגַם־ה֣וּא יִגְדָּ֑ל וְאוּלָ֗ם אָחִ֤יו הַקָּטֹן֙ יִגְדַּ֣ל מִמֶּ֔נּוּ וְזַרְע֖וֹ יִהְיֶ֥ה מְלֹֽא־הַגּוֹיִֽם׃
48.englishText: But his father objected, saying, “I know, my son, I know. He too shall become a people, and he too shall be great. Yet his younger brother shall be greater than he, and his offspring shall be plentiful enough for nations.”
48.transliteration: vַyְmָaֵ֣ן aָbִ֗yv vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ yָdַ֤aְtִּֽy bְnִy֙ yָdַ֔aְtִּy gַּם־h֥vּa yִֽhְyֶh־lְּaָ֖ם vְgַם־h֣vּa yִgְdָּ֑l vְavּlָ֗ם aָchִ֤yv hַkָּtֹן֙ yִgְdַּ֣l mִmֶּ֔nּvּ vְzַrְa֖vֹ yִhְyֶ֥h mְlֹֽa־hַgּvֹyִֽם׃

48.hebrewText: וַיְבָ֨רְכֵ֜ם בַּיּ֣וֹם הַהוּא֮ לֵאמוֹר֒ בְּךָ֗ יְבָרֵ֤ךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר יְשִֽׂמְךָ֣ אֱלֹהִ֔ים כְּאֶפְרַ֖יִם וְכִמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה וַיָּ֥שֶׂם אֶת־אֶפְרַ֖יִם לִפְנֵ֥י מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃
48.englishText: So he blessed them that day, saying, “By you shall Israel invoke blessings, saying: God make you like Ephraim and Manasseh.” Thus he put Ephraim before Manasseh.
48.transliteration: vַyְbָ֨rְkֵ֜ם bַּyּ֣vֹם hַhvּa֮ lֵamvֹr֒ bְּךָ֗ yְbָrֵ֤ךְ yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ lֵamֹ֔r yְshִֽׂmְךָ֣ aֱlֹhִ֔yם kְּaֶpְrַ֖yִם vְkִmְnַshֶּׁ֑h vַyָּ֥shֶׂם aֶt־aֶpְrַ֖yִם lִpְnֵ֥y mְnַshֶּֽׁh׃

48.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ אֶל־יוֹסֵ֔ף הִנֵּ֥ה אָנֹכִ֖י מֵ֑ת וְהָיָ֤ה אֱלֹהִים֙ עִמָּכֶ֔ם וְהֵשִׁ֣יב אֶתְכֶ֔ם אֶל־אֶ֖רֶץ אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃
48.englishText: Then Israel said to Joseph, “I am about to die; but God will be with you and bring you back to the land of your ancestors.
48.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ aֶl־yvֹsֵ֔ף hִnֵּ֥h aָnֹkִ֖y mֵ֑t vְhָyָ֤h aֱlֹhִyם֙ aִmָּkֶ֔ם vְhֵshִׁ֣yb aֶtְkֶ֔ם aֶl־aֶ֖rֶץ aֲbֹtֵykֶֽם׃

48.hebrewText: וַאֲנִ֞י נָתַ֧תִּֽי לְךָ֛ שְׁכֶ֥ם אַחַ֖ד עַל־אַחֶ֑יךָ אֲשֶׁ֤ר לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ מִיַּ֣ד הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י בְּחַרְבִּ֖י וּבְקַשְׁתִּֽי׃ {פ}
48.englishText: And now, I assign to you one portion*portion Meaning of Heb. shekhem uncertain; others “mountain slope.” more than to your brothers, which I wrested from the Amorites with my sword and bow.”
48.transliteration: vַaֲnִ֞y nָtַ֧tִּֽy lְךָ֛ shְׁkֶ֥ם aַchַ֖d aַl־aַchֶ֑yךָ aֲshֶׁ֤r lָkַ֙chְtִּy֙ mִyַּ֣d hָֽaֱmֹrִ֔y bְּchַrְbִּ֖y vּbְkַshְׁtִּֽy׃ {p}

49.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרָ֥א יַעֲקֹ֖ב אֶל־בָּנָ֑יו וַיֹּ֗אמֶר הֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ וְאַגִּ֣ידָה לָכֶ֔ם אֵ֛ת אֲשֶׁר־יִקְרָ֥א אֶתְכֶ֖ם בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית הַיָּמִֽים׃
49.englishText: And Jacob called his sons and said, “Come together that I may tell you what is to befall you in days to come.
49.transliteration: vַyִּkְrָ֥a yַaֲkֹ֖b aֶl־bָּnָ֑yv vַyֹּ֗amֶr hֵaָֽsְpvּ֙ vְaַgִּ֣ydָh lָkֶ֔ם aֵ֛t aֲshֶׁr־yִkְrָ֥a aֶtְkֶ֖ם bְּaַchֲrִ֥yt hַyָּmִֽyם׃

49.hebrewText: הִקָּבְצ֥וּ וְשִׁמְע֖וּ בְּנֵ֣י יַעֲקֹ֑ב וְשִׁמְע֖וּ אֶל־יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל אֲבִיכֶֽם׃
49.englishText:
Assemble and hearken, O sons of Jacob;
Hearken to Israel your father:
49.transliteration: hִkָּbְts֥vּ vְshִׁmְa֖vּ bְּnֵ֣y yַaֲkֹ֑b vְshִׁmְa֖vּ aֶl־yִshְׂrָaֵ֥l aֲbִykֶֽם׃

49.hebrewText: רְאוּבֵן֙ בְּכֹ֣רִי אַ֔תָּה כֹּחִ֖י וְרֵאשִׁ֣ית אוֹנִ֑י יֶ֥תֶר שְׂאֵ֖ת וְיֶ֥תֶר עָֽז׃
49.englishText:
Reuben, you are my first-born,
My might and first fruit of my vigor,
Exceeding in rank
And exceeding in honor.
49.transliteration: rְavּbֵן֙ bְּkֹ֣rִy aַ֔tָּh kֹּchִ֖y vְrֵashִׁ֣yt avֹnִ֑y yֶ֥tֶr shְׂaֵ֖t vְyֶ֥tֶr aָֽz׃

49.hebrewText: פַּ֤חַז כַּמַּ֙יִם֙ אַל־תּוֹתַ֔ר כִּ֥י עָלִ֖יתָ מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י אָבִ֑יךָ אָ֥ז חִלַּ֖לְתָּ יְצוּעִ֥י עָלָֽה׃ {פ}
49.englishText:
Unstable as water, you shall excel no longer;
For when you mounted your father’s bed,
You brought disgrace—my couch he mounted!
49.transliteration: pַּ֤chַz kַּmַּ֙yִם֙ aַl־tּvֹtַ֔r kִּ֥y aָlִ֖ytָ mִshְׁkְּbֵ֣y aָbִ֑yךָ aָ֥z chִlַּ֖lְtָּ yְtsvּaִ֥y aָlָֽh׃ {p}

49.hebrewText: שִׁמְע֥וֹן וְלֵוִ֖י אַחִ֑ים כְּלֵ֥י חָמָ֖ס מְכֵרֹתֵיהֶֽם׃
49.englishText:
Simeon and Levi are a pair;
Their weapons are tools of lawlessness.
49.transliteration: shִׁmְa֥vֹן vְlֵvִ֖y aַchִ֑yם kְּlֵ֥y chָmָ֖s mְkֵrֹtֵyhֶֽם׃

49.hebrewText: בְּסֹדָם֙ אַל־תָּבֹ֣א נַפְשִׁ֔י בִּקְהָלָ֖ם אַל־תֵּחַ֣ד כְּבֹדִ֑י כִּ֤י בְאַפָּם֙ הָ֣רְגוּ אִ֔ישׁ וּבִרְצֹנָ֖ם עִקְּרוּ־שֽׁוֹר׃
49.englishText:
Let not my person be included in their council,
Let not my being be counted in their assembly.
