6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר אֱלֹהִ֖ים אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֑ה וַיֹּ֥אמֶר אֵלָ֖יו אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃
6.englishText: God spoke to Moses and said to him, “I am יהוה.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֥r aֱlֹhִ֖yם aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֑h vַyֹּ֥amֶr aֵlָ֖yv aֲnִ֥y yְhֹvָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וָאֵרָ֗א אֶל־אַבְרָהָ֛ם אֶל־יִצְחָ֥ק וְאֶֽל־יַעֲקֹ֖ב בְּאֵ֣ל שַׁדָּ֑י וּשְׁמִ֣י יְהֹוָ֔ה לֹ֥א נוֹדַ֖עְתִּי לָהֶֽם׃
6.englishText: I appeared to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob as El Shaddai, but I did not make Myself known to them by My name יהוה.
6.transliteration: vָaֵrָ֗a aֶl־aַbְrָhָ֛ם aֶl־yִtsְchָ֥k vְaֶֽl־yַaֲkֹ֖b bְּaֵ֣l shַׁdָּ֑y vּshְׁmִ֣y yְhֹvָ֔h lֹ֥a nvֹdַ֖aְtִּy lָhֶֽם׃

6.hebrewText: וְגַ֨ם הֲקִמֹ֤תִי אֶת־בְּרִיתִי֙ אִתָּ֔ם לָתֵ֥ת לָהֶ֖ם אֶת־אֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן אֵ֛ת אֶ֥רֶץ מְגֻרֵיהֶ֖ם אֲשֶׁר־גָּ֥רוּ בָֽהּ׃
6.englishText: I also established My covenant with them, to give them the land of Canaan, the land in which they lived as sojourners.
6.transliteration: vְgַ֨ם hֲkִmֹ֤tִy aֶt־bְּrִytִy֙ aִtָּ֔ם lָtֵ֥t lָhֶ֖ם aֶt־aֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן aֵ֛t aֶ֥rֶץ mְgֻrֵyhֶ֖ם aֲshֶׁr־gָּ֥rvּ bָֽhּ׃

6.hebrewText: וְגַ֣ם ׀ אֲנִ֣י שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי אֶֽת־נַאֲקַת֙ בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל אֲשֶׁ֥ר מִצְרַ֖יִם מַעֲבִדִ֣ים אֹתָ֑ם וָאֶזְכֹּ֖ר אֶת־בְּרִיתִֽי׃
6.englishText: I have now heard the moaning of the Israelites because the Egyptians are holding them in bondage, and I have remembered My covenant.
6.transliteration: vְgַ֣ם ׀ aֲnִ֣y shָׁmַ֗aְtִּy aֶֽt־nַaֲkַt֙ bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l aֲshֶׁ֥r mִtsְrַ֖yִם mַaֲbִdִ֣yם aֹtָ֑ם vָaֶzְkֹּ֖r aֶt־bְּrִytִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: לָכֵ֞ן אֱמֹ֥ר לִבְנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ אֲנִ֣י יְהֹוָה֒ וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣י אֶתְכֶ֗ם מִתַּ֙חַת֙ סִבְלֹ֣ת מִצְרַ֔יִם וְהִצַּלְתִּ֥י אֶתְכֶ֖ם מֵעֲבֹדָתָ֑ם וְגָאַלְתִּ֤י אֶתְכֶם֙ בִּזְר֣וֹעַ נְטוּיָ֔ה וּבִשְׁפָטִ֖ים גְּדֹלִֽים׃
6.englishText: Say, therefore, to the Israelite people: I am יהוה. I will free you from the labors of the Egyptians and deliver you from their bondage. I will redeem you with an outstretched arm and through extraordinary chastisements.
6.transliteration: lָkֵ֞ן aֱmֹ֥r lִbְnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵl֮ aֲnִ֣y yְhֹvָh֒ vְhvֹtsֵatִ֣y aֶtְkֶ֗ם mִtַּ֙chַt֙ sִbְlֹ֣t mִtsְrַ֔yִם vְhִtsַּlְtִּ֥y aֶtְkֶ֖ם mֵaֲbֹdָtָ֑ם vְgָaַlְtִּ֤y aֶtְkֶם֙ bִּzְr֣vֹaַ nְtvּyָ֔h vּbִshְׁpָtִ֖yם gְּdֹlִֽyם׃

6.hebrewText: וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י אֶתְכֶ֥ם לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם וְהָיִ֥יתִי לָכֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם כִּ֣י אֲנִ֤י יְהֹוָה֙ אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם הַמּוֹצִ֣יא אֶתְכֶ֔ם מִתַּ֖חַת סִבְל֥וֹת מִצְרָֽיִם׃
6.englishText: And I will take you to be My people, and I will be your God. And you shall know that I, יהוה, am your God who freed you from the labors of the Egyptians.
6.transliteration: vְlָkַchְtִּ֨y aֶtְkֶ֥ם lִy֙ lְaָ֔ם vְhָyִ֥ytִy lָkֶ֖ם lֵֽalֹhִ֑yם vִֽydַaְtֶּ֗ם kִּ֣y aֲnִ֤y yְhֹvָh֙ aֱlֹ֣hֵykֶ֔ם hַmּvֹtsִ֣ya aֶtְkֶ֔ם mִtַּ֖chַt sִbְl֥vֹt mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

6.hebrewText: וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י אֶתְכֶם֙ אֶל־הָאָ֔רֶץ אֲשֶׁ֤ר נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ אֶת־יָדִ֔י לָתֵ֣ת אֹתָ֔הּ לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם לְיִצְחָ֖ק וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב וְנָתַתִּ֨י אֹתָ֥הּ לָכֶ֛ם מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃
6.englishText: I will bring you into the land which I swore*swore Lit. “raised My hand.” to give to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, and I will give it to you for a possession, I יהוה.”
6.transliteration: vְhֵbֵatִ֤y aֶtְkֶם֙ aֶl־hָaָ֔rֶץ aֲshֶׁ֤r nָshָׂ֙atִy֙ aֶt־yָdִ֔y lָtֵ֣t aֹtָ֔hּ lְaַbְrָhָ֥ם lְyִtsְchָ֖k vּֽlְyַaֲkֹ֑b vְnָtַtִּ֨y aֹtָ֥hּ lָkֶ֛ם mvֹrָshָׁ֖h aֲnִ֥y yְhֹvָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר מֹשֶׁ֛ה כֵּ֖ן אֶל־בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל וְלֹ֤א שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה מִקֹּ֣צֶר ר֔וּחַ וּמֵעֲבֹדָ֖ה קָשָֽׁה׃ {פ}
6.englishText: But when Moses told this to the Israelites, they would not listen to Moses, their spirits crushed by cruel bondage.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֥r mֹshֶׁ֛h kֵּ֖ן aֶl־bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l vְlֹ֤a shָֽׁmְavּ֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h mִkֹּ֣tsֶr r֔vּchַ vּmֵaֲbֹdָ֖h kָshָֽׁh׃ {p}

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֥ה לֵּאמֹֽר׃
6.englishText: יהוה spoke to Moses, saying,
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֥r yְhֹvָ֖h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֥h lֵּamֹֽr׃

6.hebrewText: בֹּ֣א דַבֵּ֔ר אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֖ה מֶ֣לֶךְ מִצְרָ֑יִם וִֽישַׁלַּ֥ח אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃
6.englishText: “Go and tell Pharaoh king of Egypt to let the Israelites depart from his land.”
6.transliteration: bֹּ֣a dַbֵּ֔r aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֖h mֶ֣lֶךְ mִtsְrָ֑yִם vִֽyshַׁlַּ֥ch aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mֵaַrְtsֽvֹ׃

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר מֹשֶׁ֔ה לִפְנֵ֥י יְהֹוָ֖ה לֵאמֹ֑ר הֵ֤ן בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ לֹֽא־שָׁמְע֣וּ אֵלַ֔י וְאֵיךְ֙ יִשְׁמָעֵ֣נִי פַרְעֹ֔ה וַאֲנִ֖י עֲרַ֥ל שְׂפָתָֽיִם׃ {פ}
6.englishText: But Moses appealed to יהוה, saying, “The Israelites would not listen to me; how then should Pharaoh heed me, me—who gets tongue-tied!”*who gets tongue-tied Lit. “uncircumcised of lips,” which is not a claim to a permanent condition, contra NJPS “a man of impeded speech.” Cf. Lev. 19.23; Jer. 6.10.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֣r mֹshֶׁ֔h lִpְnֵ֥y yְhֹvָ֖h lֵamֹ֑r hֵ֤ן bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ lֹֽa־shָׁmְa֣vּ aֵlַ֔y vְaֵyךְ֙ yִshְׁmָaֵ֣nִy pַrְaֹ֔h vַaֲnִ֖y aֲrַ֥l shְׂpָtָֽyִם׃ {p}

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר יְהֹוָה֮ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֣ה וְאֶֽל־אַהֲרֹן֒ וַיְצַוֵּם֙ אֶל־בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל וְאֶל־פַּרְעֹ֖ה מֶ֣לֶךְ מִצְרָ֑יִם לְהוֹצִ֥יא אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מֵאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃ {ס}
6.englishText: So יהוה spoke to both Moses and Aaron in regard to the Israelites and Pharaoh king of Egypt, instructing them to deliver the Israelites from the land of Egypt.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֣r yְhֹvָh֮ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֣h vְaֶֽl־aַhֲrֹן֒ vַyְtsַvֵּם֙ aֶl־bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l vְaֶl־pַּrְaֹ֖h mֶ֣lֶךְ mִtsְrָ֑yִם lְhvֹtsִ֥ya aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mֵaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃ {s}

6.hebrewText: אֵ֖לֶּה רָאשֵׁ֣י בֵית־אֲבֹתָ֑ם בְּנֵ֨י רְאוּבֵ֜ן בְּכֹ֣ר יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל חֲנ֤וֹךְ וּפַלּוּא֙ חֶצְרֹ֣ן וְכַרְמִ֔י אֵ֖לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת רְאוּבֵֽן׃
6.englishText: The following are the heads of their respective clans. The sons of Reuben, Israel’s first-born: Enoch*Enoch Or “Hanoch”; cf. note at Gen. 46.9. and Pallu, Hezron and Carmi; those are the families of Reuben.
6.transliteration: aֵ֖lֶּh rָashֵׁ֣y bֵyt־aֲbֹtָ֑ם bְּnֵ֨y rְavּbֵ֜ן bְּkֹ֣r yִshְׂrָaֵ֗l chֲn֤vֹךְ vּpַlּvּa֙ chֶtsְrֹ֣ן vְkַrְmִ֔y aֵ֖lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t rְavּbֵֽן׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י שִׁמְע֗וֹן יְמוּאֵ֨ל וְיָמִ֤ין וְאֹ֙הַד֙ וְיָכִ֣ין וְצֹ֔חַר וְשָׁא֖וּל בֶּן־הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית אֵ֖לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃
6.englishText: The sons of Simeon: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar, and Saul*Saul Or “Shaul”; cf. note at Gen. 46.10. the son of a Canaanite woman; those are the families of Simeon.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y shִׁmְa֗vֹן yְmvּaֵ֨l vְyָmִ֤yן vְaֹ֙hַd֙ vְyָkִ֣yן vְtsֹ֔chַr vְshָׁa֖vּl bֶּן־hַֽkְּnַaֲnִ֑yt aֵ֖lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t shִׁmְaֽvֹן׃

6.hebrewText: וְאֵ֨לֶּה שְׁמ֤וֹת בְּנֵֽי־לֵוִי֙ לְתֹ֣לְדֹתָ֔ם גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן וּקְהָ֖ת וּמְרָרִ֑י וּשְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י לֵוִ֔י שֶׁ֧בַע וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
6.englishText: These are the names of Levi’s sons by their lineage: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari; and the span of Levi’s life was 137 years.
6.transliteration: vְaֵ֨lֶּh shְׁm֤vֹt bְּnֵֽy־lֵvִy֙ lְtֹ֣lְdֹtָ֔ם gֵּrְshׁ֕vֹן vּkְhָ֖t vּmְrָrִ֑y vּshְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y lֵvִ֔y shֶׁ֧bַa vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: בְּנֵ֥י גֵרְשׁ֛וֹן לִבְנִ֥י וְשִׁמְעִ֖י לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: The sons of Gershon: Libni and Shimei, by their families.
6.transliteration: bְּnֵ֥y gֵrְshׁ֛vֹן lִbְnִ֥y vְshִׁmְaִ֖y lְmִshְׁpְּchֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י קְהָ֔ת עַמְרָ֣ם וְיִצְהָ֔ר וְחֶבְר֖וֹן וְעֻזִּיאֵ֑ל וּשְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י קְהָ֔ת שָׁלֹ֧שׁ וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
6.englishText: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel; and the span of Kohath’s life was 133 years.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y kְhָ֔t aַmְrָ֣ם vְyִtsְhָ֔r vְchֶbְr֖vֹן vְaֻzִּyaֵ֑l vּshְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y kְhָ֔t shָׁlֹ֧shׁ vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֥י מְרָרִ֖י מַחְלִ֣י וּמוּשִׁ֑י אֵ֛לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת הַלֵּוִ֖י לְתֹלְדֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. These are the families of the Levites by their lineage.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֥y mְrָrִ֖y mַchְlִ֣y vּmvּshִׁ֑y aֵ֛lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t hַlֵּvִ֖y lְtֹlְdֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֨ח עַמְרָ֜ם אֶת־יוֹכֶ֤בֶד דֹּֽדָתוֹ֙ ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה וַתֵּ֣לֶד ל֔וֹ אֶֽת־אַהֲרֹ֖ן וְאֶת־מֹשֶׁ֑ה וּשְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י עַמְרָ֔ם שֶׁ֧בַע וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
6.englishText: Amram took into his [household] as wife his father’s sister Jochebed, and she bore him Aaron and Moses; and the span of Amram’s life was 137 years.
6.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֨ch aַmְrָ֜ם aֶt־yvֹkֶ֤bֶd dֹּֽdָtvֹ֙ l֣vֹ lְaִshָּׁ֔h vַtֵּ֣lֶd l֔vֹ aֶֽt־aַhֲrֹ֖ן vְaֶt־mֹshֶׁ֑h vּshְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y aַmְrָ֔ם shֶׁ֧bַa vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י יִצְהָ֑ר קֹ֥רַח וָנֶ֖פֶג וְזִכְרִֽי׃
6.englishText: The sons of Izhar: Korah, Nepheg, and Zichri.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y yִtsְhָ֑r kֹ֥rַch vָnֶ֖pֶg vְzִkְrִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל מִֽישָׁאֵ֥ל וְאֶלְצָפָ֖ן וְסִתְרִֽי׃
6.englishText: The sons of Uzziel: Mishael, Elzaphan, and Sithri.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y aֻzִּyaֵ֑l mִֽyshָׁaֵ֥l vְaֶlְtsָpָ֖ן vְsִtְrִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֨ח אַהֲרֹ֜ן אֶת־אֱלִישֶׁ֧בַע בַּת־עַמִּינָדָ֛ב אֲח֥וֹת נַחְשׁ֖וֹן ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֑ה וַתֵּ֣לֶד ל֗וֹ אֶת־נָדָב֙ וְאֶת־אֲבִיה֔וּא אֶת־אֶלְעָזָ֖ר וְאֶת־אִֽיתָמָֽר׃
6.englishText: Aaron took into his [household] as wife Elisheba, daughter of Amminadab and sister of Nahshon, and she bore him Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar.
6.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֨ch aַhֲrֹ֜ן aֶt־aֱlִyshֶׁ֧bַa bַּt־aַmִּynָdָ֛b aֲch֥vֹt nַchְshׁ֖vֹן l֣vֹ lְaִshָּׁ֑h vַtֵּ֣lֶd l֗vֹ aֶt־nָdָb֙ vְaֶt־aֲbִyh֔vּa aֶt־aֶlְaָzָ֖r vְaֶt־aִֽytָmָֽr׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י קֹ֔רַח אַסִּ֥יר וְאֶלְקָנָ֖ה וַאֲבִיאָסָ֑ף אֵ֖לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת הַקׇּרְחִֽי׃
6.englishText: The sons of Korah: Assir, Elkanah, and Abiasaph. Those are the families of the Korahites.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y kֹ֔rַch aַsִּ֥yr vְaֶlְkָnָ֖h vַaֲbִyaָsָ֑ף aֵ֖lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t hַkׇּrְchִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: וְאֶלְעָזָ֨ר בֶּֽן־אַהֲרֹ֜ן לָקַֽח־ל֨וֹ מִבְּנ֤וֹת פּֽוּטִיאֵל֙ ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה וַתֵּ֥לֶד ל֖וֹ אֶת־פִּֽינְחָ֑ס אֵ֗לֶּה רָאשֵׁ֛י אֲב֥וֹת הַלְוִיִּ֖ם לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: And Aaron’s son Eleazar took into his [household] as wife one of Putiel’s daughters, and she bore him Phinehas. Those are the heads of the ancestral houses of the Levites by their families.
6.transliteration: vְaֶlְaָzָ֨r bֶּֽן־aַhֲrֹ֜ן lָkַֽch־l֨vֹ mִbְּn֤vֹt pּֽvּtִyaֵl֙ l֣vֹ lְaִshָּׁ֔h vַtֵּ֥lֶd l֖vֹ aֶt־pִּֽynְchָ֑s aֵ֗lֶּh rָashֵׁ֛y aֲb֥vֹt hַlְvִyִּ֖ם lְmִshְׁpְּchֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: ה֥וּא אַהֲרֹ֖ן וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה אֲשֶׁ֨ר אָמַ֤ר יְהֹוָה֙ לָהֶ֔ם הוֹצִ֜יאוּ אֶת־בְּנֵ֧י יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל מֵאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם עַל־צִבְאֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: It is the same Aaron and Moses to whom יהוה said, “Bring forth the Israelites from the land of Egypt, troop by troop.”
6.transliteration: h֥vּa aַhֲrֹ֖ן vּmֹshֶׁ֑h aֲshֶׁ֨r aָmַ֤r yְhֹvָh֙ lָhֶ֔ם hvֹtsִ֜yavּ aֶt־bְּnֵ֧y yִshְׂrָaֵ֛l mֵaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrַ֖yִם aַl־tsִbְaֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: הֵ֗ם הַֽמְדַבְּרִים֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֣ה מֶֽלֶךְ־מִצְרַ֔יִם לְהוֹצִ֥יא אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם ה֥וּא מֹשֶׁ֖ה וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃
6.englishText: It was they who spoke to Pharaoh king of Egypt to free the Israelites from the Egyptians; these are the same Moses and Aaron.
6.transliteration: hֵ֗ם hַֽmְdַbְּrִyם֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֣h mֶֽlֶךְ־mִtsְrַ֔yִם lְhvֹtsִ֥ya aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mִmִּtsְrָ֑yִם h֥vּa mֹshֶׁ֖h vְaַhֲrֹֽן׃

6.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י בְּי֨וֹם דִּבֶּ֧ר יְהֹוָ֛ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֖ה בְּאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃ {ס}
6.englishText: For when יהוה spoke to Moses in the land of Egypt
6.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y bְּy֨vֹם dִּbֶּ֧r yְhֹvָ֛h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֖h bְּaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃ {s}

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר יְהֹוָ֛ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֥ה לֵּאמֹ֖ר אֲנִ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה דַּבֵּ֗ר אֶל־פַּרְעֹה֙ מֶ֣לֶךְ מִצְרַ֔יִם אֵ֛ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֥ר אֲנִ֖י דֹּבֵ֥ר אֵלֶֽיךָ׃
6.englishText: and יהוה said to Moses, “I am יהוה; speak to Pharaoh king of Egypt all that I will tell you,”
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֧r yְhֹvָ֛h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֥h lֵּamֹ֖r aֲnִ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h dַּbֵּ֗r aֶl־pַּrְaֹh֙ mֶ֣lֶךְ mִtsְrַ֔yִם aֵ֛t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֥r aֲnִ֖y dֹּbֵ֥r aֵlֶֽyךָ׃

6.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר מֹשֶׁ֖ה לִפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה הֵ֤ן אֲנִי֙ עֲרַ֣ל שְׂפָתַ֔יִם וְאֵ֕יךְ יִשְׁמַ֥ע אֵלַ֖י פַּרְעֹֽה׃ {פ}
6.englishText: Moses appealed to יהוה, saying, “See, I get tongue-tied;*tongue-tied See note at v. 12. how then should Pharaoh heed me!”
6.transliteration: vַyֹּ֥amֶr mֹshֶׁ֖h lִpְnֵ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h hֵ֤ן aֲnִy֙ aֲrַ֣l shְׂpָtַ֔yִם vְaֵ֕yךְ yִshְׁmַ֥a aֵlַ֖y pַּrְaֹֽh׃ {p}

vaera.name: Vaera
vaera.summary: God's promise of redemption, the genealogy of Moses and Aaron, the first seven plagues: blood, frogs, lice, wild animals, pestilence, boils, and hail.

6.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהֹוָה֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה עַתָּ֣ה תִרְאֶ֔ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה לְפַרְעֹ֑ה כִּ֣י בְיָ֤ד חֲזָקָה֙ יְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם וּבְיָ֣ד חֲזָקָ֔ה יְגָרְשֵׁ֖ם מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ {ס}
6.englishText: Then יהוה said to Moses, “You shall soon see what I will do to Pharaoh: he shall let them go because of a greater might; indeed, because of a greater might he shall drive them from his land.”
6.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhֹvָh֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h aַtָּ֣h tִrְaֶ֔h aֲshֶׁ֥r aֶֽaֱshֶׂ֖h lְpַrְaֹ֑h kִּ֣y bְyָ֤d chֲzָkָh֙ yְshַׁlְּchֵ֔ם vּbְyָ֣d chֲzָkָ֔h yְgָrְshֵׁ֖ם mֵaַrְtsֽvֹ׃ {s}

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר אֱלֹהִ֖ים אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֑ה וַיֹּ֥אמֶר אֵלָ֖יו אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃
6.englishText: God spoke to Moses and said to him, “I am יהוה.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֥r aֱlֹhִ֖yם aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֑h vַyֹּ֥amֶr aֵlָ֖yv aֲnִ֥y yְhֹvָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וָאֵרָ֗א אֶל־אַבְרָהָ֛ם אֶל־יִצְחָ֥ק וְאֶֽל־יַעֲקֹ֖ב בְּאֵ֣ל שַׁדָּ֑י וּשְׁמִ֣י יְהֹוָ֔ה לֹ֥א נוֹדַ֖עְתִּי לָהֶֽם׃
6.englishText: I appeared to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob as El Shaddai, but I did not make Myself known to them by My name יהוה.
6.transliteration: vָaֵrָ֗a aֶl־aַbְrָhָ֛ם aֶl־yִtsְchָ֥k vְaֶֽl־yַaֲkֹ֖b bְּaֵ֣l shַׁdָּ֑y vּshְׁmִ֣y yְhֹvָ֔h lֹ֥a nvֹdַ֖aְtִּy lָhֶֽם׃

6.hebrewText: וְגַ֨ם הֲקִמֹ֤תִי אֶת־בְּרִיתִי֙ אִתָּ֔ם לָתֵ֥ת לָהֶ֖ם אֶת־אֶ֣רֶץ כְּנָ֑עַן אֵ֛ת אֶ֥רֶץ מְגֻרֵיהֶ֖ם אֲשֶׁר־גָּ֥רוּ בָֽהּ׃
6.englishText: I also established My covenant with them, to give them the land of Canaan, the land in which they lived as sojourners.
6.transliteration: vְgַ֨ם hֲkִmֹ֤tִy aֶt־bְּrִytִy֙ aִtָּ֔ם lָtֵ֥t lָhֶ֖ם aֶt־aֶ֣rֶץ kְּnָ֑aַן aֵ֛t aֶ֥rֶץ mְgֻrֵyhֶ֖ם aֲshֶׁr־gָּ֥rvּ bָֽhּ׃

6.hebrewText: וְגַ֣ם ׀ אֲנִ֣י שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי אֶֽת־נַאֲקַת֙ בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל אֲשֶׁ֥ר מִצְרַ֖יִם מַעֲבִדִ֣ים אֹתָ֑ם וָאֶזְכֹּ֖ר אֶת־בְּרִיתִֽי׃
6.englishText: I have now heard the moaning of the Israelites because the Egyptians are holding them in bondage, and I have remembered My covenant.
6.transliteration: vְgַ֣ם ׀ aֲnִ֣y shָׁmַ֗aְtִּy aֶֽt־nַaֲkַt֙ bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l aֲshֶׁ֥r mִtsְrַ֖yִם mַaֲbִdִ֣yם aֹtָ֑ם vָaֶzְkֹּ֖r aֶt־bְּrִytִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: לָכֵ֞ן אֱמֹ֥ר לִבְנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ אֲנִ֣י יְהֹוָה֒ וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣י אֶתְכֶ֗ם מִתַּ֙חַת֙ סִבְלֹ֣ת מִצְרַ֔יִם וְהִצַּלְתִּ֥י אֶתְכֶ֖ם מֵעֲבֹדָתָ֑ם וְגָאַלְתִּ֤י אֶתְכֶם֙ בִּזְר֣וֹעַ נְטוּיָ֔ה וּבִשְׁפָטִ֖ים גְּדֹלִֽים׃
6.englishText: Say, therefore, to the Israelite people: I am יהוה. I will free you from the labors of the Egyptians and deliver you from their bondage. I will redeem you with an outstretched arm and through extraordinary chastisements.
6.transliteration: lָkֵ֞ן aֱmֹ֥r lִbְnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵl֮ aֲnִ֣y yְhֹvָh֒ vְhvֹtsֵatִ֣y aֶtְkֶ֗ם mִtַּ֙chַt֙ sִbְlֹ֣t mִtsְrַ֔yִם vְhִtsַּlְtִּ֥y aֶtְkֶ֖ם mֵaֲbֹdָtָ֑ם vְgָaַlְtִּ֤y aֶtְkֶם֙ bִּzְr֣vֹaַ nְtvּyָ֔h vּbִshְׁpָtִ֖yם gְּdֹlִֽyם׃

6.hebrewText: וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י אֶתְכֶ֥ם לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם וְהָיִ֥יתִי לָכֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם כִּ֣י אֲנִ֤י יְהֹוָה֙ אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם הַמּוֹצִ֣יא אֶתְכֶ֔ם מִתַּ֖חַת סִבְל֥וֹת מִצְרָֽיִם׃
6.englishText: And I will take you to be My people, and I will be your God. And you shall know that I, יהוה, am your God who freed you from the labors of the Egyptians.
6.transliteration: vְlָkַchְtִּ֨y aֶtְkֶ֥ם lִy֙ lְaָ֔ם vְhָyִ֥ytִy lָkֶ֖ם lֵֽalֹhִ֑yם vִֽydַaְtֶּ֗ם kִּ֣y aֲnִ֤y yְhֹvָh֙ aֱlֹ֣hֵykֶ֔ם hַmּvֹtsִ֣ya aֶtְkֶ֔ם mִtַּ֖chַt sִbְl֥vֹt mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

6.hebrewText: וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י אֶתְכֶם֙ אֶל־הָאָ֔רֶץ אֲשֶׁ֤ר נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ אֶת־יָדִ֔י לָתֵ֣ת אֹתָ֔הּ לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם לְיִצְחָ֖ק וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב וְנָתַתִּ֨י אֹתָ֥הּ לָכֶ֛ם מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃
6.englishText: I will bring you into the land which I swore*swore Lit. “raised My hand.” to give to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, and I will give it to you for a possession, I יהוה.”
6.transliteration: vְhֵbֵatִ֤y aֶtְkֶם֙ aֶl־hָaָ֔rֶץ aֲshֶׁ֤r nָshָׂ֙atִy֙ aֶt־yָdִ֔y lָtֵ֣t aֹtָ֔hּ lְaַbְrָhָ֥ם lְyִtsְchָ֖k vּֽlְyַaֲkֹ֑b vְnָtַtִּ֨y aֹtָ֥hּ lָkֶ֛ם mvֹrָshָׁ֖h aֲnִ֥y yְhֹvָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר מֹשֶׁ֛ה כֵּ֖ן אֶל־בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל וְלֹ֤א שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה מִקֹּ֣צֶר ר֔וּחַ וּמֵעֲבֹדָ֖ה קָשָֽׁה׃ {פ}
6.englishText: But when Moses told this to the Israelites, they would not listen to Moses, their spirits crushed by cruel bondage.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֥r mֹshֶׁ֛h kֵּ֖ן aֶl־bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l vְlֹ֤a shָֽׁmְavּ֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h mִkֹּ֣tsֶr r֔vּchַ vּmֵaֲbֹdָ֖h kָshָֽׁh׃ {p}

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֥ה לֵּאמֹֽר׃
6.englishText: יהוה spoke to Moses, saying,
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֥r yְhֹvָ֖h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֥h lֵּamֹֽr׃

6.hebrewText: בֹּ֣א דַבֵּ֔ר אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֖ה מֶ֣לֶךְ מִצְרָ֑יִם וִֽישַׁלַּ֥ח אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃
6.englishText: “Go and tell Pharaoh king of Egypt to let the Israelites depart from his land.”
6.transliteration: bֹּ֣a dַbֵּ֔r aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֖h mֶ֣lֶךְ mִtsְrָ֑yִם vִֽyshַׁlַּ֥ch aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mֵaַrְtsֽvֹ׃

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר מֹשֶׁ֔ה לִפְנֵ֥י יְהֹוָ֖ה לֵאמֹ֑ר הֵ֤ן בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ לֹֽא־שָׁמְע֣וּ אֵלַ֔י וְאֵיךְ֙ יִשְׁמָעֵ֣נִי פַרְעֹ֔ה וַאֲנִ֖י עֲרַ֥ל שְׂפָתָֽיִם׃ {פ}
6.englishText: But Moses appealed to יהוה, saying, “The Israelites would not listen to me; how then should Pharaoh heed me, me—who gets tongue-tied!”*who gets tongue-tied Lit. “uncircumcised of lips,” which is not a claim to a permanent condition, contra NJPS “a man of impeded speech.” Cf. Lev. 19.23; Jer. 6.10.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֣r mֹshֶׁ֔h lִpְnֵ֥y yְhֹvָ֖h lֵamֹ֑r hֵ֤ן bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ lֹֽa־shָׁmְa֣vּ aֵlַ֔y vְaֵyךְ֙ yִshְׁmָaֵ֣nִy pַrְaֹ֔h vַaֲnִ֖y aֲrַ֥l shְׂpָtָֽyִם׃ {p}

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר יְהֹוָה֮ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֣ה וְאֶֽל־אַהֲרֹן֒ וַיְצַוֵּם֙ אֶל־בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל וְאֶל־פַּרְעֹ֖ה מֶ֣לֶךְ מִצְרָ֑יִם לְהוֹצִ֥יא אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מֵאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃ {ס}
6.englishText: So יהוה spoke to both Moses and Aaron in regard to the Israelites and Pharaoh king of Egypt, instructing them to deliver the Israelites from the land of Egypt.
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֣r yְhֹvָh֮ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֣h vְaֶֽl־aַhֲrֹן֒ vַyְtsַvֵּם֙ aֶl־bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l vְaֶl־pַּrְaֹ֖h mֶ֣lֶךְ mִtsְrָ֑yִם lְhvֹtsִ֥ya aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mֵaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃ {s}

6.hebrewText: אֵ֖לֶּה רָאשֵׁ֣י בֵית־אֲבֹתָ֑ם בְּנֵ֨י רְאוּבֵ֜ן בְּכֹ֣ר יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל חֲנ֤וֹךְ וּפַלּוּא֙ חֶצְרֹ֣ן וְכַרְמִ֔י אֵ֖לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת רְאוּבֵֽן׃
6.englishText: The following are the heads of their respective clans. The sons of Reuben, Israel’s first-born: Enoch*Enoch Or “Hanoch”; cf. note at Gen. 46.9. and Pallu, Hezron and Carmi; those are the families of Reuben.
6.transliteration: aֵ֖lֶּh rָashֵׁ֣y bֵyt־aֲbֹtָ֑ם bְּnֵ֨y rְavּbֵ֜ן bְּkֹ֣r yִshְׂrָaֵ֗l chֲn֤vֹךְ vּpַlּvּa֙ chֶtsְrֹ֣ן vְkַrְmִ֔y aֵ֖lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t rְavּbֵֽן׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י שִׁמְע֗וֹן יְמוּאֵ֨ל וְיָמִ֤ין וְאֹ֙הַד֙ וְיָכִ֣ין וְצֹ֔חַר וְשָׁא֖וּל בֶּן־הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית אֵ֖לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃
6.englishText: The sons of Simeon: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar, and Saul*Saul Or “Shaul”; cf. note at Gen. 46.10. the son of a Canaanite woman; those are the families of Simeon.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y shִׁmְa֗vֹן yְmvּaֵ֨l vְyָmִ֤yן vְaֹ֙hַd֙ vְyָkִ֣yן vְtsֹ֔chַr vְshָׁa֖vּl bֶּן־hַֽkְּnַaֲnִ֑yt aֵ֖lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t shִׁmְaֽvֹן׃

6.hebrewText: וְאֵ֨לֶּה שְׁמ֤וֹת בְּנֵֽי־לֵוִי֙ לְתֹ֣לְדֹתָ֔ם גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן וּקְהָ֖ת וּמְרָרִ֑י וּשְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י לֵוִ֔י שֶׁ֧בַע וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
6.englishText: These are the names of Levi’s sons by their lineage: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari; and the span of Levi’s life was 137 years.
6.transliteration: vְaֵ֨lֶּh shְׁm֤vֹt bְּnֵֽy־lֵvִy֙ lְtֹ֣lְdֹtָ֔ם gֵּrְshׁ֕vֹן vּkְhָ֖t vּmְrָrִ֑y vּshְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y lֵvִ֔y shֶׁ֧bַa vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: בְּנֵ֥י גֵרְשׁ֛וֹן לִבְנִ֥י וְשִׁמְעִ֖י לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: The sons of Gershon: Libni and Shimei, by their families.
6.transliteration: bְּnֵ֥y gֵrְshׁ֛vֹן lִbְnִ֥y vְshִׁmְaִ֖y lְmִshְׁpְּchֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י קְהָ֔ת עַמְרָ֣ם וְיִצְהָ֔ר וְחֶבְר֖וֹן וְעֻזִּיאֵ֑ל וּשְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י קְהָ֔ת שָׁלֹ֧שׁ וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
6.englishText: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel; and the span of Kohath’s life was 133 years.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y kְhָ֔t aַmְrָ֣ם vְyִtsְhָ֔r vְchֶbְr֖vֹן vְaֻzִּyaֵ֑l vּshְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y kְhָ֔t shָׁlֹ֧shׁ vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֥י מְרָרִ֖י מַחְלִ֣י וּמוּשִׁ֑י אֵ֛לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת הַלֵּוִ֖י לְתֹלְדֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. These are the families of the Levites by their lineage.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֥y mְrָrִ֖y mַchְlִ֣y vּmvּshִׁ֑y aֵ֛lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t hַlֵּvִ֖y lְtֹlְdֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֨ח עַמְרָ֜ם אֶת־יוֹכֶ֤בֶד דֹּֽדָתוֹ֙ ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה וַתֵּ֣לֶד ל֔וֹ אֶֽת־אַהֲרֹ֖ן וְאֶת־מֹשֶׁ֑ה וּשְׁנֵי֙ חַיֵּ֣י עַמְרָ֔ם שֶׁ֧בַע וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים וּמְאַ֖ת שָׁנָֽה׃
6.englishText: Amram took into his [household] as wife his father’s sister Jochebed, and she bore him Aaron and Moses; and the span of Amram’s life was 137 years.
6.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֨ch aַmְrָ֜ם aֶt־yvֹkֶ֤bֶd dֹּֽdָtvֹ֙ l֣vֹ lְaִshָּׁ֔h vַtֵּ֣lֶd l֔vֹ aֶֽt־aַhֲrֹ֖ן vְaֶt־mֹshֶׁ֑h vּshְׁnֵy֙ chַyֵּ֣y aַmְrָ֔ם shֶׁ֧bַa vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם vּmְaַ֖t shָׁnָֽh׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י יִצְהָ֑ר קֹ֥רַח וָנֶ֖פֶג וְזִכְרִֽי׃
6.englishText: The sons of Izhar: Korah, Nepheg, and Zichri.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y yִtsְhָ֑r kֹ֥rַch vָnֶ֖pֶg vְzִkְrִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֖י עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל מִֽישָׁאֵ֥ל וְאֶלְצָפָ֖ן וְסִתְרִֽי׃
6.englishText: The sons of Uzziel: Mishael, Elzaphan, and Sithri.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֖y aֻzִּyaֵ֑l mִֽyshָׁaֵ֥l vְaֶlְtsָpָ֖ן vְsִtְrִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֨ח אַהֲרֹ֜ן אֶת־אֱלִישֶׁ֧בַע בַּת־עַמִּינָדָ֛ב אֲח֥וֹת נַחְשׁ֖וֹן ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֑ה וַתֵּ֣לֶד ל֗וֹ אֶת־נָדָב֙ וְאֶת־אֲבִיה֔וּא אֶת־אֶלְעָזָ֖ר וְאֶת־אִֽיתָמָֽר׃
6.englishText: Aaron took into his [household] as wife Elisheba, daughter of Amminadab and sister of Nahshon, and she bore him Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar.
6.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֨ch aַhֲrֹ֜ן aֶt־aֱlִyshֶׁ֧bַa bַּt־aַmִּynָdָ֛b aֲch֥vֹt nַchְshׁ֖vֹן l֣vֹ lְaִshָּׁ֑h vַtֵּ֣lֶd l֗vֹ aֶt־nָdָb֙ vְaֶt־aֲbִyh֔vּa aֶt־aֶlְaָzָ֖r vְaֶt־aִֽytָmָֽr׃

6.hebrewText: וּבְנֵ֣י קֹ֔רַח אַסִּ֥יר וְאֶלְקָנָ֖ה וַאֲבִיאָסָ֑ף אֵ֖לֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת הַקׇּרְחִֽי׃
6.englishText: The sons of Korah: Assir, Elkanah, and Abiasaph. Those are the families of the Korahites.
6.transliteration: vּbְnֵ֣y kֹ֔rַch aַsִּ֥yr vְaֶlְkָnָ֖h vַaֲbִyaָsָ֑ף aֵ֖lֶּh mִshְׁpְּchֹ֥t hַkׇּrְchִֽy׃

6.hebrewText: וְאֶלְעָזָ֨ר בֶּֽן־אַהֲרֹ֜ן לָקַֽח־ל֨וֹ מִבְּנ֤וֹת פּֽוּטִיאֵל֙ ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה וַתֵּ֥לֶד ל֖וֹ אֶת־פִּֽינְחָ֑ס אֵ֗לֶּה רָאשֵׁ֛י אֲב֥וֹת הַלְוִיִּ֖ם לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: And Aaron’s son Eleazar took into his [household] as wife one of Putiel’s daughters, and she bore him Phinehas. Those are the heads of the ancestral houses of the Levites by their families.
6.transliteration: vְaֶlְaָzָ֨r bֶּֽן־aַhֲrֹ֜ן lָkַֽch־l֨vֹ mִbְּn֤vֹt pּֽvּtִyaֵl֙ l֣vֹ lְaִshָּׁ֔h vַtֵּ֥lֶd l֖vֹ aֶt־pִּֽynְchָ֑s aֵ֗lֶּh rָashֵׁ֛y aֲb֥vֹt hַlְvִyִּ֖ם lְmִshְׁpְּchֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: ה֥וּא אַהֲרֹ֖ן וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה אֲשֶׁ֨ר אָמַ֤ר יְהֹוָה֙ לָהֶ֔ם הוֹצִ֜יאוּ אֶת־בְּנֵ֧י יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל מֵאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם עַל־צִבְאֹתָֽם׃
6.englishText: It is the same Aaron and Moses to whom יהוה said, “Bring forth the Israelites from the land of Egypt, troop by troop.”
6.transliteration: h֥vּa aַhֲrֹ֖ן vּmֹshֶׁ֑h aֲshֶׁ֨r aָmַ֤r yְhֹvָh֙ lָhֶ֔ם hvֹtsִ֜yavּ aֶt־bְּnֵ֧y yִshְׂrָaֵ֛l mֵaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrַ֖yִם aַl־tsִbְaֹtָֽם׃

6.hebrewText: הֵ֗ם הַֽמְדַבְּרִים֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֣ה מֶֽלֶךְ־מִצְרַ֔יִם לְהוֹצִ֥יא אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם ה֥וּא מֹשֶׁ֖ה וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃
6.englishText: It was they who spoke to Pharaoh king of Egypt to free the Israelites from the Egyptians; these are the same Moses and Aaron.
6.transliteration: hֵ֗ם hַֽmְdַbְּrִyם֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֣h mֶֽlֶךְ־mִtsְrַ֔yִם lְhvֹtsִ֥ya aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mִmִּtsְrָ֑yִם h֥vּa mֹshֶׁ֖h vְaַhֲrֹֽן׃

6.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י בְּי֨וֹם דִּבֶּ֧ר יְהֹוָ֛ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֖ה בְּאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃ {ס}
6.englishText: For when יהוה spoke to Moses in the land of Egypt
6.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y bְּy֨vֹם dִּbֶּ֧r yְhֹvָ֛h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֖h bְּaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃ {s}

6.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר יְהֹוָ֛ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֥ה לֵּאמֹ֖ר אֲנִ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה דַּבֵּ֗ר אֶל־פַּרְעֹה֙ מֶ֣לֶךְ מִצְרַ֔יִם אֵ֛ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֥ר אֲנִ֖י דֹּבֵ֥ר אֵלֶֽיךָ׃
6.englishText: and יהוה said to Moses, “I am יהוה; speak to Pharaoh king of Egypt all that I will tell you,”
6.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֧r yְhֹvָ֛h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֥h lֵּamֹ֖r aֲnִ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h dַּbֵּ֗r aֶl־pַּrְaֹh֙ mֶ֣lֶךְ mִtsְrַ֔yִם aֵ֛t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֥r aֲnִ֖y dֹּbֵ֥r aֵlֶֽyךָ׃

6.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר מֹשֶׁ֖ה לִפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה הֵ֤ן אֲנִי֙ עֲרַ֣ל שְׂפָתַ֔יִם וְאֵ֕יךְ יִשְׁמַ֥ע אֵלַ֖י פַּרְעֹֽה׃ {פ}
6.englishText: Moses appealed to יהוה, saying, “See, I get tongue-tied;*tongue-tied See note at v. 12. how then should Pharaoh heed me!”
6.transliteration: vַyֹּ֥amֶr mֹshֶׁ֖h lִpְnֵ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h hֵ֤ן aֲnִy֙ aֲrַ֣l shְׂpָtַ֔yִם vְaֵ֕yךְ yִshְׁmַ֥a aֵlַ֖y pַּrְaֹֽh׃ {p}

7.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהֹוָה֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה רְאֵ֛ה נְתַתִּ֥יךָ אֱלֹהִ֖ים לְפַרְעֹ֑ה וְאַהֲרֹ֥ן אָחִ֖יךָ יִהְיֶ֥ה נְבִיאֶֽךָ׃
7.englishText: יהוה replied to Moses, “See, I place you in the role of God to Pharaoh, with your brother Aaron as your prophet.*prophet Cf. 4.16.
7.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhֹvָh֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h rְaֵ֛h nְtַtִּ֥yךָ aֱlֹhִ֖yם lְpַrְaֹ֑h vְaַhֲrֹ֥ן aָchִ֖yךָ yִhְyֶ֥h nְbִyaֶֽךָ׃

7.hebrewText: אַתָּ֣ה תְדַבֵּ֔ר אֵ֖ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר אֲצַוֶּ֑ךָּ וְאַהֲרֹ֤ן אָחִ֙יךָ֙ יְדַבֵּ֣ר אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְשִׁלַּ֥ח אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃
7.englishText: You shall repeat all that I command you, and your brother Aaron shall speak to Pharaoh to let the Israelites depart from his land.
7.transliteration: aַtָּ֣h tְdַbֵּ֔r aֵ֖t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֣r aֲtsַvֶּ֑ךָּ vְaַhֲrֹ֤ן aָchִ֙yךָ֙ yְdַbֵּ֣r aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֔h vְshִׁlַּ֥ch aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mֵaַrְtsֽvֹ׃

7.hebrewText: וַאֲנִ֥י אַקְשֶׁ֖ה אֶת־לֵ֣ב פַּרְעֹ֑ה וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י אֶת־אֹתֹתַ֛י וְאֶת־מוֹפְתַ֖י בְּאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
7.englishText: But I will harden Pharaoh’s heart, that I may multiply My signs and marvels in the land of Egypt.
7.transliteration: vַaֲnִ֥y aַkְshֶׁ֖h aֶt־lֵ֣b pַּrְaֹ֑h vְhִrְbֵּytִ֧y aֶt־aֹtֹtַ֛y vְaֶt־mvֹpְtַ֖y bְּaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

7.hebrewText: וְלֹֽא־יִשְׁמַ֤ע אֲלֵכֶם֙ פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְנָתַתִּ֥י אֶת־יָדִ֖י בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם וְהוֹצֵאתִ֨י אֶת־צִבְאֹתַ֜י אֶת־עַמִּ֤י בְנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם בִּשְׁפָטִ֖ים גְּדֹלִֽים׃
7.englishText: When Pharaoh does not heed you, I will lay My hand upon Egypt and deliver My ranks, My people the Israelites, from the land of Egypt with extraordinary chastisements.
7.transliteration: vְlֹֽa־yִshְׁmַ֤a aֲlֵkֶם֙ pַּrְaֹ֔h vְnָtַtִּ֥y aֶt־yָdִ֖y bְּmִtsְrָ֑yִם vְhvֹtsֵatִ֨y aֶt־tsִbְaֹtַ֜y aֶt־aַmִּ֤y bְnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵl֙ mֵaֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם bִּshְׁpָtִ֖yם gְּdֹlִֽyם׃

7.hebrewText: וְיָדְע֤וּ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ כִּֽי־אֲנִ֣י יְהֹוָ֔ה בִּנְטֹתִ֥י אֶת־יָדִ֖י עַל־מִצְרָ֑יִם וְהוֹצֵאתִ֥י אֶת־בְּנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל מִתּוֹכָֽם׃
7.englishText: And the Egyptians shall know that I am יהוה, when I stretch out My hand over Egypt and bring out the Israelites from their midst.”
7.transliteration: vְyָdְa֤vּ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ kִּֽy־aֲnִ֣y yְhֹvָ֔h bִּnְtֹtִ֥y aֶt־yָdִ֖y aַl־mִtsְrָ֑yִם vְhvֹtsֵatִ֥y aֶt־bְּnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l mִtּvֹkָֽם׃

7.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ מֹשֶׁ֖ה וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר צִוָּ֧ה יְהֹוָ֛ה אֹתָ֖ם כֵּ֥ן עָשֽׂוּ׃
7.englishText: This Moses and Aaron did; as יהוה commanded them, so they did.
7.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַshׂ mֹshֶׁ֖h vְaַhֲrֹ֑ן kַּaֲshֶׁ֨r tsִvָּ֧h yְhֹvָ֛h aֹtָ֖ם kֵּ֥ן aָshֽׂvּ׃

7.hebrewText: וּמֹשֶׁה֙ בֶּן־שְׁמֹנִ֣ים שָׁנָ֔ה וְאַֽהֲרֹ֔ן בֶּן־שָׁלֹ֥שׁ וּשְׁמֹנִ֖ים שָׁנָ֑ה בְּדַבְּרָ֖ם אֶל־פַּרְעֹֽה׃ {פ}
7.englishText: Moses was eighty years old and Aaron eighty-three, when they made their demand on Pharaoh.
7.transliteration: vּmֹshֶׁh֙ bֶּן־shְׁmֹnִ֣yם shָׁnָ֔h vְaַֽhֲrֹ֔ן bֶּן־shָׁlֹ֥shׁ vּshְׁmֹnִ֖yם shָׁnָ֑h bְּdַbְּrָ֖ם aֶl־pַּrְaֹֽh׃ {p}

7.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר יְהֹוָ֔ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֥ה וְאֶֽל־אַהֲרֹ֖ן לֵאמֹֽר׃
7.englishText: יהוה said to Moses and Aaron,
7.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr yְhֹvָ֔h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֥h vְaֶֽl־aַhֲrֹ֖ן lֵamֹֽr׃

7.hebrewText: כִּי֩ יְדַבֵּ֨ר אֲלֵכֶ֤ם פַּרְעֹה֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר תְּנ֥וּ לָכֶ֖ם מוֹפֵ֑ת וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ אֶֽל־אַהֲרֹ֗ן קַ֧ח אֶֽת־מַטְּךָ֛ וְהַשְׁלֵ֥ךְ לִפְנֵֽי־פַרְעֹ֖ה יְהִ֥י לְתַנִּֽין׃
7.englishText: “When Pharaoh speaks to you and says, ‘Produce your marvel,’ you shall say to Aaron, ‘Take your rod and cast it down before Pharaoh.’ It shall turn into a serpent.”
7.transliteration: kִּy֩ yְdַbֵּ֨r aֲlֵkֶ֤ם pַּrְaֹh֙ lֵamֹ֔r tְּn֥vּ lָkֶ֖ם mvֹpֵ֑t vְaָmַrְtָּ֣ aֶֽl־aַhֲrֹ֗ן kַ֧ch aֶֽt־mַtְּךָ֛ vְhַshְׁlֵ֥ךְ lִpְnֵֽy־pַrְaֹ֖h yְhִ֥y lְtַnִּֽyן׃

7.hebrewText: וַיָּבֹ֨א מֹשֶׁ֤ה וְאַהֲרֹן֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֔ה וַיַּ֣עֲשׂוּ כֵ֔ן כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר צִוָּ֣ה יְהֹוָ֑ה וַיַּשְׁלֵ֨ךְ אַהֲרֹ֜ן אֶת־מַטֵּ֗הוּ לִפְנֵ֥י פַרְעֹ֛ה וְלִפְנֵ֥י עֲבָדָ֖יו וַיְהִ֥י לְתַנִּֽין׃
7.englishText: So Moses and Aaron came before Pharaoh and did just as יהוה had commanded: Aaron cast down his rod in the presence of Pharaoh and his courtiers, and it turned into a serpent.
7.transliteration: vַyָּbֹ֨a mֹshֶׁ֤h vְaַhֲrֹן֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֔h vַyַּ֣aֲshׂvּ kֵ֔ן kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r tsִvָּ֣h yְhֹvָ֑h vַyַּshְׁlֵ֨ךְ aַhֲrֹ֜ן aֶt־mַtֵּ֗hvּ lִpְnֵ֥y pַrְaֹ֛h vְlִpְnֵ֥y aֲbָdָ֖yv vַyְhִ֥y lְtַnִּֽyן׃

7.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרָא֙ גַּם־פַּרְעֹ֔ה לַֽחֲכָמִ֖ים וְלַֽמְכַשְּׁפִ֑ים וַיַּֽעֲשׂ֨וּ גַם־הֵ֜ם חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י מִצְרַ֛יִם בְּלַהֲטֵיהֶ֖ם כֵּֽן׃
7.englishText: Then Pharaoh, for his part, summoned the sages and the sorcerers; and the Egyptian magician-priests, in turn, did the same with their spells:
7.transliteration: vַyִּkְrָa֙ gַּם־pַּrְaֹ֔h lַֽchֲkָmִ֖yם vְlַֽmְkַshְּׁpִ֑yם vַyַּֽaֲshׂ֨vּ gַם־hֵ֜ם chַrְtֻmֵּ֥y mִtsְrַ֛yִם bְּlַhֲtֵyhֶ֖ם kֵּֽן׃

7.hebrewText: וַיַּשְׁלִ֙יכוּ֙ אִ֣ישׁ מַטֵּ֔הוּ וַיִּהְי֖וּ לְתַנִּינִ֑ם וַיִּבְלַ֥ע מַטֵּֽה־אַהֲרֹ֖ן אֶת־מַטֹּתָֽם׃
7.englishText: each cast down his rod, and they turned into serpents. But Aaron’s rod swallowed their rods.
7.transliteration: vַyַּshְׁlִ֙ykvּ֙ aִ֣yshׁ mַtֵּ֔hvּ vַyִּhְy֖vּ lְtַnִּynִ֑ם vַyִּbְlַ֥a mַtֵּֽh־aַhֲrֹ֖ן aֶt־mַtֹּtָֽם׃

7.hebrewText: וַיֶּֽחֱזַק֙ לֵ֣ב פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְלֹ֥א שָׁמַ֖ע אֲלֵהֶ֑ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר דִּבֶּ֥ר יְהֹוָֽה׃ {ס}
7.englishText: Yet Pharaoh’s heart stiffened and he did not heed them, as יהוה had said.
7.transliteration: vַyֶּֽchֱzַk֙ lֵ֣b pַּrְaֹ֔h vְlֹ֥a shָׁmַ֖a aֲlֵhֶ֑ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r dִּbֶּ֥r yְhֹvָֽh׃ {s}

7.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהֹוָה֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה כָּבֵ֖ד לֵ֣ב פַּרְעֹ֑ה מֵאֵ֖ן לְשַׁלַּ֥ח הָעָֽם׃
7.englishText: And יהוה said to Moses, “Pharaoh is stubborn; he refuses to let the people go.
7.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhֹvָh֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h kָּbֵ֖d lֵ֣b pַּrְaֹ֑h mֵaֵ֖ן lְshַׁlַּ֥ch hָaָֽם׃

7.hebrewText: לֵ֣ךְ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֞ה בַּבֹּ֗קֶר הִנֵּה֙ יֹצֵ֣א הַמַּ֔יְמָה וְנִצַּבְתָּ֥ לִקְרָאת֖וֹ עַל־שְׂפַ֣ת הַיְאֹ֑ר וְהַמַּטֶּ֛ה אֲשֶׁר־נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ לְנָחָ֖שׁ תִּקַּ֥ח בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃
7.englishText: Go to Pharaoh in the morning, as he is coming out to the water, and station yourself before him at the edge of the Nile, taking with you the rod that turned into a snake.
7.transliteration: lֵ֣ךְ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֞h bַּbֹּ֗kֶr hִnֵּh֙ yֹtsֵ֣a hַmַּ֔yְmָh vְnִtsַּbְtָּ֥ lִkְrָat֖vֹ aַl־shְׂpַ֣t hַyְaֹ֑r vְhַmַּtֶּ֛h aֲshֶׁr־nֶhְpַּ֥ךְ lְnָchָ֖shׁ tִּkַּ֥ch bְּyָdֶֽךָ׃

7.hebrewText: וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ אֵלָ֗יו יְהֹוָ֞ה אֱלֹהֵ֤י הָעִבְרִים֙ שְׁלָחַ֤נִי אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר שַׁלַּח֙ אֶת־עַמִּ֔י וְיַֽעַבְדֻ֖נִי בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר וְהִנֵּ֥ה לֹא־שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ עַד־כֹּֽה׃
7.englishText: And say to him, ‘יהוה, the God of the Hebrews, sent me to you to say, “Let My people go that they may worship Me in the wilderness.” But you have paid no heed until now.
7.transliteration: vְaָmַrְtָּ֣ aֵlָ֗yv yְhֹvָ֞h aֱlֹhֵ֤y hָaִbְrִyם֙ shְׁlָchַ֤nִy aֵlֶ֙yךָ֙ lֵamֹ֔r shַׁlַּch֙ aֶt־aַmִּ֔y vְyַֽaַbְdֻ֖nִy bַּmִּdְbָּ֑r vְhִnֵּ֥h lֹa־shָׁmַ֖aְtָּ aַd־kֹּֽh׃

7.hebrewText: כֹּ֚ה אָמַ֣ר יְהֹוָ֔ה בְּזֹ֣את תֵּדַ֔ע כִּ֖י אֲנִ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה הִנֵּ֨ה אָנֹכִ֜י מַכֶּ֣ה ׀ בַּמַּטֶּ֣ה אֲשֶׁר־בְּיָדִ֗י עַל־הַמַּ֛יִם אֲשֶׁ֥ר בַּיְאֹ֖ר וְנֶהֶפְכ֥וּ לְדָֽם׃
7.englishText: Thus says יהוה, “By this you shall know that I am יהוה.” See, I shall strike the water in the Nile with the rod that is in my hand, and it will be turned into blood;
7.transliteration: kֹּ֚h aָmַ֣r yְhֹvָ֔h bְּzֹ֣at tֵּdַ֔a kִּ֖y aֲnִ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h hִnֵּ֨h aָnֹkִ֜y mַkֶּ֣h ׀ bַּmַּtֶּ֣h aֲshֶׁr־bְּyָdִ֗y aַl־hַmַּ֛yִם aֲshֶׁ֥r bַּyְaֹ֖r vְnֶhֶpְk֥vּ lְdָֽם׃

7.hebrewText: וְהַדָּגָ֧ה אֲשֶׁר־בַּיְאֹ֛ר תָּמ֖וּת וּבָאַ֣שׁ הַיְאֹ֑ר וְנִלְא֣וּ מִצְרַ֔יִם לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת מַ֖יִם מִן־הַיְאֹֽר׃ {ס}
7.englishText: and the fish in the Nile will die. The Nile will stink so that the Egyptians will find it impossible to drink the water of the Nile.’”
7.transliteration: vְhַdָּgָ֧h aֲshֶׁr־bַּyְaֹ֛r tָּm֖vּt vּbָaַ֣shׁ hַyְaֹ֑r vְnִlְa֣vּ mִtsְrַ֔yִם lִshְׁtּ֥vֹt mַ֖yִם mִן־hַyְaֹֽr׃ {s}

7.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יְהֹוָ֜ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֗ה אֱמֹ֣ר אֶֽל־אַהֲרֹ֡ן קַ֣ח מַטְּךָ֣ וּנְטֵֽה־יָדְךָ֩ עַל־מֵימֵ֨י מִצְרַ֜יִם עַֽל־נַהֲרֹתָ֣ם ׀ עַל־יְאֹרֵיהֶ֣ם וְעַל־אַגְמֵיהֶ֗ם וְעַ֛ל כׇּל־מִקְוֵ֥ה מֵימֵיהֶ֖ם וְיִֽהְיוּ־דָ֑ם וְהָ֤יָה דָם֙ בְּכׇל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם וּבָעֵצִ֖ים וּבָאֲבָנִֽים׃
7.englishText: And יהוה said to Moses, “Say to Aaron: Take your rod and hold out your arm over the waters of Egypt—its rivers, its canals, its ponds, all its bodies of water—that they may turn to blood; there shall be blood throughout the land of Egypt, even in vessels of wood and stone.”
7.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yְhֹvָ֜h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֗h aֱmֹ֣r aֶֽl־aַhֲrֹ֡ן kַ֣ch mַtְּךָ֣ vּnְtֵֽh־yָdְךָ֩ aַl־mֵymֵ֨y mִtsְrַ֜yִם aַֽl־nַhֲrֹtָ֣ם ׀ aַl־yְaֹrֵyhֶ֣ם vְaַl־aַgְmֵyhֶ֗ם vְaַ֛l kׇּl־mִkְvֵ֥h mֵymֵyhֶ֖ם vְyִֽhְyvּ־dָ֑ם vְhָ֤yָh dָם֙ bְּkׇl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם vּbָaֵtsִ֖yם vּbָaֲbָnִֽyם׃

7.hebrewText: וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־כֵן֩ מֹשֶׁ֨ה וְאַהֲרֹ֜ן כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ צִוָּ֣ה יְהֹוָ֗ה וַיָּ֤רֶם בַּמַּטֶּה֙ וַיַּ֤ךְ אֶת־הַמַּ֙יִם֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר בַּיְאֹ֔ר לְעֵינֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֔ה וּלְעֵינֵ֖י עֲבָדָ֑יו וַיֵּהָ֥פְכ֛וּ כׇּל־הַמַּ֥יִם אֲשֶׁר־בַּיְאֹ֖ר לְדָֽם׃
7.englishText: Moses and Aaron did just as יהוה commanded: he lifted up the rod and struck the water in the Nile in the sight of Pharaoh and his courtiers, and all the water in the Nile was turned into blood
7.transliteration: vַyַּֽaֲshׂvּ־kֵן֩ mֹshֶׁ֨h vְaַhֲrֹ֜ן kַּaֲshֶׁ֣r ׀ tsִvָּ֣h yְhֹvָ֗h vַyָּ֤rֶם bַּmַּtֶּh֙ vַyַּ֤ךְ aֶt־hַmַּ֙yִם֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r bַּyְaֹ֔r lְaֵynֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֔h vּlְaֵynֵ֖y aֲbָdָ֑yv vַyֵּhָ֥pְk֛vּ kׇּl־hַmַּ֥yִם aֲshֶׁr־bַּyְaֹ֖r lְdָֽם׃

7.hebrewText: וְהַדָּגָ֨ה אֲשֶׁר־בַּיְאֹ֥ר מֵ֙תָה֙ וַיִּבְאַ֣שׁ הַיְאֹ֔ר וְלֹא־יָכְל֣וּ מִצְרַ֔יִם לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת מַ֖יִם מִן־הַיְאֹ֑ר וַיְהִ֥י הַדָּ֖ם בְּכׇל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
7.englishText: and the fish in the Nile died. The Nile stank so that the Egyptians could not drink water from the Nile; and there was blood throughout the land of Egypt.
7.transliteration: vְhַdָּgָ֨h aֲshֶׁr־bַּyְaֹ֥r mֵ֙tָh֙ vַyִּbְaַ֣shׁ hַyְaֹ֔r vְlֹa־yָkְl֣vּ mִtsְrַ֔yִם lִshְׁtּ֥vֹt mַ֖yִם mִן־hַyְaֹ֑r vַyְhִ֥y hַdָּ֖ם bְּkׇl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

7.hebrewText: וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־כֵ֛ן חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י מִצְרַ֖יִם בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק לֵב־פַּרְעֹה֙ וְלֹא־שָׁמַ֣ע אֲלֵהֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר דִּבֶּ֥ר יְהֹוָֽה׃
7.englishText: But when the Egyptian magician-priests did the same with their spells, Pharaoh’s heart stiffened and he did not heed them—as יהוה had spoken.
7.transliteration: vַyַּֽaֲshׂvּ־kֵ֛ן chַrְtֻmֵּ֥y mִtsְrַ֖yִם bְּlָtֵyhֶ֑ם vַyֶּchֱzַ֤k lֵb־pַּrְaֹh֙ vְlֹa־shָׁmַ֣a aֲlֵhֶ֔ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r dִּbֶּ֥r yְhֹvָֽh׃

7.hebrewText: וַיִּ֣פֶן פַּרְעֹ֔ה וַיָּבֹ֖א אֶל־בֵּית֑וֹ וְלֹא־שָׁ֥ת לִבּ֖וֹ גַּם־לָזֹֽאת׃
7.englishText: Pharaoh turned and went into his palace, paying no regard even to this.
7.transliteration: vַyִּ֣pֶן pַּrְaֹ֔h vַyָּbֹ֖a aֶl־bֵּyt֑vֹ vְlֹa־shָׁ֥t lִbּ֖vֹ gַּם־lָzֹֽat׃

7.hebrewText: וַיַּחְפְּר֧וּ כׇל־מִצְרַ֛יִם סְבִיבֹ֥ת הַיְאֹ֖ר מַ֣יִם לִשְׁתּ֑וֹת כִּ֣י לֹ֤א יָֽכְלוּ֙ לִשְׁתֹּ֔ת מִמֵּימֵ֖י הַיְאֹֽר׃
7.englishText: And all the Egyptians had to dig round about the Nile for drinking water, because they could not drink the water of the Nile.
7.transliteration: vַyַּchְpְּr֧vּ kׇl־mִtsְrַ֛yִם sְbִybֹ֥t hַyְaֹ֖r mַ֣yִם lִshְׁtּ֑vֹt kִּ֣y lֹ֤a yָֽkְlvּ֙ lִshְׁtֹּ֔t mִmֵּymֵ֖y hַyְaֹֽr׃

7.hebrewText: וַיִּמָּלֵ֖א שִׁבְעַ֣ת יָמִ֑ים אַחֲרֵ֥י הַכּוֹת־יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־הַיְאֹֽר׃ {פ}
7.englishText: When seven days had passed after יהוה struck the Nile,
7.transliteration: vַyִּmָּlֵ֖a shִׁbְaַ֣t yָmִ֑yם aַchֲrֵ֥y hַkּvֹt־yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־hַyְaֹֽr׃ {p}

7.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהֹוָה֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה בֹּ֖א אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֑ה וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ אֵלָ֗יו כֹּ֚ה אָמַ֣ר יְהֹוָ֔ה שַׁלַּ֥ח אֶת־עַמִּ֖י וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃
7.englishText: *This verse constitutes 8.1 in some editions. יהוה said to Moses, “Go to Pharaoh and say to him, ‘Thus says יהוה: Let My people go that they may worship Me.
7.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhֹvָh֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h bֹּ֖a aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֑h vְaָmַrְtָּ֣ aֵlָ֗yv kֹּ֚h aָmַ֣r yְhֹvָ֔h shַׁlַּ֥ch aֶt־aַmִּ֖y vְyַֽaַbְdֻֽnִy׃

7.hebrewText: וְאִם־מָאֵ֥ן אַתָּ֖ה לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ הִנֵּ֣ה אָנֹכִ֗י נֹגֵ֛ף אֶת־כׇּל־גְּבוּלְךָ֖ בַּֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃
7.englishText: If you refuse to let them go, then I will plague your whole country with frogs.
7.transliteration: vְaִם־mָaֵ֥ן aַtָּ֖h lְshַׁlֵּ֑chַ hִnֵּ֣h aָnֹkִ֗y nֹgֵ֛ף aֶt־kׇּl־gְּbvּlְךָ֖ bַּֽtsְpַrְdְּaִֽyם׃

7.hebrewText: וְשָׁרַ֣ץ הַיְאֹר֮ צְפַרְדְּעִים֒ וְעָלוּ֙ וּבָ֣אוּ בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ וּבַחֲדַ֥ר מִשְׁכָּבְךָ֖ וְעַל־מִטָּתֶ֑ךָ וּבְבֵ֤ית עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ וּבְעַמֶּ֔ךָ וּבְתַנּוּרֶ֖יךָ וּבְמִשְׁאֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃
7.englishText: The Nile shall swarm with frogs, and they shall come up and enter your palace, your bedchamber and your bed, the houses of your courtiers and your people, and your ovens and your kneading bowls.
7.transliteration: vְshָׁrַ֣ץ hַyְaֹr֮ tsְpַrְdְּaִyם֒ vְaָlvּ֙ vּbָ֣avּ bְּbֵytֶ֔ךָ vּbַchֲdַ֥r mִshְׁkָּbְךָ֖ vְaַl־mִtָּtֶ֑ךָ vּbְbֵ֤yt aֲbָdֶ֙yךָ֙ vּbְaַmֶּ֔ךָ vּbְtַnּvּrֶ֖yךָ vּbְmִshְׁaֲrvֹtֶֽyךָ׃

7.hebrewText: וּבְכָ֥ה וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֖ וּבְכׇל־עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ יַעֲל֖וּ הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃
7.englishText: The frogs shall come up on you and on your people and on all your courtiers.’”
7.transliteration: vּbְkָ֥h vּֽbְaַmְּךָ֖ vּbְkׇl־aֲbָdֶ֑yךָ yַaֲl֖vּ hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִֽyם׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר יְהֹוָה֮ אֶל־מֹשֶׁה֒ אֱמֹ֣ר אֶֽל־אַהֲרֹ֗ן נְטֵ֤ה אֶת־יָדְךָ֙ בְּמַטֶּ֔ךָ עַ֨ל־הַנְּהָרֹ֔ת עַל־הַיְאֹרִ֖ים וְעַל־הָאֲגַמִּ֑ים וְהַ֥עַל אֶת־הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים עַל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
8.englishText: And יהוה said to Moses, “Say to Aaron: Hold out your arm with the rod over the rivers, the canals, and the ponds, and bring up the frogs on the land of Egypt.”
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr yְhֹvָh֮ aֶl־mֹshֶׁh֒ aֱmֹ֣r aֶֽl־aַhֲrֹ֗ן nְtֵ֤h aֶt־yָdְךָ֙ bְּmַtֶּ֔ךָ aַ֨l־hַnְּhָrֹ֔t aַl־hַyְaֹrִ֖yם vְaַl־hָaֲgַmִּ֑yם vְhַ֥aַl aֶt־hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִ֖yם aַl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֤ט אַהֲרֹן֙ אֶת־יָד֔וֹ עַ֖ל מֵימֵ֣י מִצְרָ֑יִם וַתַּ֙עַל֙ הַצְּפַרְדֵּ֔עַ וַתְּכַ֖ס אֶת־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
8.englishText: Aaron held out his arm over the waters of Egypt, and the frogs came up and covered the land of Egypt.
8.transliteration: vַyֵּ֤t aַhֲrֹן֙ aֶt־yָd֔vֹ aַ֖l mֵymֵ֣y mִtsְrָ֑yִם vַtַּ֙aַl֙ hַtsְּpַrְdֵּ֔aַ vַtְּkַ֖s aֶt־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־כֵ֥ן הַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֖ים בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם וַיַּעֲל֥וּ אֶת־הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים עַל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
8.englishText: But the magician-priests did the same with their spells, and brought frogs upon the land of Egypt.
8.transliteration: vַyַּֽaֲshׂvּ־kֵ֥ן hַֽchַrְtֻmִּ֖yם bְּlָtֵyhֶ֑ם vַyַּaֲl֥vּ aֶt־hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִ֖yם aַl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

8.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרָ֨א פַרְעֹ֜ה לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֗ן וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ הַעְתִּ֣ירוּ אֶל־יְהֹוָ֔ה וְיָסֵר֙ הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים מִמֶּ֖נִּי וּמֵֽעַמִּ֑י וַאֲשַׁלְּחָה֙ אֶת־הָעָ֔ם וְיִזְבְּח֖וּ לַיהֹוָֽה׃
8.englishText: Then Pharaoh summoned Moses and Aaron and said, “Plead with יהוה to remove the frogs from me and my people, and I will let the people go to sacrifice to יהוה.”
8.transliteration: vַyִּkְrָ֨a pַrְaֹ֜h lְmֹshֶׁ֣h vּֽlְaַhֲrֹ֗ן vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ hַaְtִּ֣yrvּ aֶl־yְhֹvָ֔h vְyָsֵr֙ hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִ֔yם mִmֶּ֖nִּy vּmֵֽaַmִּ֑y vַaֲshַׁlְּchָh֙ aֶt־hָaָ֔ם vְyִzְbְּch֖vּ lַyhֹvָֽh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר מֹשֶׁ֣ה לְפַרְעֹה֮ הִתְפָּאֵ֣ר עָלַי֒ לְמָתַ֣י ׀ אַעְתִּ֣יר לְךָ֗ וְלַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ וּֽלְעַמְּךָ֔ לְהַכְרִית֙ הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים מִמְּךָ֖ וּמִבָּתֶּ֑יךָ רַ֥ק בַּיְאֹ��ר תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃
8.englishText: And Moses said to Pharaoh, “You may have this triumph over me: for what time shall I plead in behalf of you and your courtiers and your people, that the frogs be cut off from you and your houses, to remain only in the Nile?”
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr mֹshֶׁ֣h lְpַrְaֹh֮ hִtְpָּaֵ֣r aָlַy֒ lְmָtַ֣y ׀ aַaְtִּ֣yr lְךָ֗ vְlַaֲbָdֶ֙yךָ֙ vּֽlְaַmְּךָ֔ lְhַkְrִyt֙ hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִ֔yם mִmְּךָ֖ vּmִbָּtֶּ֑yךָ rַ֥k bַּyְaֹ��r tִּshָּׁaַֽrְnָh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר לְמָחָ֑ר וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ כִּדְבָ֣רְךָ֔ לְמַ֣עַן תֵּדַ֔ע כִּי־אֵ֖ין כַּיהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃
8.englishText: “For tomorrow,” he replied. And [Moses] said, “As you say—that you may know that there is none like our God יהוה;
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֖amֶr lְmָchָ֑r vַyֹּ֙amֶr֙ kִּdְbָ֣rְךָ֔ lְmַ֣aַן tֵּdַ֔a kִּy־aֵ֖yן kַּyhֹvָ֥h aֱlֹhֵֽynvּ׃

8.hebrewText: וְסָר֣וּ הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֗ים מִמְּךָ֙ וּמִבָּ֣תֶּ֔יךָ וּמֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ וּמֵעַמֶּ֑ךָ רַ֥ק בַּיְאֹ֖ר תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃
8.englishText: the frogs shall retreat from you and your courtiers and your people; they shall remain only in the Nile.”
8.transliteration: vְsָr֣vּ hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִ֗yם mִmְּךָ֙ vּmִbָּ֣tֶּ֔yךָ vּmֵaֲbָdֶ֖yךָ vּmֵaַmֶּ֑ךָ rַ֥k bַּyְaֹ֖r tִּshָּׁaַֽrְnָh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֵּצֵ֥א מֹשֶׁ֛ה וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן מֵעִ֣ם פַּרְעֹ֑ה וַיִּצְעַ֤ק מֹשֶׁה֙ אֶל־יְהֹוָ֔ה עַל־דְּבַ֥ר הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים אֲשֶׁר־שָׂ֥ם לְפַרְעֹֽה׃
8.englishText: Then Moses and Aaron left Pharaoh’s presence, and Moses cried out to יהוה in the matter of the frogs which had been inflicted upon Pharaoh.
8.transliteration: vַyֵּtsֵ֥a mֹshֶׁ֛h vְaַhֲrֹ֖ן mֵaִ֣ם pַּrְaֹ֑h vַyִּtsְaַ֤k mֹshֶׁh֙ aֶl־yְhֹvָ֔h aַl־dְּbַ֥r hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִ֖yם aֲshֶׁr־shָׂ֥ם lְpַrְaֹֽh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ יְהֹוָ֖ה כִּדְבַ֣ר מֹשֶׁ֑ה וַיָּמֻ֙תוּ֙ הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים מִן־הַבָּתִּ֥ים מִן־הַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת וּמִן־הַשָּׂדֹֽת׃
8.englishText: And יהוה did as Moses asked; the frogs died out in the houses, the courtyards, and the fields.
8.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַshׂ yְhֹvָ֖h kִּdְbַ֣r mֹshֶׁ֑h vַyָּmֻ֙tvּ֙ hַֽtsְpַrְdְּaִ֔yם mִן־hַbָּtִּ֥yם mִן־hַchֲtsֵrֹ֖t vּmִן־hַshָּׂdֹֽt׃

8.hebrewText: וַיִּצְבְּר֥וּ אֹתָ֖ם חֳמָרִ֣ם חֳמָרִ֑ם וַתִּבְאַ֖שׁ הָאָֽרֶץ׃
8.englishText: And they piled them up in heaps, till the land stank.
8.transliteration: vַyִּtsְbְּr֥vּ aֹtָ֖ם chֳmָrִ֣ם chֳmָrִ֑ם vַtִּbְaַ֖shׁ hָaָֽrֶץ׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣רְא פַּרְעֹ֗ה כִּ֤י הָֽיְתָה֙ הָֽרְוָחָ֔ה וְהַכְבֵּד֙ אֶת־לִבּ֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א שָׁמַ֖ע אֲלֵהֶ֑ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר דִּבֶּ֥ר יְהֹוָֽה׃ {ס}
8.englishText: But when Pharaoh saw that there was relief, he became stubborn and would not heed them, as יהוה had spoken.
8.transliteration: vַyַּ֣rְa pַּrְaֹ֗h kִּ֤y hָֽyְtָh֙ hָֽrְvָchָ֔h vְhַkְbֵּd֙ aֶt־lִbּ֔vֹ vְlֹ֥a shָׁmַ֖a aֲlֵhֶ֑ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r dִּbֶּ֥r yְhֹvָֽh׃ {s}

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר יְהֹוָה֮ אֶל־מֹשֶׁה֒ אֱמֹר֙ אֶֽל־אַהֲרֹ֔ן נְטֵ֣ה אֶֽת־מַטְּךָ֔ וְהַ֖ךְ אֶת־עֲפַ֣ר הָאָ֑רֶץ וְהָיָ֥ה לְכִנִּ֖ם בְּכׇל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
8.englishText: Then יהוה said to Moses, “Say to Aaron: Hold out your rod and strike the dust of the earth, and it shall turn to lice throughout the land of Egypt.”
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr yְhֹvָh֮ aֶl־mֹshֶׁh֒ aֱmֹr֙ aֶֽl־aַhֲrֹ֔ן nְtֵ֣h aֶֽt־mַtְּךָ֔ vְhַ֖ךְ aֶt־aֲpַ֣r hָaָ֑rֶץ vְhָyָ֥h lְkִnִּ֖ם bְּkׇl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־כֵ֗ן וַיֵּט֩ אַהֲרֹ֨ן אֶת־יָד֤וֹ בְמַטֵּ֙הוּ֙ וַיַּךְ֙ אֶת־עֲפַ֣ר הָאָ֔רֶץ וַתְּהִי֙ הַכִּנָּ֔ם בָּאָדָ֖ם וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה כׇּל־עֲפַ֥ר הָאָ֛רֶץ הָיָ֥ה כִנִּ֖ים בְּכׇל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
8.englishText: And they did so. Aaron held out his arm with the rod and struck the dust of the earth, and vermin came upon human and beast; all the dust of the earth turned to lice throughout the land of Egypt.
8.transliteration: vַyַּֽaֲshׂvּ־kֵ֗ן vַyֵּt֩ aַhֲrֹ֨ן aֶt־yָd֤vֹ bְmַtֵּ֙hvּ֙ vַyַּךְ֙ aֶt־aֲpַ֣r hָaָ֔rֶץ vַtְּhִy֙ hַkִּnָּ֔ם bָּaָdָ֖ם vּbַbְּhֵmָ֑h kׇּl־aֲpַ֥r hָaָ֛rֶץ hָyָ֥h kִnִּ֖yם bְּkׇl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־כֵ֨ן הַחַרְטֻמִּ֧ים בְּלָטֵיהֶ֛ם לְהוֹצִ֥יא אֶת־הַכִּנִּ֖ים וְלֹ֣א יָכֹ֑לוּ וַתְּהִי֙ הַכִּנָּ֔ם בָּאָדָ֖ם וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃
8.englishText: The magician-priests did the like with their spells to produce lice, but they could not. The vermin remained upon human and beast;
8.transliteration: vַyַּaֲshׂvּ־kֵ֨ן hַchַrְtֻmִּ֧yם bְּlָtֵyhֶ֛ם lְhvֹtsִ֥ya aֶt־hַkִּnִּ֖yם vְlֹ֣a yָkֹ֑lvּ vַtְּhִy֙ hַkִּnָּ֔ם bָּaָdָ֖ם vּbַbְּhֵmָֽh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ הַֽחַרְטֻמִּם֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֔ה אֶצְבַּ֥ע אֱלֹהִ֖ים הִ֑וא וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק לֵב־פַּרְעֹה֙ וְלֹֽא־שָׁמַ֣ע אֲלֵהֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר דִּבֶּ֥ר יְהֹוָֽה׃ {ס}
8.englishText: and the magician-priests said to Pharaoh, “This is the finger of God!” But Pharaoh’s heart stiffened and he would not heed them, as יהוה had spoken.
8.transliteration: vַyֹּamְr֤vּ hַֽchַrְtֻmִּם֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֔h aֶtsְbַּ֥a aֱlֹhִ֖yם hִ֑va vַyֶּchֱzַ֤k lֵb־pַּrְaֹh֙ vְlֹֽa־shָׁmַ֣a aֲlֵhֶ֔ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r dִּbֶּ֥r yְhֹvָֽh׃ {s}

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יְהֹוָ֜ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֗ה הַשְׁכֵּ֤ם בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ וְהִתְיַצֵּב֙ לִפְנֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֔ה הִנֵּ֖ה יוֹצֵ֣א הַמָּ֑יְמָה וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ אֵלָ֗יו כֹּ֚ה אָמַ֣ר יְהֹוָ֔ה שַׁלַּ֥ח עַמִּ֖י וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃
8.englishText: And יהוה said to Moses, “Early in the morning present yourself to Pharaoh, as he is coming out to the water, and say to him, ‘Thus says יהוה: Let My people go that they may worship Me.
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yְhֹvָ֜h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֗h hַshְׁkֵּ֤ם bַּbֹּ֙kֶr֙ vְhִtְyַtsֵּb֙ lִpְnֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֔h hִnֵּ֖h yvֹtsֵ֣a hַmָּ֑yְmָh vְaָmַrְtָּ֣ aֵlָ֗yv kֹּ֚h aָmַ֣r yְhֹvָ֔h shַׁlַּ֥ch aַmִּ֖y vְyַֽaַbְdֻֽnִy׃

8.hebrewText: כִּ֣י אִם־אֵינְךָ֮ מְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ אֶת־עַמִּי֒ הִנְנִי֩ מַשְׁלִ֨יחַ בְּךָ֜ וּבַעֲבָדֶ֧יךָ וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֛ וּבְבָתֶּ֖יךָ אֶת־הֶעָרֹ֑ב וּמָ֨לְא֜וּ בָּתֵּ֤י מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ אֶת־הֶ֣עָרֹ֔ב וְגַ֥ם הָאֲדָמָ֖ה אֲשֶׁר־הֵ֥ם עָלֶֽיהָ׃
8.englishText: For if you do not let My people go, I will let loose swarms of insects*swarms of insects Others “wild beasts.” against you and your courtiers and your people and your houses; the houses of the Egyptians, and the very ground they stand on, shall be filled with swarms of insects.
8.transliteration: kִּ֣y aִם־aֵynְךָ֮ mְshַׁlֵּ֣chַ aֶt־aַmִּy֒ hִnְnִy֩ mַshְׁlִ֨ychַ bְּךָ֜ vּbַaֲbָdֶ֧yךָ vּֽbְaַmְּךָ֛ vּbְbָtֶּ֖yךָ aֶt־hֶaָrֹ֑b vּmָ֨lְa֜vּ bָּtֵּ֤y mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ aֶt־hֶ֣aָrֹ֔b vְgַ֥ם hָaֲdָmָ֖h aֲshֶׁr־hֵ֥ם aָlֶֽyhָ׃

8.hebrewText: וְהִפְלֵיתִי֩ בַיּ֨וֹם הַה֜וּא אֶת־אֶ֣רֶץ גֹּ֗שֶׁן אֲשֶׁ֤ר עַמִּי֙ עֹמֵ֣ד עָלֶ֔יהָ לְבִלְתִּ֥י הֱיֽוֹת־שָׁ֖ם עָרֹ֑ב לְמַ֣עַן תֵּדַ֔ע כִּ֛י אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָ֖ה בְּקֶ֥רֶב הָאָֽרֶץ׃
8.englishText: But on that day I will set apart the region of Goshen, where My people dwell, so that no swarms of insects shall be there, that you may know that I יהוה am in the midst of the land.
8.transliteration: vְhִpְlֵytִy֩ bַyּ֨vֹם hַh֜vּa aֶt־aֶ֣rֶץ gֹּ֗shֶׁן aֲshֶׁ֤r aַmִּy֙ aֹmֵ֣d aָlֶ֔yhָ lְbִlְtִּ֥y hֱyֽvֹt־shָׁ֖ם aָrֹ֑b lְmַ֣aַן tֵּdַ֔a kִּ֛y aֲnִ֥y yְhֹvָ֖h bְּkֶ֥rֶb hָaָֽrֶץ׃

8.hebrewText: וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י פְדֻ֔ת בֵּ֥ין עַמִּ֖י וּבֵ֣ין עַמֶּ֑ךָ לְמָחָ֥ר יִהְיֶ֖ה הָאֹ֥ת הַזֶּֽה׃
8.englishText: And I will make a distinction*distinction Meaning of peduth uncertain. between My people and your people. Tomorrow this sign shall come to pass.’”
8.transliteration: vְshַׂmְtִּ֣y pְdֻ֔t bֵּ֥yן aַmִּ֖y vּbֵ֣yן aַmֶּ֑ךָ lְmָchָ֥r yִhְyֶ֖h hָaֹ֥t hַzֶּֽh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּ֤עַשׂ יְהֹוָה֙ כֵּ֔ן וַיָּבֹא֙ עָרֹ֣ב כָּבֵ֔ד בֵּ֥יתָה פַרְעֹ֖ה וּבֵ֣ית עֲבָדָ֑יו וּבְכׇל־אֶ֧רֶץ מִצְרַ֛יִם תִּשָּׁחֵ֥ת הָאָ֖רֶץ מִפְּנֵ֥י הֶעָרֹֽב׃
8.englishText: And יהוה did so. Heavy swarms of insects invaded Pharaoh’s palace and the houses of his courtiers; throughout the country of Egypt the land was ruined because of the swarms of insects.
8.transliteration: vַyַּ֤aַshׂ yְhֹvָh֙ kֵּ֔ן vַyָּbֹa֙ aָrֹ֣b kָּbֵ֔d bֵּ֥ytָh pַrְaֹ֖h vּbֵ֣yt aֲbָdָ֑yv vּbְkׇl־aֶ֧rֶץ mִtsְrַ֛yִם tִּshָּׁchֵ֥t hָaָ֖rֶץ mִpְּnֵ֥y hֶaָrֹֽb׃

8.hebrewText: וַיִּקְרָ֣א פַרְעֹ֔ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֖ה וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֑ן וַיֹּ֗אמֶר לְכ֛וּ זִבְח֥וּ לֵאלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם בָּאָֽרֶץ׃
8.englishText: Then Pharaoh summoned Moses and Aaron and said, “Go and sacrifice to your God within the land.”
8.transliteration: vַyִּkְrָ֣a pַrְaֹ֔h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֖h vּֽlְaַhֲrֹ֑ן vַyֹּ֗amֶr lְk֛vּ zִbְch֥vּ lֵalֹֽhֵykֶ֖ם bָּaָֽrֶץ׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר מֹשֶׁ֗ה לֹ֤א נָכוֹן֙ לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת כֵּ֔ן כִּ֚י תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת מִצְרַ֔יִם נִזְבַּ֖ח לַיהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ הֵ֣ן נִזְבַּ֞ח אֶת־תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת מִצְרַ֛יִם לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם וְלֹ֥א יִסְקְלֻֽנוּ׃
8.englishText: But Moses replied, “It would not be right to do this, for what we sacrifice to our God יהוה is untouchable to the Egyptians. If we sacrifice that which is untouchable to the Egyptians before their very eyes, will they not stone us?
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr mֹshֶׁ֗h lֹ֤a nָkvֹן֙ lַaֲshׂ֣vֹt kֵּ֔ן kִּ֚y tּvֹaֲbַ֣t mִtsְrַ֔yִם nִzְbַּ֖ch lַyhֹvָ֣h aֱlֹhֵ֑ynvּ hֵ֣ן nִzְbַּ֞ch aֶt־tּvֹaֲbַ֥t mִtsְrַ֛yִם lְaֵynֵyhֶ֖ם vְlֹ֥a yִsְkְlֻֽnvּ׃

8.hebrewText: דֶּ֚רֶךְ שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת יָמִ֔ים נֵלֵ֖ךְ בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר וְזָבַ֙חְנוּ֙ לַֽיהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר יֹאמַ֥ר אֵלֵֽינוּ׃
8.englishText: So we must go a distance of three days into the wilderness and sacrifice to יהוה as our God may command us.”
8.transliteration: dֶּ֚rֶךְ shְׁlֹ֣shֶׁt yָmִ֔yם nֵlֵ֖ךְ bַּmִּdְbָּ֑r vְzָbַ֙chְnvּ֙ lַֽyhֹvָ֣h aֱlֹhֵ֔ynvּ kַּaֲshֶׁ֖r yֹamַ֥r aֵlֵֽynvּ׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר פַּרְעֹ֗ה אָנֹכִ֞י אֲשַׁלַּ֤ח אֶתְכֶם֙ וּזְבַחְתֶּ֞ם לַיהֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר רַ֛ק הַרְחֵ֥ק לֹא־תַרְחִ֖יקוּ לָלֶ֑כֶת הַעְתִּ֖ירוּ בַּעֲדִֽי׃
8.englishText: Pharaoh said, “I will let you go to sacrifice to your God יהוה in the wilderness; but do not go very far. Plead, then, for me.”
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr pַּrְaֹ֗h aָnֹkִ֞y aֲshַׁlַּ֤ch aֶtְkֶם֙ vּzְbַchְtֶּ֞ם lַyhֹvָ֤h aֱlֹֽhֵykֶם֙ bַּmִּdְbָּ֔r rַ֛k hַrְchֵ֥k lֹa־tַrְchִ֖ykvּ lָlֶ֑kֶt hַaְtִּ֖yrvּ bַּaֲdִֽy׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר מֹשֶׁ֗ה הִנֵּ֨ה אָנֹכִ֜י יוֹצֵ֤א מֵֽעִמָּךְ֙ וְהַעְתַּרְתִּ֣י אֶל־יְהֹוָ֔ה וְסָ֣ר הֶעָרֹ֗ב מִפַּרְעֹ֛ה מֵעֲבָדָ֥יו וּמֵעַמּ֖וֹ מָחָ֑ר רַ֗ק אַל־יֹסֵ֤ף פַּרְעֹה֙ הָתֵ֔ל לְבִלְתִּי֙ שַׁלַּ֣ח אֶת־הָעָ֔ם לִזְבֹּ֖חַ לַֽיהֹוָֽה׃
8.englishText: And Moses said, “When I leave your presence, I will plead with יהוה that the swarms of insects depart tomorrow from Pharaoh and his courtiers and his people; but let not Pharaoh again act deceitfully, not letting the people go to sacrifice to יהוה.”
8.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr mֹshֶׁ֗h hִnֵּ֨h aָnֹkִ֜y yvֹtsֵ֤a mֵֽaִmָּךְ֙ vְhַaְtַּrְtִּ֣y aֶl־yְhֹvָ֔h vְsָ֣r hֶaָrֹ֗b mִpַּrְaֹ֛h mֵaֲbָdָ֥yv vּmֵaַmּ֖vֹ mָchָ֑r rַ֗k aַl־yֹsֵ֤ף pַּrְaֹh֙ hָtֵ֔l lְbִlְtִּy֙ shַׁlַּ֣ch aֶt־hָaָ֔ם lִzְbֹּ֖chַ lַֽyhֹvָֽh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיֵּצֵ֥א מֹשֶׁ֖ה מֵעִ֣ם פַּרְעֹ֑ה וַיֶּעְתַּ֖ר אֶל־יְהֹוָֽה׃
8.englishText: So Moses left Pharaoh’s presence and pleaded with יהוה.
8.transliteration: vַyֵּtsֵ֥a mֹshֶׁ֖h mֵaִ֣ם pַּrְaֹ֑h vַyֶּaְtַּ֖r aֶl־yְhֹvָֽh׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּ֤עַשׂ יְהֹוָה֙ כִּדְבַ֣ר מֹשֶׁ֔ה וַיָּ֙סַר֙ הֶעָרֹ֔ב מִפַּרְעֹ֖ה מֵעֲבָדָ֣יו וּמֵעַמּ֑וֹ לֹ֥א נִשְׁאַ֖ר אֶחָֽד׃
8.englishText: And יהוה did as Moses asked—removing the swarms of insects from Pharaoh, from his courtiers, and from his people; not one remained.
8.transliteration: vַyַּ֤aַshׂ yְhֹvָh֙ kִּdְbַ֣r mֹshֶׁ֔h vַyָּ֙sַr֙ hֶaָrֹ֔b mִpַּrְaֹ֖h mֵaֲbָdָ֣yv vּmֵaַmּ֑vֹ lֹ֥a nִshְׁaַ֖r aֶchָֽd׃

8.hebrewText: וַיַּכְבֵּ֤ד פַּרְעֹה֙ אֶת־לִבּ֔וֹ גַּ֖ם בַּפַּ֣עַם הַזֹּ֑את וְלֹ֥א שִׁלַּ֖ח אֶת־הָעָֽם׃ {פ}
8.englishText: But Pharaoh became stubborn this time also, and would not let the people go.
8.transliteration: vַyַּkְbֵּ֤d pַּrְaֹh֙ aֶt־lִbּ֔vֹ gַּ֖ם bַּpַּ֣aַם hַzֹּ֑at vְlֹ֥a shִׁlַּ֖ch aֶt־hָaָֽם׃ {p}

9.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהֹוָה֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה בֹּ֖א אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֑ה וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ אֵלָ֗יו כֹּֽה־אָמַ֤ר יְהֹוָה֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים שַׁלַּ֥ח אֶת־עַמִּ֖י וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃
9.englishText: יהוה said to Moses, “Go to Pharaoh and say to him, ‘Thus says יהוה, the God of the Hebrews: Let My people go to worship Me.
9.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhֹvָh֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h bֹּ֖a aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֑h vְdִbַּrְtָּ֣ aֵlָ֗yv kֹּֽh־aָmַ֤r yְhֹvָh֙ aֱlֹhֵ֣y hָֽaִbְrִ֔yם shַׁlַּ֥ch aֶt־aַmִּ֖y vְyַֽaַbְdֻֽnִy׃

9.hebrewText: כִּ֛י אִם־מָאֵ֥ן אַתָּ֖ה לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ וְעוֹדְךָ֖ מַחֲזִ֥יק בָּֽם׃
9.englishText: For if you refuse to let them go, and continue to hold them,
9.transliteration: kִּ֛y aִם־mָaֵ֥ן aַtָּ֖h lְshַׁlֵּ֑chַ vְavֹdְךָ֖ mַchֲzִ֥yk bָּֽם׃

9.hebrewText: הִנֵּ֨ה יַד־יְהֹוָ֜ה הוֹיָ֗ה בְּמִקְנְךָ֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה בַּסּוּסִ֤ים בַּֽחֲמֹרִים֙ בַּגְּמַלִּ֔ים בַּבָּקָ֖ר וּבַצֹּ֑אן דֶּ֖בֶר כָּבֵ֥ד מְאֹֽד׃
9.englishText: then the hand of יהוה will strike your livestock in the fields—the horses, the asses, the camels, the cattle, and the sheep—with a very severe pestilence.
9.transliteration: hִnֵּ֨h yַd־yְhֹvָ֜h hvֹyָ֗h bְּmִkְnְךָ֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r bַּshָּׂdֶ֔h bַּsּvּsִ֤yם bַּֽchֲmֹrִyם֙ bַּgְּmַlִּ֔yם bַּbָּkָ֖r vּbַtsֹּ֑aן dֶּ֖bֶr kָּbֵ֥d mְaֹֽd׃

9.hebrewText: וְהִפְלָ֣ה יְהֹוָ֔ה בֵּ֚ין מִקְנֵ֣ה יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל וּבֵ֖ין מִקְנֵ֣ה מִצְרָ֑יִם וְלֹ֥א יָמ֛וּת מִכׇּל־לִבְנֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל דָּבָֽר׃
9.englishText: But יהוה will make a distinction between the livestock of Israel and the livestock of the Egyptians, so that nothing shall die of all that belongs to the Israelites.
9.transliteration: vְhִpְlָ֣h yְhֹvָ֔h bֵּ֚yן mִkְnֵ֣h yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l vּbֵ֖yן mִkְnֵ֣h mִtsְrָ֑yִם vְlֹ֥a yָm֛vּt mִkׇּl־lִbְnֵ֥y yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l dָּbָֽr׃

9.hebrewText: וַיָּ֥שֶׂם יְהֹוָ֖ה מוֹעֵ֣ד לֵאמֹ֑ר מָחָ֗ר יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה יְהֹוָ֛ה הַדָּבָ֥ר הַזֶּ֖ה בָּאָֽרֶץ׃
9.englishText: יהוה has fixed the time: tomorrow יהוה will do this thing in the land.’”
9.transliteration: vַyָּ֥shֶׂם yְhֹvָ֖h mvֹaֵ֣d lֵamֹ֑r mָchָ֗r yַaֲshֶׂ֧h yְhֹvָ֛h hַdָּbָ֥r hַzֶּ֖h bָּaָֽrֶץ׃

9.hebrewText: וַיַּ֨עַשׂ יְהֹוָ֜ה אֶת־הַדָּבָ֤ר הַזֶּה֙ מִֽמׇּחֳרָ֔ת וַיָּ֕מׇת כֹּ֖ל מִקְנֵ֣ה מִצְרָ֑יִם וּמִמִּקְנֵ֥ה בְנֵֽי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל לֹא־מֵ֥ת אֶחָֽד׃
9.englishText: And יהוה did so the next day: all the livestock of the Egyptians died, but of the livestock of the Israelites not a beast died.
9.transliteration: vַyַּ֨aַshׂ yְhֹvָ֜h aֶt־hַdָּbָ֤r hַzֶּh֙ mִֽmׇּchֳrָ֔t vַyָּ֕mׇt kֹּ֖l mִkְnֵ֣h mִtsְrָ֑yִם vּmִmִּkְnֵ֥h bְnֵֽy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l lֹa־mֵ֥t aֶchָֽd׃

9.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְהִנֵּ֗ה לֹא־מֵ֛ת מִמִּקְנֵ֥ה יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל עַד־אֶחָ֑ד וַיִּכְבַּד֙ לֵ֣ב פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְלֹ֥א שִׁלַּ֖ח אֶת־הָעָֽם׃ {פ}
9.englishText: When Pharaoh inquired, he found that not a head of the livestock of Israel had died; yet Pharaoh remained stubborn, and he would not let the people go.
9.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁlַ֣ch pַּrְaֹ֔h vְhִnֵּ֗h lֹa־mֵ֛t mִmִּkְnֵ֥h yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l aַd־aֶchָ֑d vַyִּkְbַּd֙ lֵ֣b pַּrְaֹ֔h vְlֹ֥a shִׁlַּ֖ch aֶt־hָaָֽם׃ {p}

9.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר יְהֹוָה֮ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֣ה וְאֶֽל־אַהֲרֹן֒ קְח֤וּ לָכֶם֙ מְלֹ֣א חׇפְנֵיכֶ֔ם פִּ֖יחַ כִּבְשָׁ֑ן וּזְרָק֥וֹ מֹשֶׁ֛ה הַשָּׁמַ֖יְמָה לְעֵינֵ֥י פַרְעֹֽה׃
9.englishText: Then יהוה said to Moses and Aaron, “Each of you take handfuls of soot from the kiln, and let Moses throw it toward the sky in the sight of Pharaoh.
9.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr yְhֹvָh֮ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֣h vְaֶֽl־aַhֲrֹן֒ kְch֤vּ lָkֶם֙ mְlֹ֣a chׇpְnֵykֶ֔ם pִּ֖ychַ kִּbְshָׁ֑ן vּzְrָk֥vֹ mֹshֶׁ֛h hַshָּׁmַ֖yְmָh lְaֵynֵ֥y pַrְaֹֽh׃

9.hebrewText: וְהָיָ֣ה לְאָבָ֔ק עַ֖ל כׇּל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם וְהָיָ֨ה עַל־הָאָדָ֜ם וְעַל־הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה לִשְׁחִ֥ין פֹּרֵ֛חַ אֲבַעְבֻּעֹ֖ת בְּכׇל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
9.englishText: It shall become a fine dust all over the land of Egypt, and cause an inflammation breaking out in boils on human and beast throughout the land of Egypt.”
9.transliteration: vְhָyָ֣h lְaָbָ֔k aַ֖l kׇּl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrָ֑yִם vְhָyָ֨h aַl־hָaָdָ֜ם vְaַl־hַbְּhֵmָ֗h lִshְׁchִ֥yן pֹּrֵ֛chַ aֲbַaְbֻּaֹ֖t bְּkׇl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

9.hebrewText: וַיִּקְח֞וּ אֶת־פִּ֣יחַ הַכִּבְשָׁ֗ן וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ לִפְנֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֔ה וַיִּזְרֹ֥ק אֹת֛וֹ מֹשֶׁ֖ה הַשָּׁמָ֑יְמָה וַיְהִ֗י שְׁחִין֙ אֲבַעְבֻּעֹ֔ת פֹּרֵ֕חַ בָּאָדָ֖ם וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃
9.englishText: So they took soot of the kiln and appeared before Pharaoh; Moses threw it toward the sky, and it caused an inflammation breaking out in boils on human and beast.
9.transliteration: vַyִּkְch֞vּ aֶt־pִּ֣ychַ hַkִּbְshָׁ֗ן vַyַּֽaַmְdvּ֙ lִpְnֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֔h vַyִּzְrֹ֥k aֹt֛vֹ mֹshֶׁ֖h hַshָּׁmָ֑yְmָh vַyְhִ֗y shְׁchִyן֙ aֲbַaְbֻּaֹ֔t pֹּrֵ֕chַ bָּaָdָ֖ם vּbַbְּhֵmָֽh׃

9.hebrewText: וְלֹֽא־יָכְל֣וּ הַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֗ים לַעֲמֹ֛ד לִפְנֵ֥י מֹשֶׁ֖ה מִפְּנֵ֣י הַשְּׁחִ֑ין כִּֽי־הָיָ֣ה הַשְּׁחִ֔ין בַּֽחַרְטֻמִּ֖ם וּבְכׇל־מִצְרָֽיִם׃
9.englishText: The magician-priests were unable to confront Moses because of the inflammation, for the inflammation afflicted the magician-priests as well as all the other Egyptians.
9.transliteration: vְlֹֽa־yָkְl֣vּ hַֽchַrְtֻmִּ֗yם lַaֲmֹ֛d lִpְnֵ֥y mֹshֶׁ֖h mִpְּnֵ֣y hַshְּׁchִ֑yן kִּֽy־hָyָ֣h hַshְּׁchִ֔yן bַּֽchַrְtֻmִּ֖ם vּbְkׇl־mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

9.hebrewText: וַיְחַזֵּ֤ק יְהֹוָה֙ אֶת־לֵ֣ב פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְלֹ֥א שָׁמַ֖ע אֲלֵהֶ֑ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר דִּבֶּ֥ר יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶל־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
9.englishText: But יהוה stiffened the heart of Pharaoh, and he would not heed them, just as יהוה had told Moses.
9.transliteration: vַyְchַzֵּ֤k yְhֹvָh֙ aֶt־lֵ֣b pַּrְaֹ֔h vְlֹ֥a shָׁmַ֖a aֲlֵhֶ֑ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r dִּbֶּ֥r yְhֹvָ֖h aֶl־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

9.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהֹוָה֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם בַּבֹּ֔קֶר וְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב לִפְנֵ֣י פַרְעֹ֑ה וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ אֵלָ֗יו כֹּֽה־אָמַ֤ר יְהֹוָה֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים שַׁלַּ֥ח אֶת־עַמִּ֖י וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃
9.englishText: יהוה said to Moses, “Early in the morning present yourself to Pharaoh and say to him, ‘Thus says יהוה, the God of the Hebrews: Let My people go to worship Me.
9.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhֹvָh֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h hַshְׁkֵּ֣ם bַּbֹּ֔kֶr vְhִtְyַtsֵּ֖b lִpְnֵ֣y pַrְaֹ֑h vְaָmַrְtָּ֣ aֵlָ֗yv kֹּֽh־aָmַ֤r yְhֹvָh֙ aֱlֹhֵ֣y hָֽaִbְrִ֔yם shַׁlַּ֥ch aֶt־aַmִּ֖y vְyַֽaַbְdֻֽnִy׃

9.hebrewText: כִּ֣י ׀ בַּפַּ֣עַם הַזֹּ֗את אֲנִ֨י שֹׁלֵ֜חַ אֶת־כׇּל־מַגֵּפֹתַי֙ אֶֽל־לִבְּךָ֔ וּבַעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ וּבְעַמֶּ֑ךָ בַּעֲב֣וּר תֵּדַ֔ע כִּ֛י אֵ֥ין כָּמֹ֖נִי בְּכׇל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃
9.englishText: For this time I will send all My plagues upon your person, and your courtiers, and your people, in order that you may know that there is none like Me in all the world.
9.transliteration: kִּ֣y ׀ bַּpַּ֣aַם hַzֹּ֗at aֲnִ֨y shֹׁlֵ֜chַ aֶt־kׇּl־mַgֵּpֹtַy֙ aֶֽl־lִbְּךָ֔ vּbַaֲbָdֶ֖yךָ vּbְaַmֶּ֑ךָ bַּaֲb֣vּr tֵּdַ֔a kִּ֛y aֵ֥yן kָּmֹ֖nִy bְּkׇl־hָaָֽrֶץ׃

9.hebrewText: כִּ֤י עַתָּה֙ שָׁלַ֣חְתִּי אֶת־יָדִ֔י וָאַ֥ךְ אוֹתְךָ֛ וְאֶֽת־עַמְּךָ֖ בַּדָּ֑בֶר וַתִּכָּחֵ֖ד מִן־הָאָֽרֶץ׃
9.englishText: I could have stretched forth My hand and stricken you and your people with pestilence, and you would have been effaced from the earth.
9.transliteration: kִּ֤y aַtָּh֙ shָׁlַ֣chְtִּy aֶt־yָdִ֔y vָaַ֥ךְ avֹtְךָ֛ vְaֶֽt־aַmְּךָ֖ bַּdָּ֑bֶr vַtִּkָּchֵ֖d mִן־hָaָֽrֶץ׃

9.hebrewText: וְאוּלָ֗ם בַּעֲב֥וּר זֹאת֙ הֶעֱמַדְתִּ֔יךָ בַּעֲב֖וּר הַרְאֹתְךָ֣ אֶת־כֹּחִ֑י וּלְמַ֛עַן סַפֵּ֥ר שְׁמִ֖י בְּכׇל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃
9.englishText: Nevertheless I have spared you for this purpose: in order to show you My power, and in order that My fame may resound throughout the world.
9.transliteration: vְavּlָ֗ם bַּaֲb֥vּr zֹat֙ hֶaֱmַdְtִּ֔yךָ bַּaֲb֖vּr hַrְaֹtְךָ֣ aֶt־kֹּchִ֑y vּlְmַ֛aַן sַpֵּ֥r shְׁmִ֖y bְּkׇl־hָaָֽrֶץ׃

9.hebrewText: עוֹדְךָ֖ מִסְתּוֹלֵ֣ל בְּעַמִּ֑י לְבִלְתִּ֖י שַׁלְּחָֽם׃
9.englishText: Yet you continue to thwart*thwart Others “exalt yourself over.” My people, and do not let them go!
9.transliteration: avֹdְךָ֖ mִsְtּvֹlֵ֣l bְּaַmִּ֑y lְbִlְtִּ֖y shַׁlְּchָֽם׃

9.hebrewText: הִנְנִ֤י מַמְטִיר֙ כָּעֵ֣ת מָחָ֔ר בָּרָ֖ד כָּבֵ֣ד מְאֹ֑ד אֲשֶׁ֨ר לֹא־הָיָ֤ה כָמֹ֙הוּ֙ בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם לְמִן־הַיּ֥וֹם הִוָּסְדָ֖הֿ וְעַד־עָֽתָּה׃
9.englishText: This time tomorrow I will rain down a very heavy hail, such as has not been in Egypt from the day it was founded until now.
9.transliteration: hִnְnִ֤y mַmְtִyr֙ kָּaֵ֣t mָchָ֔r bָּrָ֖d kָּbֵ֣d mְaֹ֑d aֲshֶׁ֨r lֹa־hָyָ֤h kָmֹ֙hvּ֙ bְּmִtsְrַ֔yִם lְmִן־hַyּ֥vֹם hִvָּsְdָ֖hֿ vְaַd־aָֽtָּh׃

9.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֗ה שְׁלַ֤ח הָעֵז֙ אֶֽת־מִקְנְךָ֔ וְאֵ֛ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֥ר לְךָ֖ בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה כׇּל־הָאָדָ֨ם וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה אֲשֶֽׁר־יִמָּצֵ֣א בַשָּׂדֶ֗ה וְלֹ֤א יֵֽאָסֵף֙ הַבַּ֔יְתָה וְיָרַ֧ד עֲלֵהֶ֛ם הַבָּרָ֖ד וָמֵֽתוּ׃
9.englishText: Therefore, order your livestock and everything you have in the open brought under shelter; every human and beast that is found outside, not having been brought indoors, shall perish when the hail comes down upon them!’”
9.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֗h shְׁlַ֤ch hָaֵz֙ aֶֽt־mִkְnְךָ֔ vְaֵ֛t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֥r lְךָ֖ bַּshָּׂdֶ֑h kׇּl־hָaָdָ֨ם vְhַbְּhֵmָ֜h aֲshֶֽׁr־yִmָּtsֵ֣a bַshָּׂdֶ֗h vְlֹ֤a yֵֽaָsֵף֙ hַbַּ֔yְtָh vְyָrַ֧d aֲlֵhֶ֛ם hַbָּrָ֖d vָmֵֽtvּ׃

9.hebrewText: הַיָּרֵא֙ אֶת־דְּבַ֣ר יְהֹוָ֔ה מֵֽעַבְדֵ֖י פַּרְעֹ֑ה הֵנִ֛יס אֶת־עֲבָדָ֥יו וְאֶת־מִקְנֵ֖הוּ אֶל־הַבָּתִּֽים׃
9.englishText: Those among Pharaoh’s courtiers who feared יהוה’s word brought their slaves and livestock indoors to safety;
9.transliteration: hַyָּrֵa֙ aֶt־dְּbַ֣r yְhֹvָ֔h mֵֽaַbְdֵ֖y pַּrְaֹ֑h hֵnִ֛ys aֶt־aֲbָdָ֥yv vְaֶt־mִkְnֵ֖hvּ aֶl־hַbָּtִּֽyם׃

9.hebrewText: וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר לֹא־שָׂ֛ם לִבּ֖וֹ אֶל־דְּבַ֣ר יְהֹוָ֑ה וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב אֶת־עֲבָדָ֥יו וְאֶת־מִקְנֵ֖הוּ בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ {פ}
9.englishText: but those who paid no regard to the word of יהוה left their slaves and livestock in the open.
9.transliteration: vַaֲshֶׁ֥r lֹa־shָׂ֛ם lִbּ֖vֹ aֶl־dְּbַ֣r yְhֹvָ֑h vַֽyַּaֲzֹ֛b aֶt־aֲbָdָ֥yv vְaֶt־mִkְnֵ֖hvּ bַּshָּׂdֶֽh׃ {p}

9.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יְהֹוָ֜ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֗ה נְטֵ֤ה אֶת־יָֽדְךָ֙ עַל־הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם וִיהִ֥י בָרָ֖ד בְּכׇל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם עַל־הָאָדָ֣ם וְעַל־הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה וְעַ֛ל כׇּל־עֵ֥שֶׂב הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה בְּאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
9.englishText: יהוה said to Moses, “Hold out your arm toward the sky that hail may fall on all the land of Egypt, upon human and beast and all the grasses of the field in the land of Egypt.”
9.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yְhֹvָ֜h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֗h nְtֵ֤h aֶt־yָֽdְךָ֙ aַl־hַshָּׁmַ֔yִם vִyhִ֥y bָrָ֖d bְּkׇl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrָ֑yִם aַl־hָaָdָ֣ם vְaַl־hַbְּhֵmָ֗h vְaַ֛l kׇּl־aֵ֥shֶׂb hַshָּׂdֶ֖h bְּaֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

9.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֨ט מֹשֶׁ֣ה אֶת־מַטֵּ֘הוּ֮ עַל־הַשָּׁמַ֒יִם֒ וַֽיהֹוָ֗ה נָתַ֤ן קֹלֹת֙ וּבָרָ֔ד וַתִּ֥הֲלַךְ אֵ֖שׁ אָ֑רְצָה וַיַּמְטֵ֧ר יְהֹוָ֛ה בָּרָ֖ד עַל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
9.englishText: So Moses held out his rod toward the sky, and יהוה sent thunder and hail, and fire streamed down to the ground, as יהוה rained down hail upon the land of Egypt.
9.transliteration: vַyֵּ֨t mֹshֶׁ֣h aֶt־mַtֵּ֘hvּ֮ aַl־hַshָּׁmַ֒yִם֒ vַֽyhֹvָ֗h nָtַ֤ן kֹlֹt֙ vּbָrָ֔d vַtִּ֥hֲlַךְ aֵ֖shׁ aָ֑rְtsָh vַyַּmְtֵ֧r yְhֹvָ֛h bָּrָ֖d aַl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

9.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֣י בָרָ֔ד וְאֵ֕שׁ מִתְלַקַּ֖חַת בְּת֣וֹךְ הַבָּרָ֑ד כָּבֵ֣ד מְאֹ֔ד אֲ֠שֶׁ֠ר לֹֽא־הָיָ֤ה כָמֹ֙הוּ֙ בְּכׇל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם מֵאָ֖ז הָיְתָ֥ה לְגֽוֹי׃
9.englishText: The hail was very heavy—fire flashing in the midst of the hail—such as had not fallen on the land of Egypt since it had become a nation.
9.transliteration: vַyְhִ֣y bָrָ֔d vְaֵ֕shׁ mִtְlַkַּ֖chַt bְּt֣vֹךְ hַbָּrָ֑d kָּbֵ֣d mְaֹ֔d aֲ֠shֶׁ֠r lֹֽa־hָyָ֤h kָmֹ֙hvּ֙ bְּkׇl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם mֵaָ֖z hָyְtָ֥h lְgֽvֹy׃

9.hebrewText: וַיַּ֨ךְ הַבָּרָ֜ד בְּכׇל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֗יִם אֵ֚ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה מֵאָדָ֖ם וְעַד־בְּהֵמָ֑ה וְאֵ֨ת כׇּל־עֵ֤שֶׂב הַשָּׂדֶה֙ הִכָּ֣ה הַבָּרָ֔ד וְאֶת־כׇּל־עֵ֥ץ הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה שִׁבֵּֽר׃
9.englishText: Throughout the land of Egypt the hail struck down all that were in the open, both human and beast; the hail also struck down all the grasses of the field and shattered all the trees of the field.
9.transliteration: vַyַּ֨ךְ hַbָּrָ֜d bְּkׇl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֗yִם aֵ֚t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֣r bַּshָּׂdֶ֔h mֵaָdָ֖ם vְaַd־bְּhֵmָ֑h vְaֵ֨t kׇּl־aֵ֤shֶׂb hַshָּׂdֶh֙ hִkָּ֣h hַbָּrָ֔d vְaֶt־kׇּl־aֵ֥ץ hַshָּׂdֶ֖h shִׁbֵּֽr׃

9.hebrewText: רַ֚ק בְּאֶ֣רֶץ גֹּ֔שֶׁן אֲשֶׁר־שָׁ֖ם בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל לֹ֥א הָיָ֖ה בָּרָֽד׃
9.englishText: Only in the region of Goshen, where the Israelites were, there was no hail.
9.transliteration: rַ֚k bְּaֶ֣rֶץ gֹּ֔shֶׁן aֲshֶׁr־shָׁ֖ם bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l lֹ֥a hָyָ֖h bָּrָֽd׃

9.hebrewText: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח פַּרְעֹ֗ה וַיִּקְרָא֙ לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֔ן וַיֹּ֥אמֶר אֲלֵהֶ֖ם חָטָ֣אתִי הַפָּ֑עַם יְהֹוָה֙ הַצַּדִּ֔יק וַאֲנִ֥י וְעַמִּ֖י הָרְשָׁעִֽים׃
9.englishText: Thereupon Pharaoh sent for Moses and Aaron and said to them, “I stand guilty this time. יהוה is in the right, and I and my people are in the wrong.
9.transliteration: vַyִּshְׁlַ֣ch pַּrְaֹ֗h vַyִּkְrָa֙ lְmֹshֶׁ֣h vּֽlְaַhֲrֹ֔ן vַyֹּ֥amֶr aֲlֵhֶ֖ם chָtָ֣atִy hַpָּ֑aַם yְhֹvָh֙ hַtsַּdִּ֔yk vַaֲnִ֥y vְaַmִּ֖y hָrְshָׁaִֽyם׃

9.hebrewText: הַעְתִּ֙ירוּ֙ אֶל־יְהֹוָ֔ה וְרַ֕ב מִֽהְיֹ֛ת קֹלֹ֥ת אֱלֹהִ֖ים וּבָרָ֑ד וַאֲשַׁלְּחָ֣ה אֶתְכֶ֔ם וְלֹ֥א תֹסִפ֖וּן לַעֲמֹֽד׃
9.englishText: Plead with יהוה that there may be an end of God’s thunder and of hail. I will let you go; you need stay no longer.”
9.transliteration: hַaְtִּ֙yrvּ֙ aֶl־yְhֹvָ֔h vְrַ֕b mִֽhְyֹ֛t kֹlֹ֥t aֱlֹhִ֖yם vּbָrָ֑d vַaֲshַׁlְּchָ֣h aֶtְkֶ֔ם vְlֹ֥a tֹsִp֖vּן lַaֲmֹֽd׃

9.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר אֵלָיו֙ מֹשֶׁ֔ה כְּצֵאתִי֙ אֶת־הָעִ֔יר אֶפְרֹ֥שׂ אֶת־כַּפַּ֖י אֶל־יְהֹוָ֑ה הַקֹּל֣וֹת יֶחְדָּל֗וּן וְהַבָּרָד֙ לֹ֣א יִֽהְיֶה־ע֔וֹד לְמַ֣עַן תֵּדַ֔ע כִּ֥י לַיהֹוָ֖ה הָאָֽרֶץ׃
9.englishText: Moses said to him, “As I go out of the city, I shall spread out my hands to יהוה; the thunder will cease and the hail will fall no more, so that you may know that the earth is יהוה’s.
9.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr aֵlָyv֙ mֹshֶׁ֔h kְּtsֵatִy֙ aֶt־hָaִ֔yr aֶpְrֹ֥shׂ aֶt־kַּpַּ֖y aֶl־yְhֹvָ֑h hַkֹּl֣vֹt yֶchְdָּl֗vּן vְhַbָּrָd֙ lֹ֣a yִֽhְyֶh־a֔vֹd lְmַ֣aַן tֵּdַ֔a kִּ֥y lַyhֹvָ֖h hָaָֽrֶץ׃

9.hebrewText: וְאַתָּ֖ה וַעֲבָדֶ֑יךָ יָדַ֕עְתִּי כִּ֚י טֶ֣רֶם תִּֽירְא֔וּן מִפְּנֵ֖י יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהִֽים׃
9.englishText: But I know that you and your courtiers do not yet fear God יהוה.”—
9.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֖h vַaֲbָdֶ֑yךָ yָdַ֕aְtִּy kִּ֚y tֶ֣rֶם tִּֽyrְa֔vּן mִpְּnֵ֖y yְhֹvָ֥h aֱlֹhִֽyם׃

9.hebrewText: וְהַפִּשְׁתָּ֥ה וְהַשְּׂעֹרָ֖ה נֻכָּ֑תָה כִּ֤י הַשְּׂעֹרָה֙ אָבִ֔יב וְהַפִּשְׁתָּ֖ה גִּבְעֹֽל׃
9.englishText: Now the flax and barley were ruined, for the barley was in the ear and the flax was in bud;
9.transliteration: vְhַpִּshְׁtָּ֥h vְhַshְּׂaֹrָ֖h nֻkָּ֑tָh kִּ֤y hַshְּׂaֹrָh֙ aָbִ֔yb vְhַpִּshְׁtָּ֖h gִּbְaֹֽl׃

9.hebrewText: וְהַחִטָּ֥ה וְהַכֻּסֶּ֖מֶת לֹ֣א נֻכּ֑וּ כִּ֥י אֲפִילֹ֖ת הֵֽנָּה׃
9.englishText: but the wheat and the emmer*emmer A kind of wheat. were not hurt, for they ripen late.—
9.transliteration: vְhַchִtָּ֥h vְhַkֻּsֶּ֖mֶt lֹ֣a nֻkּ֑vּ kִּ֥y aֲpִylֹ֖t hֵֽnָּh׃

9.hebrewText: וַיֵּצֵ֨א מֹשֶׁ֜ה מֵעִ֤ם פַּרְעֹה֙ אֶת־הָעִ֔יר וַיִּפְרֹ֥שׂ כַּפָּ֖יו אֶל־יְהֹוָ֑ה וַֽיַּחְדְּל֤וּ הַקֹּלוֹת֙ וְהַבָּרָ֔ד וּמָטָ֖ר לֹא־נִתַּ֥ךְ אָֽרְצָה׃
9.englishText: Leaving Pharaoh, Moses went outside the city and spread out his hands to יהוה: the thunder and the hail ceased, and no rain came pouring down upon the earth.
9.transliteration: vַyֵּtsֵ֨a mֹshֶׁ֜h mֵaִ֤ם pַּrְaֹh֙ aֶt־hָaִ֔yr vַyִּpְrֹ֥shׂ kַּpָּ֖yv aֶl־yְhֹvָ֑h vַֽyַּchְdְּl֤vּ hַkֹּlvֹt֙ vְhַbָּrָ֔d vּmָtָ֖r lֹa־nִtַּ֥ךְ aָֽrְtsָh׃

9.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣רְא פַּרְעֹ֗ה כִּֽי־חָדַ֨ל הַמָּטָ֧ר וְהַבָּרָ֛ד וְהַקֹּלֹ֖ת וַיֹּ֣סֶף לַחֲטֹ֑א וַיַּכְבֵּ֥ד לִבּ֖וֹ ה֥וּא וַעֲבָדָֽיו׃
9.englishText: But when Pharaoh saw that the rain and the hail and the thunder had ceased, he became stubborn and reverted to his guilty ways, as did his courtiers.
9.transliteration: vַyַּ֣rְa pַּrְaֹ֗h kִּֽy־chָdַ֨l hַmָּtָ֧r vְhַbָּrָ֛d vְhַkֹּlֹ֖t vַyֹּ֣sֶף lַchֲtֹ֑a vַyַּkְbֵּ֥d lִbּ֖vֹ h֥vּa vַaֲbָdָֽyv׃

9.hebrewText: וַיֶּֽחֱזַק֙ לֵ֣ב פַּרְעֹ֔ה וְלֹ֥א שִׁלַּ֖ח אֶת־בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר דִּבֶּ֥ר יְהֹוָ֖ה בְּיַד־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {פ}
9.englishText: So Pharaoh’s heart stiffened and he would not let the Israelites go, just as יהוה had foretold through Moses.
9.transliteration: vַyֶּֽchֱzַk֙ lֵ֣b pַּrְaֹ֔h vְlֹ֥a shִׁlַּ֖ch aֶt־bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r dִּbֶּ֥r yְhֹvָ֖h bְּyַd־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {p}

bo.name: Bo
bo.summary: The final three plagues: locusts, darkness, and the death of the firstborn, the Passover, the Exodus from Egypt, and the consecration of the firstborn.

10.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יְהֹוָה֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה בֹּ֖א אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֑ה כִּֽי־אֲנִ֞י הִכְבַּ֤דְתִּי אֶת־לִבּוֹ֙ וְאֶת־לֵ֣ב עֲבָדָ֔יו לְמַ֗עַן שִׁתִ֛י אֹתֹתַ֥י אֵ֖לֶּה בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃
10.englishText: Then יהוה said to Moses, “Go to Pharaoh. For I have hardened his heart and the hearts of his courtiers, in order that I may display these My signs among them,
10.transliteration: vַyֹּ֤amֶr yְhֹvָh֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h bֹּ֖a aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֑h kִּֽy־aֲnִ֞y hִkְbַּ֤dְtִּy aֶt־lִbּvֹ֙ vְaֶt־lֵ֣b aֲbָdָ֔yv lְmַ֗aַן shִׁtִ֛y aֹtֹtַ֥y aֵ֖lֶּh bְּkִrְbּֽvֹ׃

10.hebrewText: וּלְמַ֡עַן תְּסַפֵּר֩ בְּאׇזְנֵ֨י בִנְךָ֜ וּבֶן־בִּנְךָ֗ אֵ֣ת אֲשֶׁ֤ר הִתְעַלַּ֙לְתִּי֙ בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם וְאֶת־אֹתֹתַ֖י אֲשֶׁר־שַׂ֣מְתִּי בָ֑ם וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם כִּי־אֲנִ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃
10.englishText: and that you may recount in the hearing of your child and of your child’s child how I made a mockery of the Egyptians and how I displayed My signs among them—in order that you may know that I am יהוה.”
10.transliteration: vּlְmַ֡aַן tְּsַpֵּr֩ bְּaׇzְnֵ֨y bִnְךָ֜ vּbֶן־bִּnְךָ֗ aֵ֣t aֲshֶׁ֤r hִtְaַlַּ֙lְtִּy֙ bְּmִtsְrַ֔yִם vְaֶt־aֹtֹtַ֖y aֲshֶׁr־shַׂ֣mְtִּy bָ֑ם vִֽydַaְtֶּ֖ם kִּy־aֲnִ֥y yְhֹvָֽh׃

10.hebrewText: וַיָּבֹ֨א מֹשֶׁ֣ה וְאַהֲרֹן֮ אֶל־פַּרְעֹה֒ וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ אֵלָ֗יו כֹּֽה־אָמַ֤ר יְהֹוָה֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים עַד־מָתַ֣י מֵאַ֔נְתָּ לֵעָנֹ֖ת מִפָּנָ֑י שַׁלַּ֥ח עַמִּ֖י וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃
10.englishText: So Moses and Aaron went to Pharaoh and said to him, “Thus says יהוה, the God of the Hebrews, ‘How long will you refuse to humble yourself before Me? Let My people go that they may worship Me.
10.transliteration: vַyָּbֹ֨a mֹshֶׁ֣h vְaַhֲrֹן֮ aֶl־pַּrְaֹh֒ vַyֹּamְr֣vּ aֵlָ֗yv kֹּֽh־aָmַ֤r yְhֹvָh֙ aֱlֹhֵ֣y hָֽaִbְrִ֔yם aַd־mָtַ֣y mֵaַ֔nְtָּ lֵaָnֹ֖t mִpָּnָ֑y shַׁlַּ֥ch aַmִּ֖y vְyַֽaַbְdֻֽnִy׃

10.hebrewText: כִּ֛י אִם־מָאֵ֥ן אַתָּ֖ה לְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ אֶת־עַמִּ֑י הִנְנִ֨י מֵבִ֥יא מָחָ֛ר אַרְבֶּ֖ה בִּגְבֻלֶֽךָ׃
10.englishText: For if you refuse to let My people go, tomorrow I will bring locusts on your territory.
10.transliteration: kִּ֛y aִם־mָaֵ֥ן aַtָּ֖h lְshַׁlֵּ֣chַ aֶt־aַmִּ֑y hִnְnִ֨y mֵbִ֥ya mָchָ֛r aַrְbֶּ֖h bִּgְbֻlֶֽךָ׃

10.hebrewText: וְכִסָּה֙ אֶת־עֵ֣ין הָאָ֔רֶץ וְלֹ֥א יוּכַ֖ל לִרְאֹ֣ת אֶת־הָאָ֑רֶץ וְאָכַ֣ל ׀ אֶת־יֶ֣תֶר הַפְּלֵטָ֗ה הַנִּשְׁאֶ֤רֶת לָכֶם֙ מִן־הַבָּרָ֔ד וְאָכַל֙ אֶת־כׇּל־הָעֵ֔ץ הַצֹּמֵ֥חַ לָכֶ֖ם מִן־הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃
10.englishText: They shall cover the surface of the land, so that no one will be able to see the land. They shall devour the surviving remnant that was left to you after the hail; and they shall eat away all your trees that grow in the field.
10.transliteration: vְkִsָּh֙ aֶt־aֵ֣yן hָaָ֔rֶץ vְlֹ֥a yvּkַ֖l lִrְaֹ֣t aֶt־hָaָ֑rֶץ vְaָkַ֣l ׀ aֶt־yֶ֣tֶr hַpְּlֵtָ֗h hַnִּshְׁaֶ֤rֶt lָkֶם֙ mִן־hַbָּrָ֔d vְaָkַl֙ aֶt־kׇּl־hָaֵ֔ץ hַtsֹּmֵ֥chַ lָkֶ֖ם mִן־hַshָּׂdֶֽh׃

10.hebrewText: וּמָלְא֨וּ בָתֶּ֜יךָ וּבָתֵּ֣י כׇל־עֲבָדֶ֘יךָ֮ וּבָתֵּ֣י כׇל־מִצְרַ֒יִם֒ אֲשֶׁ֨ר לֹֽא־רָא֤וּ אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ וַאֲב֣וֹת אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ מִיּ֗וֹם הֱיוֹתָם֙ עַל־הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה עַ֖ד הַיּ֣וֹם הַזֶּ֑ה וַיִּ֥פֶן וַיֵּצֵ֖א מֵעִ֥ם פַּרְעֹֽה׃
10.englishText: Moreover, they shall fill your palaces and the houses of all your courtiers and of all the Egyptians—something that neither your fathers nor fathers’ fathers have seen from the day they appeared on earth to this day.’” With that he turned and left Pharaoh’s presence.
10.transliteration: vּmָlְa֨vּ bָtֶּ֜yךָ vּbָtֵּ֣y kׇl־aֲbָdֶ֘yךָ֮ vּbָtֵּ֣y kׇl־mִtsְrַ֒yִם֒ aֲshֶׁ֨r lֹֽa־rָa֤vּ aֲbֹtֶ֙yךָ֙ vַaֲb֣vֹt aֲbֹtֶ֔yךָ mִyּ֗vֹם hֱyvֹtָם֙ aַl־hָ֣aֲdָmָ֔h aַ֖d hַyּ֣vֹם hַzֶּ֑h vַyִּ֥pֶן vַyֵּtsֵ֖a mֵaִ֥ם pַּrְaֹֽh׃

10.hebrewText: וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ עַבְדֵ֨י פַרְעֹ֜ה אֵלָ֗יו עַד־מָתַי֙ יִהְיֶ֨ה זֶ֥ה לָ֙נוּ֙ לְמוֹקֵ֔שׁ שַׁלַּח֙ אֶת־הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים וְיַֽעַבְד֖וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם הֲטֶ֣רֶם תֵּדַ֔ע כִּ֥י אָבְדָ֖ה מִצְרָֽיִם׃
10.englishText: Pharaoh’s courtiers said to him, “How long shall this one be a snare to us? Let a delegation*a delegation Lit. “the [salient] participants,” i.e., not everyone. Trad. “the men.” See the Dictionary under ’ish. go to worship their God יהוה ! Are you not yet aware that Egypt is lost?”
10.transliteration: vַyֹּamְrvּ֩ aַbְdֵ֨y pַrְaֹ֜h aֵlָ֗yv aַd־mָtַy֙ yִhְyֶ֨h zֶ֥h lָ֙nvּ֙ lְmvֹkֵ֔shׁ shַׁlַּch֙ aֶt־hָ֣aֲnָshִׁ֔yם vְyַֽaַbְd֖vּ aֶt־yְhֹvָ֣h aֱlֹhֵyhֶ֑ם hֲtֶ֣rֶם tֵּdַ֔a kִּ֥y aָbְdָ֖h mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

10.hebrewText: וַיּוּשַׁ֞ב אֶת־מֹשֶׁ֤ה וְאֶֽת־אַהֲרֹן֙ אֶל־פַּרְעֹ֔ה וַיֹּ֣אמֶר אֲלֵהֶ֔ם לְכ֥וּ עִבְד֖וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם מִ֥י וָמִ֖י הַהֹלְכִֽים׃
10.englishText: So Moses and Aaron were brought back to Pharaoh and he said to them, “Go, worship your God יהוה ! Who are the ones to go?”
10.transliteration: vַyּvּshַׁ֞b aֶt־mֹshֶׁ֤h vְaֶֽt־aַhֲrֹן֙ aֶl־pַּrְaֹ֔h vַyֹּ֣amֶr aֲlֵhֶ֔ם lְk֥vּ aִbְd֖vּ aֶt־yְhֹvָ֣h aֱlֹhֵykֶ֑ם mִ֥y vָmִ֖y hַhֹlְkִֽyם׃

10.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר מֹשֶׁ֔ה בִּנְעָרֵ֥ינוּ וּבִזְקֵנֵ֖ינוּ נֵלֵ֑ךְ בְּבָנֵ֨ינוּ וּבִבְנוֹתֵ֜נוּ בְּצֹאנֵ֤נוּ וּבִבְקָרֵ֙נוּ֙ נֵלֵ֔ךְ כִּ֥י חַג־יְהֹוָ֖ה לָֽנוּ׃
10.englishText: Moses replied, “We will all go—regardless of social station*regardless of social station Heb. bi-n‘areinu u-vi-ziqneinu, taking na‘ar and zaqen as terms of social rank—lit. “with our underlings and with our elders.” NJPS “young and old.” See the Dictionary under na‘ar and “elders.” —we will go with our sons and daughters, our flocks and herds; for we must observe יהוה’s festival.”
10.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr mֹshֶׁ֔h bִּnְaָrֵ֥ynvּ vּbִzְkֵnֵ֖ynvּ nֵlֵ֑ךְ bְּbָnֵ֨ynvּ vּbִbְnvֹtֵ֜nvּ bְּtsֹanֵ֤nvּ vּbִbְkָrֵ֙nvּ֙ nֵlֵ֔ךְ kִּ֥y chַg־yְhֹvָ֖h lָֽnvּ׃

10.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר אֲלֵהֶ֗ם יְהִ֨י כֵ֤ן יְהֹוָה֙ עִמָּכֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח אֶתְכֶ֖ם וְאֶֽת־טַפְּכֶ֑ם רְא֕וּ כִּ֥י רָעָ֖ה נֶ֥גֶד פְּנֵיכֶֽם׃
10.englishText: But he said to them, “יהוה be with you—the same as I mean to let your dependents go with you! Clearly, you are bent on mischief.
10.transliteration: vַyֹּ֣amֶr aֲlֵhֶ֗ם yְhִ֨y kֵ֤ן yְhֹvָh֙ aִmָּkֶ֔ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r aֲshַׁlַּ֥ch aֶtְkֶ֖ם vְaֶֽt־tַpְּkֶ֑ם rְa֕vּ kִּ֥y rָaָ֖h nֶ֥gֶd pְּnֵykֶֽם׃

10.hebrewText: לֹ֣א כֵ֗ן לְכֽוּ־נָ֤א הַגְּבָרִים֙ וְעִבְד֣וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֔ה כִּ֥י אֹתָ֖הּ אַתֶּ֣ם מְבַקְשִׁ֑ים וַיְגָ֣רֶשׁ אֹתָ֔ם מֵאֵ֖ת פְּנֵ֥י פַרְעֹֽה׃ {ס}
10.englishText: No! You gentlemen go and worship יהוה, since that is what you want.” And they were expelled from Pharaoh’s presence.
10.transliteration: lֹ֣a kֵ֗ן lְkֽvּ־nָ֤a hַgְּbָrִyם֙ vְaִbְd֣vּ aֶt־yְhֹvָ֔h kִּ֥y aֹtָ֖hּ aַtֶּ֣ם mְbַkְshִׁ֑yם vַyְgָ֣rֶshׁ aֹtָ֔ם mֵaֵ֖t pְּnֵ֥y pַrְaֹֽh׃ {s}

10.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יְהֹוָ֜ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֗ה נְטֵ֨ה יָדְךָ֜ עַל־אֶ֤רֶץ מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ בָּֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה וְיַ֖עַל עַל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם וְיֹאכַל֙ אֶת־כׇּל־עֵ֣שֶׂב הָאָ֔רֶץ אֵ֛ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁ֥ר הִשְׁאִ֖יר הַבָּרָֽד׃
10.englishText: Then יהוה said to Moses, “Hold out your arm over the land of Egypt for the locusts, that they may come upon the land of Egypt and eat up all the grasses in the land, whatever the hail has left.”
10.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yְhֹvָ֜h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֗h nְtֵ֨h yָdְךָ֜ aַl־aֶ֤rֶץ mִtsְrַ֙yִם֙ bָּֽaַrְbֶּ֔h vְyַ֖aַl aַl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrָ֑yִם vְyֹakַl֙ aֶt־kׇּl־aֵ֣shֶׂb hָaָ֔rֶץ aֵ֛t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁ֥r hִshְׁaִ֖yr hַbָּrָֽd׃

10.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֨ט מֹשֶׁ֣ה אֶת־מַטֵּ֘הוּ֮ עַל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֒יִם֒ וַֽיהֹוָ֗ה נִהַ֤ג רֽוּחַ־קָדִים֙ בָּאָ֔רֶץ כׇּל־הַיּ֥וֹם הַה֖וּא וְכׇל־הַלָּ֑יְלָה הַבֹּ֣קֶר הָיָ֔ה וְר֙וּחַ֙ הַקָּדִ֔ים נָשָׂ֖א אֶת־הָאַרְבֶּֽה׃
10.englishText: So Moses held out his rod over the land of Egypt, and יהוה drove an east wind over the land all that day and all night; and when morning came, the east wind had brought the locusts.
10.transliteration: vַyֵּ֨t mֹshֶׁ֣h aֶt־mַtֵּ֘hvּ֮ aַl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֒yִם֒ vַֽyhֹvָ֗h nִhַ֤g rֽvּchַ־kָdִyם֙ bָּaָ֔rֶץ kׇּl־hַyּ֥vֹם hַh֖vּa vְkׇl־hַlָּ֑yְlָh hַbֹּ֣kֶr hָyָ֔h vְr֙vּchַ֙ hַkָּdִ֔yם nָshָׂ֖a aֶt־hָaַrְbֶּֽh׃

10.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣עַל הָֽאַרְבֶּ֗ה עַ֚ל כׇּל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם וַיָּ֕נַח בְּכֹ֖ל גְּב֣וּל מִצְרָ֑יִם כָּבֵ֣ד מְאֹ֔ד לְ֠פָנָ֠יו לֹא־הָ֨יָה כֵ֤ן אַרְבֶּה֙ כָּמֹ֔הוּ וְאַחֲרָ֖יו לֹ֥א יִֽהְיֶה־כֵּֽן׃
10.englishText: Locusts invaded all the land of Egypt and settled within all the territory of Egypt in a thick mass; never before had there been so many, nor will there ever be so many again.
10.transliteration: vַyַּ֣aַl hָֽaַrְbֶּ֗h aַ֚l kׇּl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrַ֔yִם vַyָּ֕nַch bְּkֹ֖l gְּb֣vּl mִtsְrָ֑yִם kָּbֵ֣d mְaֹ֔d lְ֠pָnָ֠yv lֹa־hָ֨yָh kֵ֤ן aַrְbֶּh֙ kָּmֹ֔hvּ vְaַchֲrָ֖yv lֹ֥a yִֽhְyֶh־kֵּֽן׃

10.hebrewText: וַיְכַ֞ס אֶת־עֵ֣ין כׇּל־הָאָ֘רֶץ֮ וַתֶּחְשַׁ֣ךְ הָאָ֒רֶץ֒ וַיֹּ֜אכַל אֶת־כׇּל־עֵ֣שֶׂב הָאָ֗רֶץ וְאֵת֙ כׇּל־פְּרִ֣י הָעֵ֔ץ אֲשֶׁ֥ר הוֹתִ֖יר הַבָּרָ֑ד וְלֹא־נוֹתַ֨ר כׇּל־יֶ֧רֶק בָּעֵ֛ץ וּבְעֵ֥שֶׂב הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה בְּכׇל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרָֽיִם׃
10.englishText: They hid all the land from view, and the land was darkened; and they ate up all the grasses of the field and all the fruit of the trees which the hail had left, so that nothing green was left, of tree or grass of the field, in all the land of Egypt.
10.transliteration: vַyְkַ֞s aֶt־aֵ֣yן kׇּl־hָaָ֘rֶץ֮ vַtֶּchְshַׁ֣ךְ hָaָ֒rֶץ֒ vַyֹּ֜akַl aֶt־kׇּl־aֵ֣shֶׂb hָaָ֗rֶץ vְaֵt֙ kׇּl־pְּrִ֣y hָaֵ֔ץ aֲshֶׁ֥r hvֹtִ֖yr hַbָּrָ֑d vְlֹa־nvֹtַ֨r kׇּl־yֶ֧rֶk bָּaֵ֛ץ vּbְaֵ֥shֶׂb hַshָּׂdֶ֖h bְּkׇl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

10.hebrewText: וַיְמַהֵ֣ר פַּרְעֹ֔ה לִקְרֹ֖א לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֑ן וַיֹּ֗אמֶר חָטָ֛אתִי לַיהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם וְלָכֶֽם׃
10.englishText: Pharaoh hurriedly summoned Moses and Aaron and said, “I stand guilty before your God יהוה and before you.
10.transliteration: vַyְmַhֵ֣r pַּrְaֹ֔h lִkְrֹ֖a lְmֹshֶׁ֣h vּֽlְaַhֲrֹ֑ן vַyֹּ֗amֶr chָtָ֛atִy lַyhֹvָ֥h aֱlֹֽhֵykֶ֖ם vְlָkֶֽם׃

10.hebrewText: וְעַתָּ֗ה שָׂ֣א נָ֤א חַטָּאתִי֙ אַ֣ךְ הַפַּ֔עַם וְהַעְתִּ֖ירוּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם וְיָסֵר֙ מֵֽעָלַ֔י רַ֖ק אֶת־הַמָּ֥וֶת הַזֶּֽה׃
10.englishText: Forgive my offense just this once, and plead with your God יהוה that this death but be removed from me.”
10.transliteration: vְaַtָּ֗h shָׂ֣a nָ֤a chַtָּatִy֙ aַ֣ךְ hַpַּ֔aַם vְhַaְtִּ֖yrvּ lַyhֹvָ֣h aֱlֹhֵykֶ֑ם vְyָsֵr֙ mֵֽaָlַ֔y rַ֖k aֶt־hַmָּ֥vֶt hַzֶּֽh׃

10.hebrewText: וַיֵּצֵ֖א מֵעִ֣ם פַּרְעֹ֑ה וַיֶּעְתַּ֖ר אֶל־יְהֹוָֽה׃
10.englishText: So he left Pharaoh’s presence and pleaded with יהוה.
10.transliteration: vַyֵּtsֵ֖a mֵaִ֣ם pַּrְaֹ֑h vַyֶּaְtַּ֖r aֶl־yְhֹvָֽh׃

10.hebrewText: וַיַּהֲפֹ֨ךְ יְהֹוָ֤ה רֽוּחַ־יָם֙ חָזָ֣ק מְאֹ֔ד וַיִּשָּׂא֙ אֶת־הָ֣אַרְבֶּ֔ה וַיִּתְקָעֵ֖הוּ יָ֣מָּה סּ֑וּף לֹ֤א נִשְׁאַר֙ אַרְבֶּ֣ה אֶחָ֔ד בְּכֹ֖ל גְּב֥וּל מִצְרָֽיִם׃
10.englishText: יהוה caused a shift to a very strong west wind, which lifted the locusts and hurled them into the Sea of Reeds;*Sea of Reeds Traditionally, but incorrectly, “Red Sea.” not a single locust remained in all the territory of Egypt.
10.transliteration: vַyַּhֲpֹ֨ךְ yְhֹvָ֤h rֽvּchַ־yָם֙ chָzָ֣k mְaֹ֔d vַyִּshָּׂa֙ aֶt־hָ֣aַrְbֶּ֔h vַyִּtְkָaֵ֖hvּ yָ֣mָּh sּ֑vּף lֹ֤a nִshְׁaַr֙ aַrְbֶּ֣h aֶchָ֔d bְּkֹ֖l gְּb֥vּl mִtsְrָֽyִם׃

10.hebrewText: וַיְחַזֵּ֥ק יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־לֵ֣ב פַּרְעֹ֑ה וְלֹ֥א שִׁלַּ֖ח אֶת־בְּנֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ {פ}
10.englishText: But יהוה stiffened Pharaoh’s heart, and he would not let the Israelites go.
10.transliteration: vַyְchַzֵּ֥k yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־lֵ֣b pַּrְaֹ֑h vְlֹ֥a shִׁlַּ֖ch aֶt־bְּnֵ֥y yִshְׂrָaֵֽl׃ {p}

10.hebrewText: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר יְהֹוָ֜ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֗ה נְטֵ֤ה יָֽדְךָ֙ עַל־הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם וִ֥יהִי חֹ֖שֶׁךְ עַל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם וְיָמֵ֖שׁ חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃
10.englishText: Then יהוה said to Moses, “Hold out your arm toward the sky that there may be darkness upon the land of Egypt, a darkness that can be touched.”
10.transliteration: vַyֹּ֨amֶr yְhֹvָ֜h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֗h nְtֵ֤h yָֽdְךָ֙ aַl־hַshָּׁmַ֔yִם vִ֥yhִy chֹ֖shֶׁךְ aַl־aֶ֣rֶץ mִtsְrָ֑yִם vְyָmֵ֖shׁ chֹֽshֶׁךְ׃

10.hebrewText: וַיֵּ֥ט מֹשֶׁ֛ה אֶת־יָד֖וֹ עַל־הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם וַיְהִ֧י חֹֽשֶׁךְ־אֲפֵלָ֛ה בְּכׇל־אֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת יָמִֽים׃
10.englishText: Moses held out his arm toward the sky and thick darkness descended upon all the land of Egypt for three days.
10.transliteration: vַyֵּ֥t mֹshֶׁ֛h aֶt־yָd֖vֹ aַl־hַshָּׁmָ֑yִם vַyְhִ֧y chֹֽshֶׁךְ־aֲpֵlָ֛h bְּkׇl־aֶ֥rֶץ mִtsְrַ֖yִם shְׁlֹ֥shֶׁt yָmִֽyם׃

10.hebrewText: לֹֽא־רָא֞וּ אִ֣ישׁ אֶת־אָחִ֗יו וְלֹא־קָ֛מוּ אִ֥ישׁ מִתַּחְתָּ֖יו שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת יָמִ֑ים וּֽלְכׇל־בְּנֵ֧י יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל הָ֥יָה א֖וֹר בְּמוֹשְׁבֹתָֽם׃
10.englishText: People could not see one another, and for three days no one could move about; but all the Israelites enjoyed light in their dwellings.
10.transliteration: lֹֽa־rָa֞vּ aִ֣yshׁ aֶt־aָchִ֗yv vְlֹa־kָ֛mvּ aִ֥yshׁ mִtַּchְtָּ֖yv shְׁlֹ֣shֶׁt yָmִ֑yם vּֽlְkׇl־bְּnֵ֧y yִshְׂrָaֵ֛l hָ֥yָh a֖vֹr bְּmvֹshְׁbֹtָֽם׃
