37.hebrewText: וַיַּ֜עַשׂ אֶֽת־הַכֵּלִ֣ים ׀ אֲשֶׁ֣ר עַל־הַשֻּׁלְחָ֗ן אֶת־קְעָרֹתָ֤יו וְאֶת־כַּפֹּתָיו֙ וְאֵת֙ מְנַקִּיֹּתָ֔יו וְאֶ֨ת־הַקְּשָׂוֺ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֥ר יֻסַּ֖ךְ בָּהֵ֑ן זָהָ֖ב טָהֽוֹר׃ {פ}
37.englishText: The utensils that were to be upon the table—its bowls, ladles, jugs, and jars with which to offer libations—he made of pure gold.
37.transliteration: vַyַּ֜aַshׂ aֶֽt־hַkֵּlִ֣yם ׀ aֲshֶׁ֣r aַl־hַshֻּׁlְchָ֗ן aֶt־kְaָrֹtָ֤yv vְaֶt־kַּpֹּtָyv֙ vְaֵt֙ mְnַkִּyֹּtָ֔yv vְaֶ֨t־hַkְּshָׂvֺ֔t aֲshֶׁ֥r yֻsַּ֖ךְ bָּhֵ֑ן zָhָ֖b tָhֽvֹr׃ {p}

37.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ אֶת־הַמְּנֹרָ֖ה זָהָ֣ב טָה֑וֹר מִקְשָׁ֞ה עָשָׂ֤ה אֶת־הַמְּנֹרָה֙ יְרֵכָ֣הּ וְקָנָ֔הּ גְּבִיעֶ֛יהָ כַּפְתֹּרֶ֥יהָ וּפְרָחֶ֖יהָ מִמֶּ֥נָּה הָיֽוּ׃
37.englishText: He made the lampstand of pure gold. He made the lampstand—its base and its shaft—of hammered work; its cups, calyxes, and petals were of one piece with it.
37.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַshׂ aֶt־hַmְּnֹrָ֖h zָhָ֣b tָh֑vֹr mִkְshָׁ֞h aָshָׂ֤h aֶt־hַmְּnֹrָh֙ yְrֵkָ֣hּ vְkָnָ֔hּ gְּbִyaֶ֛yhָ kַּpְtֹּrֶ֥yhָ vּpְrָchֶ֖yhָ mִmֶּ֥nָּh hָyֽvּ׃

37.hebrewText: וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה קָנִ֔ים יֹצְאִ֖ים מִצִּדֶּ֑יהָ שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה ׀ קְנֵ֣י מְנֹרָ֗ה מִצִּדָּהּ֙ הָֽאֶחָ֔ד וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ קְנֵ֣י מְנֹרָ֔ה מִצִּדָּ֖הּ הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃
37.englishText: Six branches issued from its sides: three branches from one side of the lampstand, and three branches from the other side of the lampstand.
37.transliteration: vְshִׁshָּׁ֣h kָnִ֔yם yֹtsְaִ֖yם mִtsִּdֶּ֑yhָ shְׁlֹshָׁ֣h ׀ kְnֵ֣y mְnֹrָ֗h mִtsִּdָּhּ֙ hָֽaֶchָ֔d vּshְׁlֹshָׁh֙ kְnֵ֣y mְnֹrָ֔h mִtsִּdָּ֖hּ hַshֵּׁnִֽy׃

37.hebrewText: שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה גְ֠בִעִ֠ים מְֽשֻׁקָּדִ֞ים בַּקָּנֶ֣ה הָאֶחָד֮ כַּפְתֹּ֣ר וָפֶ֒רַח֒ וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה גְבִעִ֗ים מְשֻׁקָּדִ֛ים בְּקָנֶ֥ה אֶחָ֖ד כַּפְתֹּ֣ר וָפָ֑רַח כֵּ֚ן לְשֵׁ֣שֶׁת הַקָּנִ֔ים הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים מִן־הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃
37.englishText: There were three cups shaped like almond-blossoms, each with calyx and petals, on one branch; and there were three cups shaped like almond-blossoms, each with calyx and petals, on the next branch; so for all six branches issuing from the lampstand.
37.transliteration: shְׁlֹshָׁ֣h gְ֠bִaִ֠yם mְֽshֻׁkָּdִ֞yם bַּkָּnֶ֣h hָaֶchָd֮ kַּpְtֹּ֣r vָpֶ֒rַch֒ vּshְׁlֹshָׁ֣h gְbִaִ֗yם mְshֻׁkָּdִ֛yם bְּkָnֶ֥h aֶchָ֖d kַּpְtֹּ֣r vָpָ֑rַch kֵּ֚ן lְshֵׁ֣shֶׁt hַkָּnִ֔yם hַyֹּtsְaִ֖yם mִן־hַmְּnֹrָֽh׃

37.hebrewText: וּבַמְּנֹרָ֖ה אַרְבָּעָ֣ה גְבִעִ֑ים מְשֻׁ֨קָּדִ֔ים כַּפְתֹּרֶ֖יהָ וּפְרָחֶֽיהָ׃
37.englishText: On the lampstand itself there were four cups shaped like almond-blossoms, each with calyx and petals:
37.transliteration: vּbַmְּnֹrָ֖h aַrְbָּaָ֣h gְbִaִ֑yם mְshֻׁ֨kָּdִ֔yם kַּpְtֹּrֶ֖yhָ vּpְrָchֶֽyhָ׃

37.hebrewText: וְכַפְתֹּ֡ר תַּ֩חַת֩ שְׁנֵ֨י הַקָּנִ֜ים מִמֶּ֗נָּה וְכַפְתֹּר֙ תַּ֣חַת שְׁנֵ֤י הַקָּנִים֙ מִמֶּ֔נָּה וְכַפְתֹּ֕ר תַּֽחַת־שְׁנֵ֥י הַקָּנִ֖ים מִמֶּ֑נָּה לְשֵׁ֙שֶׁת֙ הַקָּנִ֔ים הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים מִמֶּֽנָּה׃
37.englishText: a calyx, of one piece with it, under a pair of branches; and a calyx, of one piece with it, under the second pair of branches; and a calyx, of one piece with it, under the last pair of branches; so for all six branches issuing from it.
37.transliteration: vְkַpְtֹּ֡r tַּ֩chַt֩ shְׁnֵ֨y hַkָּnִ֜yם mִmֶּ֗nָּh vְkַpְtֹּr֙ tַּ֣chַt shְׁnֵ֤y hַkָּnִyם֙ mִmֶּ֔nָּh vְkַpְtֹּ֕r tַּֽchַt־shְׁnֵ֥y hַkָּnִ֖yם mִmֶּ֑nָּh lְshֵׁ֙shֶׁt֙ hַkָּnִ֔yם hַyֹּtsְaִ֖yם mִmֶּֽnָּh׃

37.hebrewText: כַּפְתֹּרֵיהֶ֥ם וּקְנֹתָ֖ם מִמֶּ֣נָּה הָי֑וּ כֻּלָּ֛הּ מִקְשָׁ֥ה אַחַ֖ת זָהָ֥ב טָהֽוֹר׃
37.englishText: Their calyxes and their stems were of one piece with it, the whole of it a single hammered piece of pure gold.
37.transliteration: kַּpְtֹּrֵyhֶ֥ם vּkְnֹtָ֖ם mִmֶּ֣nָּh hָy֑vּ kֻּlָּ֛hּ mִkְshָׁ֥h aַchַ֖t zָhָ֥b tָhֽvֹr׃

37.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ אֶת־נֵרֹתֶ֖יהָ שִׁבְעָ֑ה וּמַלְקָחֶ֥יהָ וּמַחְתֹּתֶ֖יהָ זָהָ֥ב טָהֽוֹר׃
37.englishText: He made its seven lamps, its tongs, and its fire pans of pure gold.
37.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַshׂ aֶt־nֵrֹtֶ֖yhָ shִׁbְaָ֑h vּmַlְkָchֶ֥yhָ vּmַchְtֹּtֶ֖yhָ zָhָ֥b tָhֽvֹr׃

37.hebrewText: כִּכָּ֛ר זָהָ֥ב טָה֖וֹר עָשָׂ֣ה אֹתָ֑הּ וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־כֵּלֶֽיהָ׃ {פ}
37.englishText: He made it and all its furnishings out of a talent of pure gold.
37.transliteration: kִּkָּ֛r zָhָ֥b tָh֖vֹr aָshָׂ֣h aֹtָ֑hּ vְaֵ֖t kׇּl־kֵּlֶֽyhָ׃ {p}

37.hebrewText: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ אֶת־מִזְבַּ֥ח הַקְּטֹ֖רֶת עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים אַמָּ֣ה אׇרְכּוֹ֩ וְאַמָּ֨ה רׇחְבּ֜וֹ רָב֗וּעַ וְאַמָּתַ֙יִם֙ קֹֽמָת֔וֹ מִמֶּ֖נּוּ הָי֥וּ קַרְנֹתָֽיו׃
37.englishText: He made the incense altar of acacia wood, a cubit long and a cubit wide—square—and two cubits high; its horns were of one piece with it.
37.transliteration: vַyַּ֛aַshׂ aֶt־mִzְbַּ֥ch hַkְּtֹ֖rֶt aֲtsֵ֣y shִׁtִּ֑yם aַmָּ֣h aׇrְkּvֹ֩ vְaַmָּ֨h rׇchְbּ֜vֹ rָb֗vּaַ vְaַmָּtַ֙yִם֙ kֹֽmָt֔vֹ mִmֶּ֖nּvּ hָy֥vּ kַrְnֹtָֽyv׃

37.hebrewText: וַיְצַ֨ף אֹת֜וֹ זָהָ֣ב טָה֗וֹר אֶת־גַּגּ֧וֹ וְאֶת־קִירֹתָ֛יו סָבִ֖יב וְאֶת־קַרְנֹתָ֑יו וַיַּ֥עַשׂ ל֛וֹ זֵ֥ר זָהָ֖ב סָבִֽיב׃
37.englishText: He overlaid it with pure gold: its top, its sides round about, and its horns; and he made a gold molding for it round about.
37.transliteration: vַyְtsַ֨ף aֹt֜vֹ zָhָ֣b tָh֗vֹr aֶt־gַּgּ֧vֹ vְaֶt־kִyrֹtָ֛yv sָbִ֖yb vְaֶt־kַrְnֹtָ֑yv vַyַּ֥aַshׂ l֛vֹ zֵ֥r zָhָ֖b sָbִֽyb׃

37.hebrewText: וּשְׁתֵּי֩ טַבְּעֹ֨ת זָהָ֜ב עָֽשָׂה־ל֣וֹ ׀ מִתַּ֣חַת לְזֵר֗וֹ עַ֚ל שְׁתֵּ֣י צַלְעֹתָ֔יו עַ֖ל שְׁנֵ֣י צִדָּ֑יו לְבָתִּ֣ים לְבַדִּ֔ים לָשֵׂ֥את אֹת֖וֹ בָּהֶֽם׃
37.englishText: He made two gold rings for it under its molding, on its two walls—on opposite sides—as holders for the poles with which to carry it.
37.transliteration: vּshְׁtֵּy֩ tַbְּaֹ֨t zָhָ֜b aָֽshָׂh־l֣vֹ ׀ mִtַּ֣chַt lְzֵr֗vֹ aַ֚l shְׁtֵּ֣y tsַlְaֹtָ֔yv aַ֖l shְׁnֵ֣y tsִdָּ֑yv lְbָtִּ֣yם lְbַdִּ֔yם lָshֵׂ֥at aֹt֖vֹ bָּhֶֽם׃

37.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ אֶת־הַבַּדִּ֖ים עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים וַיְצַ֥ף אֹתָ֖ם זָהָֽב׃
37.englishText: He made the poles of acacia wood, and overlaid them with gold.
37.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַshׂ aֶt־hַbַּdִּ֖yם aֲtsֵ֣y shִׁtִּ֑yם vַyְtsַ֥ף aֹtָ֖ם zָhָֽb׃

37.hebrewText: וַיַּ֜עַשׂ אֶת־שֶׁ֤מֶן הַמִּשְׁחָה֙ קֹ֔דֶשׁ וְאֶת־קְטֹ֥רֶת הַסַּמִּ֖ים טָה֑וֹר מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה רֹקֵֽחַ׃ {ס}
37.englishText: He prepared the sacred anointing oil and the pure aromatic incense, expertly blended.
37.transliteration: vַyַּ֜aַshׂ aֶt־shֶׁ֤mֶן hַmִּshְׁchָh֙ kֹ֔dֶshׁ vְaֶt־kְtֹ֥rֶt hַsַּmִּ֖yם tָh֑vֹr mַaֲshֵׂ֖h rֹkֵֽchַ׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ אֶת־מִזְבַּ֥ח הָעֹלָ֖ה עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים חָמֵשׁ֩ אַמּ֨וֹת אׇרְכּ֜וֹ וְחָֽמֵשׁ־אַמּ֤וֹת רׇחְבּוֹ֙ רָב֔וּעַ וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ אַמּ֖וֹת קֹמָתֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: He made the altar for burnt offering of acacia wood, five cubits long and five cubits wide—square—and three cubits high.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֛aַshׂ aֶt־mִzְbַּ֥ch hָaֹlָ֖h aֲtsֵ֣y shִׁtִּ֑yם chָmֵshׁ֩ aַmּ֨vֹt aׇrְkּ֜vֹ vְchָֽmֵshׁ־aַmּ֤vֹt rׇchְbּvֹ֙ rָb֔vּaַ vְshָׁlֹ֥shׁ aַmּ֖vֹt kֹmָtֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣עַשׂ קַרְנֹתָ֗יו עַ֚ל אַרְבַּ֣ע פִּנֹּתָ֔יו מִמֶּ֖נּוּ הָי֣וּ קַרְנֹתָ֑יו וַיְצַ֥ף אֹת֖וֹ נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
38.englishText: He made horns for it on its four corners, the horns being of one piece with it; and he overlaid it with copper.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֣aַshׂ kַrְnֹtָ֗yv aַ֚l aַrְbַּ֣a pִּnֹּtָ֔yv mִmֶּ֖nּvּ hָy֣vּ kַrְnֹtָ֑yv vַyְtsַ֥ף aֹt֖vֹ nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֜עַשׂ אֶֽת־כׇּל־כְּלֵ֣י הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ אֶת־הַסִּירֹ֤ת וְאֶת־הַיָּעִים֙ וְאֶת־הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת אֶת־הַמִּזְלָגֹ֖ת וְאֶת־הַמַּחְתֹּ֑ת כׇּל־כֵּלָ֖יו עָשָׂ֥ה נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
38.englishText: He made all the utensils of the altar—the pails, the scrapers, the basins, the flesh hooks, and the fire pans; he made all these utensils of copper.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֜aַshׂ aֶֽt־kׇּl־kְּlֵ֣y hַmִּzְbֵּ֗chַ aֶt־hַsִּyrֹ֤t vְaֶt־hַyָּaִyם֙ vְaֶt־hַmִּzְrָkֹ֔t aֶt־hַmִּzְlָgֹ֖t vְaֶt־hַmַּchְtֹּ֑t kׇּl־kֵּlָ֖yv aָshָׂ֥h nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֤עַשׂ לַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ מִכְבָּ֔ר מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה רֶ֣שֶׁת נְחֹ֑שֶׁת תַּ֧חַת כַּרְכֻּבּ֛וֹ מִלְּמַ֖טָּה עַד־חֶצְיֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: He made for the altar a grating of meshwork in copper, extending below, under its ledge, to its middle.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֤aַshׂ lַmִּzְbֵּ֙chַ֙ mִkְbָּ֔r mַaֲshֵׂ֖h rֶ֣shֶׁt nְchֹ֑shֶׁt tַּ֧chַt kַּrְkֻּbּ֛vֹ mִlְּmַ֖tָּh aַd־chֶtsְyֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיִּצֹ֞ק אַרְבַּ֧ע טַבָּעֹ֛ת בְּאַרְבַּ֥ע הַקְּצָוֺ֖ת לְמִכְבַּ֣ר הַנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת בָּתִּ֖ים לַבַּדִּֽים׃
38.englishText: He cast four rings, at the four corners of the copper grating, as holders for the poles.
38.transliteration: vַyִּtsֹ֞k aַrְbַּ֧a tַbָּaֹ֛t bְּaַrְbַּ֥a hַkְּtsָvֺ֖t lְmִkְbַּ֣r hַnְּchֹ֑shֶׁt bָּtִּ֖yם lַbַּdִּֽyם׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ אֶת־הַבַּדִּ֖ים עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים וַיְצַ֥ף אֹתָ֖ם נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
38.englishText: He made the poles of acacia wood and overlaid them with copper;
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַshׂ aֶt־hַbַּdִּ֖yם aֲtsֵ֣y shִׁtִּ֑yם vַyְtsַ֥ף aֹtָ֖ם nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃

38.hebrewText: וַיָּבֵ֨א אֶת־הַבַּדִּ֜ים בַּטַּבָּעֹ֗ת עַ֚ל צַלְעֹ֣ת הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ לָשֵׂ֥את אֹת֖וֹ בָּהֶ֑ם נְב֥וּב לֻחֹ֖ת עָשָׂ֥ה אֹתֽוֹ׃ {ס}
38.englishText: and he inserted the poles into the rings on the side walls of the altar, to carry it by them. He made it hollow, of boards.
38.transliteration: vַyָּbֵ֨a aֶt־hַbַּdִּ֜yם bַּtַּbָּaֹ֗t aַ֚l tsַlְaֹ֣t hַmִּzְbֵּ֔chַ lָshֵׂ֥at aֹt֖vֹ bָּhֶ֑ם nְb֥vּb lֻchֹ֖t aָshָׂ֥h aֹtֽvֹ׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֗עַשׂ אֵ֚ת הַכִּיּ֣וֹר נְחֹ֔שֶׁת וְאֵ֖ת כַּנּ֣וֹ נְחֹ֑שֶׁת בְּמַרְאֹת֙ הַצֹּ֣בְאֹ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֣ר צָֽבְא֔וּ פֶּ֖תַח אֹ֥הֶל מוֹעֵֽד׃ {ס}
38.englishText: He made the laver of copper and its stand of copper, from the mirrors of the women who performed tasks*women who performed tasks Precise nuance of Heb. ṣove’ot ’asher ṣave’u uncertain. at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֗aַshׂ aֵ֚t hַkִּyּ֣vֹr nְchֹ֔shֶׁt vְaֵ֖t kַּnּ֣vֹ nְchֹ֑shֶׁt bְּmַrְaֹt֙ hַtsֹּ֣bְaֹ֔t aֲshֶׁ֣r tsָֽbְa֔vּ pֶּ֖tַch aֹ֥hֶl mvֹaֵֽd׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֖עַשׂ אֶת־הֶחָצֵ֑ר לִפְאַ֣ת ׀ נֶ֣גֶב תֵּימָ֗נָה קַלְעֵ֤י הֶֽחָצֵר֙ שֵׁ֣שׁ מׇשְׁזָ֔ר מֵאָ֖ה בָּאַמָּֽה׃
38.englishText: He made the enclosure: On the south*south Cf. note at 26.18. side, a hundred cubits of hangings of fine twisted linen for the enclosure—
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֖aַshׂ aֶt־hֶchָtsֵ֑r lִpְaַ֣t ׀ nֶ֣gֶb tֵּymָ֗nָh kַlְaֵ֤y hֶֽchָtsֵr֙ shֵׁ֣shׁ mׇshְׁzָ֔r mֵaָ֖h bָּaַmָּֽh׃

38.hebrewText: עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם עֶשְׂרִ֔ים וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם עֶשְׂרִ֖ים נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וָוֵ֧י הָעַמּוּדִ֛ים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: with their twenty posts and their twenty sockets of copper, the hooks and bands of the posts being silver.
38.transliteration: aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם aֶshְׂrִ֔yם vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֥ם aֶshְׂrִ֖yם nְchֹ֑shֶׁt vָvֵ֧y hָaַmּvּdִ֛yם vַchֲshֻׁkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְלִפְאַ֤ת צָפוֹן֙ מֵאָ֣ה בָֽאַמָּ֔ה עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם עֶשְׂרִ֔ים וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם עֶשְׂרִ֖ים נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וָוֵ֧י הָֽעַמּוּדִ֛ים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: On the north side, a hundred cubits—with their twenty posts and their twenty sockets of copper, the hooks and bands of the posts being silver.
38.transliteration: vְlִpְaַ֤t tsָpvֹן֙ mֵaָ֣h bָֽaַmָּ֔h aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם aֶshְׂrִ֔yם vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֥ם aֶshְׂrִ֖yם nְchֹ֑shֶׁt vָvֵ֧y hָֽaַmּvּdִ֛yם vַchֲshֻׁkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְלִפְאַת־יָ֗ם קְלָעִים֙ חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם עֲשָׂרָ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם עֲשָׂרָ֑ה וָוֵ֧י הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: On the west side, fifty cubits of hangings—with their ten posts and their ten sockets, the hooks and bands of the posts being silver.
38.transliteration: vְlִpְaַt־yָ֗ם kְlָaִyם֙ chֲmִshִּׁ֣yם bָּֽaַmָּ֔h aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם aֲshָׂrָ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֖ם aֲshָׂrָ֑h vָvֵ֧y hָaַmֻּdִ֛yם vַchֲshׁvּkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְלִפְאַ֛ת קֵ֥דְמָה מִזְרָ֖חָה חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים אַמָּֽה׃
38.englishText: And on the front side, to the east, fifty cubits:
38.transliteration: vְlִpְaַ֛t kֵ֥dְmָh mִzְrָ֖chָh chֲmִshִּׁ֥yם aַmָּֽh׃

38.hebrewText: קְלָעִ֛ים חֲמֵשׁ־עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה אַמָּ֖ה אֶל־הַכָּתֵ֑ף עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃
38.englishText: fifteen cubits of hangings on the one flank, with their three posts and their three sockets,
38.transliteration: kְlָaִ֛yם chֲmֵshׁ־aֶshְׂrֵ֥h aַmָּ֖h aֶl־hַkָּtֵ֑ף aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם shְׁlֹshָׁ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֖ם shְׁlֹshָֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: וְלַכָּתֵ֣ף הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית מִזֶּ֤ה וּמִזֶּה֙ לְשַׁ֣עַר הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר קְלָעִ֕ים חֲמֵ֥שׁ עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה אַמָּ֑ה עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃
38.englishText: and fifteen cubits of hangings on the other flank—on each side of the gate of the enclosure*enclosure Which accounts for the remaining 20 cubits; cf. v. 18. —with their three posts and their three sockets.
38.transliteration: vְlַkָּtֵ֣ף hַshֵּׁnִ֗yt mִzֶּ֤h vּmִzֶּh֙ lְshַׁ֣aַr hֶֽchָtsֵ֔r kְlָaִ֕yם chֲmֵ֥shׁ aֶshְׂrֵ֖h aַmָּ֑h aַmֻּdֵyhֶ֣ם shְׁlֹshָׁ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֖ם shְׁlֹshָֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: כׇּל־קַלְעֵ֧י הֶחָצֵ֛ר סָבִ֖יב שֵׁ֥שׁ מׇשְׁזָֽר׃
38.englishText: All the hangings around the enclosure were of fine twisted linen.
38.transliteration: kׇּl־kַlְaֵ֧y hֶchָtsֵ֛r sָbִ֖yb shֵׁ֥shׁ mׇshְׁzָֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וְהָאֲדָנִ֣ים לָֽעַמֻּדִים֮ נְחֹ֒שֶׁת֒ וָוֵ֨י הָֽעַמּוּדִ֜ים וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם֙ כֶּ֔סֶף וְצִפּ֥וּי רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם כָּ֑סֶף וְהֵם֙ מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים כֶּ֔סֶף כֹּ֖ל עַמֻּדֵ֥י הֶחָצֵֽר׃
38.englishText: The sockets for the posts were of copper, the hooks and bands of the posts were of silver, the overlay of their tops was of silver; all the posts of the enclosure were banded with silver.—
38.transliteration: vְhָaֲdָnִ֣yם lָֽaַmֻּdִyם֮ nְchֹ֒shֶׁt֒ vָvֵ֨y hָֽaַmּvּdִ֜yם vַchֲshׁvּkֵyhֶם֙ kֶּ֔sֶף vְtsִpּ֥vּy rָashֵׁyhֶ֖ם kָּ֑sֶף vְhֵם֙ mְchֻshָּׁkִ֣yם kֶּ֔sֶף kֹּ֖l aַmֻּdֵ֥y hֶchָtsֵֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וּמָסַ֞ךְ שַׁ֤עַר הֶחָצֵר֙ מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה רֹקֵ֔ם תְּכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֣שׁ מׇשְׁזָ֑ר וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים אַמָּה֙ אֹ֔רֶךְ וְקוֹמָ֤ה בְרֹ֙חַב֙ חָמֵ֣שׁ אַמּ֔וֹת לְעֻמַּ֖ת קַלְעֵ֥י הֶחָצֵֽר׃
38.englishText: The screen of the gate of the enclosure, done in embroidery, was of blue, purple, and crimson yarns, and fine twisted linen. It was twenty cubits long. Its height—or width—was five cubits, like that of*Its height—or width—was five cubits, like that of Meaning of Heb. uncertain. the hangings of the enclosure.
38.transliteration: vּmָsַ֞ךְ shַׁ֤aַr hֶchָtsֵr֙ mַaֲshֵׂ֣h rֹkֵ֔ם tְּkֵ֧lֶt vְaַrְgָּmָ֛ן vְtvֹlַ֥aַt shָׁnִ֖y vְshֵׁ֣shׁ mׇshְׁzָ֑r vְaֶshְׂrִ֤yם aַmָּh֙ aֹ֔rֶךְ vְkvֹmָ֤h bְrֹ֙chַb֙ chָmֵ֣shׁ aַmּ֔vֹt lְaֻmַּ֖t kַlְaֵ֥y hֶchָtsֵֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וְעַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ אַרְבָּעָ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם אַרְבָּעָ֖ה נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וָוֵיהֶ֣ם כֶּ֔סֶף וְצִפּ֧וּי רָאשֵׁיהֶ֛ם וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: The posts were four; their four sockets were of copper, their hooks of silver; and the overlay of their tops was of silver, as were also their bands.—
38.transliteration: vְaַmֻּֽdֵyhֶם֙ aַrְbָּaָ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֥ם aַrְbָּaָ֖h nְchֹ֑shֶׁt vָvֵyhֶ֣ם kֶּ֔sֶף vְtsִpּ֧vּy rָashֵׁyhֶ֛ם vַchֲshֻׁkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְֽכׇל־הַיְתֵדֹ֞ת לַמִּשְׁכָּ֧ן וְלֶחָצֵ֛ר סָבִ֖יב נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ {ס}
38.englishText: All the pegs of the Tabernacle and of the enclosure round about were of copper.
38.transliteration: vְֽkׇl־hַyְtֵdֹ֞t lַmִּshְׁkָּ֧ן vְlֶchָtsֵ֛r sָbִ֖yb nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: אֵ֣לֶּה פְקוּדֵ֤י הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ מִשְׁכַּ֣ן הָעֵדֻ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֥ר פֻּקַּ֖ד עַל־פִּ֣י מֹשֶׁ֑ה עֲבֹדַת֙ הַלְוִיִּ֔ם בְּיַד֙ אִֽיתָמָ֔ר בֶּֽן־אַהֲרֹ֖ן הַכֹּהֵֽן׃
38.englishText: These are the records of the Tabernacle, the Tabernacle of the Pact, which were drawn up at Moses’ bidding—the work of the Levites under the direction of Ithamar son of Aaron the priest.
38.transliteration: aֵ֣lֶּh pְkvּdֵ֤y hַmִּshְׁkָּן֙ mִshְׁkַּ֣ן hָaֵdֻ֔t aֲshֶׁ֥r pֻּkַּ֖d aַl־pִּ֣y mֹshֶׁ֑h aֲbֹdַt֙ hַlְvִyִּ֔ם bְּyַd֙ aִֽytָmָ֔r bֶּֽן־aַhֲrֹ֖ן hַkֹּhֵֽן׃

38.hebrewText: וּבְצַלְאֵ֛ל בֶּן־אוּרִ֥י בֶן־ח֖וּר לְמַטֵּ֣ה יְהוּדָ֑ה עָשָׂ֕ה אֵ֛ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃
38.englishText: Now Bezalel, son of Uri son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah, had made all that יהוה had commanded Moses;
38.transliteration: vּbְtsַlְaֵ֛l bֶּן־avּrִ֥y bֶן־ch֖vּr lְmַtֵּ֣h yְhvּdָ֑h aָshָׂ֕h aֵ֛t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁr־tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: וְאִתּ֗וֹ אׇהֳלִיאָ֞ב בֶּן־אֲחִיסָמָ֛ךְ לְמַטֵּה־דָ֖ן חָרָ֣שׁ וְחֹשֵׁ֑ב וְרֹקֵ֗ם בַּתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ וּבָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן וּבְתוֹלַ֥עַת הַשָּׁנִ֖י וּבַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ {ס}
38.englishText: at his side was Oholiab son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan, carver and designer, and embroiderer in blue, purple, and crimson yarns and in fine linen.
38.transliteration: vְaִtּ֗vֹ aׇhֳlִyaָ֞b bֶּן־aֲchִysָmָ֛ךְ lְmַtֵּh־dָ֖ן chָrָ֣shׁ vְchֹshֵׁ֑b vְrֹkֵ֗ם bַּtְּkֵ֙lֶt֙ vּbָֽaַrְgָּmָ֔ן vּbְtvֹlַ֥aַt hַshָּׁnִ֖y vּbַshֵּֽׁshׁ׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: כׇּל־הַזָּהָ֗ב הֶֽעָשׂוּי֙ לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה בְּכֹ֖ל מְלֶ֣אכֶת הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ וַיְהִ֣י ׀ זְהַ֣ב הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה תֵּ֤שַׁע וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ כִּכָּ֔ר וּשְׁבַ֨ע מֵא֧וֹת וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים שֶׁ֖קֶל בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃
38.englishText: All the gold that was used for the work, in all the work of the sanctuary—the elevation offering of gold—came to 29 talents*talents A talent here equals 3,000 shekels. and 730 shekels by the sanctuary weight.
38.transliteration: kׇּl־hַzָּhָ֗b hֶֽaָshׂvּy֙ lַmְּlָakָ֔h bְּkֹ֖l mְlֶ֣akֶt hַkֹּ֑dֶshׁ vַyְhִ֣y ׀ zְhַ֣b hַtְּnvּpָ֗h tֵּ֤shַׁa vְaֶshְׂrִyם֙ kִּkָּ֔r vּshְׁbַ֨a mֵa֧vֹt vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם shֶׁ֖kֶl bְּshֶׁ֥kֶl hַkֹּֽdֶshׁ׃

38.hebrewText: וְכֶ֛סֶף פְּקוּדֵ֥י הָעֵדָ֖ה מְאַ֣ת כִּכָּ֑ר וְאֶ֩לֶף֩ וּשְׁבַ֨ע מֵא֜וֹת וַחֲמִשָּׁ֧ה וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים שֶׁ֖קֶל בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃
38.englishText: The silver of those of the community who were recorded came to 100 talents and 1,775 shekels by the sanctuary weight:
38.transliteration: vְkֶ֛sֶף pְּkvּdֵ֥y hָaֵdָ֖h mְaַ֣t kִּkָּ֑r vְaֶ֩lֶף֩ vּshְׁbַ֨a mֵa֜vֹt vַchֲmִshָּׁ֧h vְshִׁbְaִ֛yם shֶׁ֖kֶl bְּshֶׁ֥kֶl hַkֹּֽdֶshׁ׃

38.hebrewText: בֶּ֚קַע לַגֻּלְגֹּ֔לֶת מַחֲצִ֥ית הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ לְכֹ֨ל הָעֹבֵ֜ר עַל־הַפְּקֻדִ֗ים מִבֶּ֨ן עֶשְׂרִ֤ים שָׁנָה֙ וָמַ֔עְלָה לְשֵׁשׁ־מֵא֥וֹת אֶ֙לֶף֙ וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת אֲלָפִ֔ים וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ מֵא֖וֹת וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃
38.englishText: a half-shekel*half-shekel Heb. beqa‘. a head, half a shekel by the sanctuary weight, for each one who was entered in the records, from the age of twenty years up, 603,550 men.
38.transliteration: bֶּ֚kַa lַgֻּlְgֹּ֔lֶt mַchֲtsִ֥yt hַshֶּׁ֖kֶl bְּshֶׁ֣kֶl hַkֹּ֑dֶshׁ lְkֹ֨l hָaֹbֵ֜r aַl־hַpְּkֻdִ֗yם mִbֶּ֨ן aֶshְׂrִ֤yם shָׁnָh֙ vָmַ֔aְlָh lְshֵׁshׁ־mֵa֥vֹt aֶ֙lֶף֙ vּshְׁlֹ֣shֶׁt aֲlָpִ֔yם vַchֲmֵ֥shׁ mֵa֖vֹt vַchֲmִshִּֽׁyם׃

38.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י מְאַת֙ כִּכַּ֣ר הַכֶּ֔סֶף לָצֶ֗קֶת אֵ֚ת אַדְנֵ֣י הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ וְאֵ֖ת אַדְנֵ֣י הַפָּרֹ֑כֶת מְאַ֧ת אֲדָנִ֛ים לִמְאַ֥ת הַכִּכָּ֖ר כִּכָּ֥ר לָאָֽדֶן׃
38.englishText: The 100 talents of silver were for casting the sockets of the sanctuary and the sockets for the curtain, 100 sockets to the 100 talents, a talent a socket.
38.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y mְaַt֙ kִּkַּ֣r hַkֶּ֔sֶף lָtsֶ֗kֶt aֵ֚t aַdְnֵ֣y hַkֹּ֔dֶshׁ vְaֵ֖t aַdְnֵ֣y hַpָּrֹ֑kֶt mְaַ֧t aֲdָnִ֛yם lִmְaַ֥t hַkִּkָּ֖r kִּkָּ֥r lָaָֽdֶן׃

38.hebrewText: וְאֶת־הָאֶ֜לֶף וּשְׁבַ֤ע הַמֵּאוֹת֙ וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה וְשִׁבְעִ֔ים עָשָׂ֥ה וָוִ֖ים לָעַמּוּדִ֑ים וְצִפָּ֥ה רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם וְחִשַּׁ֥ק אֹתָֽם׃
38.englishText: And of the 1,775 shekels he made hooks for the posts, overlay for their tops, and bands around them.
38.transliteration: vְaֶt־hָaֶ֜lֶף vּshְׁbַ֤a hַmֵּavֹt֙ vַchֲmִshָּׁ֣h vְshִׁbְaִ֔yם aָshָׂ֥h vָvִ֖yם lָaַmּvּdִ֑yם vְtsִpָּ֥h rָashֵׁyhֶ֖ם vְchִshַּׁ֥k aֹtָֽם׃

38.hebrewText: וּנְחֹ֥שֶׁת הַתְּנוּפָ֖ה שִׁבְעִ֣ים כִּכָּ֑ר וְאַלְפַּ֥יִם וְאַרְבַּע־מֵא֖וֹת שָֽׁקֶל׃
38.englishText: The copper from the elevation offering came to 70 talents and 2,400 shekels.
38.transliteration: vּnְchֹ֥shֶׁt hַtְּnvּpָ֖h shִׁbְaִ֣yם kִּkָּ֑r vְaַlְpַּ֥yִם vְaַrְbַּa־mֵa֖vֹt shָֽׁkֶl׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣עַשׂ בָּ֗הּ אֶת־אַדְנֵי֙ פֶּ֚תַח אֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֔ד וְאֵת֙ מִזְבַּ֣ח הַנְּחֹ֔שֶׁת וְאֶת־מִכְבַּ֥ר הַנְּחֹ֖שֶׁת אֲשֶׁר־ל֑וֹ וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־כְּלֵ֥י הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃
38.englishText: Of it he made the sockets for the entrance of the Tent of Meeting; the copper altar and its copper grating and all the utensils of the altar;
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֣aַshׂ bָּ֗hּ aֶt־aַdְnֵy֙ pֶּ֚tַch aֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֔d vְaֵt֙ mִzְbַּ֣ch hַnְּchֹ֔shֶׁt vְaֶt־mִkְbַּ֥r hַnְּchֹ֖shֶׁt aֲshֶׁr־l֑vֹ vְaֵ֖t kׇּl־kְּlֵ֥y hַmִּzְbֵּֽchַ׃

38.hebrewText: וְאֶת־אַדְנֵ֤י הֶֽחָצֵר֙ סָבִ֔יב וְאֶת־אַדְנֵ֖י שַׁ֣עַר הֶחָצֵ֑ר וְאֵ֨ת כׇּל־יִתְדֹ֧ת הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן וְאֶת־כׇּל־יִתְדֹ֥ת הֶחָצֵ֖ר סָבִֽיב׃
38.englishText: the sockets of the enclosure round about and the sockets of the gate of the enclosure; and all the pegs of the Tabernacle and all the pegs of the enclosure round about.
38.transliteration: vְaֶt־aַdְnֵ֤y hֶֽchָtsֵr֙ sָbִ֔yb vְaֶt־aַdְnֵ֖y shַׁ֣aַr hֶchָtsֵ֑r vְaֵ֨t kׇּl־yִtְdֹ֧t hַmִּshְׁkָּ֛ן vְaֶt־kׇּl־yִtְdֹ֥t hֶchָtsֵ֖r sָbִֽyb׃

pekudei.name: Pekudei
pekudei.summary: The accounting of the materials, the completion of the priestly garments, the erection of the Tabernacle, and the divine presence.

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ אֶת־מִזְבַּ֥ח הָעֹלָ֖ה עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים חָמֵשׁ֩ אַמּ֨וֹת אׇרְכּ֜וֹ וְחָֽמֵשׁ־אַמּ֤וֹת רׇחְבּוֹ֙ רָב֔וּעַ וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ אַמּ֖וֹת קֹמָתֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: He made the altar for burnt offering of acacia wood, five cubits long and five cubits wide—square—and three cubits high.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֛aַshׂ aֶt־mִzְbַּ֥ch hָaֹlָ֖h aֲtsֵ֣y shִׁtִּ֑yם chָmֵshׁ֩ aַmּ֨vֹt aׇrְkּ֜vֹ vְchָֽmֵshׁ־aַmּ֤vֹt rׇchְbּvֹ֙ rָb֔vּaַ vְshָׁlֹ֥shׁ aַmּ֖vֹt kֹmָtֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣עַשׂ קַרְנֹתָ֗יו עַ֚ל אַרְבַּ֣ע פִּנֹּתָ֔יו מִמֶּ֖נּוּ הָי֣וּ קַרְנֹתָ֑יו וַיְצַ֥ף אֹת֖וֹ נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
38.englishText: He made horns for it on its four corners, the horns being of one piece with it; and he overlaid it with copper.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֣aַshׂ kַrְnֹtָ֗yv aַ֚l aַrְbַּ֣a pִּnֹּtָ֔yv mִmֶּ֖nּvּ hָy֣vּ kַrְnֹtָ֑yv vַyְtsַ֥ף aֹt֖vֹ nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֜עַשׂ אֶֽת־כׇּל־כְּלֵ֣י הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ אֶת־הַסִּירֹ֤ת וְאֶת־הַיָּעִים֙ וְאֶת־הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת אֶת־הַמִּזְלָגֹ֖ת וְאֶת־הַמַּחְתֹּ֑ת כׇּל־כֵּלָ֖יו עָשָׂ֥ה נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
38.englishText: He made all the utensils of the altar—the pails, the scrapers, the basins, the flesh hooks, and the fire pans; he made all these utensils of copper.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֜aַshׂ aֶֽt־kׇּl־kְּlֵ֣y hַmִּzְbֵּ֗chַ aֶt־hַsִּyrֹ֤t vְaֶt־hַyָּaִyם֙ vְaֶt־hַmִּzְrָkֹ֔t aֶt־hַmִּzְlָgֹ֖t vְaֶt־hַmַּchְtֹּ֑t kׇּl־kֵּlָ֖yv aָshָׂ֥h nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֤עַשׂ לַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ מִכְבָּ֔ר מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה רֶ֣שֶׁת נְחֹ֑שֶׁת תַּ֧חַת כַּרְכֻּבּ֛וֹ מִלְּמַ֖טָּה עַד־חֶצְיֽוֹ׃
38.englishText: He made for the altar a grating of meshwork in copper, extending below, under its ledge, to its middle.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֤aַshׂ lַmִּzְbֵּ֙chַ֙ mִkְbָּ֔r mַaֲshֵׂ֖h rֶ֣shֶׁt nְchֹ֑shֶׁt tַּ֧chַt kַּrְkֻּbּ֛vֹ mִlְּmַ֖tָּh aַd־chֶtsְyֽvֹ׃

38.hebrewText: וַיִּצֹ֞ק אַרְבַּ֧ע טַבָּעֹ֛ת בְּאַרְבַּ֥ע הַקְּצָוֺ֖ת לְמִכְבַּ֣ר הַנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת בָּתִּ֖ים לַבַּדִּֽים׃
38.englishText: He cast four rings, at the four corners of the copper grating, as holders for the poles.
38.transliteration: vַyִּtsֹ֞k aַrְbַּ֧a tַbָּaֹ֛t bְּaַrְbַּ֥a hַkְּtsָvֺ֖t lְmִkְbַּ֣r hַnְּchֹ֑shֶׁt bָּtִּ֖yם lַbַּdִּֽyם׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ אֶת־הַבַּדִּ֖ים עֲצֵ֣י שִׁטִּ֑ים וַיְצַ֥ף אֹתָ֖ם נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃
38.englishText: He made the poles of acacia wood and overlaid them with copper;
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַshׂ aֶt־hַbַּdִּ֖yם aֲtsֵ֣y shִׁtִּ֑yם vַyְtsַ֥ף aֹtָ֖ם nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃

38.hebrewText: וַיָּבֵ֨א אֶת־הַבַּדִּ֜ים בַּטַּבָּעֹ֗ת עַ֚ל צַלְעֹ֣ת הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ לָשֵׂ֥את אֹת֖וֹ בָּהֶ֑ם נְב֥וּב לֻחֹ֖ת עָשָׂ֥ה אֹתֽוֹ׃ {ס}
38.englishText: and he inserted the poles into the rings on the side walls of the altar, to carry it by them. He made it hollow, of boards.
38.transliteration: vַyָּbֵ֨a aֶt־hַbַּdִּ֜yם bַּtַּbָּaֹ֗t aַ֚l tsַlְaֹ֣t hַmִּzְbֵּ֔chַ lָshֵׂ֥at aֹt֖vֹ bָּhֶ֑ם nְb֥vּb lֻchֹ֖t aָshָׂ֥h aֹtֽvֹ׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֗עַשׂ אֵ֚ת הַכִּיּ֣וֹר נְחֹ֔שֶׁת וְאֵ֖ת כַּנּ֣וֹ נְחֹ֑שֶׁת בְּמַרְאֹת֙ הַצֹּ֣בְאֹ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֣ר צָֽבְא֔וּ פֶּ֖תַח אֹ֥הֶל מוֹעֵֽד׃ {ס}
38.englishText: He made the laver of copper and its stand of copper, from the mirrors of the women who performed tasks*women who performed tasks Precise nuance of Heb. ṣove’ot ’asher ṣave’u uncertain. at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֗aַshׂ aֵ֚t hַkִּyּ֣vֹr nְchֹ֔shֶׁt vְaֵ֖t kַּnּ֣vֹ nְchֹ֑shֶׁt bְּmַrְaֹt֙ hַtsֹּ֣bְaֹ֔t aֲshֶׁ֣r tsָֽbְa֔vּ pֶּ֖tַch aֹ֥hֶl mvֹaֵֽd׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֖עַשׂ אֶת־הֶחָצֵ֑ר לִפְאַ֣ת ׀ נֶ֣גֶב תֵּימָ֗נָה קַלְעֵ֤י הֶֽחָצֵר֙ שֵׁ֣שׁ מׇשְׁזָ֔ר מֵאָ֖ה בָּאַמָּֽה׃
38.englishText: He made the enclosure: On the south*south Cf. note at 26.18. side, a hundred cubits of hangings of fine twisted linen for the enclosure—
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֖aַshׂ aֶt־hֶchָtsֵ֑r lִpְaַ֣t ׀ nֶ֣gֶb tֵּymָ֗nָh kַlְaֵ֤y hֶֽchָtsֵr֙ shֵׁ֣shׁ mׇshְׁzָ֔r mֵaָ֖h bָּaַmָּֽh׃

38.hebrewText: עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם עֶשְׂרִ֔ים וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם עֶשְׂרִ֖ים נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וָוֵ֧י הָעַמּוּדִ֛ים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: with their twenty posts and their twenty sockets of copper, the hooks and bands of the posts being silver.
38.transliteration: aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם aֶshְׂrִ֔yם vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֥ם aֶshְׂrִ֖yם nְchֹ֑shֶׁt vָvֵ֧y hָaַmּvּdִ֛yם vַchֲshֻׁkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְלִפְאַ֤ת צָפוֹן֙ מֵאָ֣ה בָֽאַמָּ֔ה עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם עֶשְׂרִ֔ים וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם עֶשְׂרִ֖ים נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וָוֵ֧י הָֽעַמּוּדִ֛ים וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: On the north side, a hundred cubits—with their twenty posts and their twenty sockets of copper, the hooks and bands of the posts being silver.
38.transliteration: vְlִpְaַ֤t tsָpvֹן֙ mֵaָ֣h bָֽaַmָּ֔h aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם aֶshְׂrִ֔yם vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֥ם aֶshְׂrִ֖yם nְchֹ֑shֶׁt vָvֵ֧y hָֽaַmּvּdִ֛yם vַchֲshֻׁkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְלִפְאַת־יָ֗ם קְלָעִים֙ חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם עֲשָׂרָ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם עֲשָׂרָ֑ה וָוֵ֧י הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: On the west side, fifty cubits of hangings—with their ten posts and their ten sockets, the hooks and bands of the posts being silver.
38.transliteration: vְlִpְaַt־yָ֗ם kְlָaִyם֙ chֲmִshִּׁ֣yם bָּֽaַmָּ֔h aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם aֲshָׂrָ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֖ם aֲshָׂrָ֑h vָvֵ֧y hָaַmֻּdִ֛yם vַchֲshׁvּkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְלִפְאַ֛ת קֵ֥דְמָה מִזְרָ֖חָה חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים אַמָּֽה׃
38.englishText: And on the front side, to the east, fifty cubits:
38.transliteration: vְlִpְaַ֛t kֵ֥dְmָh mִzְrָ֖chָh chֲmִshִּׁ֥yם aַmָּֽh׃

38.hebrewText: קְלָעִ֛ים חֲמֵשׁ־עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה אַמָּ֖ה אֶל־הַכָּתֵ֑ף עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃
38.englishText: fifteen cubits of hangings on the one flank, with their three posts and their three sockets,
38.transliteration: kְlָaִ֛yם chֲmֵshׁ־aֶshְׂrֵ֥h aַmָּ֖h aֶl־hַkָּtֵ֑ף aַmּvּdֵyhֶ֣ם shְׁlֹshָׁ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֖ם shְׁlֹshָֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: וְלַכָּתֵ֣ף הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית מִזֶּ֤ה וּמִזֶּה֙ לְשַׁ֣עַר הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר קְלָעִ֕ים חֲמֵ֥שׁ עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה אַמָּ֑ה עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃
38.englishText: and fifteen cubits of hangings on the other flank—on each side of the gate of the enclosure*enclosure Which accounts for the remaining 20 cubits; cf. v. 18. —with their three posts and their three sockets.
38.transliteration: vְlַkָּtֵ֣ף hַshֵּׁnִ֗yt mִzֶּ֤h vּmִzֶּh֙ lְshַׁ֣aַr hֶֽchָtsֵ֔r kְlָaִ֕yם chֲmֵ֥shׁ aֶshְׂrֵ֖h aַmָּ֑h aַmֻּdֵyhֶ֣ם shְׁlֹshָׁ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֖ם shְׁlֹshָֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: כׇּל־קַלְעֵ֧י הֶחָצֵ֛ר סָבִ֖יב שֵׁ֥שׁ מׇשְׁזָֽר׃
38.englishText: All the hangings around the enclosure were of fine twisted linen.
38.transliteration: kׇּl־kַlְaֵ֧y hֶchָtsֵ֛r sָbִ֖yb shֵׁ֥shׁ mׇshְׁzָֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וְהָאֲדָנִ֣ים לָֽעַמֻּדִים֮ נְחֹ֒שֶׁת֒ וָוֵ֨י הָֽעַמּוּדִ֜ים וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם֙ כֶּ֔סֶף וְצִפּ֥וּי רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם כָּ֑סֶף וְהֵם֙ מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים כֶּ֔סֶף כֹּ֖ל עַמֻּדֵ֥י הֶחָצֵֽר׃
38.englishText: The sockets for the posts were of copper, the hooks and bands of the posts were of silver, the overlay of their tops was of silver; all the posts of the enclosure were banded with silver.—
38.transliteration: vְhָaֲdָnִ֣yם lָֽaַmֻּdִyם֮ nְchֹ֒shֶׁt֒ vָvֵ֨y hָֽaַmּvּdִ֜yם vַchֲshׁvּkֵyhֶם֙ kֶּ֔sֶף vְtsִpּ֥vּy rָashֵׁyhֶ֖ם kָּ֑sֶף vְhֵם֙ mְchֻshָּׁkִ֣yם kֶּ֔sֶף kֹּ֖l aַmֻּdֵ֥y hֶchָtsֵֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וּמָסַ֞ךְ שַׁ֤עַר הֶחָצֵר֙ מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה רֹקֵ֔ם תְּכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֣שׁ מׇשְׁזָ֑ר וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים אַמָּה֙ אֹ֔רֶךְ וְקוֹמָ֤ה בְרֹ֙חַב֙ חָמֵ֣שׁ אַמּ֔וֹת לְעֻמַּ֖ת קַלְעֵ֥י הֶחָצֵֽר׃
38.englishText: The screen of the gate of the enclosure, done in embroidery, was of blue, purple, and crimson yarns, and fine twisted linen. It was twenty cubits long. Its height—or width—was five cubits, like that of*Its height—or width—was five cubits, like that of Meaning of Heb. uncertain. the hangings of the enclosure.
38.transliteration: vּmָsַ֞ךְ shַׁ֤aַr hֶchָtsֵr֙ mַaֲshֵׂ֣h rֹkֵ֔ם tְּkֵ֧lֶt vְaַrְgָּmָ֛ן vְtvֹlַ֥aַt shָׁnִ֖y vְshֵׁ֣shׁ mׇshְׁzָ֑r vְaֶshְׂrִ֤yם aַmָּh֙ aֹ֔rֶךְ vְkvֹmָ֤h bְrֹ֙chַb֙ chָmֵ֣shׁ aַmּ֔vֹt lְaֻmַּ֖t kַlְaֵ֥y hֶchָtsֵֽr׃

38.hebrewText: וְעַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ אַרְבָּעָ֔ה וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם אַרְבָּעָ֖ה נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וָוֵיהֶ֣ם כֶּ֔סֶף וְצִפּ֧וּי רָאשֵׁיהֶ֛ם וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם כָּֽסֶף׃
38.englishText: The posts were four; their four sockets were of copper, their hooks of silver; and the overlay of their tops was of silver, as were also their bands.—
38.transliteration: vְaַmֻּֽdֵyhֶם֙ aַrְbָּaָ֔h vְaַdְnֵyhֶ֥ם aַrְbָּaָ֖h nְchֹ֑shֶׁt vָvֵyhֶ֣ם kֶּ֔sֶף vְtsִpּ֧vּy rָashֵׁyhֶ֛ם vַchֲshֻׁkֵyhֶ֖ם kָּֽsֶף׃

38.hebrewText: וְֽכׇל־הַיְתֵדֹ֞ת לַמִּשְׁכָּ֧ן וְלֶחָצֵ֛ר סָבִ֖יב נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ {ס}
38.englishText: All the pegs of the Tabernacle and of the enclosure round about were of copper.
38.transliteration: vְֽkׇl־hַyְtֵdֹ֞t lַmִּshְׁkָּ֧ן vְlֶchָtsֵ֛r sָbִ֖yb nְchֹֽshֶׁt׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: אֵ֣לֶּה פְקוּדֵ֤י הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ מִשְׁכַּ֣ן הָעֵדֻ֔ת אֲשֶׁ֥ר פֻּקַּ֖ד עַל־פִּ֣י מֹשֶׁ֑ה עֲבֹדַת֙ הַלְוִיִּ֔ם בְּיַד֙ אִֽיתָמָ֔ר בֶּֽן־אַהֲרֹ֖ן הַכֹּהֵֽן׃
38.englishText: These are the records of the Tabernacle, the Tabernacle of the Pact, which were drawn up at Moses’ bidding—the work of the Levites under the direction of Ithamar son of Aaron the priest.
38.transliteration: aֵ֣lֶּh pְkvּdֵ֤y hַmִּshְׁkָּן֙ mִshְׁkַּ֣ן hָaֵdֻ֔t aֲshֶׁ֥r pֻּkַּ֖d aַl־pִּ֣y mֹshֶׁ֑h aֲbֹdַt֙ hַlְvִyִּ֔ם bְּyַd֙ aִֽytָmָ֔r bֶּֽן־aַhֲrֹ֖ן hַkֹּhֵֽן׃

38.hebrewText: וּבְצַלְאֵ֛ל בֶּן־אוּרִ֥י בֶן־ח֖וּר לְמַטֵּ֣ה יְהוּדָ֑ה עָשָׂ֕ה אֵ֛ת כׇּל־אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃
38.englishText: Now Bezalel, son of Uri son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah, had made all that יהוה had commanded Moses;
38.transliteration: vּbְtsַlְaֵ֛l bֶּן־avּrִ֥y bֶן־ch֖vּr lְmַtֵּ֣h yְhvּdָ֑h aָshָׂ֕h aֵ֛t kׇּl־aֲshֶׁr־tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃

38.hebrewText: וְאִתּ֗וֹ אׇהֳלִיאָ֞ב בֶּן־אֲחִיסָמָ֛ךְ לְמַטֵּה־דָ֖ן חָרָ֣שׁ וְחֹשֵׁ֑ב וְרֹקֵ֗ם בַּתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ וּבָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן וּבְתוֹלַ֥עַת הַשָּׁנִ֖י וּבַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ {ס}
38.englishText: at his side was Oholiab son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan, carver and designer, and embroiderer in blue, purple, and crimson yarns and in fine linen.
38.transliteration: vְaִtּ֗vֹ aׇhֳlִyaָ֞b bֶּן־aֲchִysָmָ֛ךְ lְmַtֵּh־dָ֖ן chָrָ֣shׁ vְchֹshֵׁ֑b vְrֹkֵ֗ם bַּtְּkֵ֙lֶt֙ vּbָֽaַrְgָּmָ֔ן vּbְtvֹlַ֥aַt hַshָּׁnִ֖y vּbַshֵּֽׁshׁ׃ {s}

38.hebrewText: כׇּל־הַזָּהָ֗ב הֶֽעָשׂוּי֙ לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה בְּכֹ֖ל מְלֶ֣אכֶת הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ וַיְהִ֣י ׀ זְהַ֣ב הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה תֵּ֤שַׁע וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ כִּכָּ֔ר וּשְׁבַ֨ע מֵא֧וֹת וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים שֶׁ֖קֶל בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃
38.englishText: All the gold that was used for the work, in all the work of the sanctuary—the elevation offering of gold—came to 29 talents*talents A talent here equals 3,000 shekels. and 730 shekels by the sanctuary weight.
38.transliteration: kׇּl־hַzָּhָ֗b hֶֽaָshׂvּy֙ lַmְּlָakָ֔h bְּkֹ֖l mְlֶ֣akֶt hַkֹּ֑dֶshׁ vַyְhִ֣y ׀ zְhַ֣b hַtְּnvּpָ֗h tֵּ֤shַׁa vְaֶshְׂrִyם֙ kִּkָּ֔r vּshְׁbַ֨a mֵa֧vֹt vּshְׁlֹshִׁ֛yם shֶׁ֖kֶl bְּshֶׁ֥kֶl hַkֹּֽdֶshׁ׃

38.hebrewText: וְכֶ֛סֶף פְּקוּדֵ֥י הָעֵדָ֖ה מְאַ֣ת כִּכָּ֑ר וְאֶ֩לֶף֩ וּשְׁבַ֨ע מֵא֜וֹת וַחֲמִשָּׁ֧ה וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים שֶׁ֖קֶל בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃
38.englishText: The silver of those of the community who were recorded came to 100 talents and 1,775 shekels by the sanctuary weight:
38.transliteration: vְkֶ֛sֶף pְּkvּdֵ֥y hָaֵdָ֖h mְaַ֣t kִּkָּ֑r vְaֶ֩lֶף֩ vּshְׁbַ֨a mֵa֜vֹt vַchֲmִshָּׁ֧h vְshִׁbְaִ֛yם shֶׁ֖kֶl bְּshֶׁ֥kֶl hַkֹּֽdֶshׁ׃

38.hebrewText: בֶּ֚קַע לַגֻּלְגֹּ֔לֶת מַחֲצִ֥ית הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ לְכֹ֨ל הָעֹבֵ֜ר עַל־הַפְּקֻדִ֗ים מִבֶּ֨ן עֶשְׂרִ֤ים שָׁנָה֙ וָמַ֔עְלָה לְשֵׁשׁ־מֵא֥וֹת אֶ֙לֶף֙ וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת אֲלָפִ֔ים וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ מֵא֖וֹת וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃
38.englishText: a half-shekel*half-shekel Heb. beqa‘. a head, half a shekel by the sanctuary weight, for each one who was entered in the records, from the age of twenty years up, 603,550 men.
38.transliteration: bֶּ֚kַa lַgֻּlְgֹּ֔lֶt mַchֲtsִ֥yt hַshֶּׁ֖kֶl bְּshֶׁ֣kֶl hַkֹּ֑dֶshׁ lְkֹ֨l hָaֹbֵ֜r aַl־hַpְּkֻdִ֗yם mִbֶּ֨ן aֶshְׂrִ֤yם shָׁnָh֙ vָmַ֔aְlָh lְshֵׁshׁ־mֵa֥vֹt aֶ֙lֶף֙ vּshְׁlֹ֣shֶׁt aֲlָpִ֔yם vַchֲmֵ֥shׁ mֵa֖vֹt vַchֲmִshִּֽׁyם׃

38.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֗י מְאַת֙ כִּכַּ֣ר הַכֶּ֔סֶף לָצֶ֗קֶת אֵ֚ת אַדְנֵ֣י הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ וְאֵ֖ת אַדְנֵ֣י הַפָּרֹ֑כֶת מְאַ֧ת אֲדָנִ֛ים לִמְאַ֥ת הַכִּכָּ֖ר כִּכָּ֥ר לָאָֽדֶן׃
38.englishText: The 100 talents of silver were for casting the sockets of the sanctuary and the sockets for the curtain, 100 sockets to the 100 talents, a talent a socket.
38.transliteration: vַyְhִ֗y mְaַt֙ kִּkַּ֣r hַkֶּ֔sֶף lָtsֶ֗kֶt aֵ֚t aַdְnֵ֣y hַkֹּ֔dֶshׁ vְaֵ֖t aַdְnֵ֣y hַpָּrֹ֑kֶt mְaַ֧t aֲdָnִ֛yם lִmְaַ֥t hַkִּkָּ֖r kִּkָּ֥r lָaָֽdֶן׃

38.hebrewText: וְאֶת־הָאֶ֜לֶף וּשְׁבַ֤ע הַמֵּאוֹת֙ וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה וְשִׁבְעִ֔ים עָשָׂ֥ה וָוִ֖ים לָעַמּוּדִ֑ים וְצִפָּ֥ה רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם וְחִשַּׁ֥ק אֹתָֽם׃
38.englishText: And of the 1,775 shekels he made hooks for the posts, overlay for their tops, and bands around them.
38.transliteration: vְaֶt־hָaֶ֜lֶף vּshְׁbַ֤a hַmֵּavֹt֙ vַchֲmִshָּׁ֣h vְshִׁbְaִ֔yם aָshָׂ֥h vָvִ֖yם lָaַmּvּdִ֑yם vְtsִpָּ֥h rָashֵׁyhֶ֖ם vְchִshַּׁ֥k aֹtָֽם׃

38.hebrewText: וּנְחֹ֥שֶׁת הַתְּנוּפָ֖ה שִׁבְעִ֣ים כִּכָּ֑ר וְאַלְפַּ֥יִם וְאַרְבַּע־מֵא֖וֹת שָֽׁקֶל׃
38.englishText: The copper from the elevation offering came to 70 talents and 2,400 shekels.
38.transliteration: vּnְchֹ֥shֶׁt hַtְּnvּpָ֖h shִׁbְaִ֣yם kִּkָּ֑r vְaַlְpַּ֥yִם vְaַrְbַּa־mֵa֖vֹt shָֽׁkֶl׃

38.hebrewText: וַיַּ֣עַשׂ בָּ֗הּ אֶת־אַדְנֵי֙ פֶּ֚תַח אֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֔ד וְאֵת֙ מִזְבַּ֣ח הַנְּחֹ֔שֶׁת וְאֶת־מִכְבַּ֥ר הַנְּחֹ֖שֶׁת אֲשֶׁר־ל֑וֹ וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־כְּלֵ֥י הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃
38.englishText: Of it he made the sockets for the entrance of the Tent of Meeting; the copper altar and its copper grating and all the utensils of the altar;
38.transliteration: vַyַּ֣aַshׂ bָּ֗hּ aֶt־aַdְnֵy֙ pֶּ֚tַch aֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֔d vְaֵt֙ mִzְbַּ֣ch hַnְּchֹ֔shֶׁt vְaֶt־mִkְbַּ֥r hַnְּchֹ֖shֶׁt aֲshֶׁr־l֑vֹ vְaֵ֖t kׇּl־kְּlֵ֥y hַmִּzְbֵּֽchַ׃

38.hebrewText: וְאֶת־אַדְנֵ֤י הֶֽחָצֵר֙ סָבִ֔יב וְאֶת־אַדְנֵ֖י שַׁ֣עַר הֶחָצֵ֑ר וְאֵ֨ת כׇּל־יִתְדֹ֧ת הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן וְאֶת־כׇּל־יִתְדֹ֥ת הֶחָצֵ֖ר סָבִֽיב׃
38.englishText: the sockets of the enclosure round about and the sockets of the gate of the enclosure; and all the pegs of the Tabernacle and all the pegs of the enclosure round about.
38.transliteration: vְaֶt־aַdְnֵ֤y hֶֽchָtsֵr֙ sָbִ֔yb vְaֶt־aַdְnֵ֖y shַׁ֣aַr hֶchָtsֵ֑r vְaֵ֨t kׇּl־yִtְdֹ֧t hַmִּshְׁkָּ֛ן vְaֶt־kׇּl־yִtְdֹ֥t hֶchָtsֵ֖r sָbִֽyb׃

39.hebrewText: וּמִן־הַתְּכֵ֤לֶת וְהָֽאַרְגָּמָן֙ וְתוֹלַ֣עַת הַשָּׁנִ֔י עָשׂ֥וּ בִגְדֵי־שְׂרָ֖ד לְשָׁרֵ֣ת בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ אֶת־בִּגְדֵ֤י הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר לְאַהֲרֹ֔ן כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {פ}
39.englishText: Of the blue, purple, and crimson yarns they also*also See 36.8. made the service vestments for officiating in the sanctuary; they made Aaron’s sacral vestments—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
39.transliteration: vּmִן־hַtְּkֵ֤lֶt vְhָֽaַrְgָּmָן֙ vְtvֹlַ֣aַt hַshָּׁnִ֔y aָshׂ֥vּ bִgְdֵy־shְׂrָ֖d lְshָׁrֵ֣t bַּkֹּ֑dֶshׁ vַֽyַּaֲshׂ֞vּ aֶt־bִּgְdֵ֤y hַkֹּ֙dֶshׁ֙ aֲshֶׁ֣r lְaַhֲrֹ֔ן kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {p}

39.hebrewText: וַיַּ֖עַשׂ אֶת־הָאֵפֹ֑ד זָהָ֗ב תְּכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֥שׁ מׇשְׁזָֽר׃
39.englishText: The ephod was made*was made Here and elsewhere in this chapter, the singular active verb (lit. “he made”) is used impersonally. of gold, blue, purple, and crimson yarns, and fine twisted linen.
39.transliteration: vַyַּ֖aַshׂ aֶt־hָaֵpֹ֑d zָhָ֗b tְּkֵ֧lֶt vְaַrְgָּmָ֛ן vְtvֹlַ֥aַt shָׁnִ֖y vְshֵׁ֥shׁ mׇshְׁzָֽr׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיְרַקְּע֞וּ אֶת־פַּחֵ֣י הַזָּהָב֮ וְקִצֵּ֣ץ פְּתִילִם֒ לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת בְּת֤וֹךְ הַתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ וּבְת֣וֹךְ הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן וּבְת֛וֹךְ תּוֹלַ֥עַת הַשָּׁנִ֖י וּבְת֣וֹךְ הַשֵּׁ֑שׁ מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה חֹשֵֽׁב׃
39.englishText: They hammered out sheets of gold and cut threads to be worked into designs among the blue, the purple, and the crimson yarns, and the fine linen.
39.transliteration: vַֽyְrַkְּa֞vּ aֶt־pַּchֵ֣y hַzָּhָb֮ vְkִtsֵּ֣ץ pְּtִylִם֒ lַaֲshׂ֗vֹt bְּt֤vֹךְ hַtְּkֵ֙lֶt֙ vּbְt֣vֹךְ hָֽaַrְgָּmָ֔ן vּbְt֛vֹךְ tּvֹlַ֥aַt hַshָּׁnִ֖y vּbְt֣vֹךְ hַshֵּׁ֑shׁ mַaֲshֵׂ֖h chֹshֵֽׁb׃

39.hebrewText: כְּתֵפֹ֥ת עָֽשׂוּ־ל֖וֹ חֹבְרֹ֑ת עַל־שְׁנֵ֥י (קצוותו) [קְצוֹתָ֖יו] חֻבָּֽר׃
39.englishText: They made for it attaching shoulder-pieces; they were attached at its two ends.
39.transliteration: kְּtֵpֹ֥t aָֽshׂvּ־l֖vֹ chֹbְrֹ֑t aַl־shְׁnֵ֥y (ktsvvtv) [kְtsvֹtָ֖yv] chֻbָּֽr׃

39.hebrewText: וְחֵ֨שֶׁב אֲפֻדָּת֜וֹ אֲשֶׁ֣ר עָלָ֗יו מִמֶּ֣נּוּ הוּא֮ כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֒הוּ֒ זָהָ֗ב תְּכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֣שׁ מׇשְׁזָ֑ר כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
39.englishText: The decorated band that was upon it was made like it, of one piece with it; of gold, blue, purple, and crimson yarns, and fine twisted linen—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
39.transliteration: vְchֵ֨shֶׁb aֲpֻdָּt֜vֹ aֲshֶׁ֣r aָlָ֗yv mִmֶּ֣nּvּ hvּa֮ kְּmַaֲshֵׂ֒hvּ֒ zָhָ֗b tְּkֵ֧lֶt vְaַrְgָּmָ֛ן vְtvֹlַ֥aַt shָׁnִ֖y vְshֵׁ֣shׁ mׇshְׁzָ֑r kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

39.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ אֶת־אַבְנֵ֣י הַשֹּׁ֔הַם מֻֽסַבֹּ֖ת מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת זָהָ֑ב מְפֻתָּחֹת֙ פִּתּוּחֵ֣י חוֹתָ֔ם עַל־שְׁמ֖וֹת בְּנֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃
39.englishText: They bordered the lazuli stones with frames of gold, engraved with seal engravings of the names of the sons of Israel.
39.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲshׂvּ֙ aֶt־aַbְnֵ֣y hַshֹּׁ֔hַם mֻֽsַbֹּ֖t mִshְׁbְּtsֹ֣t zָhָ֑b mְpֻtָּchֹt֙ pִּtּvּchֵ֣y chvֹtָ֔ם aַl־shְׁm֖vֹt bְּnֵ֥y yִshְׂrָaֵֽl׃

39.hebrewText: וַיָּ֣שֶׂם אֹתָ֗ם עַ֚ל כִּתְפֹ֣ת הָאֵפֹ֔ד אַבְנֵ֥י זִכָּר֖וֹן לִבְנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {פ}
39.englishText: They were set on the shoulder-pieces of the ephod, as stones of remembrance for the Israelites—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
39.transliteration: vַyָּ֣shֶׂם aֹtָ֗ם aַ֚l kִּtְpֹ֣t hָaֵpֹ֔d aַbְnֵ֥y zִkָּr֖vֹן lִbְnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {p}

39.hebrewText: וַיַּ֧עַשׂ אֶת־הַחֹ֛שֶׁן מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה חֹשֵׁ֖ב כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה אֵפֹ֑ד זָהָ֗ב תְּכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י וְשֵׁ֥שׁ מׇשְׁזָֽר׃
39.englishText: The breastpiece was made in the style of the ephod: of gold, blue, purple, and crimson yarns, and fine twisted linen.
39.transliteration: vַyַּ֧aַshׂ aֶt־hַchֹ֛shֶׁן mַaֲshֵׂ֥h chֹshֵׁ֖b kְּmַaֲshֵׂ֣h aֵpֹ֑d zָhָ֗b tְּkֵ֧lֶt vְaַrְgָּmָ֛ן vְtvֹlַ֥aַt shָׁnִ֖y vְshֵׁ֥shׁ mׇshְׁzָֽr׃

39.hebrewText: רָב֧וּעַ הָיָ֛ה כָּפ֖וּל עָשׂ֣וּ אֶת־הַחֹ֑שֶׁן זֶ֧רֶת אׇרְכּ֛וֹ וְזֶ֥רֶת רׇחְבּ֖וֹ כָּפֽוּל׃
39.englishText: It was square; they made the breastpiece doubled—a span in length and a span in width, doubled.
39.transliteration: rָb֧vּaַ hָyָ֛h kָּp֖vּl aָshׂ֣vּ aֶt־hַchֹ֑shֶׁן zֶ֧rֶt aׇrְkּ֛vֹ vְzֶ֥rֶt rׇchְbּ֖vֹ kָּpֽvּl׃

39.hebrewText: וַיְמַ֨לְאוּ־ב֔וֹ אַרְבָּעָ֖ה ט֣וּרֵי אָ֑בֶן ט֗וּר אֹ֤דֶם פִּטְדָה֙ וּבָרֶ֔קֶת הַטּ֖וּר הָאֶחָֽד׃
39.englishText: They set in it four rows of stones. The first row was a row of*carnelian, chrysolite,… See note at 28.17. carnelian, chrysolite, and emerald;
39.transliteration: vַyְmַ֨lְavּ־b֔vֹ aַrְbָּaָ֖h t֣vּrֵy aָ֑bֶן t֗vּr aֹ֤dֶם pִּtְdָh֙ vּbָrֶ֔kֶt hַtּ֖vּr hָaֶchָֽd׃

39.hebrewText: וְהַטּ֖וּר הַשֵּׁנִ֑י נֹ֥פֶךְ סַפִּ֖יר וְיָהֲלֹֽם׃
39.englishText: the second row: a turquoise, a sapphire, and an amethyst;
39.transliteration: vְhַtּ֖vּr hַshֵּׁnִ֑y nֹ֥pֶךְ sַpִּ֖yr vְyָhֲlֹֽם׃

39.hebrewText: וְהַטּ֖וּר הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י לֶ֥שֶׁם שְׁב֖וֹ וְאַחְלָֽמָה׃
39.englishText: the third row: a jacinth, an agate, and a crystal;
39.transliteration: vְhַtּ֖vּr hַshְּׁlִyshִׁ֑y lֶ֥shֶׁם shְׁb֖vֹ vְaַchְlָֽmָh׃

39.hebrewText: וְהַטּוּר֙ הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ שֹׁ֖הַם וְיָשְׁפֵ֑ה מֽוּסַבֹּ֛ת מִשְׁבְּצֹ֥ת זָהָ֖ב בְּמִלֻּאֹתָֽם׃
39.englishText: and the fourth row: a beryl, a lapis lazuli, and a jasper. They were encircled in their mountings with frames of gold.
39.transliteration: vְhַtּvּr֙ hָֽrְbִyaִ֔y tַּrְshִׁ֥yshׁ shֹׁ֖hַם vְyָshְׁpֵ֑h mֽvּsַbֹּ֛t mִshְׁbְּtsֹ֥t zָhָ֖b bְּmִlֻּaֹtָֽם׃

39.hebrewText: וְ֠הָאֲבָנִ֠ים עַל־שְׁמֹ֨ת בְּנֵי־יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל הֵ֛נָּה שְׁתֵּ֥ים עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה עַל־שְׁמֹתָ֑ם פִּתּוּחֵ֤י חֹתָם֙ אִ֣ישׁ עַל־שְׁמ֔וֹ לִשְׁנֵ֥ים עָשָׂ֖ר שָֽׁבֶט׃
39.englishText: The stones corresponded [in number] to the names of the sons of Israel: twelve, corresponding to their names; engraved like seals, each with its name, for the twelve tribes.
39.transliteration: vְ֠hָaֲbָnִ֠yם aַl־shְׁmֹ֨t bְּnֵy־yִshְׂrָaֵ֥l hֵ֛nָּh shְׁtֵּ֥yם aֶshְׂrֵ֖h aַl־shְׁmֹtָ֑ם pִּtּvּchֵ֤y chֹtָם֙ aִ֣yshׁ aַl־shְׁm֔vֹ lִshְׁnֵ֥yם aָshָׂ֖r shָֽׁbֶt׃

39.hebrewText: וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ עַל־הַחֹ֛שֶׁן שַׁרְשְׁרֹ֥ת גַּבְלֻ֖ת מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה עֲבֹ֑ת זָהָ֖ב טָהֽוֹר׃
39.englishText: On the breastpiece they made braided chains of corded work in pure gold.
39.transliteration: vַyַּaֲshׂ֧vּ aַl־hַchֹ֛shֶׁן shַׁrְshְׁrֹ֥t gַּbְlֻ֖t mַaֲshֵׂ֣h aֲbֹ֑t zָhָ֖b tָhֽvֹr׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ שְׁתֵּי֙ מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת זָהָ֔ב וּשְׁתֵּ֖י טַבְּעֹ֣ת זָהָ֑ב וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ אֶת־שְׁתֵּי֙ הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת עַל־שְׁנֵ֖י קְצ֥וֹת הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃
39.englishText: They made two frames of gold and two rings of gold, and fastened the two rings at the two ends of the breastpiece,
39.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲshׂ֗vּ shְׁtֵּy֙ mִshְׁbְּtsֹ֣t zָhָ֔b vּshְׁtֵּ֖y tַbְּaֹ֣t zָhָ֑b vַֽyִּtְּn֗vּ aֶt־shְׁtֵּy֙ hַtַּbָּaֹ֔t aַl־shְׁnֵ֖y kְts֥vֹt hַchֹֽshֶׁן׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ שְׁתֵּי֙ הָעֲבֹתֹ֣ת הַזָּהָ֔ב עַל־שְׁתֵּ֖י הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת עַל־קְצ֖וֹת הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃
39.englishText: attaching the two golden cords to the two rings at the ends of the breastpiece.
39.transliteration: vַֽyִּtְּn֗vּ shְׁtֵּy֙ hָaֲbֹtֹ֣t hַzָּhָ֔b aַl־shְׁtֵּ֖y hַtַּbָּaֹ֑t aַl־kְts֖vֹt hַchֹֽshֶׁן׃

39.hebrewText: וְאֵ֨ת שְׁתֵּ֤י קְצוֹת֙ שְׁתֵּ֣י הָֽעֲבֹתֹ֔ת נָתְנ֖וּ עַל־שְׁתֵּ֣י הַֽמִּשְׁבְּצֹ֑ת וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֛ם עַל־כִּתְפֹ֥ת הָאֵפֹ֖ד אֶל־מ֥וּל פָּנָֽיו׃
39.englishText: They then fastened the two ends of the cords to the two frames, attaching them to the shoulder-pieces of the ephod, at the front.
39.transliteration: vְaֵ֨t shְׁtֵּ֤y kְtsvֹt֙ shְׁtֵּ֣y hָֽaֲbֹtֹ֔t nָtְn֖vּ aַl־shְׁtֵּ֣y hַֽmִּshְׁbְּtsֹ֑t vַֽyִּtְּnֻ֛ם aַl־kִּtְpֹ֥t hָaֵpֹ֖d aֶl־m֥vּl pָּnָֽyv׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ שְׁתֵּי֙ טַבְּעֹ֣ת זָהָ֔ב וַיָּשִׂ֕ימוּ עַל־שְׁנֵ֖י קְצ֣וֹת הַחֹ֑שֶׁן עַל־שְׂפָת֕וֹ אֲשֶׁ֛ר אֶל־עֵ֥בֶר הָאֵפֹ֖ד בָּֽיְתָה׃
39.englishText: They made two rings of gold and attached them to the two ends of the breastpiece, at its inner edge, which faced the ephod.
39.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲshׂ֗vּ shְׁtֵּy֙ tַbְּaֹ֣t zָhָ֔b vַyָּshִׂ֕ymvּ aַl־shְׁnֵ֖y kְts֣vֹt hַchֹ֑shֶׁן aַl־shְׂpָt֕vֹ aֲshֶׁ֛r aֶl־aֵ֥bֶr hָaֵpֹ֖d bָּֽyְtָh׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֮ שְׁתֵּ֣י טַבְּעֹ֣ת זָהָב֒ וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֡ם עַל־שְׁתֵּי֩ כִתְפֹ֨ת הָאֵפֹ֤ד מִלְּמַ֙טָּה֙ מִמּ֣וּל פָּנָ֔יו לְעֻמַּ֖ת מַחְבַּרְתּ֑וֹ מִמַּ֕עַל לְחֵ֖שֶׁב הָאֵפֹֽד׃
39.englishText: They made two other rings of gold and fastened them on the front of the ephod, low on the two shoulder-pieces, close to its seam above the decorated band.
39.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲshׂvּ֮ shְׁtֵּ֣y tַbְּaֹ֣t zָhָb֒ vַֽyִּtְּnֻ֡ם aַl־shְׁtֵּy֩ kִtְpֹ֨t hָaֵpֹ֤d mִlְּmַ֙tָּh֙ mִmּ֣vּl pָּnָ֔yv lְaֻmַּ֖t mַchְbַּrְtּ֑vֹ mִmַּ֕aַl lְchֵ֖shֶׁb hָaֵpֹֽd׃

39.hebrewText: וַיִּרְכְּס֣וּ אֶת־הַחֹ֡שֶׁן מִטַּבְּעֹתָיו֩ אֶל־טַבְּעֹ֨ת הָאֵפֹ֜ד בִּפְתִ֣יל תְּכֵ֗לֶת לִֽהְיֹת֙ עַל־חֵ֣שֶׁב הָאֵפֹ֔ד וְלֹֽא־יִזַּ֣ח הַחֹ֔שֶׁן מֵעַ֖ל הָאֵפֹ֑ד כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {פ}
39.englishText: The breastpiece was held in place by a cord of blue from its rings to the rings of the ephod, so that the breastpiece rested on the decorated band and did not come loose from the ephod—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
39.transliteration: vַyִּrְkְּs֣vּ aֶt־hַchֹ֡shֶׁן mִtַּbְּaֹtָyv֩ aֶl־tַbְּaֹ֨t hָaֵpֹ֜d bִּpְtִ֣yl tְּkֵ֗lֶt lִֽhְyֹt֙ aַl־chֵ֣shֶׁb hָaֵpֹ֔d vְlֹֽa־yִzַּ֣ch hַchֹ֔shֶׁן mֵaַ֖l hָaֵpֹ֑d kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {p}

39.hebrewText: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ אֶת־מְעִ֥יל הָאֵפֹ֖ד מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה אֹרֵ֑ג כְּלִ֖יל תְּכֵֽלֶת׃
39.englishText: The robe for the ephod was made of woven work, of pure blue.*of pure blue See note at 28.31.
39.transliteration: vַyַּ֛aַshׂ aֶt־mְaִ֥yl hָaֵpֹ֖d mַaֲshֵׂ֣h aֹrֵ֑g kְּlִ֖yl tְּkֵֽlֶt׃

39.hebrewText: וּפִֽי־הַמְּעִ֥יל בְּתוֹכ֖וֹ כְּפִ֣י תַחְרָ֑א שָׂפָ֥ה לְפִ֛יו סָבִ֖יב לֹ֥א יִקָּרֵֽעַ׃
39.englishText: The opening of the robe, in the middle of it, was like the opening of a coat of mail, with a binding around the opening, so that it would not tear.
39.transliteration: vּpִֽy־hַmְּaִ֥yl bְּtvֹk֖vֹ kְּpִ֣y tַchְrָ֑a shָׂpָ֥h lְpִ֛yv sָbִ֖yb lֹ֥a yִkָּrֵֽaַ׃

39.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ עַל־שׁוּלֵ֣י הַמְּעִ֔יל רִמּוֹנֵ֕י תְּכֵ֥לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֖ן וְתוֹלַ֣עַת שָׁנִ֑י מׇשְׁזָֽר׃
39.englishText: On the hem of the robe they made pomegranates of blue, purple, and crimson yarns, twisted.
39.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲshׂvּ֙ aַl־shׁvּlֵ֣y hַmְּaִ֔yl rִmּvֹnֵ֕y tְּkֵ֥lֶt vְaַrְgָּmָ֖ן vְtvֹlַ֣aַt shָׁnִ֑y mׇshְׁzָֽr׃

39.hebrewText: וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ פַעֲמֹנֵ֖י זָהָ֣ב טָה֑וֹר וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ אֶת־הַפַּֽעֲמֹנִ֜ים בְּת֣וֹךְ הָרִמֹּנִ֗ים עַל־שׁוּלֵ֤י הַמְּעִיל֙ סָבִ֔יב בְּת֖וֹךְ הָרִמֹּנִֽים׃
39.englishText: They also made bells of pure gold, and attached the bells between the pomegranates, all around the hem of the robe, between the pomegranates:
39.transliteration: vַyַּaֲshׂ֥vּ pַaֲmֹnֵ֖y zָhָ֣b tָh֑vֹr vַyִּtְּn֨vּ aֶt־hַpַּֽaֲmֹnִ֜yם bְּt֣vֹךְ hָrִmֹּnִ֗yם aַl־shׁvּlֵ֤y hַmְּaִyl֙ sָbִ֔yb bְּt֖vֹךְ hָrִmֹּnִֽyם׃

39.hebrewText: פַּעֲמֹ֤ן וְרִמֹּן֙ פַּעֲמֹ֣ן וְרִמֹּ֔ן עַל־שׁוּלֵ֥י הַמְּעִ֖יל סָבִ֑יב לְשָׁרֵ֕ת כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
39.englishText: a bell and a pomegranate, a bell and a pomegranate, all around the hem of the robe for officiating in—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
39.transliteration: pַּaֲmֹ֤ן vְrִmֹּן֙ pַּaֲmֹ֣ן vְrִmֹּ֔ן aַl־shׁvּlֵ֥y hַmְּaִ֖yl sָbִ֑yb lְshָׁrֵ֕t kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

39.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֛וּ אֶת־הַכׇּתְנֹ֥ת שֵׁ֖שׁ מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה אֹרֵ֑ג לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן וּלְבָנָֽיו׃
39.englishText: They made the tunics of fine linen, of woven work, for Aaron and his sons;
39.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲshׂ֛vּ aֶt־hַkׇּtְnֹ֥t shֵׁ֖shׁ mַaֲshֵׂ֣h aֹrֵ֑g lְaַhֲrֹ֖ן vּlְbָnָֽyv׃

39.hebrewText: וְאֵת֙ הַמִּצְנֶ֣פֶת שֵׁ֔שׁ וְאֶת־פַּאֲרֵ֥י הַמִּגְבָּעֹ֖ת שֵׁ֑שׁ וְאֶת־מִכְנְסֵ֥י הַבָּ֖ד שֵׁ֥שׁ מׇשְׁזָֽר׃
39.englishText: and the headdress of fine linen, and the decorated turbans of fine linen, and the linen breeches of fine twisted linen;
39.transliteration: vְaֵt֙ hַmִּtsְnֶ֣pֶt shֵׁ֔shׁ vְaֶt־pַּaֲrֵ֥y hַmִּgְbָּaֹ֖t shֵׁ֑shׁ vְaֶt־mִkְnְsֵ֥y hַbָּ֖d shֵׁ֥shׁ mׇshְׁzָֽr׃

39.hebrewText: וְֽאֶת־הָאַבְנֵ֞ט שֵׁ֣שׁ מׇשְׁזָ֗ר וּתְכֵ֧לֶת וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן וְתוֹלַ֥עַת שָׁנִ֖י מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה רֹקֵ֑ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
39.englishText: and sashes of fine twisted linen, blue, purple, and crimson yarns, done in embroidery—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
39.transliteration: vְֽaֶt־hָaַbְnֵ֞t shֵׁ֣shׁ mׇshְׁzָ֗r vּtְkֵ֧lֶt vְaַrְgָּmָ֛ן vְtvֹlַ֥aַt shָׁnִ֖y mַaֲshֵׂ֣h rֹkֵ֑ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

39.hebrewText: וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֛וּ אֶת־צִ֥יץ נֵֽזֶר־הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ זָהָ֣ב טָה֑וֹר וַיִּכְתְּב֣וּ עָלָ֗יו מִכְתַּב֙ פִּתּוּחֵ֣י חוֹתָ֔ם קֹ֖דֶשׁ לַיהֹוָֽה׃
39.englishText: They made the frontlet for the holy diadem of pure gold, and incised upon it the seal inscription: “Holy to יהוה.”
39.transliteration: vַֽyַּaֲshׂ֛vּ aֶt־tsִ֥yץ nֵֽzֶr־hַkֹּ֖dֶshׁ zָhָ֣b tָh֑vֹr vַyִּkְtְּb֣vּ aָlָ֗yv mִkְtַּb֙ pִּtּvּchֵ֣y chvֹtָ֔ם kֹ֖dֶshׁ lַyhֹvָֽh׃

39.hebrewText: וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ עָלָיו֙ פְּתִ֣יל תְּכֵ֔לֶת לָתֵ֥ת עַל־הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת מִלְמָ֑עְלָה כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
39.englishText: They attached to it a cord of blue to fix it upon the headdress above—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
39.transliteration: vַyִּtְּn֤vּ aָlָyv֙ pְּtִ֣yl tְּkֵ֔lֶt lָtֵ֥t aַl־hַmִּtsְnֶ֖pֶt mִlְmָ֑aְlָh kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

39.hebrewText: וַתֵּ֕כֶל כׇּל־עֲבֹדַ֕ת מִשְׁכַּ֖ן אֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֑ד וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל כְּ֠כֹ֠ל אֲשֶׁ֨ר צִוָּ֧ה יְהֹוָ֛ה אֶת־מֹשֶׁ֖ה כֵּ֥ן עָשֽׂוּ׃ {פ}
39.englishText: Thus was completed all the work of the Tabernacle of the Tent of Meeting. The Israelites did so; just as יהוה had commanded Moses, so they did.
39.transliteration: vַtֵּ֕kֶl kׇּl־aֲbֹdַ֕t mִshְׁkַּ֖ן aֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֑d vַֽyַּaֲshׂvּ֙ bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l kְּ֠kֹ֠l aֲshֶׁ֨r tsִvָּ֧h yְhֹvָ֛h aֶt־mֹshֶׁ֖h kֵּ֥ן aָshֽׂvּ׃ {p}

39.hebrewText: וַיָּבִ֤יאוּ אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֔ה אֶת־הָאֹ֖הֶל וְאֶת־כׇּל־כֵּלָ֑יו קְרָסָ֣יו קְרָשָׁ֔יו בְּרִיחָ֖ו וְעַמֻּדָ֥יו וַאֲדָנָֽיו׃
39.englishText: Then they brought the Tabernacle to Moses, with the Tent and all its furnishings: its clasps, its planks, its bars, its posts, and its sockets;
39.transliteration: vַyָּbִ֤yavּ aֶt־hַmִּshְׁkָּן֙ aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֔h aֶt־hָaֹ֖hֶl vְaֶt־kׇּl־kֵּlָ֑yv kְrָsָ֣yv kְrָshָׁ֔yv bְּrִychָ֖v vְaַmֻּdָ֥yv vַaֲdָnָֽyv׃

39.hebrewText: וְאֶת־מִכְסֵ֞ה עוֹרֹ֤ת הָֽאֵילִם֙ הַמְאׇדָּמִ֔ים וְאֶת־מִכְסֵ֖ה עֹרֹ֣ת הַתְּחָשִׁ֑ים וְאֵ֖ת פָּרֹ֥כֶת הַמָּסָֽךְ׃
39.englishText: the covering of tanned ram skins, the covering of dolphin skins, and the curtain for the screen;
39.transliteration: vְaֶt־mִkְsֵ֞h avֹrֹ֤t hָֽaֵylִם֙ hַmְaׇdָּmִ֔yם vְaֶt־mִkְsֵ֖h aֹrֹ֣t hַtְּchָshִׁ֑yם vְaֵ֖t pָּrֹ֥kֶt hַmָּsָֽךְ׃

39.hebrewText: אֶת־אֲר֥וֹן הָעֵדֻ֖ת וְאֶת־בַּדָּ֑יו וְאֵ֖ת הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃
39.englishText: the Ark of the Pact and its poles, and the cover;
39.transliteration: aֶt־aֲr֥vֹן hָaֵdֻ֖t vְaֶt־bַּdָּ֑yv vְaֵ֖t hַkַּpֹּֽrֶt׃

39.hebrewText: אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ אֶת־כׇּל־כֵּלָ֔יו וְאֵ֖ת לֶ֥חֶם הַפָּנִֽים׃
39.englishText: the table and all its utensils, and the bread of display;
39.transliteration: aֶt־hַshֻּׁlְchָן֙ aֶt־kׇּl־kֵּlָ֔yv vְaֵ֖t lֶ֥chֶם hַpָּnִֽyם׃

39.hebrewText: אֶת־הַמְּנֹרָ֨ה הַטְּהֹרָ֜ה אֶת־נֵרֹתֶ֗יהָ נֵרֹ֛ת הַמַּֽעֲרָכָ֖ה וְאֶת־כׇּל־כֵּלֶ֑יהָ וְאֵ֖ת שֶׁ֥מֶן הַמָּאֽוֹר׃
39.englishText: the pure lampstand,*pure lampstand See note at 31.8. its lamps—lamps in due order—and all its fittings, and the oil for lighting;
39.transliteration: aֶt־hַmְּnֹrָ֨h hַtְּhֹrָ֜h aֶt־nֵrֹtֶ֗yhָ nֵrֹ֛t hַmַּֽaֲrָkָ֖h vְaֶt־kׇּl־kֵּlֶ֑yhָ vְaֵ֖t shֶׁ֥mֶן hַmָּaֽvֹr׃

39.hebrewText: וְאֵת֙ מִזְבַּ֣ח הַזָּהָ֔ב וְאֵת֙ שֶׁ֣מֶן הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה וְאֵ֖ת קְטֹ֣רֶת הַסַּמִּ֑ים וְאֵ֕ת מָסַ֖ךְ פֶּ֥תַח הָאֹֽהֶל׃
39.englishText: the altar of gold, the oil for anointing, the aromatic incense, and the screen for the entrance of the Tent;
39.transliteration: vְaֵt֙ mִzְbַּ֣ch hַzָּhָ֔b vְaֵt֙ shֶׁ֣mֶן hַmִּshְׁchָ֔h vְaֵ֖t kְtֹ֣rֶt hַsַּmִּ֑yם vְaֵ֕t mָsַ֖ךְ pֶּ֥tַch hָaֹֽhֶl׃

39.hebrewText: אֵ֣ת ׀ מִזְבַּ֣ח הַנְּחֹ֗שֶׁת וְאֶת־מִכְבַּ֤ר הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ אֲשֶׁר־ל֔וֹ אֶת־בַּדָּ֖יו וְאֶת־כׇּל־כֵּלָ֑יו אֶת־הַכִּיֹּ֖ר וְאֶת־כַּנּֽוֹ׃
39.englishText: the copper altar with its copper grating, its poles and all its utensils, and the laver and its stand;
39.transliteration: aֵ֣t ׀ mִzְbַּ֣ch hַnְּchֹ֗shֶׁt vְaֶt־mִkְbַּ֤r hַnְּchֹ֙shֶׁt֙ aֲshֶׁr־l֔vֹ aֶt־bַּdָּ֖yv vְaֶt־kׇּl־kֵּlָ֑yv aֶt־hַkִּyֹּ֖r vְaֶt־kַּnּֽvֹ׃

39.hebrewText: אֵת֩ קַלְעֵ֨י הֶחָצֵ֜ר אֶת־עַמֻּדֶ֣יהָ וְאֶת־אֲדָנֶ֗יהָ וְאֶת־הַמָּסָךְ֙ לְשַׁ֣עַר הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר אֶת־מֵיתָרָ֖יו וִיתֵדֹתֶ֑יהָ וְאֵ֗ת כׇּל־כְּלֵ֛י עֲבֹדַ֥ת הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן לְאֹ֥הֶל מוֹעֵֽד׃
39.englishText: the hangings of the enclosure, its posts and its sockets, the screen for the gate of the enclosure, its cords and its pegs—all the furnishings for the service of the Tabernacle, the Tent of Meeting;
39.transliteration: aֵt֩ kַlְaֵ֨y hֶchָtsֵ֜r aֶt־aַmֻּdֶ֣yhָ vְaֶt־aֲdָnֶ֗yhָ vְaֶt־hַmָּsָךְ֙ lְshַׁ֣aַr hֶֽchָtsֵ֔r aֶt־mֵytָrָ֖yv vִytֵdֹtֶ֑yhָ vְaֵ֗t kׇּl־kְּlֵ֛y aֲbֹdַ֥t hַmִּshְׁkָּ֖ן lְaֹ֥hֶl mvֹaֵֽd׃

39.hebrewText: אֶת־בִּגְדֵ֥י הַשְּׂרָ֖ד לְשָׁרֵ֣ת בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ אֶת־בִּגְדֵ֤י הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן הַכֹּהֵ֔ן וְאֶת־בִּגְדֵ֥י בָנָ֖יו לְכַהֵֽן׃
39.englishText: the service vestments for officiating in the sanctuary, the sacral vestments of Aaron the priest, and the vestments of his sons for priestly service.
39.transliteration: aֶt־bִּgְdֵ֥y hַshְּׂrָ֖d lְshָׁrֵ֣t bַּkֹּ֑dֶshׁ aֶt־bִּgְdֵ֤y hַkֹּ֙dֶshׁ֙ lְaַhֲrֹ֣ן hַkֹּhֵ֔ן vְaֶt־bִּgְdֵ֥y bָnָ֖yv lְkַhֵֽן׃

39.hebrewText: כְּכֹ֛ל אֲשֶׁר־צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶׁ֑ה כֵּ֤ן עָשׂוּ֙ בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל אֵ֖ת כׇּל־הָעֲבֹדָֽה׃
39.englishText: Just as יהוה had commanded Moses, so the Israelites had done all the work.
39.transliteration: kְּkֹ֛l aֲshֶׁr־tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶׁ֑h kֵּ֤ן aָshׂvּ֙ bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֔l aֵ֖t kׇּl־hָaֲbֹdָֽh׃

39.hebrewText: וַיַּ֨רְא מֹשֶׁ֜ה אֶת־כׇּל־הַמְּלָאכָ֗ה וְהִנֵּה֙ עָשׂ֣וּ אֹתָ֔הּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה כֵּ֣ן עָשׂ֑וּ וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ אֹתָ֖ם מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {פ}
39.englishText: And when Moses saw that they had performed all the tasks—as יהוה had commanded, so they had done—Moses blessed them.
39.transliteration: vַyַּ֨rְa mֹshֶׁ֜h aֶt־kׇּl־hַmְּlָakָ֗h vְhִnֵּh֙ aָshׂ֣vּ aֹtָ֔hּ kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h kֵּ֣ן aָshׂ֑vּ vַyְbָ֥rֶךְ aֹtָ֖ם mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {p}

40.hebrewText: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶל־מֹשֶׁ֥ה לֵּאמֹֽר׃
40.englishText: And יהוה spoke to Moses, saying:
40.transliteration: vַyְdַbֵּ֥r yְhֹvָ֖h aֶl־mֹshֶׁ֥h lֵּamֹֽr׃

40.hebrewText: בְּיוֹם־הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן בְּאֶחָ֣ד לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ תָּקִ֕ים אֶת־מִשְׁכַּ֖ן אֹ֥הֶל מוֹעֵֽד׃
40.englishText: On the first day of the first month you shall set up the Tabernacle of the Tent of Meeting.
40.transliteration: bְּyvֹם־hַchֹ֥dֶshׁ hָrִashׁ֖vֹן bְּaֶchָ֣d lַchֹ֑dֶshׁ tָּkִ֕yם aֶt־mִshְׁkַּ֖ן aֹ֥hֶl mvֹaֵֽd׃

40.hebrewText: וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ שָׁ֔ם אֵ֖ת אֲר֣וֹן הָעֵד֑וּת וְסַכֹּתָ֥ עַל־הָאָרֹ֖ן אֶת־הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃
40.englishText: Place there the Ark of the Pact, and screen off the ark with the curtain.
40.transliteration: vְshַׂmְtָּ֣ shָׁ֔ם aֵ֖t aֲr֣vֹן hָaֵd֑vּt vְsַkֹּtָ֥ aַl־hָaָrֹ֖ן aֶt־hַpָּrֹֽkֶt׃

40.hebrewText: וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָ֔ן וְעָרַכְתָּ֖ אֶת־עֶרְכּ֑וֹ וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ אֶת־הַמְּנֹרָ֔ה וְהַעֲלֵיתָ֖ אֶת־נֵרֹתֶֽיהָ׃
40.englishText: Bring in the table and lay out its due setting; bring in the lampstand and light its lamps;
40.transliteration: vְhֵbֵatָ֙ aֶt־hַshֻּׁlְchָ֔ן vְaָrַkְtָּ֖ aֶt־aֶrְkּ֑vֹ vְhֵbֵatָ֙ aֶt־hַmְּnֹrָ֔h vְhַaֲlֵytָ֖ aֶt־nֵrֹtֶֽyhָ׃

40.hebrewText: וְנָתַתָּ֞ה אֶת־מִזְבַּ֤ח הַזָּהָב֙ לִקְטֹ֔רֶת לִפְנֵ֖י אֲר֣וֹן הָעֵדֻ֑ת וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ אֶת־מָסַ֥ךְ הַפֶּ֖תַח לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃
40.englishText: and place the gold altar of incense before the Ark of the Pact. Then put up the screen for the entrance of the Tabernacle.
40.transliteration: vְnָtַtָּ֞h aֶt־mִzְbַּ֤ch hַzָּhָb֙ lִkְtֹ֔rֶt lִpְnֵ֖y aֲr֣vֹן hָaֵdֻ֑t vְshַׂmְtָּ֛ aֶt־mָsַ֥ךְ hַpֶּ֖tַch lַmִּshְׁkָּֽן׃

40.hebrewText: וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה אֵ֖ת מִזְבַּ֣ח הָעֹלָ֑ה לִפְנֵ֕י פֶּ֖תַח מִשְׁכַּ֥ן אֹֽהֶל־מוֹעֵֽד׃
40.englishText: You shall place the altar of burnt offering before the entrance of the Tabernacle of the Tent of Meeting.
40.transliteration: vְnָ֣tַtָּ֔h aֵ֖t mִzְbַּ֣ch hָaֹlָ֑h lִpְnֵ֕y pֶּ֖tַch mִshְׁkַּ֥ן aֹֽhֶl־mvֹaֵֽd׃

40.hebrewText: וְנָֽתַתָּ֙ אֶת־הַכִּיֹּ֔ר בֵּֽין־אֹ֥הֶל מוֹעֵ֖ד וּבֵ֣ין הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ וְנָתַתָּ֥ שָׁ֖ם מָֽיִם׃
40.englishText: Place the laver between the Tent of Meeting and the altar, and put water in it.
40.transliteration: vְnָֽtַtָּ֙ aֶt־hַkִּyֹּ֔r bֵּֽyן־aֹ֥hֶl mvֹaֵ֖d vּbֵ֣yן hַmִּzְbֵּ֑chַ vְnָtַtָּ֥ shָׁ֖ם mָֽyִם׃

40.hebrewText: וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ אֶת־הֶחָצֵ֖ר סָבִ֑יב וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ אֶת־מָסַ֖ךְ שַׁ֥עַר הֶחָצֵֽר׃
40.englishText: Set up the enclosure round about, and put in place the screen for the gate of the enclosure.
40.transliteration: vְshַׂmְtָּ֥ aֶt־hֶchָtsֵ֖r sָbִ֑yb vְnָ֣tַtָּ֔ aֶt־mָsַ֖ךְ shַׁ֥aַr hֶchָtsֵֽr׃

40.hebrewText: וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ אֶת־שֶׁ֣מֶן הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן וְאֶת־כׇּל־אֲשֶׁר־בּ֑וֹ וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ אֹת֛וֹ וְאֶת־כׇּל־כֵּלָ֖יו וְהָ֥יָה קֹֽדֶשׁ׃
40.englishText: You shall take the anointing oil and anoint the Tabernacle and all that is in it to consecrate it and all its furnishings, so that it shall be holy.
40.transliteration: vְlָkַchְtָּ֙ aֶt־shֶׁ֣mֶן hַmִּshְׁchָ֔h vּmָshַׁchְtָּ֥ aֶt־hַmִּshְׁkָּ֖ן vְaֶt־kׇּl־aֲshֶׁr־bּ֑vֹ vְkִdַּshְׁtָּ֥ aֹt֛vֹ vְaֶt־kׇּl־kֵּlָ֖yv vְhָ֥yָh kֹֽdֶshׁ׃

40.hebrewText: וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֛ אֶת־מִזְבַּ֥ח הָעֹלָ֖ה וְאֶת־כׇּל־כֵּלָ֑יו וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֙ אֶת־הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ וְהָיָ֥ה הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ קֹ֥דֶשׁ קׇֽדָשִֽׁים׃
40.englishText: Then anoint the altar of burnt offering and all its utensils to consecrate the altar, so that the altar shall be most holy.
40.transliteration: vּmָshַׁchְtָּ֛ aֶt־mִzְbַּ֥ch hָaֹlָ֖h vְaֶt־kׇּl־kֵּlָ֑yv vְkִdַּshְׁtָּ֙ aֶt־hַmִּzְbֵּ֔chַ vְhָyָ֥h hַmִּzְbֵּ֖chַ kֹ֥dֶshׁ kׇֽdָshִֽׁyם׃

40.hebrewText: וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ אֶת־הַכִּיֹּ֖ר וְאֶת־כַּנּ֑וֹ וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֖ אֹתֽוֹ׃
40.englishText: And anoint the laver and its stand to consecrate it.
40.transliteration: vּmָshַׁchְtָּ֥ aֶt־hַkִּyֹּ֖r vְaֶt־kַּnּ֑vֹ vְkִdַּshְׁtָּ֖ aֹtֽvֹ׃

40.hebrewText: וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֤ אֶֽת־אַהֲרֹן֙ וְאֶת־בָּנָ֔יו אֶל־פֶּ֖תַח אֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֑ד וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ אֹתָ֖ם בַּמָּֽיִם׃
40.englishText: You shall bring Aaron and his sons forward to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting and wash them with the water.
40.transliteration: vְhִkְrַbְtָּ֤ aֶֽt־aַhֲrֹן֙ vְaֶt־bָּnָ֔yv aֶl־pֶּ֖tַch aֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֑d vְrָchַtsְtָּ֥ aֹtָ֖ם bַּmָּֽyִם׃

40.hebrewText: וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֙ אֶֽת־אַהֲרֹ֔ן אֵ֖ת בִּגְדֵ֣י הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ אֹת֛וֹ וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ אֹת֖וֹ וְכִהֵ֥ן לִֽי׃
40.englishText: Put the sacral vestments on Aaron, and anoint him and consecrate him, that he may serve Me as priest.
40.transliteration: vְhִlְbַּshְׁtָּ֙ aֶֽt־aַhֲrֹ֔ן aֵ֖t bִּgְdֵ֣y hַkֹּ֑dֶshׁ vּmָshַׁchְtָּ֥ aֹt֛vֹ vְkִdַּshְׁtָּ֥ aֹt֖vֹ vְkִhֵ֥ן lִֽy׃

40.hebrewText: וְאֶת־בָּנָ֖יו תַּקְרִ֑יב וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֥ אֹתָ֖ם כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃
40.englishText: Then bring his sons forward, put tunics on them,
40.transliteration: vְaֶt־bָּnָ֖yv tַּkְrִ֑yb vְhִlְbַּshְׁtָּ֥ aֹtָ֖ם kֻּtֳּnֹֽt׃

40.hebrewText: וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ אֹתָ֗ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר מָשַׁ֙חְתָּ֙ אֶת־אֲבִיהֶ֔ם וְכִהֲנ֖וּ לִ֑י וְ֠הָיְתָ֠ה לִהְיֹ֨ת לָהֶ֧ם מׇשְׁחָתָ֛ם לִכְהֻנַּ֥ת עוֹלָ֖ם לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃
40.englishText: and anoint them as you have anointed their father, that they may serve Me as priests. This their anointing shall serve them for everlasting priesthood throughout the ages.
40.transliteration: vּmָshַׁchְtָּ֣ aֹtָ֗ם kַּaֲshֶׁ֤r mָshַׁ֙chְtָּ֙ aֶt־aֲbִyhֶ֔ם vְkִhֲn֖vּ lִ֑y vְ֠hָyְtָ֠h lִhְyֹ֨t lָhֶ֧ם mׇshְׁchָtָ֛ם lִkְhֻnַּ֥t avֹlָ֖ם lְdֹrֹtָֽם׃

40.hebrewText: וַיַּ֖עַשׂ מֹשֶׁ֑ה כְּ֠כֹ֠ל אֲשֶׁ֨ר צִוָּ֧ה יְהֹוָ֛ה אֹת֖וֹ כֵּ֥ן עָשָֽׂה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: This Moses did; just as יהוה had commanded him, so he did.
40.transliteration: vַyַּ֖aַshׂ mֹshֶׁ֑h kְּ֠kֹ֠l aֲshֶׁ֨r tsִvָּ֧h yְhֹvָ֛h aֹt֖vֹ kֵּ֥ן aָshָֽׂh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיְהִ֞י בַּחֹ֧דֶשׁ הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית בְּאֶחָ֣ד לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ הוּקַ֖ם הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃
40.englishText: In the first month of the second year, on the first of the month, the Tabernacle was set up.
40.transliteration: vַyְhִ֞y bַּchֹ֧dֶshׁ hָrִashׁ֛vֹן bַּshָּׁnָ֥h hַshֵּׁnִ֖yt bְּaֶchָ֣d lַchֹ֑dֶshׁ hvּkַ֖ם hַmִּshְׁkָּֽן׃

40.hebrewText: וַיָּ֨קֶם מֹשֶׁ֜ה אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ן וַיִּתֵּן֙ אֶת־אֲדָנָ֔יו וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ אֶת־קְרָשָׁ֔יו וַיִּתֵּ֖ן אֶת־בְּרִיחָ֑יו וַיָּ֖קֶם אֶת־עַמּוּדָֽיו׃
40.englishText: Moses set up the Tabernacle, placing its sockets, setting up its planks, inserting its bars, and erecting its posts.
40.transliteration: vַyָּ֨kֶם mֹshֶׁ֜h aֶt־hַmִּshְׁkָּ֗ן vַyִּtֵּן֙ aֶt־aֲdָnָ֔yv vַyָּ֙shֶׂם֙ aֶt־kְrָshָׁ֔yv vַyִּtֵּ֖ן aֶt־bְּrִychָ֑yv vַyָּ֖kֶם aֶt־aַmּvּdָֽyv׃

40.hebrewText: וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ אֶת־הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ עַל־הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן וַיָּ֜שֶׂם אֶת־מִכְסֵ֥ה הָאֹ֛הֶל עָלָ֖יו מִלְמָ֑עְלָה כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: He spread the tent over the Tabernacle, placing the covering of the tent on top of it—just as יהוה had commanded Moses.
40.transliteration: vַyִּpְrֹ֤shׂ aֶt־hָaֹ֙hֶl֙ aַl־hַmִּshְׁkָּ֔ן vַyָּ֜shֶׂם aֶt־mִkְsֵ֥h hָaֹ֛hֶl aָlָ֖yv mִlְmָ֑aְlָh kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיִּקַּ֞ח וַיִּתֵּ֤ן אֶת־הָעֵדֻת֙ אֶל־הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן וַיָּ֥שֶׂם אֶת־הַבַּדִּ֖ים עַל־הָאָרֹ֑ן וַיִּתֵּ֧ן אֶת־הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת עַל־הָאָרֹ֖ן מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃
40.englishText: He took the Pact and placed it in the ark; he fixed the poles to the ark, placed the cover on top of the ark,
40.transliteration: vַyִּkַּ֞ch vַyִּtֵּ֤ן aֶt־hָaֵdֻt֙ aֶl־hָ֣aָrֹ֔ן vַyָּ֥shֶׂם aֶt־hַbַּdִּ֖yם aַl־hָaָrֹ֑ן vַyִּtֵּ֧ן aֶt־hַkַּpֹּ֛rֶt aַl־hָaָrֹ֖ן mִlְmָֽaְlָh׃

40.hebrewText: וַיָּבֵ֣א אֶת־הָאָרֹן֮ אֶל־הַמִּשְׁכָּן֒ וַיָּ֗שֶׂם אֵ֚ת פָּרֹ֣כֶת הַמָּסָ֔ךְ וַיָּ֕סֶךְ עַ֖ל אֲר֣וֹן הָעֵד֑וּת כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: and brought the ark inside the Tabernacle. Then he put up the curtain for screening, and screened off the Ark of the Pact—just as יהוה had commanded Moses.
40.transliteration: vַyָּbֵ֣a aֶt־hָaָrֹן֮ aֶl־hַmִּshְׁkָּן֒ vַyָּ֗shֶׂם aֵ֚t pָּrֹ֣kֶt hַmָּsָ֔ךְ vַyָּ֕sֶךְ aַ֖l aֲr֣vֹן hָaֵd֑vּt kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיִּתֵּ֤ן אֶת־הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ בְּאֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֔ד עַ֛ל יֶ֥רֶךְ הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן צָפֹ֑נָה מִח֖וּץ לַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃
40.englishText: He placed the table in the Tent of Meeting, outside the curtain, on the north side of the Tabernacle.
40.transliteration: vַyִּtֵּ֤ן aֶt־hַshֻּׁlְchָן֙ bְּaֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֔d aַ֛l yֶ֥rֶךְ hַmִּshְׁkָּ֖ן tsָpֹ֑nָh mִch֖vּץ lַpָּrֹֽkֶt׃

40.hebrewText: וַיַּעֲרֹ֥ךְ עָלָ֛יו עֵ֥רֶךְ לֶ֖חֶם לִפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: Upon it he laid out the setting of bread before יהוה —as יהוה had commanded Moses.
40.transliteration: vַyַּaֲrֹ֥ךְ aָlָ֛yv aֵ֥rֶךְ lֶ֖chֶם lִpְnֵ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיָּ֤שֶׂם אֶת־הַמְּנֹרָה֙ בְּאֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֔ד נֹ֖כַח הַשֻּׁלְחָ֑ן עַ֛ל יֶ֥רֶךְ הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן נֶֽגְבָּה׃
40.englishText: He placed the lampstand in the Tent of Meeting opposite the table, on the south side of the Tabernacle.
40.transliteration: vַyָּ֤shֶׂם aֶt־hַmְּnֹrָh֙ bְּaֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֔d nֹ֖kַch hַshֻּׁlְchָ֑ן aַ֛l yֶ֥rֶךְ hַmִּshְׁkָּ֖ן nֶֽgְbָּh׃

40.hebrewText: וַיַּ֥עַל הַנֵּרֹ֖ת לִפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: And he lit the lamps before יהוה —as יהוה had commanded Moses.
40.transliteration: vַyַּ֥aַl hַnֵּrֹ֖t lִpְnֵ֣y yְhֹvָ֑h kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיָּ֛שֶׂם אֶת־מִזְבַּ֥ח הַזָּהָ֖ב בְּאֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֑ד לִפְנֵ֖י הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃
40.englishText: He placed the altar of gold in the Tent of Meeting, before the curtain.
40.transliteration: vַyָּ֛shֶׂם aֶt־mִzְbַּ֥ch hַzָּhָ֖b bְּaֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֑d lִpְnֵ֖y hַpָּrֹֽkֶt׃

40.hebrewText: וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר עָלָ֖יו קְטֹ֣רֶת סַמִּ֑ים כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: On it he burned aromatic incense—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
40.transliteration: vַyַּkְtֵ֥r aָlָ֖yv kְtֹ֣rֶt sַmִּ֑yם kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיָּ֛שֶׂם אֶת־מָסַ֥ךְ הַפֶּ֖תַח לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃
40.englishText: Then he put up the screen for the entrance of the Tabernacle.
40.transliteration: vַyָּ֛shֶׂם aֶt־mָsַ֥ךְ hַpֶּ֖tַch lַmִּshְׁkָּֽן׃

40.hebrewText: וְאֵת֙ מִזְבַּ֣ח הָעֹלָ֔ה שָׂ֕ם פֶּ֖תַח מִשְׁכַּ֣ן אֹֽהֶל־מוֹעֵ֑ד וַיַּ֣עַל עָלָ֗יו אֶת־הָעֹלָה֙ וְאֶת־הַמִּנְחָ֔ה כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: At the entrance of the Tabernacle of the Tent of Meeting he placed the altar of burnt offering. On it he offered up the burnt offering and the meal offering—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
40.transliteration: vְaֵt֙ mִzְbַּ֣ch hָaֹlָ֔h shָׂ֕ם pֶּ֖tַch mִshְׁkַּ֣ן aֹֽhֶl־mvֹaֵ֑d vַyַּ֣aַl aָlָ֗yv aֶt־hָaֹlָh֙ vְaֶt־hַmִּnְchָ֔h kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ אֶת־הַכִּיֹּ֔ר בֵּֽין־אֹ֥הֶל מוֹעֵ֖ד וּבֵ֣ין הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ וַיִּתֵּ֥ן שָׁ֛מָּה מַ֖יִם לְרׇחְצָֽה׃
40.englishText: He placed the laver between the Tent of Meeting and the altar, and put water in it for washing.
40.transliteration: vַyָּ֙shֶׂם֙ aֶt־hַkִּyֹּ֔r bֵּֽyן־aֹ֥hֶl mvֹaֵ֖d vּbֵ֣yן hַmִּzְbֵּ֑chַ vַyִּtֵּ֥ן shָׁ֛mָּh mַ֖yִם lְrׇchְtsָֽh׃

40.hebrewText: וְרָחֲצ֣וּ מִמֶּ֔נּוּ מֹשֶׁ֖ה וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן וּבָנָ֑יו אֶת־יְדֵיהֶ֖ם וְאֶת־רַגְלֵיהֶֽם׃
40.englishText: From it Moses and Aaron and his sons would wash their hands and feet;
40.transliteration: vְrָchֲts֣vּ mִmֶּ֔nּvּ mֹshֶׁ֖h vְaַhֲrֹ֣ן vּbָnָ֑yv aֶt־yְdֵyhֶ֖ם vְaֶt־rַgְlֵyhֶֽם׃

40.hebrewText: בְּבֹאָ֞ם אֶל־אֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֗ד וּבְקׇרְבָתָ֛ם אֶל־הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ יִרְחָ֑צוּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר צִוָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֖ה אֶת־מֹשֶֽׁה׃ {ס}
40.englishText: they washed when they entered the Tent of Meeting and when they approached the altar—as יהוה had commanded Moses.
40.transliteration: bְּbֹaָ֞ם aֶl־aֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֗d vּbְkׇrְbָtָ֛ם aֶl־hַmִּzְbֵּ֖chַ yִrְchָ֑tsvּ kַּaֲshֶׁ֛r tsִvָּ֥h yְhֹvָ֖h aֶt־mֹshֶֽׁh׃ {s}

40.hebrewText: וַיָּ֣קֶם אֶת־הֶחָצֵ֗ר סָבִיב֙ לַמִּשְׁכָּ֣ן וְלַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ וַיִּתֵּ֕ן אֶת־מָסַ֖ךְ שַׁ֣עַר הֶחָצֵ֑ר וַיְכַ֥ל מֹשֶׁ֖ה אֶת־הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ {פ}
40.englishText: And he set up the enclosure around the Tabernacle and the altar, and put up the screen for the gate of the enclosure. When Moses had finished the work,
40.transliteration: vַyָּ֣kֶם aֶt־hֶchָtsֵ֗r sָbִyb֙ lַmִּshְׁkָּ֣ן vְlַmִּzְbֵּ֔chַ vַyִּtֵּ֕ן aֶt־mָsַ֖ךְ shַׁ֣aַr hֶchָtsֵ֑r vַyְkַ֥l mֹshֶׁ֖h aֶt־hַmְּlָakָֽh׃ {p}

40.hebrewText: וַיְכַ֥ס הֶעָנָ֖ן אֶת־אֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֑ד וּכְב֣וֹד יְהֹוָ֔ה מָלֵ֖א אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃
40.englishText: the cloud covered the Tent of Meeting, and the Presence of יהוה filled the Tabernacle.
40.transliteration: vַyְkַ֥s hֶaָnָ֖ן aֶt־aֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֑d vּkְb֣vֹd yְhֹvָ֔h mָlֵ֖a aֶt־hַmִּshְׁkָּֽן׃

40.hebrewText: וְלֹא־יָכֹ֣ל מֹשֶׁ֗ה לָבוֹא֙ אֶל־אֹ֣הֶל מוֹעֵ֔ד כִּֽי־שָׁכַ֥ן עָלָ֖יו הֶעָנָ֑ן וּכְב֣וֹד יְהֹוָ֔ה מָלֵ֖א אֶת־הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃
40.englishText: Moses could not enter the Tent of Meeting, because the cloud had settled upon it and the Presence of יהוה filled the Tabernacle.
40.transliteration: vְlֹa־yָkֹ֣l mֹshֶׁ֗h lָbvֹa֙ aֶl־aֹ֣hֶl mvֹaֵ֔d kִּֽy־shָׁkַ֥ן aָlָ֖yv hֶaָnָ֑ן vּkְb֣vֹd yְhֹvָ֔h mָlֵ֖a aֶt־hַmִּshְׁkָּֽן׃

40.hebrewText: וּבְהֵעָל֤וֹת הֶֽעָנָן֙ מֵעַ֣ל הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן יִסְע֖וּ בְּנֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל בְּכֹ֖ל מַסְעֵיהֶֽם׃
40.englishText: When the cloud lifted from the Tabernacle, the Israelites would set out, on their various journeys;
40.transliteration: vּbְhֵaָl֤vֹt hֶֽaָnָן֙ mֵaַ֣l hַmִּshְׁkָּ֔ן yִsְa֖vּ bְּnֵ֣y yִshְׂrָaֵ֑l bְּkֹ֖l mַsְaֵyhֶֽם׃

40.hebrewText: וְאִם־לֹ֥א יֵעָלֶ֖ה הֶעָנָ֑ן וְלֹ֣א יִסְע֔וּ עַד־י֖וֹם הֵעָלֹתֽוֹ׃
40.englishText: but if the cloud did not lift, they would not set out until such time as it did lift.
40.transliteration: vְaִם־lֹ֥a yֵaָlֶ֖h hֶaָnָ֑ן vְlֹ֣a yִsְa֔vּ aַd־y֖vֹם hֵaָlֹtֽvֹ׃

40.hebrewText: כִּי֩ עֲנַ֨ן יְהֹוָ֤ה עַֽל־הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ יוֹמָ֔ם וְאֵ֕שׁ תִּהְיֶ֥ה לַ֖יְלָה בּ֑וֹ לְעֵינֵ֥י כׇל־בֵּֽית־יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל בְּכׇל־מַסְעֵיהֶֽם׃
40.englishText: For over the Tabernacle a cloud of יהוה rested by day, and fire would appear in it*in it I.e., in the cloud. by night, in the view of all the house of Israel throughout their journeys.
40.transliteration: kִּy֩ aֲnַ֨ן yְhֹvָ֤h aַֽl־hַmִּshְׁkָּן֙ yvֹmָ֔ם vְaֵ֕shׁ tִּhְyֶ֥h lַ֖yְlָh bּ֑vֹ lְaֵynֵ֥y kׇl־bֵּֽyt־yִshְׂrָaֵ֖l bְּkׇl־mַsְaֵyhֶֽם׃
